1a1(rgyud): rnam snang mngon sbyang gi rgyung bzhug s+ho// /
2a1(rgyud): // ma hA bai ro
2a2(rgyud): nanana.a b+hi sa bo d+hi/ ji
2b1(rgyud): ra bi ta a d+haSh+TA na bi pu l+ya su te/
2b2(rgyud): ra//
2b3(rgyud): rar dza na ma/ d+harme
2b4(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzod chen po ma
3a1(rgyud): pUraM byang chub pa/ rnam par
3a2(rgyud): sprul pa byin gyis rlob po/ shin tu rgyas
3a3(rgyud): bai/ mdo sde'i dpa' bo'i rgyal po zhes
3b1(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs/ bcom ldan 'das ngag gi dbang phyug la na/ bcom
3b2(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob pa/ rdo
3b3(rgyud): rje chen po rgya che ba/ chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang / rdo rje 'dzin thams cad 'du
3b4(rgyud): bde bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa rnam par rol pa/ mtha'
4a1(rgyud): // dang dbus med cing rtse mo mtho ba che po che'i rgyal
4a2(rgyud): bos shin du legs par brgyan pa 'byang ba'i khang bzangs chen po
4a3(rgyud): rin po che'i rgyal po'i nang ra/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi sreng
4a4(rgyud): go'i khril bzhugs te/ 'di lta ste rdo rje 'dzin/ na mkha' drim
4b1(rgyud): myed pa dang / namakha' la rnam par 'gro ba dang / na mkha' la 'byung ba dang / gos sna
4b2(rgyud): tshogs gyon pa dang / sna tshogs su rgyu dang / chos thams cad maunyam pa nyid la ga na sa pa
4b3(rgyud): pA dang / sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongs su skyob pa'i rdo rje dang / sred med kyi
4b4(rgyud): bu'i sra bcad dang / sred med kyi bu chen po'i stobs can dang / rdo rje bzung dang /
4b5(rgyud): rdo rje mchog gi shugs 'chang ba dang / dri ma med pa'i rdo rje dang / rdo rje dang cho ga
5a1(rgyud): 'chang ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha dang / spros pa
5a2(rgyud): med pa la gra nasra pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcud las nges par skyes
5a3(rgyud): pa dang / dri ma med pa'i mig dang / gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje dang / de dag
5a4(rgyud): la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul stong dang / thabs gcig
5a5(rgyud): tu bzhugs ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du bzang po dang / byams
5b1(rgyud): ba dang / 'jam drapal dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba la sogs pa drag gis kyang bskor cing mdun gyis/
5b2(rgyud): bltas pa la 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma dus gsum las 'das pa byin gyis brlab na/ sku dang / gsung dang
5b3(rgyud): thugs mnyam pa nyid kyi gzhi zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo'i chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po la sogs pa
5b4(rgyud): de dag dang / gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pa/ rdo rje 'dzin de dag dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
5b5(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sku mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zad pa'i rnam par sgyings pa la zhugs so// de bzhin du sku gsung thugs
5b6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid bkod pa mi zang po'i rnam par 'gyings pa la bzhugs ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku'am/
6a1(rgyud): gsung ngam/ thugs la ni 'jug pa'am/ ldog pa'i mi dmigs so// thams cad du yang ba
6a2(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi/ sku'i phrin las thams cad dang / gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad dang / thugs kyi 'phrin
6a3(rgyud): las thams cad dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad la kun du gsang sngags kyi tshul gyi tshig dag gis chos ston par mthong ba ni
6a4(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ sems can las kyi rnam par bskyed pa rnams/ sems dpo bskyed pa nas bzung ste/ sa bcu'i bar mnan pa 'di nyid
6a5(rgyud): la yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / las kyi tshe bkag pa rnams kyang srid pa'i myu gu mngon par 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje 'dzin
6a6(rgyud): pa'i lus 'dra ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang / phyag na pad ma'i lus 'dra ba phyogs bcun gsang sngags
6b1(rgyud): kyi tshul gyi tshig rnam par dag pa'i tshig dag gis chos ston pa dag mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje
6b2(rgyud): 'khor 'dus pa de nyid na 'dug pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par
6b3(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnyed nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de sems can rnams la
6b4(rgyud): rnam par phye ste/ tshul sna tshogs dang / bsam pa sna tshogs dag gis chos ston cing / kha cig lini nyan thos kyi theg pa'i tshul/ kha cig la
6b5(rgyud): ni rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i tshul/ kha cig la ni theg pa chen po'i tshul/ kha cig la ni mngon par shes pa lnga'i tshul/ kha cig la ni lhar
6b6(rgyud): skye bar bya ba dang / kha cig la ni mir ske bar ba ba nas/ lto 'ape chen po dang / ka dang / gnod srin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang /
7a1(rgyud): bya/ na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am cir skye bar bya ba'i bar du chos ston pa lags/ de la la la sangs rgyas kyis gdul ba
7a2(rgyud): bya ba dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su mthong / la la ni nyan thos kyi gzugs su/ la la ni rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su/ la la ni byang
7a3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i gzugs su/ la li ni dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su/ la la ni tshangs pa'i gzugs su/ la la ni sred med kyi bu'i gzugs/
7a4(rgyud): la la ni rnam thos kyi bu'i gzugs su/ la la ni lto 'phye chen po nas/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i bar du mthong ste/ rang rang gi tshig brjod pa'i tshul dag
7a5(rgyud): dang spyod lam sna tshogs su mthong la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de yang 'di ltar/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ror rog cis
7a6(rgyud): pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ na mkha'i khams ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/ mi rtog
7a7(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang / rtog pa thams cad dang bral te/ mi rtog rnam par
7b1(rgyud): mid+hog lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyin chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi gsos su gyur pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de
7b2(rgyud): bzhin du/ thams cad gakhyen pa'i ye shes kyang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi gsos su gyur pa lag so// bcom ldan 'a
7b3(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ dper bgyid na/ me'i khams ni bud shing thams cad bsreg pas nam yang yongs su bas par mi 'gyur lag so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen
7b4(rgyud): ba'i ye shes kyang mi shes pa'i bud shing thams cad bsregs pas/ nam yang yongs su bas par mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper
7b5(rgyud): bgyi na rlung gi khams ni rdul thams cad sel bar mdzad pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang mi shes pa'i rdul
7b6(rgyud): thams cad sel bar mdzad pa lagaso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper bgyi na/ chu khams ni sems can thams cad kyi lus bsil bar bgyid pa
7b7(rgyud): lags so// de bzhin du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang / lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rab tu sim par bgyid pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes dang
7b8(rgyud): 'di'i rgyu ni gang lags/ rtsa ba ni gang lags/ mthar thugs pa ni gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis//
8a1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje leg so legs so// lags na rdo rje gang khyod la don 'di 'dri ba ni yang leg so//
8a2(rgyud): de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab ta yid la bzung shig dang khyod la bshad do// rgyu ni byang chub kyi sems so// rtsa ba ni snying rje chen po'o// mthar thugs pa ni thabs so// gsang
8a3(rgyud): ba'i bdag po de la byang chub gang zhe na/ rang gi sems yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa ste/ de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo// gsang
8a4(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po// de la ni chos rdul tsam yang med cing mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems ni na mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ de la byang chub par byed pa yang med
8a5(rgyud): la/ byang chub par bya ba dga' yang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub la mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir ste/ gsang ba'i bdag po// chos thams cad kyang mtshan nyid
8a6(rgyud): med pa 'di lta ste/ na mkha'i mtshan nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid ni
8a7(rgyud): gang nas yongs su btsal bar bgyi/ gang ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba'i bdag
8a8(rgyud): po// byang chub dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rang gi sems las yongs su btsal bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa yin
8b1(rgyud): te/ de ni nang na yang med/ phyi rol na yang med/ gnyi ka'i bar na yang mi dmig so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// sems ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
8b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gzigs/ gzigs par mi 'gyur te/ sngon por ma yin/ ser por ma yin/ dmar por ma yin/ dkar po ma yin/ kha dog leb
8b3(rgyud): rgan du ma yin/ shel gyi kha dog tu ma yin/ thung ngur ma yin/ ring por ma yin/ bzlum por ba yin/ gru bzhir ba yin/ snang ba ma yin/ mun pa ma yin/ bud med
8b4(rgyud): du ma yin/ skyes par ma yin/ ma ning du ma yin// gsang ba'i bdag po// sems 'di 'dod pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin/ gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin ma
8b5(rgyud): yin/ gzugs med pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin ma yin no// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang /
8b6(rgyud): mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba sems can rigs mthun pa'i rang bzhin yin no// gsang ba'i bdag po// sems de ni mig la gnas/ rna ba la mi gnas/ snal ma yid/
8b7(rgyud): lce la ma yin/ lus la ma yin/ yul mi gnas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni namakha'i mtshan nyid do// de'i phyir rtogs pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// de
8b8(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ dmakha'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni sems kyi rang bzhin no// sems kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de/ byang chub kyi rang bzhin te/ gsang ba'i ba'i bdag po//
9a1(rgyud): de ltar na sems dang / na mkha'i dbyings dang / byang chub 'di ni gnyis su med/ gnyis su byar med do// de yang snying rje'i rtsa ba can
9a2(rgyud): thabs kyi pha rol du phyin pa yongs su bzung ba ste/ gsang ba'i bdag po// de bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi nang du/ chos gang dang
9a3(rgyud): gang ston pa de thams cad ni/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su dag par bya ba dang / sems yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir yin par rig par bya'o// bsang ba pa'i bdag po// /
9a4(rgyud): de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo// byang chub yongs su shes par 'dod pas rang gi sems nyid yongs su shes par bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po// ci ltar rang gi
9a5(rgyud): sems yongs su shes par bya zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par ram/ kha dog du'am/ dbyibs su 'am/ yul du 'am/ gzugs su 'am/ tshor ba'am/ 'du shes su 'am/
9a6(rgyud): 'du byed du'am/ rnam par shes par ram/ bdag tu 'am/ bdag gir ram/ bzung bar ram/ 'dzin par ram/ ma dag par ram/ khams su 'am/ skye mched du 'am/
9a7(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad kyi bar du yongs su btsal kyang mi rnyed pa yin te/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i chos
9a8(rgyud): snang ba'i sgo'i tshul dang po ste/ gang sa gnas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshegs chung sgrib pa thams cad spos pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / de thob pas byang chub sems dpa
9b1(rgyud): rnams/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang lhan cig 'grogs pa thob par 'gyur/ mngon par shes pa lnga dag kyang thob par 'gyur/ skad dang / sgra dang / dbyangs mtha' yas pa'i/
9b2(rgyud): gzungs kyang thob par 'gyur/ sems can gyis bsams pa rjes su shes pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis 'khor ba na yongs su
9b3(rgyud): mi nyams pa'i chos can du 'gyur/ sems can gyi don bya ba dag la yongs su mi sko bar 'gyur/ 'dus ma byas kyi tshul khrims la rab tu gnas pa dang / log par lta ba
9b4(rgyud): rnam par spangs pa dang / yang dag par lta ba khong du chud par 'gyur ba yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang sgrib pa thams cad spong ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pi
9b5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' ni mos pa'i stobs bskyed pas tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongasu rdzogs par byed do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// mdor na rigs
9b6(rgyud): kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes yongs su zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang
9b7(rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed pa zhes bgyi ba lags/ byang chub 'byung ba'i sems bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi'o// sems skyed pa ni rnams kyi mchog/ dpa' che/
9b8(rgyud): ye shes las byung ba// ji snyed cig las 'das nas ni// skye bar 'gyur ba bstan du gsol// mgon pos sems kyi mtshan nyid dang // dus kyang rgya cher ba sha du gsol/
10a1(rgyud): de dag bsod nams ci 'dra dang // spyod pa ci 'drar 'gyur ba dang // sems la sems kyi khyab par yang // thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol//
10a2(rgyud): de skad gsol nas de'i tshe// bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad chen gyis// phyag na rdo rje cher 'byung la// legs so bu zhes 'di skad gsungs// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog/
10a3(rgyud): sems kyi rgyud kyi mtshan nyid ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba'i mchog/ tog kun gyis mi shes pa// thams cad khyod la bshad par byas// yid gcig bsdus la mnyan
10a4(rgyud): par bgyis// sems ni brgya rtsa drug bcu las// 'das nas byang chub nyid kyi phyir// bsod nams ches 'byung snying po ste// byang chub 'byung ba skye bar 'gyur// na mkha'i
10a5(rgyud): lta bur dpag med cing // gos pa med do tsa bzhin gnas// chos kun gyis ni mi sprul te// bzod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// dpag med ye shes kyis bsgrub pa//
10a6(rgyud): yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas ston pa// mchod dang sprod pa sgrub pa'i phyir// byang chub phyir ni dang por 'dod// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la 'khor ba thog ma med pa'i
10a7(rgyud): na byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la mngon par zhen pas/ bdag gis khyad par grangs med par rab tu brtags te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la bdag
10a8(rgyud): gi ngo bo nyid la ma spong ba dang / bdag gis zhes rang 'dzin pa kun nas slong ngo // bzhan dag ni dus las 'byung ba dang / 'dzin pa pos sprul pa dang nges par 'byung ba dang /
10b1(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug dang / 'byin po dang / dus dang / gtso bo dang / byed pa po dang / byed po ma yin pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / tshad ma dang / dag pa dang / ma dag pa dang // /
10b2(rgyud): nang gi bdag dang / skyes bu dang / khyab pa dag dang / srob dang / gang zag dang / rnam par shes pa dang / kun gzhi dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po dang / bzung ba dang /
10b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa dang / shes pa dang / shes pa dang / khong du chud par bya ba dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / brjod par bya ba dang / brjod par bya ba ma yin par rtog ste/
10b4(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po// bdag gi khyad par de lta bu las sogs pa rnal 'byor 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pa bdag gis thar 'dod pas sngon brtag pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag
10b5(rgyud): po// gzhan yang byis pa so so'i skye bo phyogs dang / mtshungs pa rnams las rgya lam na res 'ga' zhig las/ chos kyi 'du shes 'byung ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ bsnyung bar gnas
10b6(rgyud): ba la gnas par bya'o// zhes de tsam zhig sems la bya ste/ mgu bar bskyed nas/ phyi phyir zhing de nyid la gom par byed de/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de ni dge ba'i las
10b7(rgyud): skye ba'i sa bon lta bu ste/ sems dang po'o// de rgyud kyi mtshan ma dang bcas pa nyi ma de dang de dag la pha ma dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dag la sbyin pa
10b8(rgyud): byon par byed de/ 'di ni byu gu ste gnyis pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid mi shes pa dag la yang sbyin par byed/ 'di ni stong bu ste gsum pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid
11a1(rgyud): snod du rung ba yongs su tshol zhing sbyin pa byed de/ 'di ni lo ma lta bu ste bzhi pa'o// gzhan yang sbyir pa de nyid bla ma dang / rol mo mkhan la dga'
11a2(rgyud): bzhin du sbyin par byed de/ 'di ni me tog lta bu ste lnga pa'o// gzhan yang sbyin pa de nyid yid dga' ba la sbyin par byed de/ 'di ni 'bras bu ste drug pa'o// bsang ba pa'i bdag po//
11a3(rgyud): gzhan yang mtho ris su skye bar bya ba'i phyir/ tshul khrims bsrung ba ste/ 'di ni gsos su gyur pa lta bu ste bdun pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang sems de lta bu
11a4(rgyud): nyid kyi 'khor bar rgyu ba na/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la la zhig las tshig 'di skad ces thos te/ lha 'di dag ni chen po ste/ thams cad la ni bde ba ster// de la khyod kyi gus
11a5(rgyud): mchod dang / thams cad 'byor pa nyid du 'gyur// de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ dbang phyug dang ni tshangs pa dang // de bzhin khyab 'jug bde byed dang // drag po skom byed de bzhin
11a6(rgyud): du// nyi ma zla ba chu zla nyid// lus ngas nor sprin brgya byin dang // mig mi bzang dang sna tshogs 'byung // gshin rje dus mtshan mya ngan 'das// 'jig rten gtso zhes bya ba dang //
11a7(rgyud): med dang rnam par 'dud pa'i bu// de bzhin lha mo dka' thub zlog/ pad ma dang ni 'jog po'i klu// nor ldan dang ni dung zhes bya// kar ko ta kyi pad ma che// rigs can dang ni bdes
11a8(rgyud): ka mang // rtag tu mtha' yas thog ma'i lha// de bzhin lha dang drang srong mchog/ rig byed rig byed skyes bu yin// mkhas pas mchod pa gyis shig ces// de las de 'dril
11b1(rgyud): tshig thos nas// yid ni yang dag mgu gyur te// de tshe rab tu gus ldan pas// de dag las ni nan tan byed// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// 'di byis pa so so'i skye bo 'khor
11b2(rgyud): ba na khyam pa rnams kyis dbugs 'byin pa'i mchog yin te/ 'di ni stobs su gyur pa ste/ sems brgyad par rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad do/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
11b3(rgyud): gzhan yang khyad par rtogs pa ci skad du yongs su bsgrags pa'i khyad par de dang / de dag la khyad par du gnas pa rnams la 'ba' zhig pa rnam kyi don du blo skye zhing / de yang
11b4(rgyud): yod do yong zhes ston pa nyid kho na la dngos por sems te// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de dag gis na stong pa nyid du rab tu mi she so// stong pa nyid ni dngos po ma yin/ dngos
11b5(rgyud): po med pa yang ma yin/ yod pa yang ma yin/ gnyi ga yang ma yin te/ de la rtog pa 'am/ mi rtog pa yang med na/ de lta ji ltar stong pa zhes pa brtag par bya// gang dag stong
11b6(rgyud): nyid mi shes pa// de dag mya ngan 'das mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa// 'jig pa'i stong nyid shes par bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes gsol
11b7(rgyud): ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems kyi khyad par de dag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje
11b8(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' bstsal pa dang / bsang ba'i bdag po// sems kyi khyad par gyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la sems 'di ni 'dod chag
12a1(rgyud): kyi sems dang / 'dod chags da bral ba'i sems dang / ne sdang gi sems dang / byams pa'i sems dang gti mug gi sems dang / shes rab
12a2(rgyud): kyi sems dang / gtan la dbab pa'i sems dang / the tsom kyi sems dang / mun par gyur pa'i sems dang / snang bar gyur pa'i sems dang / sdug pa'i sems dang / 'thab pa'i
12a3(rgyud): sems dang / rtsod pa'i sems dang / mi rtsod pa'i sems dang / lha'i sems dang / lha ma yin gyi sems dang / klu'i sems dang / mi'i sems dang / dbang phyug gi sems
12a4(rgyud): dang / tshor ba'i sems dang / zhi ba'i sems dang/ chu bo'i sems dang / lteng ka'i sems dang / khron pa'i sems dang / kun tu bsrungs pa'i sems dang / ser sna'i
12a5(rgyud): sems dang / khyi'i sems dang / byi la'i sems dang / na mkha'i lding gi sems dang / byi ba'i sems dang / klu'i sems dang / gar gyi sems dang / sil snyan gyi sems dang /
12a6(rgyud): khyim gyi sems dang / seng ge'i sems dang / 'ug pa'i sems dang / bya rog gi sems dang / srin po'i sems dang / cher ma'i sems dang / sa 'og gi sems dang /
12a7(rgyud): rlung gi sems dang / chu'i sems dang / me'i sems dang / 'dal gyi sems dang / rnyog pa'i sems dang / mtshon rtse'i sems dang / shing leb kyi sems dang / 'khrul pa'i sem
12a8(rgyud): dang / dug gi sems dang / zhags pa'i sems dang / lcug sgrogs gi sems dang / srin gyi sems dang / zhing gi sems dang / lan cha'i sems dang / spu gri'i sems dang /
12b1(rgyud): ri rab lta bu'i sems dang / rgya mtsho lta bu'i sems dang / phug lta bu'i sems dang / skye bar gyur pa'i sems so// gsang ba'i bdag po// de la 'dod chags kyi sems
12b2(rgyud): gang zhe na/ chags pa can chos kun tu bsten pa'o// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems gang zhe na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos kun ston pa'o// zhe sdang gi sems gang zhe na/
12b3(rgyud): sdang bas chos kun du ston pa'o// byams pa'i sems gang zhe na/ byams pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston pa'o// gti mug gi sems gang zhe na/ gang mi spyod par chos ston pa'o// she
12b4(rgyud): rab kyi sems gang zhed/ khyad par las las khyad par gzhan rtogs par bya ste chos ston pa'o// gtan la bab pa'i sems gang zhe na/ dka' dang / bla ma'i tshig bzhin byed pa nyid//
12b5(rgyud): the tsom gyi sems gang zhe na/ ji ltar yongs su bzung ba nges pa dag la som nyid sten pa nyid do// mun par gyur pa'i sems can gang zhe na/ som nyid med pa la som nyir 'du shes
12b6(rgyud): pa'o// snang bar gyur pa'i sems gang zhe na/ som nyi med par rten pa'o// sdud pa'i sems gang zhe na/ du ma gcig tu med pa'o// 'thab pa'i sems gang zhe na/ phan tshun rtsod pa
12b7(rgyud): nyid do// rtsod pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang dag nyid dang bdag nyid du rtsod pa'o// mi rtsod pa'i sems gang zhe na/ mnyan pas mtshungs par lta'o// lha'i sems gang zhe na/
12b8(rgyud): yid kyis bdag nyid la rlom sems su byed pa'o// lha ma yin gyi sems gang zhe na/ gang 'khor ba nyid la slong ba'o// klu'i sems gang zhin/ gang las spyod chen po nyid du
13a1(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir sems pa'o// me'i sems gang zhe na/ de nyid kyi mngon du sems dpa'o// bud med kyi sems gang zhe na// 'dod pa'i kho na'i phyir
13a2(rgyud): chos ston pa'o// dbang phyug gi sems gang zhe na/ gang bdag gis thams cad bsam so snyam du rlom sems byed pa'o// tshong pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang bsdu ba byas te/ rnam
13a3(rgyud): par spel nas phyis sten pa'o// bzhad pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang thos pa rnam pa du ma tshol zhing phyis bsten pa'o// chu bo'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mtha' gnyis la ltos shing
13a4(rgyud): sten pa'o// lteng ka'i sems gang zhe na/ gang sred pa sten pa'o// khron pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mi zab pa la zab par sten pa'o// kun tu bsrung ba'i sems gang zhe na/
13a5(rgyud): de nyid bden gyi gzhan ni gti mug go snyam du sems pa'o// ser sna'i sems gang zhe na/ bdag nyid sten cing gzhan la mi ster ro// byi la'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mchod pa la
13a6(rgyud): rten pa'o// khyi'i sems gang zhe na/ gang chung ngus kyang mgu bar 'gyur ba'o// na mkha' lding gi sems gang zhe na/ gang phyogs 'dzin pas chos la sten pa'o// byi ba'i
13a7(rgyud): sems gang zhe na/ 'ching ba thams cad dag pa'i phyir sems pa'o// klu'i sems gang zhe na/ bdag gis dbyangs sna tshogs kyis klus sems can rnams bzung bar bya'o snyam
13a8(rgyud): pa'o// gar gyi sems gang zhe na/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs kyis gzhan dag yang dag par 'dzin du bzhug go snyam du sems pa'o// sil snyan gyi sems gang zhe na/ bdag
13b1(rgyud): gis chos kyi rnga brdung ngo snyam pa'o// khyim pa'i sems gang zhen/ bdag gis lus kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir sten pa'o// seng ge'i sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad zil gyis nano
13b2(rgyud): pas sten pa'o// 'ug pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mtshan mo sems so// bya rog gi sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad du skrag sems pa'o// srin po'i sems gang zhe na/ dge bas
13b3(rgyud): mi dge ba rnams bsgrub pa'o// tsher mi'i sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad 'gyod pa'i sems pa'o// sa 'og gi sems gang zhe na/ sa'i 'og gi don du sems pa'o// rlung gi sems
13b4(rgyud): gang zhe na/ gang thams cad du thams cad bsgrub pa'o// chu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mi dag pa thams cad bkru ba'i phyir sten pa'o// me'i sems gang zhe na/ gang dka' thub nyid kyis
13b5(rgyud): gdung bar byed pa'o// 'das gyi sems gang zhe na/ gang bdag gi nyes pa gzhan la skud pa'o// rlogs pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang pha rol gyi nyes pa 'dzin pas sems la rlogs
13b6(rgyud): pa bskyed pa'o// tshon rtsi'i sems gang zhe na/ de la chags pa nyid du ston pa'o// shing leb gyi sems gang zhe na/ gang dge ba'i gzhan spong bas ston pa'o// nor ba'i sems gang
13b7(rgyud): zhe na/ gzhan gzung zhing kho nar sems pa'o// dug gi sems gang zhe na/ gang shing tu dngos po med pa nyid sems pa'o// zhags pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang thams cad du bdag
13b8(rgyud): nyid bcings shing 'jug pa'o// lcags sgrog gi sems gang zhen/ gang rkang banyis la 'dug ste sems pa'o// sbyin gyi sems gang zhe na/ gang tu dag la sems pa'o// zhing gi
14a1(rgyud): sems gang zhe na/ rang gi sems nyid las yongs su sbyin par byed pa'o// lan tshwa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang zhig gis sems dpar byed pa de
14a2(rgyud): la sems dpa'o// spu gri'i sems gang zhe na/ gang bar du byung ba tsam la rten pa'o// ri rab lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang mthong bar gyur nas sems pa'o// rgya mtsho lta
14a3(rgyud): bu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang rang gi lus nyid la mchog tu 'dzin cig 'dug pa'o// phag lta bu'i sems gang zhe na/ gang sngar nges par 'gyur la/ phyis de nyid kyis 'gyur bar sten
14a4(rgyud): pa'o// de la skye bar gyur pa'i sems gang zhe na/ gang sems 'du byed gang kho na dang / skyes pa de kho na dang lhan cig tu 'gro ba'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de ltar na cig gnyis
14a5(rgyud): gsum bzhi lnga gnyis su bsgyur ba byas pas/ 'jig rten pa'i sems brgya drug bcu skal pa gsum gyi 'das nas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems skye ste/ 'din phung po tsa ma nyid//
14a6(rgyud): bdag ni nam yang yod pa yin// dbang po'i grong khyer khams rnams kyis// 'jig rten don med rnam par nyams// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel te/ nyon mongs las kyis
14a7(rgyud): kun nas bslang // ma rig sa bon las byung ba// byed po la sogs rnam pa spangs// de ltar zhi zhing shin du zab// tog gi kun gyi shes par dka'// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs
14a8(rgyud): ba/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis sngon bstod pa'o// gsang ba'i bdag po// de las 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems la gnas pa rnams la phung po la yod do// snyam pa'i blo
14b1(rgyud): bar skye'o// nam phung po dag la 'dod chags dang bral bar skyed pa de'i tshe sbu ba dang / chu'i chu bur dang / sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / mtshungs par 'jig pas rnam par grol bar 'gyur te/
14b2(rgyud): 'di lta ste phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo zhi ba'i dbyings rtogs par 'gyur ro// gsang ba
14b3(rgyud): pa'i bdag po 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems phyin ci log dang / byin ci log ma yin pa'i sems kyi khyad par rgya dra ba 'brel pa/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i dra ba dang bral ba 'di ni/
14b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor pa dag skal pa gcig gis 'da' bar byed do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang theg pa chen po bgrod par gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams la/ chos la bdag med pa
14b5(rgyud): sems skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag sngon spyad pa spyod cing phung po'i gnas rnam par 'jig pa ra/ ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / gzugs
14b6(rgyud): brnyan dang / brag cha dang / 'gal me'i 'khor lo dang / dri zi'i grong khyer lta bu'i 'du shes skyes so// gsang ba'i bdag po// de'i phyir de dag sems kyi dbang du byas pas/
14b7(rgyud): chos la bdag med pa nyid kyang spang bar bya ste/ rang gi sems na bzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pa'i phyir/
14b8(rgyud): sems la sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs ste/ rnal 'byor pa dag 'di la bskal pa gnyis kyis 'da' bar byed do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang byang
15a1(rgyud): nub sems dpa' gsang sngag nges kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med par bsod rnams dang /
15a2(rgyud): ye shes kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa bsags pa rnams la/ shes rab dang thabs dpab tu med pa yongs su bzung ba/ lha dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag byas pa/ nyan
15a3(rgyud): thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis las yang dag par 'das pa/ rgya byin dang / tshangs pa'i dbang po dang / nye dbang las sogs pas phyag byas pa 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid
15a4(rgyud): kyi ngo bo nyid rdzas med pa/ mtshan nyid med pa/ spros pa thams cad las 'das pa/ na mkha' ltar dpag tu med pa/ chos thams cad kyi go skabs su gyur pa/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus
15a5(rgyud): ma byas kyi khams dang bral ba/ las dang bya ba med pa/ mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang bral ba/ shin tu ngo bo nyid med pa'i sems skye ste/
15a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag go// 'di byang chub kyi sems dang pa zhes rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de dag nyon mongs las grol ba dang / las dang nyon mongs ldan pa 'di yin/
15a7(rgyud): de dag 'jig rten sbyin gnas te/ de dag rtag mchod mor bya// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang mos par yis ni spyod pa'i sa/ sems gsum rnam par bsgom pa ste/
15a8(rgyud): pha rol phyin rnams spras pa dang / bsdu ba dag ni bzhi pa yis// mos pa'i sa ni mtshungs pa med// dpag tu medado cing bsam mi khyab// dpag med ye shes 'byung ba ni/
15b1(rgyud): sems bcu dag gis thob par 'gyur// ngas gang cung zad brjod pa ni// thams cad 'di yis thob par 'gyur// de phyir thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa// mos pa zhes ni bya bar
15b2(rgyud): bshad// blo ldan bskal pa gang gis ni// sa las yang dag 'da' bar 'gyur// 'di yi yang ni bzhi cha yis// mos pa las kyang 'da' bar 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan
15b3(rgyud): 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// mgon po khyab bdag khyod kyis ni// sems kyi mtshan nyid bstan lags na// dbugs 'byin rnam pa du thob nas// mchog
15b4(rgyud): skyes de dag dbugs phyin 'gyur// de skad ces gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i/ de tshe phyag na rdo rjes la// yid bsdus 'di ni nyod ces gsungs/
15b5(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la nam byis pa so so'i skye bo dag mi dge ba'i las spangs te/ dge ba'i las byed pa de'i tshe/ dge bas dbugs 'byin pa yin no// de nas bdag gis
15b6(rgyud): de'i kho na nyid yang dag pa ji lta bzhin du rab tu shes pa'o de'i tshe/ bdag la rten nas dbugs phyin pa yin no// nam phung pos yongs su bzung bar byas te/ rang gi ngo bo nyid la sprad
15b7(rgyud): nas/ bdag la rten pa yongs su gtong ba de'i tshe/ bdag med pas dbugs phyin pas yin no// nam phung po rnams spangs nas/ chos kyi dmigs pa la gnas pa de'i tshe// chos kyi
15b8(rgyud): dbugs phyin pa yin no// nam ches rnams spangs nas mi skye ba la gnas pa de'i tshe/ chos la bdag med pas dbugs byin pa yin no// nam phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang /
16a1(rgyud): bzung ba dang / 'dzin pa dang / bdag dang / srog la sogs pa dang / chos dang / sems skye ba dag kyang stong pa nyid kyang ngo bo nyid du yang ngo bo nyid medo//
16a2(rgyud): zhes stong pa'i ye shes pa de'i tshe/ chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid mnyam pa nyid kyis dbugs phyin pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gsang
16a3(rgyud): sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bzhi bcus rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams sgoms te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul rtogs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// bcu
16a4(rgyud): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / gzungs brnyen dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / brag cha dang / chu zla dang / chu'i tu bur dang / 'khrul pa dang /
16a5(rgyud): 'gal me'i 'khor lo lta bur rnam par bsgom mo gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo// nam byang chub sems dpa'i spad pa spod pas//
16a6(rgyud): 'di ltar so sor brtag par bya ste/ de la sgyu ma gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba dag gi sbyor ba las/ dngos po rnams par thar dad pa sna tshogs mig dang / yid
16a7(rgyud): 'phrog pa sngon ma mthong ba dag kyang ston/ de dag la ni phan tshun phyogs bcur 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir te/ de
16a8(rgyud): bzhin du gsang sngags spor bar byed pa dag gi sbyor ba las thams cad 'byung ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang mig rgyu ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa ste/ de yang 'du
16b1(rgyud): shes kyis tha snyad du 'dogs shing / thasrad kyang bsgrub par byed do// de bzhin du 'du shes 'di yang gsang sngag so// zhes tha snyad du 'dogs shing / tha snyad kyang bsgrub par byed do//
16b2(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang rmi lam na bdag nyid nyin gcig dang / thang gcig dang / skad gcig dang / yul tsam dang / lo la sogs par 'dug cing bde ba dang / sdug
16b3(rgyud): bsngal rnam pa mang po myong bar mthong ba las/ sad na ci yang mi mthong ba bzhin du/ gang du gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di yang rmi lam lta bur khong du chud par bya'o// gsang ba po
16b4(rgyud): bdag po// gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi dngos grub 'byung ba ni/ gzugs bstan lta bur 'jig par bya ste/ dper na/ gdong dang me long la rten nas bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan
16b5(rgyud): 'byung ba ltar/ gsang sngags kyi dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra ba rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang grub pa'i grub gnas ni/ dri za'i grong khyer lta bur lnga'o// gsang
16b6(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag go// gzhan yang gsang sngags kyi sman brag cha lta bur rig par bya ste/ dper na/ sgra la rten nas brag cha 'byung ba ltar/ gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di yang de dang 'dra bar
16b7(rgyud): rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang zla ba shar na chu'i nang du gzugs brnyan mthong nas/ chu zla zhes brjod pa de bzhin du/ sngags pa de nyid kyang chu zla bzhin du
16b8(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang zhes brjod do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang ji ltar ba 'bab pa dang / chu'i chu bur rnams 'byung ba/ de bzhin du gsang sngags grub pa'i/ sprul pa
17a1(rgyud): / rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod/ gsang ba pa'i bdag go// gzhan yang sems can med cing / srog dang / byed papo yang med pa ste/ dngos po thams cad
17a2(rgyud): stong // 'khrul pa kho nar snang bar zad// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang / ji ltar 'ga' zhig bdag nyid kyi// lag na 'gal me thog nas ni// bskor ba 'khor lo ltar snang
17a3(rgyud): ba// de bzhin stong pa dag las 'byung // gsang ba pa'i bdag po// 'di ni theg pa chen po'i bzhi// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzhi// nges pa'i bzhi/ yang dag par rdzogs bri
17a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bzhi/ mthar gyi theg pa chen po la 'jig pa'i bzhi ste/ ye shes sna tshogs cher 'byung ba/ nor gyi dbyigs 'di shes na ni// kun gyi sems ni pra brag kyang //
17a5(rgyud): bzhin yang dag rab tu shes/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las/ sems kyi khyad par rim par bye
17a6(rgyud): nga'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i/ chos
17a7(rgyud): kyi dbyings bsam gyi mi khyab pa/ sems kyis yang dag par 'das pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang tshul sna tshogs dag gis bsam pa dang / mos pa ci lta ba bzhin du//
17a8(rgyud): sems can rnams la bstan pa ni/ ngo mtshar che lag so// bcom ldan 'das yang gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po yong
17b1(rgyud): su rdzogs par bgyi ba ba shad du gsol/ de ni ma 'ongs pa'i dus na sems nan mang po dag gi don dang / phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
17b2(rgyud): snang mdzad kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lab na rdo rje dkyil 'khor sprad pi
17b3(rgyud): tshu la bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nyon cig/ de nas bco ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dbyings kyi dgongs pa mi
17b4(rgyud): rdzogs shing / sems can gyi khams ma lus pasgral bar dam bca' ba mdzad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / thabs gcig tu yang dag par mos nas/ snying
17b5(rgyud): rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ skra'i yang lag thams cad nas/ de bzhin gshegs
17b6(rgyud): pa'i sku sems dang po bskyed pa nas gzungs ste/ sa bcu'i bar du sems can la phan pa'i don mdzad pa 'byung ngo // byung nas kyang phyogs bcu kun du bskor ste/ slar log nas/ de bcom
17b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi sku nang gi gnas su zhugaso// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnam
17b8(rgyud): par dgod par nyon cig// re shig dang por slob dpon yid byang chub sems dpa' la zhugs pa shes rab dang ldan pa/ brtan pa snying rje can skya brtsal dag la mkhas pa shes rab kyi pha
18a1(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la rtag tu mkhas pa/ theg pa gsum gyi khyad par shes pa/ gsang sngags kyi dor kho na nyid kyi don la mkhas bsam pa shes pa/
18a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dang pa/ dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las byed par gnang zhir dbang bskur ba/ rigs bcun gsang sngags spyod pa la// mngon par
18a3(rgyud): brtson zhing gtan la phab// sbyor la mkhas shing zung thub la// byang chub sems la rnam par gnas// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// slob dpon de lta bu ni rgyal sras yin te/ sangs
18a4(rgyud): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rab tu bsngag so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la slob dpon la gzhan gyis gsol ba btab kyang rung / yang bdag gis sems can
18a5(rgyud): dag/ snod du rung zhes nyes bral ba// mos mang brtan la dang pa can// gzhan la phan dga' mthong na ni// de lta bu'i slob dpon bdag nyid kyis// ma gsol bar ni de bos te// /
18a6(rgyud): phan 'dod phyir na skad bya ba// khyod ni rdul chen snod yin gyis// bu chur theg pa chen po yis// gsang bsngags spyod tshul cho ga ni// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya// rdzogs pa'i sang
18a7(rgyud): rgyas gang 'das dang // de bzhin gang dag ma byod dang // da ltar byung ba'i mgon po rnams// 'gro la bar phyir zhags pa dag/ de dag kun gyi gsang sngags kyi// cho ga bzang po 'di
18a8(rgyud): mkhyen nas// dpa' bos byang chub shing drung du// thams cad mkhyen pa mtshan med brnyes// gsang sngags spor ba mnyam med de// shAkya seng ge slob pa yis// bdud ste shin tu mi
18b1(rgyud): zad pa/ dpung chen dag kyang de yis bcom// de bas kun mkhyen thob bya'i phyir// bu yis blo gros 'di gyis shig/ de bas snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni// de ltar lan pang
18b2(rgyud): bzengs bstod de// slob ma de brten shes nas ni// sa bzhi legs par yongs su brtag/ me tog 'bras bu ldan pa'i ri// gtsang zhing yi 'ong chu'i gnas// de dag dkyil
18b3(rgyud): 'khor bri ba yi// las la sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// gang na 'bab chu mang po dang / ngang pa bzhed kyis brgyan yod pa// del ni sngags pa blo can gyis// snying rje
18b4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri// sangs rgyas rnams dang rang mgon dang // de bzhin rgyal ba'i nyan thos kyis// sa phyogs gang dag bsnyen pa ni// de dag thub pas rtag tu bsngags//
18b5(rgyud): phyogs gzhan rnam pa sna tshogs pa// lha gang kun dga' bzang po dang // khyim dang yang thog nyams dga' dang // mtsho dang skyed mos tshal mdzes dang // mchod rten lha khang pa glang
18b6(rgyud): lhas// 'bab chu 'dus pa'i mdo dag dang / lha'i gnas rnams thams cad dang // de bzhin khang pa stong pa yang // slob ma dag la phan 'dod phyir// nan tan du ni dkyil 'khor bri//
18b7(rgyud): yang dag yid du 'ong ba'i sa// gang yang rung bar bri bar bya// gsang ba'i bdag po de la gzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba na/ rdo dang bong ba dang / gyo mo dang / gseg ma med cing /
18b8(rgyud): skra dang / phub ma dang / sol ba dang / de la tshes grangs dang / rgyu skar dang / gzha' dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang ba'i mtshan ma dang ldan pa'i nyi ma la snga dro'i dus kyi tshe ltas
19a1(rgyud): bzang pos mtshan ma la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te/ sa'i lha mo la sbran pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis bsgrub par bya'o// sangs
19a2(rgyud): rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par ni// sa dang pha rol phyin dag la// lha mo khyod ni dbang du 'gyur// shAkya seng ge skyob pa yis// ji ltar bdud kyi sde bcom pa/
19a3(rgyud): de bzhin bdag gis bdud las ni// rgyal bar bya ste dkyil 'khor bri// sa la lag pa reg byas shing // de ltar lan mang byas nas ni// pus mo gnyis ni der gtsug nas// me tog
19a4(rgyud): spos kyi mchod par bya// mchod nas sngags pas de nas ni// de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tshal te// de nas cho ga 'di dag gis// mkhas pas sa bzhi sbyang bar bya// de nas phyag na rdo rjes/
19a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la btugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas mtshan ma mi mnga' ste// chos kyi sku la rnam par bzhugs// mtshan med
19a6(rgyud): 'dus ma byas pa yis// mtshungs pa med pa'i chos ston na// dpa'o chen po ci slad du// mtshan mar bcas pa'i cho ga 'di// gsang sngags spyad la bstan par mdzad// 'di ni chos nyid
19a7(rgyud): tshul ma lags// de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das// rnam par snang mdzad chen po yis// de'i phyag na rdo rjes la// chos kyi mtshan nyid 'di nyon cig gsungs// chos ni rtog
19a8(rgyud): dang bral ba ste// kun rtog thams cad spangs pa yin// de la sems dang sems byung gi// rtog pa rab tu spongs par 'gyur// nga yis chos mngon sangs rgyas pa// de ni mkhas las
19b1(rgyud): byang ba ba// yog par rtog pa'i spyod yul ba// byis pa rnams kyi mi shes so// yul dang macan ma la sogs pa// sun gyis bsgribs pa rnams 'dod // de dag gzung bar byan
19b2(rgyud): phyir/ chog 'di yang brjod pa yin// yul med dus kyang med pa ste// bu ba med cing byed pa yang // chos rnams kun la yongs med de// ches rnams nyi 'ga' zhig go// gsang
19b3(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po// 'on kyang ni sems can dag ni bro zhan cing // bya ba tsam gyis rmong bdag/ dngos po don la chags pa mas// ma 'o dus na 'byung bar 'gyur// 'di lta bu'i na
19b4(rgyud): mi shes pas// yul dang dus dang bya ba las// dge dang mi dge'i mtshan ma yis// rmongs pa 'bras bu 'dod pa de// sems dpa' chen po de dag phyir// cho ga 'di ni brjod pa yis//
19b5(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la ji skad bstan pa'i gnas gang yang rung bar sa bzhi la rab tu 'thas par bcags te/ ba'i lci ba sa la ma ltung ba dang / ba'i gcin sres pas bya'o//
19b6(rgyud): de la sngags 'dis gsang gtor bya ste sngag so// nA ma sa man ta b+hu tA nA na/ a pra ti sa me ga g+ha na/ sa ma ta nu ga te/ sa ma ta nu ga te/ pra ki ti/ bi shud d+ha/ d+harma d+ha tu/ bi sho d+ha ni sA hA/
19b7(rgyud): de'i 'og tu sngags pa ni// langs nas de'i dbus su ni// pad ma dkar po'i gdan la bzhugs// thor tshugs dang ni dbu rgyan 'chang // 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pas// kun nas
19b8(rgyud): yongs su bskod par bsam// de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhi// blo dang ldan pas phyogs su bsam// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog/ nyi ma shar ka lta bur bas pa/ rje
20a1(rgyud): @ru rgyal ba dpa' bon// me tog kun rgyas zhes bya ba// gser gyi kha dog 'bar bar bcas// nyes pa bcom pa'i ting 'dzin gnas// byang phyogs su ni
20a2(rgyud): mi 'khrugs pa// nad dang bral ba ting 'dzin gnas// nub phyogs 'od dpag med pa ste// rgyal ba lnga po 'di rnams ni// bsams te de nas sngags pa yis// mi g.yo bdag nyid
20a3(rgyud): chen po 'am// yang na 'jig rten gsum rgyal gyi// gsang sngags don kun bsgrub pa yis// sa ni yongs su bzungs par bya// dbus su dkyil 'khor bzang po dag/ tsan dan
20a4(rgyud): dag gis bya ba ni// dang po gcig ni nga'i yin// gnyis pa skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// gsum pa de dang mnyam bya ba// the tsom med par yum gyi yin// gzhi pa lag na pad ma ste/
20a5(rgyud): lnga phyag na rdo rje'i phyir// drug pa mi g.yo mgon gyi ste// ma zad 'og tu legs par bya// de bzhin gshegs rnams rjes dran nas// me tog spos las sogs phul te// mnyam
20a6(rgyud): par bzhags nas gus pa ru// tshig tu 'di skad smras par bya// mgon po thugs rje bdag nyid can// thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// sras bcas sang gi gdug
20a7(rgyud): 'das na// sa bzhi yongs su bzung ba mdzod// de skad kyi ni tshig spras nas// gsang sngags 'di brjod par bya// nams man ta/ sarba ta thA ga ta d+hiSh+Thi ti/ a tsa le/ bi tsa le/
20a8(rgyud): sma ra ni/ pra kri ti pa ri shud d+he swA hA// de nas sngags pas langs nas su// snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni// nub kyi phyogs su gnas na su// nang gi bdag nyid rnam dag pas//
20b1(rgyud): byang chub sems ni sems byed cing // de nyid du nyal bar bya// dedas sngags pas rmil ma bsdu// byang chub sems dpa' grags cen nam// yang nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
20b2(rgyud): sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las rnams la// bdag nyid kun tu rtsol byed pa 'am// bdag nyid la ni 'di skad du// sems can chen po bu khyod
20b3(rgyud): legs// dkyil 'khor myur du bris shig ces// sbed pa skyed pa mthong yang rung // de nas de'i phyir de nyin// slob ma dad cing rigs btsun pa// dkon mchog gsum la dad pa dang //
20b4(rgyud): zab pa yi ni blo dang ldan// spro ba che zhing tshul khrims ldan// bzod dang ldan zhing ser sna med// dpa' la yi dam brtan pa na// bcu 'am brgyad dam bdun dam lnga// gcig gnyis
20b5(rgyud): bzhi las lhag kyang rung // spyad mi dgos par gzung bar bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes zhus pa// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming gang lags/
20b6(rgyud): ci'i slad du dkyil 'khor zhes bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ste// dkyil ni snying po zhes bya'o//
20b7(rgyud): 'khor ni rdzogs pa te/ de'i gong na stong por gyur pa gzhan med pas// de bas kyang dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// 'on kyang dkyil 'khor rgyas pa 'di ni/
20b8(rgyud): sems can khams ma nges pas yongs su bskyab phyir/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med par/ bla na med pa
21a1(rgyud): @yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems yang dag par bsgrub pa byin gyis brlabs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de lta bas na rnam grangs 'dis kyang /
21a2(rgyud): khyod kyi 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can gcig gi phyir// byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin gnyis kyi phyir ma yin/ gsum gyi phyir ma yin//
21a3(rgyud): 'on kyang thugs rje chen po'i dbang du gyur pa dag/ sems can gyis khams ma lus pa yongs sgrub pa'i phyir byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ste// de dag gis sems
21a4(rgyud): can gyi khams rnam pa du ma la bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin du/ sems can rnams la chos 'chad par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// theg pa chen po la gom par ma byas pa
21a5(rgyud): rnams ni/ gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul ma mthong ma thos na/ sems la dga' ba 'am/ dad pa cung zad yang dag par mi skye'i/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gang dag gis sngon theg
21a6(rgyud): pa chen po// gsang sngags spyad pa'i tshul sgo mtha' yas pa/ bsgrub pa la gom par byas pa de dag ni/ rdo rje sems dpa' yin te/ de rnams nyid kyi don gyi phyir grangs kyi tshad
21a7(rgyud): 'di byaso// 'on kyang slob dpon chen po dang ldan pa sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral bar yid dam bca' ba kho nar bya ste/ des byang chub kyi sems kyi 'gyur bar bya ba
21a8(rgyud): phyir/ sems can tshad med pa rnams yongs su bzung bar bya'o// de nas de dag pos la gsum la skyabs su gtang bar bya'o// sdig pa mi bya ba'i las rnams kyang bsgo bar
21b1(rgyud): bya'o// de nas de dag la spos dang me tog la sogs pa sbyin no// de dag dus gsum du sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa yang 'dzin du bzhugs go/ 'dzin du bzhugs nas
21b2(rgyud): bsngags pa yis// de nas so shing dag kyang sbyin// rtse gcig mnyam par bzhag pa dag/ shar ram byang du kha bltas te// u dum b+ha ra a shod thA// shin du bzang po bsrung
21b3(rgyud): byas shing // me tog dri yis bskus pa yis// so shing dag ni 'char ba zhug go/ sems can snong rung sdod mi rung // bor ba nyid las brtag par bya// de nas lag pa g.yas
21b4(rgyud): g.yon la// skrang pa mdud pa gsum ldan pa// bdag nyid mnyam par bzhag pa yis// legs pa ru ni bcing bar bya// de ltar yongs su bzung ldan pa'i// slob ma nyes pa med
21b5(rgyud): rnams la// bsam pa gtan par bya ba'i phyir// 'di ltar spro ba bskyed par bya// bdag nyid chen po khyed rnams kyis// rnyed pa mnyam med de ring rnyed// gang phyir rgyal ba sras bcwa
21b6(rgyud): pa// bdag nyid chen po kun gyis ni// bstan pa 'di la khyed rnams kun// yongs su bzung ste bzhin pa// de phyir khyed rnams theg chen du// sang ni rab tu skye bar 'gyur// gal
21b7(rgyud): te rmi lam dag du ni// bcug lag khang dang kun dga' bzang // khang pa bzang po sna tshogs dang // de bzhin du ni yang tho ga dang // ral gri yid bzhin nor bu dang // gdugs dang /
21b8(rgyud): me tog sna tshogs dang // bud med bzang mo ges dkar can// sdug pa'i mnyan dang bu dag dang // glegs bam de bzhin bram ze dang // sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// de bzhi
22a1(rgyud): rgyal ba'i nyan thos dang // byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// gal te 'bras bu thob pa dang // mtsho dang brgya mtsho las rgal mthong // de bzhin
22a2(rgyud): du ni nam mkha' las// bkra shis yi 'ong ba yi tshig/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu 'byung ba grags// de la sogs pa'i rmi lam ni// bzang ba zhes ni bya bar brtag/ mkhas pas
22a3(rgyud): de las bzlog pa yin// rmi lam ngan par yong mi bya// brtul zhugs bzang po khyed rnams kyis// nang par thams cad la bzlos// slob ma de dag rnams la ni de// de skad sgo
22a4(rgyud): nas chos kyang bshad// theg pa chen po cher 'byung ba'i// lam mchog 'di ni dpal dang ldan// khyed rnams der na dong bas na// rang 'byung bskal pa chen po yang // 'jig
22a5(rgyud): rten thams cad mkhyen pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa rnamasu 'gyur// yod dang med las rnam par 'das// nam mkha' bzhin dri ma med// zab mo rtog gi thams cad kyis//
22a6(rgyud): rab tu mi rtog gnas med pa// spros pa kun dang bral ba ste// spros pa rnams kyis rnam par spros// las dang bya ba la sogs bral// bden pa gnyis la phan gnas pa'i// theg
22a7(rgyud): pa rab kyi mchog 'di ni// tshul la gnas na thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// rdo rje 'dzin spros par gnas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
22a8(rgyud): dus gsum du sgrib mchog pa'i ye shes kyi sdom pa gang la// byang chub sems dpa' rnams gnas// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba
22b1(rgyud): bshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje 'dzin pa spros pa med par gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dang / ngag dang /
22b2(rgyud): yid gcig tu 'jug cing / chos thams cad la rtsom pa med cing bya ba med pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de// rigs kyi bu nyon cig/ de gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
22b3(rgyud): dpa' rnams la bdag gi lus yongs su gtong ba gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis bdag gi lus yongs su gtong ba des ni// dngos po yongs su btang ba yin te//
22b4(rgyud): dngos po gsum yongs su btang ba de yang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i lus dang ngag dang / yid gsum
22b5(rgyud): gyi sdom pa bsdams par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lus dang ngag dang yid yongs su ma btang bar slab pa 'dzin par ma byed do// des na phyi de nyin
22b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la bya ba byas te/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis brlabs la/ bum pa spos chus bkang ba la 'jig rten po sum rnam par rgyal bas
22b7(rgyud): mngon par sngags te/ sgo dang por bzhag la mkhas pas skye bo kun la nges par gtor bya'o// de nas sems skye bo kun la nges par gtor bya'o// de nas sems spang ba'i phyir
22b8(rgyud): spos chu gtsang ma blud/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor gyi ni slob dpon dag/ gsang sngags bsgrub la 'bod pa ni// gang
23a1(rgyud): gis dus su dkyil 'khor du// sems dpa' chen po byin rlob pa'i// dus dang tshod ni kun mkhyen pa// smra ba'i mchog gis bka' stsol cig/
23a2(rgyud): de skad ces gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rdo rje 'dzin la bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor don du gnyen pa la// rtag tu mtshan mo bri bar bya// lag na rdo rje/ de nas slob
23a3(rgyud): dpon gyis sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas la/ tshon sna lnga'i sred bu thogs te/ bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la/ shar du sras bu bre ba
23a4(rgyud): ni kha lte ba'i thed kar bzung nas ni// bar snang la ni bzung bar bya// de nas lho phyogs song na su// byang phyogasu ni bri bar bya// de nas srad bu gnyis pa ni// rang gi blangs nas de
23a5(rgyud): nyid du// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran cing // shar phyogs bltas nas bri bar bya// de nas lho phyogs song nas ni// byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya// blo can de nas slar log gnas/
23a6(rgyud): bden bral phyogs su gnas nas ni// byang phyogs na ni bri bar bya// de nas gnas su bsgyur te bya// bsgyur te de ru 'dug nas ni// lho phyogs su ni bri bar bya// de nas de btang nas su//
23a7(rgyud): me'i phyogs su gnas nas ni// sngags pas gsang sngags cho gar gnas// shar du srid bu bri bar bya// de nas de bzhin dbang ldan phyogs// song nas nub du kha bltas te// rlung
23a8(rgyud): gi phyogs kyi bar du ni// byang phyogs su ni bri bar bya// sngags pa yis ni de lta bur// kun nas gru bzhi ltam par bya// de nas dbus su zhugs nas su// de la cha ni gsum du
23b1(rgyud): brtag/ sa rnams thams cad kun du yang // cha gsum dag tu brtags nas ni// cha rnams kyang ni re re la// cha gsum du rab tu brtag/ cha gcig gcig ni bskor ba ra yi//
23b2(rgyud): 'khor bar byas te lhags ma yi// cha gnyis po ni lha nyid kyi// gnas su nges par bya ba yin// blo dang ldan pa phyogs bzhi ru// so so'i phyogs char sgo khyud ni// sdom brtso
23b3(rgyud): can gyis nan tan du// lha de ltar rim pas phye ste// 'di dag thams cad byas nas ni// dbus su pad ma dkar po mgog/ de ni snying po zhes su bsgrags// dkyil 'khor
23b4(rgyud): snying rje 'byung ba kun// dkyil 'khor snying po zhes bya ba// de yi tshad kyang sor bcu drug/ yan chad du ni bshad pa yin// 'dam brgyad pa legs par rdzogs// ze bar ldan
23b5(rgyud): la shin tu bzang // 'dab ma'i bar ni thams cad du// kun nas rdo rje bri bar bya// de yi snying po'i dbus su ni// rgyal mchog gtso bo gser gyi mdog/ 'bar bcas thur tshugs
23b6(rgyud): dbu rgyan can// 'od zer dag gis kun nas bskor// mgon po nad dang bral ba ni// ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri// de'i shar du blo ldan gyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya
23b7(rgyud): ni// gru gsum thams cad thal ka ri nyid// pad ma'i steng na 'khor yub tu// 'od zer dkar pos yongs bskor ba// rab tu bskor ba bri bar bya// de'i byang du mkhas rnams
23b8(rgyud): kyis// skyob pa dag ni kun gyi yum// gser gyi mdog can 'bar dang bcas// na bza' dag ni dkar po snams// kun tu rnam par snang mdzad pa// ting nge 'dzin du gnas par bri/
24a1(rgyud): kya/ mgon po yi ni byang phyogs su// spyan ras gzigs dbang dpa'o ni// pad+ma dkar po'i stan la 'dug/ dung dang kun d+ha zla ba 'dra// dbu la 'od dpag
24a2(rgyud): med pa bzhugs// bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzum pa bri// de'i g.yasu lha me ni// sgrol bar grags pa chen po de// dga' zhing 'jig pa sel ba ste// sde bsang mi la sna tshogs gzugs//
24a3(rgyud): bud dir la bab pa'i tshad// thal sbyar me tog ud dpal thogs// 'od zer dag gi kun bskor cing // gos ni dkar po glon pa bri// g.yon du lha mo khro gnyon can// sngags de'i
24a4(rgyud): phreng ba lag na srungs// mig gsum pa la thor tshugs can// kha dog 'dog ni dkar mo la// 'od zer dkar po ser po dang // dmar po rnams kyis bskor ba bri// khro gnyen can
24a5(rgyud): dang nye bar na// mthu chen lag na pad mo thogs// brtse bar chen pos gos dkar gyon// 'od zer dag gis bskor ba'o// dpa' bo yang dag bri bya ste// de'i dad ma kham che//
24a6(rgyud): dri'i drung du blo ldan gyis// rigs sngags lha mo grags ldan mo// gser gyi kha dog lta bu can// brgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan te// lag pa g.yon pas pri yang ku'i//
24a7(rgyud): ske ma yi 'ong 'dzin par bri// sgrol ma yi ni nye khor du// blo dang ldan pas gos dkar ram// thur tshugs can la gos dkar gyon// lag na pad ma thogs pa bri// de'i 'og
24a8(rgyud): du sngags pa yis// rigs sngags rgyal po stob po che// kha dog nyi ma 'char ka bzhin// pad+ma dkar pos rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba'i phreng can mi zad cing // spu dag seng ge
24b1(rgyud): ltar 'dug pa// spyan ras gzigs dbang blo ldan gyis// rta 'grin can zhes grags pa bri// sangs rgyas rnams kyis lho phyogasu// byang chub sems dpa' skyob rnams
24b2(rgyud): kyis// phyags rgya yid bzhin nor bu zhes// grags pa bskal pa chen po can// re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed// pad+ma dkar la 'dug par bri// mgon po rnam par snang mdzad kyi//
24b3(rgyud): lho'i phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin// re ba thams cad skong byed pa// mgon ni pri yang ku lta bu// ljang ser ram ni mar rgad ltar// sngo bsangs mgon po dbu brgyan can// sems dpa'
24b4(rgyud): chen po brgyan gyis brgyan// rnam par brgyan cing mtha' yas par// 'jug pa rgya chen rdo rje bcas// 'od zer dag gis bskor bar bri// de'i g.yas su lha mo'i ming // ma ma/
24b5(rgyud): ki zhes bya ba de// rdo rje brgyan gyis brgyan pa de// lag na rdo rje thogs pa bri// de'i 'og tu lha mo ni// rdo rje rtse mo stobs chen de// pho nya rnams kyis yongs bskor cing //
24b6(rgyud): bzhin ni bag tsam 'dzub pa bri// g.yon rol ni bsngags pa yis// rdo rje lu bu rgyud ces pa// lag na rdo rje lu gu rgyud// rang gi pho nya rnams kyi bskor// pri yang kun ldangs ser
24b7(rgyud): mdog/ rdo rjes mtshan mas legs mtshan bri// lag na rdo rje'i 'og logs su// khro za tso bo zhes bya ba// bgegs chen dgra ni zhi byed pa// khro bo 'jig rten gsum du grags/
24b8(rgyud): mig gsum mche ba bzhi pa ste/ kha dog dbur gyi char sprin 'dra// rab tu rgong pa'i sla bang 'byid// rdo rje brgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// 'khor lo mtha' yas kho bo yis// dbang
25a1(rgyud): phyug rnams kyis yongs bskor ba// lag pa stong phrag brgya dgar// mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing gdags// 'od zer khro bo chen po 'di//
25a2(rgyud): pad ma'i steng du 'dug pa bri// de'i nub du song nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa mang po dag/ lag na mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// kha dog sna tshogs stobs po che// 'od zer dag gis yongs bsko
25a3(rgyud): sems can kun don byed pa bri// gsang sngags mgon po'i 'og logs su// bden bral gyi ni phyogs kyi char// mi g.yo zhes bya lag na ni// ral gri zhags pa legs par thogs/
25a4(rgyud): zur phung spyi bo'i g.yon du byang // rab tu brgyan cing mig gcig g.yo// rang gi 'od kyi nang na gnas// khro dang bcas pa blag la 'dug/ bzhin ni khro gnyer rab tu gnyer//
25a5(rgyud): byis pa'i gzugs can mkhrang brag bri// bris nas blo dang ldan rlung phyogs// song nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ni// khro bo 'jig rten gsum las rgyal// 'bar ba'i phreng can
25a6(rgyud): mi bzad pa// lag na rdo rje rtse bran brgyan// bka' lung nod pa ltar 'dug cing // zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnas pa// nan tan du ni bri bar bya// de lta nang du bri ba ni// rgyas
25a7(rgyud): dang bcas par bshad pa yin// de na sngags phyir byung nas// nges par gnyis pa'i cha dag la// shar gyi phyogs kyi nang du ni// cha ni gnyis su phye ba la// sgo khyud kyi ni nang rol
25a8(rgyud): dra// sngags pa rgyal ba shAkya thub// gser gyi khe dag 'bar dang bcas// mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// mgon po nam bza' ngur smrig snoms// khyab bdag bsta/
25b1(rgyud): pa'i don mdzad pa// pad ma dkar po'i stan la bzhugs// chos 'chang tshul du bzhugs pa bri// de'i g.yas su lha me ni// sangs rgyas spun zhes bya ba ste// lha mo cung zad 'dzum pI
25b2(rgyud): zhal// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba// mtshungs med sku ni rab tu dang // de ni shAkya thub pa'i yum// de'i g.yas su lha mo ni// rigs sngags mdzod pu zhes grags pa//
25b3(rgyud): pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa ste// dung zla kun d+ha lta bu'i mdog/ lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs// reb kun rdzogs byed par bri// de nas sngags pas g.yon rol du// shAkya
25b4(rgyud): seng ge skyob pa yis// gtsug tor gzi' can rtson 'grus che// gdugs dkar po dang rgyal ba yi// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal nyi dang // gzi brjid phung po skal chen dang //
25b5(rgyud): rnam par mthor zhes rnam grags pa// lnga po yang dag bri bar bya// shAkya tog ni mthu chen gyi// gtsug tor lnga po 'di dag ni// gnas ni lnga rnams nyid du ni// rab tu bsgrims
25b6(rgyud): te bri bar bya// de yid byang du song nas ni// gnas gtsang rnams ni bri bar bya// dbang phyug kun tu me tog dang // 'od kyi phyeng ba nyid dang ni// de dag thams cad legs par bri//
25b7(rgyud): mdzod spu yi ni g.yas logasu// gtsug tor chen po cher 'byung dang / de bzhin 'byung nyid dang ning // sgra dbyang mtha' yas pa yang ste// gtsug tor gsum po kho na ni/ sgrims
25b8(rgyud): skye yang dag bri bar bya// gtsug tor lnga po stobs chen rnams// dkar po sar skye ser por bya// gsum po gzhan ni dkar po dang // ser po dang ni dmar por bya// kun kyang
26a1(rgyud): / 'od zer dmar po can/ rgyan rnams kun gyi rgyan pa yis// de nas smon lam stobs chen ste// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// de dag sngags pas
26a2(rgyud): me phyogs su// me yi drang srong che rnams dang // bcas shing me'i nang na 'dug/ thal ba'i so ris gsum gyi mtshan// dpa' bo thams cad rab tu dmar// snying kha sum mdo ris
26a3(rgyud): mtshan can// me lce 'bar ba'i dbus na 'dug/ de nas lce'o phyogs kyi rab// gshin rje'i gtso bo lag pa na// dbyug pa thogs pa ma he zhon// kha dog dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra//
26a4(rgyud): ma mo rnams dang dus mtshan dang // 'chi bdag rnams kyis skor bar bri// bden bral phyogs su bden bral ni// lag par ral gri 'jigs pa bri// de nas kyang ni blo ldan pa//
26a5(rgyud): myur du byang gi phyogs song ste// lha'i rgyal po ri rab la// 'dug cing lha rnams kyis bskor ba// lag na rdo rje gcod pan can// rgyan kun gyis ni brgyan par bri// de nas de yi
26a6(rgyud): shar du ni// chu lag na zhags thogs bri// de'i yang ni shar phyogs su// nyi ma shing rta'i steng du bri// de'i g.yas dang g.yon du ni// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal bri// de'i g.yas
26a7(rgyud): su tshangs pa ni// gdung bzhi pa la thor tshugs can// oM zhes bya ba lhur len pa// dang pad+ma stan 'dug bri// de yi nub du bri ba ni// sa yi lha dang dbyangs can dang // khyab 'jug
26a8(rgyud): skye ma byed de bzhin rlung // bde byed de bzhin zla ba ste// nub kyi phyogs su gnas nas ni// rab tu nan tan byas te bri// bris nas sngags pas de nas na// yid la 'khrul pa med pa ru//
26b1(rgyud): gsang sngags mgon po rab tu ni// khro tshon bzhan gyi mi thub ces// bya ba nyid dang lha mon// gzhan gyi mi thub ma dang ni// sa bdag lag na bum pa thogs// bum pa yang dag
26b2(rgyud): gnas par bri// ku chen dga' bo nye dga' dag/ shAkya seng ge skyob pa yi// sgo drung gnyis su mngon phyogs par// rab tu sgrims te bri bar bya// gzhan yang shAkya thub pa yis//
26b3(rgyud): rgyud rnams kun las dkyil 'khor du// sngags dang phyag rgya gang bshad pa// de dag kyang ni mkhas pas bri// sngags pa de nas phyir byung nas// cha gsum pa ni nges pa la// rdo rje
26b4(rgyud): dam pa byin pa ni// gur gum lta bu'i mdog can ste// spyi bor zur phud lnga dang ldan// byis pa gzhon du gzugs can pa// ud dpal sngon po rdo rje can// lag pa g.yon thogs
26b5(rgyud): pa ste// pad ma dkar po'i sten la 'dug/ rab tu 'dzum pa'i bzhin du gnas// 'od zer mtshan nyid bzang po yi// kun tu 'khor bar sngags pas bri// de'i byang du gzhon nu ni/
26b6(rgyud): dra ba'i 'od can lag pa na// rin chen dra ba thogs pa ste// sna tshogs pa'i rgyan gyis rgyan// pad ma dkar po'i stan la 'dug/ rgyal ba'i sras la lta ba bri// rdo rje dam pa sbyin pa yi//
26b7(rgyud): g.yon du po nya mo lnga bri// skra can dang na nye skra can// sna tshogs bsam dang nor can ma// de bzhin 'gag ma zhes bya ba// 'di dag blo ldan po nya mo// de dag gi ni 'og zad du// phyag
26b8(rgyud): rnyan ma ni lnga rnams dang // gzhon nu 'dra ba'i 'od car gyi// 'khor gnyis po yang bri bar bya// de nas sngags pas lho phyogs su// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// sgrib
27a1(rgyud): @pa thams cad rnam sel gtso// yid bzhin nor bu thogs pa bri// de'i cha gnyis bor nas ni// dpa' bo ngo mtshar can dang ni// sems can kun la mi
27a2(rgyud): 'jigs sbyin// ngan song thams cad spongs pa dang / de bzhin skyong sems blo gros dang // blo chen snying rjes gdung ba dang // byams pa mngon 'byung ba dang // gdud pa thams cad
27a3(rgyud): zhi byed dang // de bzhin blo bros bsam pa ste// mkhas pas brgyad po bri bar bya// byang gi phyogasu song nas ni// si'i snying po 'bar dang bcas// bzod dang nges pa bun tshogs
27a4(rgyud): bri// de yi stan ni mkhas pa yis// 'byung ba kun dang ldan pa yis// rin chen kun gyi nyer rgyan pa// de'i steng na rin chen bzhi'i// pad ma yang dag gnas pa ni// yid du
27a5(rgyud): 'ong ba bsam bya ste// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen po// de yi steng na 'dug par bri// de yid 'khor na nan tan gtso// mtha'i shin du grangs med de// de yi nang nas
27a6(rgyud): byang chub sems// rin chen 'byung gnas rin chen lags// sa 'dzin nyid dang lag na ni// rin chen phyag rgyan can dang ni// lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pa nyid// grags chen
27a7(rgyud): 'di dag bar bya// de bzhin sngags pas nub phyogs su// dpa' bo na mkha'i snying po ni// gzi brjid chen po gos dkar gyon// lag na ral gri thogs bsam ste// rgyal sras
27a8(rgyud): snga ma'i stan stong na// legs par 'dug pa bri bar bya// bdag nyid chen po de 'khor tu// grags pa dag kyang bri bar bya// de 'khor dpa'o chen po ni// na mkha' dri med blo gros
27b1(rgyud): mkha'// blo gros rnam dag nyid dang ni// spyod pa yi ni blo gros dang // blo brtan pa zhes bya ba ste// de dag du ni sgrim zhing bri// rtag tu dpa' bo 'di rnams dang // lhan cig go rims
27b2(rgyud): bzhin du bsam// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnam la bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la ring zhing zhig du mi
27b3(rgyud): mig 'dzub par ltas te// ched du gleng pa gzhi tshig tu smras pa// 'jig rten du ni kun mkhyen rnams// u dum 'bar ba'i me tog bzhin// brgya lam na ni res 'ga' zhig/ 'byung
27b4(rgyud): 'gyur yang ni mi 'byu // gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul 'byung ba// de bas kyang ni dkon pa ste// skal pa bye ba du ma ru// sdig pa bgyis par gyur pa gang // de kun dkyil 'kho
27b5(rgyud): 'di 'dra ba// mthong bas byang bar 'gyur lags na// grags pa mtha' yas sngags spyod pa'i// tshul la gnas na smos ci dgos// skyob pa'i gsang sngags bzlas na
27b6(rgyud): nita ta go phangs bla na med par 'gyur// gang dag spyod pa mchog 'di la// blo gros shin tu mi g.yo ba// de dag gi ni ngan 'gro rgyan// sdug bsngal kun 'byung rab tu gcad//
27b7(rgyud): de'i tshe thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa de dag gis/ mgrin cig tu mthun pa'i tshig smras pa// gseng sngags spyod pa'i dbang gyur pa// dpa' bo chen
27b8(rgyud): po lag so legs// khyod kyi yid la gang bsam pa// mnyam med thams cad mkhyen la zhus// sngags rgyud rtogs par shes pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' gzhan rnams dang /
28a1(rgyud): / sngags spyad 'bras bu la gnas pa// bdag cag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
28a2(rgyud): gsol to// tshon zhes bgyi ba de gang legs// ci slad 'di ni tshan zhes bgyi// tshon ni ji ltar bgyi bar bgyi// gang gi thog mar btang bar bgyi// rta babs rnams dang de
28a3(rgyud): bzhin du// sgo khyud rnams kyi tshad dang ni// sgo khyud kyang ni ci 'dra bgyi// mgon po yis ni bshad du gsol// lha bshos me tog byag spos dang // bum pa rnams kyang rgyas
28a4(rgyud): par gsungs// slob ma ci ltar bzung bar dang // de ni ci ltar dbang bskar dang // bla ma la ni yon dbul dang // sprin bsregs gnas kyang bdag la gsungs// gsang
28a5(rgyud): sngags mtshani nyid ci 'dra lags// ting nge 'dzin du bzhed pa gang // de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das// chos kun dbang phyug thub pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad
28a6(rgyud): gsungs// yid ni cig tu tshur nyon cig/ theg chen 'bras bu 'byung ba yi// gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gyi mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis ni// gang dag dris
28a7(rgyud): ba bshad par bya// sems can khams ni zhen byed cing // 'di ni chos dbyings ro yin par// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sngon gsungs ste// de phyir 'di ni tshon zhes bya// mtshon
28a8(rgyud): ni gang nas bgyi bar bya// phyir rol nas ni chen mo bgyi// dkar po thog mar btang bar bya// de'i 'og tu dmar po ste// de nas ser po btang bar bya// de'i 'og tu ljang khu
28b1(rgyud): na sum ma 'a man chogs yogs mas smra sam sa lag dag ma/ gros ma ca mag ma pal 'a nig pa 'a ma 'a kyi / bye mas sa ga
28b2(rgyud): kyi ni bar bar du// sgo bsrungs rnams ni bzhag par bya// ting nge 'dzin ni mdor na sems// yang dag mgu ba yin par bshad// sems dpa' chen po khyad pa ni// yid
28b3(rgyud): gcig bsdus la nyan par gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// stong pa nyid ces rgyal bas gsungs// de ni sems yongs shes pa las// thob par gyur gyi gzhan du
28b4(rgyud): min// de dag nyid ni spangs pa ste// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod// stong pa chen po zhes bya ste// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa'o// de bas rnam pa thams cad
28b5(rgyud): du// stong nyid rtag tu dran par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad// sangs rgyas thams cad thabs gcig du yang dag par mos nas// nyan thos sangs
28b6(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dang so so'i tshul gsung so// de'i tshe sangs rgyas thams cad dang rgyud gcig pa'i stobs kyi shugs zhes bya ba'i ting nge
28b7(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// byang chub snying por 'dug nas su// bdud ni
28b8(rgyud): rnam pa bzhi bcom pas// de nas dpa' bo chen po zhes// tshangs las sogs pa lha'i tshogs// 'jigs pa thams cad med pa'i sgra// dga' bzhin du na spobs par byed//
29a1(rgyud): @de phyin chad ni dpa' bo// dpa' bo chen po zhes su grags// skye ba med pa rangs rtogs pa// tshig gi spyod yul rnam spangs shing // nyes pa thams cad
29a2(rgyud): med pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang bral ba yin// stong pa'i ye shes mkha' 'dra ba// mun pa kun dang bral gyur cing // shin tu dri med de kho ra// ci ltar 'byung ba la 'byung // kun
29a3(rgyud): mkhyen tsam gyi tshul du gnas// kun mkhyen sangs rgyas mtshan nyid do// de yi de nyid dam pa 'di// 'jig rten snang bar byed pa ste// byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs dang ni// yug
29a4(rgyud): 'bru rnams su bstan nas su// sems can rnams la snying rtse'i phyir// ngas ni thams cad rab tu bshad// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// ngo mtshar gyur nas mig gdangs ste//
29a5(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa kho bo yis// phyag 'tshal nas ni tshig 'di smras// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs dang ni// shes rab bsam yas ngo mtshar che// spros pa kun dang bral ba yi//
29a6(rgyud): chos rtogs nas ni rang 'byung rnams// 'jig rten kun gyi reb kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa stor// gsang sngags mtshan nyid de lta bu// bden pa gnyis la legs gnas pa/
29a7(rgyud): sems can kun gyis shes nas ni// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog gnas 'gyur// de nas bsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ tshigasu gcad pa de dag gsol nas bcom ldan 'das
29a8(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad mig mi mdzum pa'i lta bas bstas nas cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
29b1(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa// sangs rgyas kyi sa la gnas pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis tshul ni/ dog pa dang ni bral ba ru//
29b2(rgyud): dgos pa'i sa la gnas de rnams// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa yin// gsang ba pa'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sa skyed pa'i dbang phyug rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi
29b3(rgyud): tshul ni/ tshul 'di rnams thams cad mi dmigs shing // srid dang skye ba rnams spangs pa'i// 'jig rten sgyu ma ltar shes nas// 'jig rten dbang du 'gyur mi 'dod// gsang ba
29b4(rgyud): pa'i bdag po gzhan yang nyan thos dmigs pa dang // bcas pa'i sa la gnas pa rnams// skye ba dang 'jig par rtogs nas/ mtha' gnyis bshig pas rgyu mi dmigs pa'i phyir//
29b5(rgyud): shin tu dngos po med pa'i ye shes mi spyod do// 'di ni nyan thos kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// rang sangs rgyas dang 'bras bu rnam par bshig nas// /
29b6(rgyud): brjod du med pa'i tshul la gnas pa rnams ni/ chos thams cad brjod du med do snyam pa'i ye shes 'jug ste/ nga shin tu 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par reg par byed pa
29b7(rgyud): 'di ni/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa rnams rgyu las 'bras bu dang las byung ba'am// ldog par rtog
29b8(rgyud): cing gzhan gyi dbang gis stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin kun tu skye bar 'gyur te/ 'di ni 'jig rten pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul lo// gsang ba po'i bdag po// 'di ni ting 'dzin
30a1(rgyud): gyi tshul yin te/ de la sogs pa'i/ sangs rgyas dang ni rang sangs rgyas// byang chub sems dpa' skyobs rnams dang // nyan thos de la sdig pa
30a2(rgyud): par// grags pa gang dag yin pa dang // 'jig rten pa yi lha gang yin// gsang sngags spyod pa'i cho ga'i tshul// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas// dpa' bo de che 'chad
30a3(rgyud): par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po gsang sngags rnams kyis gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid
30a4(rgyud): nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol// bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces gsang ba pa'i bdag po do la/ rdzogs
30a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gsang ba ni// tshig dang ming dang brda yis mtshan// tshig de dbang du gyur pas na// gsang sngags don rnams thams cad bsgrub// kha cig bskal ba'i tshig dang /
30a6(rgyud): ldan// kha cig rang ming thog mar smos// hu~M dang phaT dang ldan pa ni// gtsug tor rnams kyi yin par sgrags// zung ze tshom cig ces pa dang // rnan song drol cig ces pa ni//
30a7(rgyud): phyag rnyan rnams dang khro bo yi// gsang sngags yin par 'dren pas gsungs// na ma sa hA la sogs ldan// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtogs pas mtshan// zhi ba'i yi ge rnam par
30a8(rgyud): dag/ re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'i// gsang sngags sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa yin// nyan thos rnams kyi gsang sngags ni// gcig
30b1(rgyud): bu bzhi ni gcig la gnas// rang sangs rgyas kyi de bzhin te// khyad par dag ni bshad bya ni// ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par las// las tshe rnam pa sbyang zhes bya// bsang ba ba'i
30b2(rgyud): bdag po// gzhan yang dgasang sngags rnams kyi mtshan nyi ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ma byas/ byed du ma cug/ rjes su yid rang ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ni chos rnam
30b3(rgyud): kyi chos nyid do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / chos rnams kyi chos nyid de na ye nas gnas pa ste// de yang 'di ltar gsang sngags
30b4(rgyud): rnams kyis chos nyid do// gsang ba'i bdag po de la gang gi tshe// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen pa// thams cad gzigs pa// 'jig rten du byung ba
30b5(rgyud): de'i tshe/ chos nyid de tshul sna tshogs dang / dgongs pa sna tshogs kyis sems can bsam pa// sna tshogs pa rnams la tshig sna tshogs pa rnams/ yig 'bru sna tshogs dang /
30b6(rgyud): yul gyi nges pa'i tshig tu brjod pa sna tshogs dang / dbyangs sna tshog su go ba rnams su byin gyis brlabs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul 'chad do// ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/
30b7(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi chu la yig 'bru dag du byin gyi sa brlobs ces na// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar yang
30b8(rgyud): dag par bsgrub pa'i bden pa'i tshig gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i
31a1(rgyud): stobs bcu dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rin po che bdun dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
31a2(rgyud): chos ma dris pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / gsang ba ba'i bdag go// mdor na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang yin de thams cad de bzhin gshes
31a3(rgyud): pa rnams kyi bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs dang / sngon gyi smon lam mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi byin brlabs kyi stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs nas//
31a4(rgyud): sems can la bskal pa ji lta ba bzhin du/ gsang sngags kyi cho ga de yang dag par ston to// gsang sngags kyi cho ga de yang dag zhe na/ bzod nas ma skyes phyir a ni chos thams
31a5(rgyud): cad kyi sgo'o// bgos pa dang bral ba'i phyir/ ka ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// nam mkha' dang 'dra bar dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ kha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'gro ba
31a6(rgyud): thams cad dmigs su med pa'i phyir// ga ni chos thams cad kyis sgo'o// gcig tu 'phungs pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ g+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'chi 'pho
31a7(rgyud): thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir/ tsa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// grib ma dang mtshungs pa'i phyir// tsha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// skye ba dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ dza ni tshe
31a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgo'o// dri ma dang dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dz+nyA ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// nga rgyal dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ Ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// skye ba dmig/
31b1(rgyud): su med pa'i phyir// Tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'khrugs pa dmig su med pa'i phyir/ Da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// slu ba yongs su bral ba'i phyir/ D+ha ni chos thams
31b2(rgyud): cad kyi sgo'o// de bzhin nyid dmig su med pa'i phyir/ ta ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gnas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ tha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'dul ba dmigasu
31b3(rgyud): med pa'i phyir/ da ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// khams dmigasu med phyir/ d+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// don dam pa'i bded pa dmig su med pa'i phyir// pa ni chos thams
31b4(rgyud): cad kyi sgo'o// dbu ba dang 'dra bar snying po med pa'i phyir// pa ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// ngag ni lam dang bral ba'i phyir// ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// srid pa thams cad
31b5(rgyud): dmigs su med pa'i phyir// b+ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// 'chi ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ ma ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// theg pa thams cad dmig su med pa'i phyir/
31b6(rgyud): ya ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rdul thams cad bral ba'i phyir// ra ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// mtshan nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir// la ni chos thams cad kyi skye'o// rang bzhi
31b7(rgyud): gyi zhi ba'i phyir/ sha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rang bzhin gyis blun pa nyid kyi phyir// Shi na chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// bden pa thams cad dmigasu med pa'i phyir// sa ni
31b8(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// rgyud dmigasu med pa'i phyir/ ha ni chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag po// ra dang nya dang / na ni ting nge 'dzin thams cad la dbang
32a1(rgyud): bskur ba ste/ mthu thams cad dang ldan pa/ rab tu myur bar dgos pa'i don rab tu bsgrub par yang byed pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po//
32a2(rgyud): gsang sngags tshul ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di ni/ re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par sbyin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyi mi khyab pa/
32a3(rgyud): rnam pa thams cad kyi cho ga dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags kyi de kho nyid kyi don ma nges pa/ dus gsum las shin tu 'das pa/ na mkha'i ltar dri ma med pa ste/ bsam yas
32a4(rgyud): sems kyi sa la gnas/ las dang bya ba dag las byung // spyad pa'i sa ni rjes thob nas// bsam yas 'bras bu sbyin par byed// 'di ni nyid dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi
32a5(rgyud): rab tu bstan/ gsang sngags cho ga 'di shes nas// sngags pas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgra zhes bya ba de nyid mchog// gsang sngags rnams kyi bsang sngags mtshan//
32a6(rgyud): sngags pa yid la sems na ni// 'chi 'pho med pa'i gnas thob po// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to//
32a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyi tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lag so// de nyan thos dang / rang
32a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad thun mongs ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di la dad pa'i sems can de dag kyang thun mongs ma yin pa'i yon tan dang
32b1(rgyud): ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad kyi chog shad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag
32b2(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// de nas gsang ba de yis su// me tog ser po dkar po dmar// yid du 'ong bas nan tan du// lha rnams la ni mchod par bya//
32b3(rgyud): pad+ma 'am yang na ud pa la// na ga ge sar bu ga na// tsam pa a sho ta ka la// pa ta la dang sa la'ang rung // de la sogs bI me tog rnams// yid du 'ong zhing bal na sdug/
32b4(rgyud): bkra shis pa la bsngags pa yis// mkhas pas nan tan mchod par bya// tsan dan ta ka ra s+thi ka dang // gur gum dang ni ru ta'ang rung // spos mchog rab tu bzang po ni// sna
32b5(rgyud): tshogs yid du 'ong ba 'bul// a ka ru 'am sgron shing 'am// ga pur dang ni tsan dan dang // sa li'i thang chu bkra shis pa 'am// shi ri ba sa ka yang rung // gzhan yang gdugs
32b6(rgyud): spos sna tshogs pa// bkra shis 'jig rten rnams grags pa// yid 'ongs sngags pas cho ga bzhin// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nas gzhan yang sems dpa
32b7(rgyud): che/ lha bshos las ni chog nyon// 'og thug 'bras can zhor sbyar dang // la phug dang ni khur skya dang // gar po dkar po yid 'ong dang // kha 'di bca' ba bzang po dang //
32b8(rgyud): pu ri ga dang g+ha rig/ de bzhin mthu shi ra dang // bi na i shing par ti dang // par pa ta yang dbul bar bya'o// de las sogs pa'i bza' ba dang // shing thogs rnam
33a1(rgyud): ni sna tshogs dang // hwags dang li kha ra rnams dang // bu ram sbrang rtsi mar dag dang // btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang // zho dang 'o ma rgyas par/
33a2(rgyud): dbul// mar me rnam pa sna tshogs pa// gtsang zhing shin du bzang po yi// 'bu mar rab tu dri zhim pas// rab tu bkang ste dbul bar bya// phyogs su gdugs dang
