59b8(rgyud): yan lag kun tu ra zhes pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba zhibs 'khrigs// med pa'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi gzugs// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs kyi snying po nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo byin gyis
60a1(rgyud): brlabs la// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas pa mngon du byed cing sras bu bres la// phyi rol gyis dkyil 'khor las/ sum gnyis lha'i gnas
60a2(rgyud): su bzhag ste// sum cha 'khor sar bya'o// dkyil 'khor lhag ma gnyis kyang de bzhin du rnam par phye la// lha'i gnas bsham par bya'o// de nas yang bdag nyid bcom ldan
60a3(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad du de'i phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs la/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por byin gyis brlabs te thog mar 'tshon rtsi dkar po blangs la/ 'di ltar byin gyis
60a4(rgyud): brlabs par bya'o// 'di ni chos kyi dbyings rnams dag ste/ sems can khams ni rnams sbyong ba// 'di ni bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs// nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs//
60a5(rgyud): de ltar blo can gyis bsams na// der ni ra zhes bya ba yang // zhi ba 'bar ba'i phreng ba can mdon/ dung zla kun dang 'dra bar bsams// de nas tshon rtsi gnyis dang ni// dmar por
60a6(rgyud): blangs nas nan tan du// yi ge a zhes bya ba ni// 'bar ba glad dkor bcas par bsams// rgyal ba thub dga' dam pa ste// nyi ma dang po 'char ba bzhin// de nas sngags pas
60a7(rgyud): tshon gsum pa// kha dogs ser po blang bar bya// mkhas pas de nas ka zhes pa// de che go cha bzhin du bsam// de bzhin gser 'od thug pa ni// gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang ba
60a8(rgyud): ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig bcom pa// kun tu rnam par snang ba yin// de nas mar gang 'dra ba yis// mtshon rtsi 'khor ba las sgrol ba// ba zhes bya ba de ru bzhag/ byang
60b1(rgyud): chub kyi snying po'i thub chen te// dpa'o kha dog 'jam 'dra ba// kun tu 'jig pa med par byed// de nas tshon ni nag po de// mkhas pa yi ni blangs nas su// der ni ha zhes bya ba
60b2(rgyud): bsam// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rnam par 'phro// dus mtha'i me ltar mi bzad pa// lag na rdo rje rtse bran brgyan// bdud sde sdad pa thams cad la// rnam pa kun du sdig par byed//
60b3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de'i tshe ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ mtha' yas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom
60b4(rgyud): ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba rigs kyi rgyal mo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul las byung ba 'di phyung ngo // na ma sarba
60b5(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ a sa me sa ra me a tsa le ga ga ne sarba tra na ga te swA hA/ de nas tshon gyi cho ga byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes
60b6(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa klagaso sam/ phyag byas te/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di lan brgyad du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas langs te/ dkyil 'khor bskor la nang du
60b7(rgyud): zhugs nas/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs kyi bsgrub pa la dmigs te/ bdag nyid pa zhes bya bas/ las kyi rdo rje sems par byin gyis brlabs la rdo rje
60b8(rgyud): dam pa byin pa dang / lhan cig snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gtan la dbab pa ni 'di yin te/ dbus su bcom
61a1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po pad ma dkar po la bzhugs pa/ dbu thor tshugs dang / dbu rgyan can/ dar ram ras kyi slad g.yogs dang /
61a2(rgyud): dar la'i stod yogs rnams pa gser gyi kha dog lta bu 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa/ phyag rgya'am gzugs sam/ yi ge'i 'bru ra bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni a/ shar phyog
61a3(rgyud): su sangs rgyas thams cad kyis a/ zhes bya ba glad kor dang bcas pa'o// a dbang ldan phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum bcom ldan 'das ma na mkha'i spyan bri'o//
61a4(rgyud): yang na yi geg bya ba bri'o// gang me'i phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'am/ yi ge ka zhes bya ba bri'o// ka byang phyogs su lag
61a5(rgyud): na pad ma/ 'khor byang chub sems dpa' skye ba cig gis thogs pa dag dang lhan cig tu/ pad mi'i phyag brgya 'am/ yi ge sa zhes bya ba bri'o// sa lho phyogs su cha gsum por
61a6(rgyud): te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// lag na rdo rje 'khor dang bcas par rdo rje'i phyab rgya 'am/ yi ge pa zhes bya ba bri'o// ba de'i cha gsum bor la/ rdo rje 'tshangs thams cad
61a7(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya 'am yi ge ra bri'o// hu de nas bden bral gyi phyogs su/ de'i phyag rgya 'am/ yi ge'i 'bru ni hUM/ rlung gi phyogs su 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba
61a8(rgyud): bgegs chen po 'joms pagyen du 'bar ba'i phreng ba can/ rab tu 'jigs pa chen po'i dus kyi me'i gzugs 'dra ba/ 'jigs pa yang 'jigs par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje
61b1(rgyud): 'od 'phro ba can thogs pa/ de'i phyag rgya 'am/ yi ger bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o ha de nas phyogs bzhir bsrungs pa chen po bzhi bgod do// de la shar phyogs su mi
61b2(rgyud): 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i bsrungs pa chen po gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ gos dkar po gyon pa yid tsam khro ba'i gdongs lag na dbyugs pa thogs pa/ de'i phyag rgya 'am/ yi ger
61b3(rgyud): bri'o// de las yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// tsa/ byang phyogs su ni 'jigs pa thams cad med pa zhes bya ba'i bsrungs pa/ kha dog dkar po lag na ral gri thogs shing /
61b4(rgyud): gos dkar po gyon pa/ 'bar ba dang bcas pa/ 'jigs pa thams cad med pa de'i phyag rgya'am// yi ger bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// pa/ nub phyogs gdul dka'
61b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i bsrung ba/ a sha ka dmar po'i 'dog 'dra ba/ gos dmar po gyon pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la lta ba de'i phyag
61b6(rgyud): rgya'am/ yi ger bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// sa/ lho phyogs su mthul ba rdo rjes 'dul bya zhes bya ba'i bsrung ba chen po kha dogs nag mo// bzhin khro gnyer slad
61b7(rgyud): yogs blo gyon pa// thor tshugs dang cod dpan can/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rang ga 'bar bas mngon par rnang bar byed pa/ lag na dbyugs pa thogs pa
61b8(rgyud): bgegs chen po med par byed pa'i phyag rgya'am/ yi ge bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// k+Sha/ de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas pa/ byag rten dang bcas/ dang
62a1(rgyud): ma dkar po la 'dug pa bri'o// de ltar blo can gyis dkod nas/ sngags pa sngags la gzhol ba yis// cho ga bzhin du byir byung nas// gnyis
62a2(rgyud): pa'i cha ni nges pa las// shAkya'i rigs ni dga' byed pa// thub pa'i rgyal po bri bar bya// mgon po nam bza' ngur smrig bsnams// mtshan mchog sum bcu rtsa gnyis ldan//
62a3(rgyud): bstan pa yi ni don mdzad ltar// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// sngags pas phyag rgya dgod pa ni// lhung zed chos gos la sogs pa 'am// yang na mkhas pas
62a4(rgyud): yi ger bzhag/ de'i cho ga dam pa 'di'o// b+ha de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du/ bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid du byin gyis brlabs la/ byang chub kyi sems su
62a5(rgyud): gyur pa'i yid kyis cha gsum bor te// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad lan gsum rjes su dran par byas nas/ tshe na de nyid blangs te/ shar phyogs kyi cha gsum
62a6(rgyud): par rdo rje dam pa sbyin bzhin nu gzugs can/ lag pa g.yon pa na ud pa la 'thing ka steng na rdo rje can thogs pa/ brgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa// dar ram ras kyi smad g.yog
62a7(rgyud): gyon pa/ dar la'i stod g.yogs can/ kha dog gur bum lta bu/ spyi bor zur phud lnga pa/ de'i phyag rgya 'am/ yi ge bri'o// de'i sngags ni 'di'o// nam sa man ta drung /
62a8(rgyud): d+ha nar paM/ de'i g.yas phyogasu dra ba can gyi 'od gzhon nu'i gzugs can rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa lag na rin po che'i dra ba 'am/ lcags kyu thogs pa/ phyag rgya 'a/
62b1(rgyud): yi ge ri 'brur bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// tsha/ de nas lho phyogs su byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/
62b2(rgyud): thor tshugs dang cod pan can/ lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu thogs pa/ de'i phyag rgya 'am yi ge bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni 'di'o// a/ nub phyogs su byang chub sem
62b3(rgyud): dpa' sa'i snying po zhes bya ba sku 'dog ljang khu lag na pad ma thogs pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa de'i phyag rgya 'am/ yi ge bri'o// de la yi ge ni 'di'o// ai/ nub
62b4(rgyud): phyogasu byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i snying po zhes bya ba rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa gos dkar po gyon pa 'bar ba dang bcas leg na ral gri thogs pa/ de
62b5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'am yi ger bri'o// de la yi ge'i 'bru ni i/ chos kyi dbyings la gzhol ba yi// sngags pas de nas 'dug nas su// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi// byang
62b6(rgyud): chub sems su gyur pa yid/ shar phyogs kha bltas gnas nas ni/ rdo rje can gyi rgya bcings nas/ de nas las kyi rdo rjer gyur// nan tan du ni mchod par bya// kun tu khyab
62b7(rgyud): pa'i yid kyis su/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// dam tshig zhes bya'i rgya bstan nas// gsang sngags lan gsum bzlas par bya// slob ma gtsang mchog
62b8(rgyud): bzhin/ ngos te dkyil 'khor mdun du ni// de dag gsum la skyabasu btang // de nas byang chub sems kyang bskyed// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyi// phyag rgya de
63a1(rgyud): dag kun la bcing // de nas chos kyi 'khor lo bcings// yid kyis de'i gzugs sbyar te// ras kyi gdong pa bkab nas ni// snying rjer gyur
63a2(rgyud): ba'i yid kyis so// byang chub tshogs ni rdzogs bya'i phyir// lag pa stong pa mi bya'o// dam tshig gi ni dam pa 'di// deg kun gyi rna bar grags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dam
63a3(rgyud): tshig ni// de nas de la bdag gis bcing / byang chub sems gyur yid kyis su// de nas me tog 'dor du bzhugs// me tog gang du babs gyur pa// de na sngags pa de la sbyin//
63a4(rgyud): lus can kun la dam tshig phyir// cho ga de ltar rab tu bya// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin// gtso bo de la yang zhus pa// mgon po slu ba'i mchog gyur pas// dbang bskur bI
63a5(rgyud): cho ga gsungs// / de skad gsol nas bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi dbyangs la gzhol ba yis// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// chos rnams kun la dang
63a6(rgyud): ba'i phyir// cho ga'i mchog ni ngas bshad kyis// yid gcig bsdus te cho ga nyon// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de nas slob dpon gyis/ bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i
63a7(rgyud): gzugs su// de'i sngags sam phyag rgyas byin gyis brlob po// de nas slob ma rnams la bos la/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi pad ma'i rgyal po la bzhag ste/ yan lag
63a8(rgyud): kun 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcings la/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po bzhis byin gyis brlabs pa/ rin po che sna bzhi'i bum pa'i chus spyi bo nas dbang bskur bar bya'o//
63b1(rgyud): a ni glang kor bcas pa ru// mkhas pas spyi bor bzhag nas ni// a zhes bya ba snying khar bzhag/ yang na a ni kun tu bzhags// gser gyi kha dog 'bar dang bcas/
63b2(rgyud): thor tshugs dang ni dbu rgyan// pad ma dkar po'i lce bzhugs// rgyal ba'i mchog gi ting 'dzin gnas// yi ge'i 'khor lo rim par bye ba rgyas pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
63b3(rgyud): 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor 'dus pa la gzigs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsad
63b4(rgyud): ba ba'i bdag po// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyun du gyur pa/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i/ phyag rgya rim par phye ba rgyas pa
63b5(rgyud): gang gis brgyan na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ 'gro ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i mtshan mas btabs pas/
63b6(rgyud): lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin nam/ na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams 'byor par 'gyur zhing //
63b7(rgyud): de rnams kyang de dag gi ngag nyan par 'gyur ba yod kyis/ de nyen la legs par yid la gzungs shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
63b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i dus la bab bo// bde bar gshegs pa de'i tshod la bab po// de nas bcom ldan
64a1(rgyud): 'das kyis de'i tshe/ stobs thogs pa med pa'i gnas byin gyis brlob pa zhes pa bya bi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom
64a2(rgyud): ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo thams cad du thogs med pa'i stobs cen/ dam tshig la 'jug par byed pa/ stobs gsum
64a3(rgyud): dang ldan par 'byung ngo // nam sa man ta byad d+ha nan/ e me sa me sa ma ye swA hA/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
64a4(rgyud): cad kyi sa yang dag par ston par byed pa/ chos gsum gyi lam gyi mtshams las mi 'da' bar byed pa/ sa dang pha rol du phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa de yin te/
64a5(rgyud): de'i phyag rgya 'di yin no// lag pa nyid thal mo khong stong du sbyar la the bo gnyis bsgreng ste/ rgya 'di phyag rgya chen po ste/ sangs rgyas skyob pa kun gyi yin// sangs rgyas
64a6(rgyud): kun gyi dam tshig ni// phyag rgya 'di la rab tu gnas// lag pa dang ni gnyis ka yang // blo dang ldan pas khu tshur bcas// the bo gnyis ni nang du gzhugs// 'dzub mo
64a7(rgyud): gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya// rgya 'di phyag brgya chen po ste// chos dbyings rnams par spong ba'o// gsang sngags ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ d+ha ma du sa b+ha ba ko haM/ de bzhin
64a8(rgyud): du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo thams cad bzlog ste bsnol la the bong gnyis phrad do// phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa nyid// chos kyis 'khor lo zhes su sgrags// 'jig rten/
64b1(rgyud): mgon po skyob rnams kyis// 'khor lo rab tu 'di bskor ro// na ma sa man ta badz+ra na ma/ badz+rad ma ko haM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar la/
64b2(rgyud): 'dzu mo gnyis 'the bod kyi ste dudu bzhag ste/ ral gri lta bur bya'o// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po ral gri'i rgya// 'dis ni lhan cig skyes
64b3(rgyud): pa yi// 'jig tshogs lta ba gcod par byed// gsang sngags ni/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ma hA kha dag bi ra dzi d+harma san d+ha ri sha ka sa ha dza pad ka ya shrI ched
64b4(rgyud): ka ta thA ga d+hi mu ti nIr+Yag+ma d+harma nir dza ta hUM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong sdong du sbyar te/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyis 'the bo bsgrigs la dung lta bur bya'o//
64b5(rgyud): phyag rgya dpal dang ldan pa 'di// chos kyi gdung zhes rnam par bsgrags// 'di ni 'jig rten 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' rnams// zhi ba mya ngan
64b6(rgyud): 'das 'gro ba// rdul dang bral ba'i chos 'chad do// gsang sngags ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ sarba tha aM/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo kun brkyang ba
64b7(rgyud): las kyang brkyang ste/ dril bu lta bur byas la 'the bong gnyis dang 'the'u chung gnyis gcig tu smad de/ 'dzub mo gnyis dang gung mo sprad do// pad pa dpal ldan 'di/
64b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyis// mi shigs rdo rje'i gdan yin te/ der ni 'dren pa 'tshang rgya zhing // rgyal ba sras rnams thams cad ni// 'di las skye dang byang chub
65a1(rgyud): @'gyur// gsang sngags ni/ nams man ta bud d+ha na ma a/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur btsangs la/ gung mo gnyis gzhibs la
65a2(rgyud): bsgred la 'dzu mo gnyis bkug la ngos gnyis su bzhag la rdo rje ltar bya/ 'the bo gnyis dang 'the'u chung gnyis smad ste bzhag/ srin lag gnyis lags pa'i nang du gzhugo//
65a3(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po rdo rje rgyu// mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes 'di// gnyid kyi byin gyi brlabs te bstan// gsang sngags ni/ nams man ta
65a4(rgyud): badz+ra naM hUM/ de bzhin du log pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ gung mo gnyis bshibs te bsgreng / 'dzub mo gnyis ngos nas bkug te sbyar ro// gtsug tor phyag rgya rgya chen te/
65a5(rgyud): gtsug tor zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis kyang // rgyal ba mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// 'di'i sngags ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan// huM hUM/ lags
65a6(rgyud): pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la/ smin mtshams su bzhag go// rgyal ba dam pa phyag rgya 'di// mdzod spu zhes ni rab tu bsgrags// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis su// rgyal ba
65a7(rgyud): mchog tu 'gyur ba yin// 'di'i sngags ni/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ a hu~M dza/ blo ldan rnal 'byor tshul gnas te// lag gnyis lte ba'i thad kar ni// lhung zed 'dzin pa'i
65a8(rgyud): tshul du bya// lhung zed phyag rgya zhes su grags// rgyu ni shAkya thub pa ste// lhung zed chen po zhes bya'o// 'di'i sngags ni/ nam sa man ta b+hung d+ha naM b+ha/ de bzhin du lag pa g.ya
65b1(rgyud): bgyen la bsgreng la/ mi 'jigs pa lta bur bya'o// sems can kun la mi 'jigs pa// de'i rab tu sbyin par 'gyur// gang gis rgya chen de bcings nas// mi 'jigs phyag rgya
65b2(rgyud): zhes bsgrags so// 'di'i sngags ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ sarba tha/ dzi na dzi na/ b+ha ya no sha na swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa smad de// dam pa sbyin par ltar
65b3(rgyud): bya'o// 'di ni dam pa sbyin rgya ste// 'jig rten mgon po rnams kyis bsgrags// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis so// rgyal mchog dam pa rtsol bar 'gyur// 'di'i da/ gas
65b4(rgyud): sngags ni 'di'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ba ra ta badz+rad ma ka swA hA/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs te/ 'dzub mo brkyang la/ dpral bar khro gnyer lta bur bya'o//
65b5(rgyud): phyag rgya chen po rgya chen 'di/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// bdud rnam par sdigs shes bya// phung byed thams cad 'jig par byed// 'di ni bcings pa tsam gyis//
65b6(rgyud): bdud sde shin tu zad pa// bgegs dang log 'dran gzhan dag kyang // the tshom med pA ru ta 'byer// 'di'i gsang sngags ni 'di'o// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ma hA ba
65b7(rgyud): la tid sha ba la te mdzod/ b+ha be ma ha maM t+ya ra byung te swA hA// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la/ gung mo dang srin lag gnyis brkyang ste/ 'the bong de drung
65b8(rgyud): du bzhag go// 'di ni sangs rgyas mgon rnams kyi// thugs rje las byung sprir yin te// migag steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ de las sangs rgyas spyan du 'gyur/ 'di'i
66a1(rgyud): gsang sngags ni/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ga ga na ba ra lag kA ka ru na ma ya/ ta thA ga t+yA swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig du
66a2(rgyud): sbyar la/ sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol ba'i khu tshur bcing ste// 'dzub mo gnyis bsgrengs la/ bkug ste sprad la zlum por bya// 'di ni zhags pa mchog ces grags//
66a3(rgyud): sdong pa thams cad 'jig par byed// sngags 'di bcings pa de'i tshe// rtag tu sdang ba bcings par 'gyur// 'di'i gsang sngags ni 'di yin no// nam sa man ta bud d+ha
66a4(rgyud): nan/ he he ma ha pra sha sa sa ro'u dar ya sa da tad+ha du ba mo tsa ka ta a ti nir dza ta swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te// khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo bsgreng
66a5(rgyud): ste/ tshig gsum bkug la lhag ma rnams ni gdu bu'i tshul du gnas par bya'o// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// lcags kyu zhes ni 'di bshad de// byang chub sems
66a6(rgyud): dpa' bdag nyid che// sa bcu dag la gnas pa dang // sdang bar sems pa bzhan dag kyang // thams cad rab tu 'gug par byed// 'di'i bsang sngags ni// na ma sa ma
66a7(rgyud): ta bud d+ha nan/ a sa ra bad Ta a pra ti hA ta/ ta thA ga ta ang ku sha bo d+hi tsar+ya pa ri su ra ka sa hA/ lcags kyu'i phyag rgya las gung mo gnyis bkug ste de nyid du sbyar ro// 'di
66a8(rgyud): ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ gnya' nod pa ba swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las sran lag gnyis bsgrengs
66b1(rgyud): la lhag ma rnams bsgre/ de bzhin du bzhag go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i lte ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags las/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ a mra tong bya
66b2(rgyud): ba swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las 'the'u chung brkyang ste sgreng la/ lhag ma rnams de bzhin du bzhag go/ skyed pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bung du
66b3(rgyud): nan/ te tha ga ta sa b+ha ba swA hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khong stong du sbyar la/ 'dzub mo gnyis ba kug ste/ nang 'dug la/ srin lag gnyis kyang de bzhin du bya//
66b4(rgyud): 'the bo dang 'gre chung gnyis cung zad dgug/ bung mo gnyis gshebs te bsgreng ngo // 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste/ 'di ni gsang sngags ni/
66b5(rgyud): na ma sarba ta thA ga ta bya ra ra ra/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis phyung la bsgreng ste gzhag go/ 'tshams chen po gcad pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'di'i gsang sngags ni yino//
66b6(rgyud): nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ bi lu ba ri ri bi ku la swA hA/ mtshams chen po bcad pa'o// de nyid las gung mo gnyis bkug la 'the bong bsgreng ngo // bsrung ba chen po'i phyag rgya
66b7(rgyud): ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man sa ta tha ba te b+ha/ sar+b+ba ye b+he ga te b+h+ya/ bi shwa mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha haM khaM rag kA ha ba la/ sarba ta tha ga ta/ pu na ya nir dza te/ hUM hUM/
66b8(rgyud): hraT ShaT/ e tha ga ces bya/ mi bzod pa zhes bya 'i bsrungs pa chen mo'i// ribin rje 'jum pa nyis nang du bzhag go// kun tu 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i bya rgya s+ho/
67a1(rgyud): gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ dza la ma la ni ta thathAg ta ar tsi swA hA/ kun tu 'bar ba'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal/
67a2(rgyud): mo khong stong du byar la/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyi ngos nas bkri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i cho ga'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ pra tsan da badza
67a3(rgyud): la ya bi pu ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i go cha'o// phyag rgya de nyid 'dzub mo gnyis dang / 'the bong gnyis gnyig tu sbyar ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljags kyi phyag
67a4(rgyud): rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ta tha ga ta dza ha sad t+ya ya d+harma/ pra ti sh+tsi ti swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ljag so// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzug
67a5(rgyud): mo gnyis dang / srin lag gnyis bkug la nang du sbyar 'the bo gnyis bsgreng la cung zad bkug ste/ rtse mo gung mo la phyogs par bya// 'the'u chung gnyis ni snga ma bzhi 'o//
67a6(rgyud): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ta tha ga ta ma hA bag tra bi sha na ma ha de ya swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pi
67a7(rgyud): zhal lo// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo bkrol la nang du bcug ste/ dgu por byas la bstod de bzung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/
67a8(rgyud): nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ta thag ta ma ha dang shwa ra sa pra sam pra ba ka/ sarba ta thA ga ta bi sha ya sam b+ha ba swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'che ba'o// phyag rgya de nyid las
67b1(rgyud): 'dzub mo gnyis bsgrengs ste bzung la/ tshig gsum pa dgug go// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha
67b2(rgyud): nan/ a tsin t+ya ad bud d+ha ru sa ma pra ba ti ba shud d+ha sa ra swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag pa'i rig pa'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis cig du thal mo khong stong
67b3(rgyud): du sbyar te/ 'the'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la gcig du spyod do// 'di ni stobs bcu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nams man ta bud d+ha nan/ da sha ba la ba d+ha
67b4(rgyud): re hU~M sang dze swA hA/ stobs bcu'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags phyag rgya de nyid las/ 'the bong gnyis rtse mor 'dzub mo gnyis bkug ste sbyar ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i
67b5(rgyud): phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ta thA ga tas+thi ti sa ta hi ta/ ang bud ka ta ga ga na sa ma sa ma sa ha/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa'i phyag rgya dang /
67b6(rgyud): gsang sngag so// phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis 'the bo'i steng du bzung ngo // gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ sarba der sa ma ta pra pa ta/ ta tha ga ta a
67b7(rgyud): nu ga ta swA hA/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyi gung mo gnyis bkris
67b8(rgyud): la/ lhag ma rnams de bzhin du bzhag go/ kun tu bzang po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ sa ma nu ga ta bi ra dza ta ma hA/
68a1(rgyud): ma hA swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo gung mo gnyis kyis drung du bkug la bzhag/ lhags ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no// 'di'i
68a2(rgyud): gsang sngags la nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ a tsi tan dza ya sarba song ta sha ya nu ga ta swA hA/ byam pa'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags so// phyag rgya de nyid las 'bre bo gnyis
68a3(rgyud): nang du gzhugs go// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ a ka sha sa ma nu ga/ pi tsi d+ha ma bar d+ha ra sA hA/ ma ma ki'i snying po dang phyag rgya'i sngags so// phyag
68a4(rgyud): rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang / 'the'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la/ 'dzub mo gnyis gang mo dang lhan cig tu sbyar ro// gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha
68a5(rgyud): nan/ ad sad tra hri da a nu ka trang trang rang rang swA hA/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la/
68a6(rgyud): sor mo thams cad dril bu 'dra bar kha bye// 'the bo gnyis dang 'the'u chung gcig tu sbyar/ lhag ma rnams na pad+ma lta bur bya'o// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man
68a7(rgyud): ta bud d+ha nan/ sarba ta ga ta/ a ba lo ki te ka ru na ma ya ra ra ra hUM dza swA hA/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi pad mi'i phyag rgya dang sngagaso// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
68a8(rgyud): thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ pad ma kha phye ba lta bur bya'o// pad mi'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ dza dza swA hA/ mthu chen po thob pa'i
68b1(rgyud): pad ma'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo gnyis rtse mo can du bsgreng ste/ 'bre bo gnyis kyang de'i drung du bzhag go/
68b2(rgyud): gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ta ra ta ri ka ru b+ha be swA hA/ lha mo sgrol ma'i'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis bcus te bsgred do// lhag ma rnams ni
68b3(rgyud): sdom bzhin no// gsang sngags la/ nams man ta b+hung d+ha nan/ sarba b+ha ba sa na tra sa ni hu~M swa ta ya swA hA/ khro gnyer can ma'i 'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong
68b4(rgyud): stong du sbyar la/ srin lag gnyis dang 'the bo gnyis nang du bzhag go/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ta tha ga ta bi sha sa saM b+ha be pad ma li ni swA hA/ gos
68b5(rgyud): dkar gyi'o// phyag rgya de nyid las gyen du bsgreng la 'dzub mo gnyis kyi rtse de'i drung du bar nas gang tsam gyis chod par gzhag go/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/
68b6(rgyud): kha da b+han dza swa ya swA hA/ rta mgrin gyi phyag rgya dang sngags so// phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis dang / 'the'u chung gnyis kyang gyen du bsgreng la/ lhag ma rnams ni
68b7(rgyud): de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs pa'i tshul du bzhag pa/ de'i sngabs ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ha ha ha su ta na swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin
68b8(rgyud): du lag pa gnyis thal mo khong stong du sbyar la/ gung mo gnyis kyis srin lag dkyis te/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyi steng du bkug la gzhag/ lhag ma rnams ni snga ma bzhin no// gas
69a1(rgyud): sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ he he ku ma ra ka bi mug ti pa ta s+thi te/ smar sma ra pra ti nyan na/ 'jam dpal gyi phyag rgya dang sngag so//
69a2(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs te/ 'dzub mo dgug go// dra ba'i 'od kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ he he ku ma ra ma ya ga
69a3(rgyud): sa b+ha ba s+thi ta swA hA/ dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngag so// phyag rgya de nyid sor mo thams cad dgug par bya'o// gzhon nu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi ud pa la'i phyag rgya ste/
69a4(rgyud): gsang sngags lan ma sa man ta bud d+he nan/ he he ku ma ra bi tsi d+ha ga ti ku ma ra/ pri ta dz+nyA ma nu sma ra swA hA/ dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi phyag rgya dang sngags/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yas
69a5(rgyud): pa khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo dang gung mo gnyis bzhipas te gyen du bsgreng ngo // sgra can gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ he he ku ri gle sha ched
69a6(rgyud): ya/ ad nan/ sma ra pra ti ga na swA hA/ skra can gyi phyag rgya dang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs/ gung mo gyen du bsgrengs ste/ mdung rtse lta bur
69a7(rgyud): bya/ nye skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ b+hA ya a dz+nyA na na he ku mi ri ke swA hA/ nye skra can gyi mdung rtse'i phyag rgya dang sngags so//
69a8(rgyud): lag na gnyis khu tshur bcangs te gung mo gnyis brkyang la/ 'dzub mo gnyis ngos su sbyar la/ sna tshogs ma'i byug pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man
69b1(rgyud): ta bud d+ha nan/ he ku ma ri ke ed dz+nyAdzA na mu ra bi d+han pa ni swahA/ de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la/ srin lag dang the'u chung gnyis bsgreng ngo // nor gyi
69b2(rgyud): rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nams man ta bud d+ha nan/ he pu ra dz+nyA na ge du swA hA/ nor gyi rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya gsang sngag so// lag pa g.yas pa
69b3(rgyud): khu nur bcangs la 'dzub mo bsgreng ste/ rtse mo bgug go/ 'dugs mi'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nams man ta bud d+ha dan/ a ri sha ya sa rban ku
69b4(rgyud): ru ad dz+nyA na ku ma ra bya swA hA/ 'gugs ma'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo gnyis bsgreng ste/ tshig
69b5(rgyud): sum dgug go/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ a bi sma yin ye ge swA hA/ phyag brnyan ma rnams kyi phyag rgya dang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa
69b6(rgyud): khu tshur bcangs te/ gung mo bsgreng la tshigs sum pa dgug go// ngo mtshar can gyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ bri ma ti tshe da ka swAhA/
69b7(rgyud): ngomacher rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// lag pa g.yas pa'i dpung pa la spyod la/ lag pa mi 'jigs sbyin pa lta bu bya/ mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya ste/ bsang sngags la/
69b8(rgyud): nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ a b+ha yan 'ang+ga swA hA/ mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang sngag so// lag pa de nyid mas yang 'dren pa'i tshul du bya'o// ngan song spong ba'i
70a1(rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ a rbud d+ha ra sa ta d+ha dun sAhA/ ngan song spong ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so//
70a2(rgyud): lag pa de nyid brang du bzhag go/ yongs su skyobs sems blo gros kyis phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ he ma ha ha ma ra pra ti dz+nyA na swA hA/ yongs su
70a3(rgyud): skyobs sems blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang sngag so// lag pa de nyid me tog 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ sa ti dzod b+ha ba swAhA/ byams
70a4(rgyud): pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// lag pa de nyid snying khar bzhag la gung mo nang du dgug go/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ka ru nod b+ha ba sahA//
70a5(rgyud): snying rjes brlab pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de bzhin du lag pa mchog sbyin pa'i tshul du bya'o// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ he he ba rad/ ba ra pra pa ta satra/
70a6(rgyud): gdung ba thams cad zhi bar byed pa'o// lag pa de nyid yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya'o// gsang sngags ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ sarba sha pa ri pu ra ka swA hA/
70a7(rgyud): blo gros bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// de bzhin lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ gung mo sor mo gnyis phyag ste brkyang ngo // sa'i snying po'i me
70a8(rgyud): tog gi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ha ha ha ba sma ye swA hA/ sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya dang sngags so// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la so
70b1(rgyud): mo gsum brkyang ngo // rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ he he ma swA hA/ rin chen 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya dang sngags so//
70b2(rgyud): lag pa de nyid las srin lag brkyang ste/ gyen du bsgreng ngo // gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha na/ rang nod bya ba sahA/ phyag ni rin chen gyis phyag rgya dang sngag so//
70b3(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis bsnol te/ rgyab sbyar la g.yon pa'i 'the bo// g.yas pa'i 'the'u chung la khyud de/ de bzhin du g.yas pas kyang g.yon pa la 'khyud la/ lhag ma rnam
70b4(rgyud): rdo rje lta bur bya'o// sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags ni na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ da ra ni pra pa ta ya swA hA/ sa 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// phyag na rin pa
70b5(rgyud): chen phyag rgya ni rdo rje rtse lnga ste/ snga ma bzhin no// gsang sngags la na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ rang na nir dza ta swA hA/ phyag na rin chen gyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// phyag rgya
70b6(rgyud): de nyid las sor mo rnams dgod par bya'o// bsam gtan pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ badz+ra sa ma b+ha ba swA hA// bsam gtan pa'i phyag
70b7(rgyud): rgya dang gsang sngags so// lag pa gnyis de bzhin du bya ba ni/ namakha'i snying po'i ral gri'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man+ta bud d+hanan/ ga gnan na sa shor
70b8(rgyud): tsaswA hA/ 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po phyag rgya dang sngags so// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin dus byas pa ni/ namakha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/
71a1(rgyud): nams man ta bud d+ha nan/ tsakra bar ti swA hA/ na mkha'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// dung gi phyag rgya snga ma bzhir byas pa ni/
71a2(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ d+ha ra ma sa b+ha wa swA hA/ rnam par dag pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so//
71a3(rgyud): pad mi'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ pad ma la ya swA hA/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya
71a4(rgyud): dang gsang sngags so// ud pa la'i phyag rgya snga ma bzhin las kham phye bar byas pa ni/ na mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/
71a5(rgyud): dz+nyA nod b+ha ba swA hA/ na mkha' dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags so// rdo rje snga ma bzhin du byas pa ni brtan pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man
71a6(rgyud): ta bud d+ha nan/ badz+ra ka ra swA hA/ brtan pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya dang gsang sngag so// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar te/ srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la bung mo dang /
71a7(rgyud): 'the'o gnyis bsgreng ste/ 'dzub mo gnyis gung mo'i ngos su bkug la/ nas gang tsam gyis ma reg par gzhag go/ phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje'o// gsang sngags la/
71a8(rgyud): nams man+ta badz+ra nade/ na ma tsan+d+ra ma hA ro Sha ni hUM/ rdo rje 'dzin gyi'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'the bong gnyis dang / mthe'u chung gnyis nang du gzhug go/ ma ma ki'i phyag rgya ste/
71b1(rgyud): gsang sngags la/ nams man ta bud d+ha nan/ tiT ti Ta dza yan ti sahA/ ma ma ki'i 'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis rgyab sprad la/ sor mo rnams phan tshun bsnol te/
71b2(rgyud): bcus la bsdams te/ g.yon pa'i mthe bos g.yas pa'i mthe bo mnan la bsdam mo// rdo rje lug rgyud kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la nam sa man ta badz+ra nan/ hUM ban
71b3(rgyud): ban d+ha/ mo ta ya mo ta ya/ brjod bya be sar bad tra pra tiha te swAhA/ rdo rje lug gu rgyud kyi phyag rgya dang sngags so// rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las 'the bo gnyis bcung zad bku
71b4(rgyud): ya/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyang de la phyogs par bya'o// khro ba zla gtso ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta badz+ra nan/ hUM hUM/ phaT swA hA/ khro zla gtso'o//
71b5(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo gnyis bzhibs te/ bsgreng ngo // rdo rje rtse mo'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/
71b6(rgyud): sarba d+ha ra ma nir d+ha na badz+ra pu tsi ba ra de swA hA/ rdo rje rtse mo'i 'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs pa'i 'dzub mo gyon du bsgrengs te/ khros pa bzhin du bcas la
71b7(rgyud): gdab pa'i thabs su bya'o// gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man te badz+ra nan/ d+ha ra d+ha ri Sha ma hA re Sha nan/ d+hu ra d+hu ri Sha mahA ro Sha na kha da ya sar ba na ku ru ta thA ga ta
71b8(rgyud): ad dz+nyA na swAhA// gdul dka'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la gdab pa'i thabs bya'o// mngon mchog mtho ba'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ rnams
72a1(rgyud): / man+ta badz+ra nan/ he a bi mu kha ma hA tsan+ta bri hA Sha da ya/ tsa ki ni tsi ra ya li sa ma ya ma nu sma ra sAhA/ mngon phyogs kyi'o// snga ma bzhin du
72a2(rgyud): lhung zed 'dzin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni/ shAkya thub pa'i lhung bzed kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ na ma sa man+ta bud d+ha nan/ sarba gle sha ni pu da na/ sarba da ma shi ta pra pa ga ga
72a3(rgyud): sa ma ya swAhA/ shAkya thub pa'i'o// mdzod spu'i phyag rgya ni snga ma bzhin no// lag pa g.yas pa'i sor mo kun rtse mor sbyar ste/ spyi bo'i steng du bzhag go// gtsug tor thams
72a4(rgyud): ma cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nams man ta bud d+hanan/ baM ba hu hU~M phaT swAhA/ gtsug gtor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang sngags so// lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur
72a5(rgyud): bcangs la/ gung mo dang 'dzub mo gnyis brkyang ste/ srin lag dang 'the chung gi rtse mo mthe bo bzhag la/ g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo dang / gung mo gnyis g.yon pa'i 'thil du
72a6(rgyud): bzhag/ mthe bo yang snga ma bzhin du bya'o// mi g.yo mgon gyi phyag rgya ral gri'i shu bas su bcug pa'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i ni snga ma bzhin no//
72a7(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la/ srin lag dang 'the'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste/ gung mo gnyis gzhibs te bsgreng la 'dzub mo bkug ste/ gung me'i tshigs
72a8(rgyud): gsum pa bzhag/ mthe bo gnyis mig lta bur bya/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yum gyi phyag ste gtsug tor ro// lag pa g.yon pa'i skyang la kha sbubs te// la
72b1(rgyud): pa khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mos gdugs lta bur bzung ngo // gdug dkar po'i phyag rgya ste/ gdugs so lam gtsug tor rgyal po'i ral gri ste/ snga bzhin no// shas
72b2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo snga ma bzhin no// saM/ rnam par mthongar ba'i lcags kyu ste/ lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur btsangs la/ 'dzub mo bkug ste bzhag go// hUM/
72b3(rgyud): gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor ste/ snga ma bzhin no// gsang sngags la/ traM/ cher 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya zhes su grags/ uM/ gyen du 'byung
72b4(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya ni/ pad ma bzang po sde bzhin/ hUM/ mtha' yas pa yi dbyangs sgra ni/ dang ni yin par ngas pa shad do// ruM lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la/ smin
72b5(rgyud): 'tshams su bzhag pa ni/ mdzod spu'i phyag rgya nor bu lta bu'o// spyan ni gtsug tor snga ma bzhin no// bye brag du rdo rjes mtshan pa'o// lag pa g.yas pa pad ma 'dzin pa'i
72b6(rgyud): thabs su snying khar bzhag la/ lag pa g.yon pa thal mo bsnun pa'i tshul du bskyang ba ni/ gzhan gyi mi thub pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/
72b7(rgyud): mthe bo gnyis gyen du bsgreng ba las dgug go// gzhan gyi mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa 'gram par bstan pa ni dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya
72b8(rgyud): de nyid las gung mo 'dzub mo gnyis bcus pa lta bur bzung ngo // kun tu me tog gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'the'o gnyis nang du bzhug go// 'od kyi phra ba can
73a1(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo dang / mthe bo gnyis me tog 'dzin pa lta bur bya'o// yid 'gyogs kyi phyag rgya'o//
73a2(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa'i srin lag gi steng du 'the bo bzhag la/ 'dzub mo dang gung mo dang / 'the'u chung gsum brkyang la/ ba'i steng du bzhag go/ lag pa g.yon pa'ang
73a3(rgyud): de bzhin du bya// sgra rnam par sgrogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis gcig tu sbyar la mthe bo gnyis rtse sprad de zlum por bya/ sor mo lhag ma rnams kyi rtse mo dgug/ sa'i
73a4(rgyud): phyag brgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yas pa mi 'jig sbyin pa'i tshul du byas la/ 'the bo gnyis nang du bzhag pa ni mi gnyer ba'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid mi 'jig
73a5(rgyud): sbyin pa lta bur byas la/ mthe chung gi tshigs gnyis par bzhag go/ drang srong rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya ste/ go rims ni ci rigs par bya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis
73a6(rgyud): gcig tu sbyar la/ 'dzub mo dang mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug ste/ lhag ma rnams gcig tu bsdus la stod de bzung ba ni/ gshin rje'i be tsan gyi phyag rgya'o// lid
73a7(rgyud): pa g.yas pa kha sbub ste/ dril bu 'dra bar byas pa ni/ 'chi bdag gi phyag rgya ste dril bu'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo dang gung mo gnyis
73a8(rgyud): bsgreng ba ni/ dus mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las gung ma bsgreng ba ni/ drag mo'i phyag rgya ste/ shu la'o// phyag rgya de nyid las pad ma 'dzin pa'i du byas pa ni/
73b1(rgyud): tshangs pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las/ 'dzub mo'i gung mo'i rgyab kyi tshigs sum sprad pa ni/ gzhon nu ma'i mdung thung gi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub
73b2(rgyud): mo'i 'the bo'i rtse mor bzhag go// khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las the bo gyen du bsgreng ngo // phag mo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las
73b3(rgyud): lag pa snod lta bur bya'o// tsa mun tra'i phyag ste/ thod pa'o// bden bral gyi phyag rgya ral gri ni snga ma bzhin no// khyab 'jug gi phyag rgya 'khor lo yang snga ma bzhi no//
73b4(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pa gnyis g.yon phyogs nas stong de bskor ba ni dga' ba dang / nye dga' bo'i sprin gyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo gsum gyen du bsgreng
73b5(rgyud): ba ni/ bde byed kyi mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las sor mo de dag drang por byas pa ni/ u ma pa ti'i phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i phyag rgya ni pad ma snga
73b6(rgyud): ma bzhin te/ khyad par du dkar por bya'o// lag pa gnyis ka bzhibs te bkan la 'dzub mo dang srin lag gnyis ngos su dgugs go/ nyi mi'i phyag rgya ste shing rta'o// lag pa/
73b7(rgyud): de nyid ka gcig tu thal mo sbyar la/ gung mo dang / srin lag gnyis gzhu 'dra bar bya'o// rgyal ba dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya'o// ba dan gyi phyag ni snga ma bzhin te rlud
73b8(rgyud): gi'o// de bzhin du lag po g.yon pa lte ba'i phyog su bkan la/ sor mo gnyis bsgreng ste bzung ngo // lag pa g.yas pa de la phyogs par byas te/ bai wang len pa lta bur byas
74a1(rgyud): pa ni dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya ste bi wang ngo // chu lha'i phyag rgya ni zhags pa ste snga ma bzhin no// dbyangs can gyi phyag rgya ste/ de nyid 'dzub mo dgugo/
74a2(rgyud): lha ma yin rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ga ra la ya ra swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin las brgyang ngo // dri za'i phyag rgya ste/ gsang
74a3(rgyud): sngags la/ bi shud d+ha sa ra bA di ni swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo dgug go/ gnod sbyin thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ bsang sngags la/ yak+She shwa ra ya swA hA/ phyag de
74a4(rgyud): nyid las mthe bo dang / the'u chung gnyis rtse mo sbya'o// gnod sbyin ma rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// gsang sngags la yag+na bi t+ya d+ha ri swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo brkyang ngo //
74a5(rgyud): sha za rnams kyi rgyu ste/ gsang sngags la/ pi sha tsaM ga ti swA hA/ gung mo de nyid bkag la bzung ngo // sha za mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ mi tsi mi tsi swA hA/
74a6(rgyud): de bzhin du lag pi gnyis gcig tu sbyar la/ 'the bo gnyis byin du bsgreng te bzung ngo // gza' thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/ nams man+ta bud d+ha nan/
74a7(rgyud): gra hwe shAr+ya pra badz+ra ti ra ma ya swAhA// phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo dang 'the bo gnyis bzlog ste sbyar ro// rgya skar thams cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ nag tra
74a8(rgyud): nir da ni ya swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bkug ste/ lag pa thil du bzhag go/ bsang sngags la/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ rag k+Sha bi d+hi ba da ye swAhA/
74b1(rgyud): srin mo rnams kyi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags so// lag pa g.yas pa khar bzhag ste/ lce la reg par byed do// ma kha' 'gro ma rnams kyi phyag rgya ste/ gsang sngags la/
74b2(rgyud): na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan hriha/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de lta bu la sogs pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mos pa las byung ba/ byang
74b3(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i mtshan mar gyur pa'i phyag rgya rab 'byam rnams ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// 'on kyang ci tsam du yan lag bskyod pa de dag ku phyag rgyas rig par bya'o//
74b4(rgyud): ci tsam lce bskyod pa de dag kun kyang ga sang sngags bstan par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas// byang
74b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spad pa spyod pa rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la gnas te/ dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gzhan du byas
74b6(rgyud): na/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / byang chub las kyang basmras par 'gyur te/ dam tshig las 'das pas/ nges par ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur/
74b7(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang bachub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis brlob pa las phyag rgya'i rim par bye ba rgyas pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
74b8(rgyud): gsang ba pe'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo chos kyi rnams grangs nyon cig/ gsang ba ba'i bdag po// dal
75a1(rgyud): @byang chub sems dpal a zhes bya ba la gnas te/ dgos pa thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// nams mnata bud d+ha nan/ a nam/ sa man+ta
75a2(rgyud): bud d+ha nan/ sa/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan/ ga ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dz+ha/ Ta tha Da D+ha Shi pa pa ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa sha ShA swA hA/ nga nya Nan/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan
75a3(rgyud): a/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha na nas/ na ma sa man ta bud d+hanan bA/ kA khA gA b+ha/ tsa tsa dzA dz+nyA/ TAThA DA D+ha/ ta thA dad+hA/ bAM pai lai waM/ shaSh+Ta sa hA/ ranya na na/ na ma sa man+ta
75a4(rgyud): bud d+ha nan aung / na ma sa man ta bud d+ha na na sang / nams man ta bud d+hanA naM bang / kaM khaM gaM g+haM/ tsang cheng dza dzang / Tang thang \u0f7fnga D+hang / ping pang bang byung med/ yang rang
75a5(rgyud): yang bang / shang / Shang sang hang / daM haM NaM naM/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha nan ang / na ma sa man ta bud+ma d+ha na na sang / na ma sa man ta bud d+ha badz+ra nan/ ka kha ga g+ha/ tsa tsha dza dz+nyA//
75a6(rgyud): Tad+da Da D+ha ta tha da d+ha/ ba pa ba b+h+ra ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa hA/ danya Na na/ i i/ u u/ e ai.o au// gsang ba'i bdag bo// de ltar na 'din
75a7(rgyud): yi ge'i tshul la mkhas pa'i chos kyi rnams grangs te/ gsang sngags kyi tshul la rnam par gnas pa'i cho ga/ lha yongasu bzung ba'i cho ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thaMd
75a8(rgyud): kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' spyad pha rol mo ste/ 'das pa dang ma 'ong ba'i sad
75b1(rgyud): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang bshad/ 'chang bar 'chad par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// ngas ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam gang dag na/
75b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo// chos kyi rnams grangs 'di ma chang ba ma mthong ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag go// de lta bus na/ byang chub sems
75b3(rgyud): dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas gsang sngags kyi chog shes par 'dod na/ thams cad du 'jug pa'i sgo kyi rnams grangs mad
75b4(rgyud): par rtson bya'o// ka dang / tsa dang / Ta dang / ta dang / rnams thogs ma dang / tha ma dang / dbus dang ldan na/ ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs la 'jug pas/ byang chub dang /
75b5(rgyud): spyod pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'das pa dang / bcas pa thob par byed do// de lta bas na gsang sngags kyi cho ga la/ dang po las sogs
75b6(rgyud): po'i tha snyad dang ldan par gyur pa de dag nyid thog ma dang / tha ma dang dbus dang / ldan gcig tu gyur par shes par bya ste/ gsang sngags kyi tshig re re la ji ltar 'dod pa de ltar
75b7(rgyud): nges par snar bar bya'o// blo yis rnam par rtogs na ni// de dag bla med gnas mchog ster// 'di ltar 'di ni 'khor lo gcig ste// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su 'khar
75b8(rgyud): de yin 'kha rdzags pa 'i'i la'ang ma / gas ga tu pa com ldan das dmapa sda sa dga' ma ni ban du ma ba sa
76a1(rgyud): # par gyur to// thams cad 'jig pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi yi ge'i tshul rim par phye ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de bzhin
76a2(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan gyis/ sems can thams cad kyi khams la gzigs nas/ chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa bkod pa bstan pa dang / gsang sngags kyi spyad pa mngon par bsgrub
76a3(rgyud): pa 'di kyis/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa 'dod par dam bcas pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings kyi mdzod kyi mthu brlabs de bzhin gshegs
76a4(rgyud): po'i mnyam pa nyid bkod pa'i snying po can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de nyid kyi tshe/ sems can
76a5(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus pa nges par 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo// ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin las dang / tshe dang rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu za dang /
76a6(rgyud): par 'jug pa'i gzugs dang / kha dog dang / dbyibs dang / nga ro dang / 'gro ba dang / spyod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig brjod pa sems can thams cad so so so sor yang
76a7(rgyud): dag par mgu byed pa'i chos kyi dbyings rnam par bskyed pa'i sku 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 'byung nas kyang / na mkha' dang snyams pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams
76a8(rgyud): su sgra dbyangs gcig kyi dbyangs khyad par rnamal bar byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di sgrog par gyur to// chos kyi mtshan
76b1(rgyud): nyid gang las ni// chos rnams dag ni thams cad dang // sangs rgyas rnams dang nyan thos dang // rang rgyal skyobs pa rnams dang ni// byang chub sems dpa' dpa' bo dang //
76b2(rgyud): de bzhin rgyal ba mchog rnams dang // sems can snod kyi 'jig rten dag/ gang las rtag tu 'byung 'gyur ba// shes rab thabs dang ldan 'gyur zhing // yid gnyis
76b3(rgyud): som nyid dang bral ba/ rdzogs sangs rgyas rab bshad pa yi// lam 'di khyod kyis sgoms par gyis// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos kyi dbyings las byung
76b4(rgyud): ba de dag gis/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi sku rnam par rig par byed pa/ sprul pa'i sprin gyis yongs su bkang nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
76b5(rgyud): kyi thugs kyi dbang tsam gyis/ ba snga'i bu ga thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba gcig nas gcig tu spyad pa'i byin gyis brlabs te/ rang rang gi chos kyi dbyings kyi
76b6(rgyud): gnas su zhugs par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gsang ba'i dkyil
76b7(rgyud): 'khor rnam par lha rnams kyi gnas yang dag par gnas par bsam pa/ sa bon dang bcas pas mtshan pa yod kyi// de nyon la legs par yid la bzung shig dang / ngas khyod
76b8(rgyud): ya bshad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/
77a1(rgyud): @dang po sngags pas dkyil rang gi lus la dgod bu ste/ rkang pa nas ni chu so la// thugs kyi bar dus yi bsam// de nas gong du
77a2(rgyud): snying kha'i bar// sdom brtson can gyi chu ya bams// chu ni yan chad me yi ste// me yi yan chad rlung yin no// bsam nas de dag mkhas pa yis// sa la gzugs brnyan
77a3(rgyud): bzhag par bya'o// de nas phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi sa la bzhugs nas/ chos mnyam pa nyid la bltas
77a4(rgyud): te/ ma 'ongs par skye bo rnams la rtags na/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo the tshom thams cad gcod par byed pa 'di smras so// nams man ta bud d+ha nan/ a sa ma pa ta
77a5(rgyud): ma d+ha ra tu ka r+ya gA ta na naM/ sarba tha/ ang khang ang a sang sa had ha rang rabang ba swA hA/ huM ma ha swA hA/ ra rang sarba// gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje gsang sngags
77a6(rgyud): kyi rgyal po chen po 'di smras ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ phyag
77a7(rgyud): na rdo rje'i spyi bor bzhag nas/ legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang /
77a8(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs kyis las bzhugs nas/ thams cad du gsang sngags kyi tshul mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la snang bar 'dod pi
77a9(rgyud): ba bar
77b1(rgyud): phyir/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di legs par smras pa legs so leg so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
77b2(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/ tshig bcu gnyis po/ 'di dag gis chos kyi dbyings rnam par spyad cing / bdud
77b3(rgyud): bzhi pham par byas nas/ chos kyi dbyings nas 'byung ba 'di gnas nas 'byung ste/ bdud sdig can rnams brtul bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skra dang /
77b4(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes nas/ na mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ sku tshad med pa brnyes par 'gyur/ de bzhin du gsung dang / thugs tshad med pa yang brnyes
77b5(rgyud): par gyur to// de ltar ye shes tshad med pa dang ldan zhing / chos thams cad la dbang thob pas/ 'di ltar gsang sngags kyi rgyal po tshig bcu gnyis po 'di 'di las
77b6(rgyud): brtsams te/ chos 'chad do// rigs kyi bu 'on kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa na//
77b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhin du snang ngo // thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la/ sngags spyad tshig mchog zhus shig
77b8(rgyud): dang // cho ga rgyas par bka' stsal te// nges kyang sngon gyi 'di rnams kyis// bla med byang chub rtogs nas su/ mya ngan 'das lam 'gro ba yin// mnyam pa med pa
78a1(rgyud): chos bshad pa// 'jig rten khams na bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang du 'gyur// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin//
78a2(rgyud): bsam pa mchog rab mabu gyur pa// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi byin brlabs pas// 'di skad ces ni tshig tu smra// chos 'di rnams ni mtshan nyid med/ ngo bo nyid med gnas
78a3(rgyud): pa med// las dang tshe las rnam par grol// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'dra bar 'dod// thugs rje'i mnga' ni mdzad pa yi// mgon po rnams kyi thabs kyis ni// rnam par
78a4(rgyud): skul nas chos rnams kyis// mtshan nyid 'di dag rtogs par 'gyur// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rjes ched du brjod pa'i tshigasu bcad pa de smras nas/ ma
78a5(rgyud): 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba rnams la bltas te/ snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i the tshom bcad pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
78a6(rgyud): la zhus pa/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// kun mkhyen snang dang bral ba'o// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa// 'dren pa khyod la zhu ba ni// dkyil 'khor gyi ni
78a7(rgyud): mngon rol du// ci zhig bgyi ba 'dren pas gsungs// thub pa chen po slob dpon dang // slob ma'ang rnam pa du ru bshad// sa bzhi ci 'dra 'tshal bar bgyi// de yang
78a8(rgyud): ltar sbar bar bgyi// ji ltar sa ni dag par 'gyur// ci ltar de ni brten pa lags// slob mi'i dgos pa gang gis bgyi// sbyang ba'ang 'dren pas bka' stsol cig/ dag/
78b1(rgyud): pa'i mtshan pa ci 'dra dang // gang gi de dag blar bgyi// sa ni gang gis byin gyis brlabs// der ni dang po gang gis brtag/ sa'i cha la thig gtabs pa'i// sras bu rnam pa du
78b2(rgyud): 'tshal bgyi// mchod pa rnam pa du 'tshal bgyi// me tog gdugs spos ci 'dra dang // me tog dang ni bdug spos dag/ ji ltar 'bul ba 'dren pas gsungs// lha bshos sbyin bsreg las
78b3(rgyud): rnams kyang / gang dag la ni ji ltar bgyi// lha rnams kyi ni gdan dag kyang // gang la gang gis bgyi ba gsungs// kha tog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams kyang // go rim bzhin du
78b4(rgyud): mgon pos gsungs// lha rnams dang ni phyag rgya dang // gdan gyi tshad kyang bshad du gsol// phyag rgya rnams ni gang nas 'byung // ci phyir phyag rgya zhes kyang bgyi// dbang bskur rnam
78b5(rgyud): pa du 'tshal bgyi// dam tshig rnam pa du zhig mchis// sngags spyad pa la brtson pa yi// sngags pa byang chub sems dpa' dang // thams cad mkhyen pa ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar
78b6(rgyud): bden pa mthong bar 'gyur// dngos grub rnam pa du 'tshal bgyi// grub nas kyang ni bka' stsol cig/ grub nas nam mkha' 'gro ba dang // ji ltar mi snang 'gyur ba dang / gtso bo
78b7(rgyud): lus 'di ma bor ba// ji ltar lha'i lus thob 'gyur// sprul pa rnams ni sna tshogs pa// de la gang nas 'byung bar 'gyur// nyi zla me dang phyogs rnams dang / rgyu skar bza' dang
78b8(rgyud): skar ma dang // yud tsam dang ni thang cig dang // rga dang 'tsho dang rgud pa dang // lhas ngan dag ni thams cad kyang // de la ji ltar 'byung mi 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtso bo sangs rgyas dang /
79a1(rgyud): sngags pa ci ltar 'bral mi 'gyur// sbyin bsregs las kyang me dag dang // tshim par bgyi ba du 'tshal bgyi// lha rnams kyang ni so so yi/
79a2(rgyud): ngo bo nyid ni 'dren pas gsungs// 'jigs pa'i sngags rnams dang // de bzhin 'jig rten 'das pa yi// tshad dang 'bras bu grangs rnams dang // ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad pa dang /
79a3(rgyud): las kyi rnam pa gang du smin// ji ltar rnam par smin mi 'gyur// sngags pa rnams ni rnam zhig na// las dang tshe las rnam grol 'gyur// de nas kun mkhyen rdzogs sangs rgyas//
79a4(rgyud): bcom ldan bsnyun dang bral ba yi// rdo rje 'dzin la 'di skad gsungs// snying rje chen po'i rtsa las byung // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams dgod pa// lha rnams kyi ni gnas nges
79a5(rgyud): patata theg pa chen po'i go 'phangs mchog/ rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi rab gsang ba// dpa' bo chen 'byung khyod kyis gang // yongs su dris pa de lags so// lag na rdo rje
79a6(rgyud): stobs chen la// mdor ni sdus nas bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni sngon rol du// bya ba rnams ni nges pas nyon// so so'i las rnams 'dod pa yis// tshul shes
79a7(rgyud): pas ni ci rigs par// rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas te// rigs kyi rgyal po stobs po che/ yan lag bcu gnyis tshig 'byung ba// go rim bzhin du bzlas brjod bya//
79a8(rgyud): gsang sngags phyag rgya rtogs shes pa'i// slob dpon rnam pa gnyis zhes bya// za ba dang mi zab bye brag las// de'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// zab mo rgya cher shes pa bya/
79b1(rgyud): lus can rnams ni yid mi rton// sangs rgyas rnams ni sras mchog ste// mthong ba'i chos ni rnam par spangs// gnyis pa'i mthong ba'i chos rnams kyis// myos par gyur/
79b2(rgyud): ba dmigs pa can// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog gis ni// 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor kun// de'i bri bar bya ba'i phyir// rjes su snang zhing dbang yang bskur//
79b3(rgyud): dus drang dus min bye brag la// slob ma rnam bzhir shes bya ste// gcig ni de'i mod la bsgrub// gnyis su bslab dang gnyi gar min// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs mi//
79b4(rgyud): slob ma de ni rgyal ba'i mchog/ sa ni dang por shes par bya// sems kyi sar ni bshad pa yin// sbyang ba sngar ni bstan pa yin// de yis de ni yongs su spang // nam zhig
79b5(rgyud): nyes dang bral ba ni// sems kyis ni mi 'jigs pa/ de tshe de ni dag pa ste// nyes pa thams cad rnam par spangs// mngon par byang chub mthong bas na// de ltar de ni brten
79b6(rgyud): shes bya// de las gzhan du sa skyong ba// de ni dag par mi 'gyur ro// sngags pa rtog la gnas nas su// gang zhig sa sbyong byed pa ni// byang chub sems ni rnam spangs pa//
79b7(rgyud): gsang ba'i bdag po de mi 'dag/ de bas rtogs pa rnams spangs nas// sa kun rnam par sbyang bar bya// nga yis dkyil 'khor rnams kyi ni// cho ga rgyas par gang bstan pa/
79b8(rgyud): de ga theg mar bsten pa ni// rmongs pa rnams kyis mi shes te// rtogs pa sdug bsngal phyir 'gyur ba// ci sring ma spangs par du ni// 'jig rten 'di ni sangs rgyas mim/
80a1(rgyud): kun mkhyen zhes kyang mi bya'o// slob ma rnams la nan tan du/ byang chub sems kyi sbyang bar bya// bsrung ba mi g.yo mgon po
80a2(rgyud): 'am// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bas bya// slob mnam zhig dmigs pa yis// nam yang g.yos par mi 'gyur ba// de tshe dri med na mkha' bzhin// yang dag
80a3(rgyud): par ni dag par 'gyur// sa byin rlabs pa dang po ni// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis bya bar bshad// gnyis pa sems kyi dbang gis te// 'dirarinin gzhan du mi bya'o//
80a4(rgyud): sred bu rnam pa bzhir bshad de// dkar po ser po dmar po dang // nag po zhes ni bya bar brjod// lnga pa na mkha' lta bur bshad// bar snang la ni bzung nas su// der ni dkyil
80a5(rgyud): 'khor brtag par bya// sras bu dag ni gnyis pa yis// sa la dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni thams cad dang // de sras blo can rnams kyi gdan// pad+ma
80a6(rgyud): yid las byang bri mchog/ bkra shis 'jig rten rnams kyi bsngags// rang rgyal dang ni dgra bcom pa// phyogs gcig shes par gang grags pa// de dag bstan du shes par
80a7(rgyud): bya// pad+ma lus byung mdab ma'o// 'jig rten gyi ni lha rnams gang // tshangs pa la sogs 'jig rten grangs// de dag bstan ni pad+ma dmar// rgya lo rnams kyi bsngags pa'o//
80a8(rgyud): phal pa rnams kyi ci rigs par// sa yi bye brags dag las bsam// mchod pa rnams bzhir shes par bya// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbar ba dang // de bzhin byams dang snying
80b1(rgyud): rje dang // me tog bdug spos 'jig rten pa'o// ser mo las byung me tog rnams// skyobs pa kun la dbul bar bya// yan lag kun 'byung phyag rgya ni// bcings nas byang chub sems
80b2(rgyud): bsgoms te// so sor mgon po thams cad dang // de sras rnams la nan tan bya'o// 'di ni skyon med me tog ste// rab tu gsungs zhing rnam par mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyi
80b3(rgyud): ljon shing rnams// rgyal ba'i mchod pa'i phyir byung ba// ting 'dzin dbang gis bsgyur ba yi// sngags kyi de dag byin brlabs na// chos kyi dbyings las byung ba yi// srin
80b4(rgyud): mang rgya chen dam pa rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni// de tshe rtag tu char bzhin 'bab// lha rnams phal pa gzhan la ni// me tog 'di rnams bsgrags pa ste// rang gis
80b5(rgyud): sngags rgyud rgyas shes pas// ji ltar rigs par dbul bar bya// de bzhin me tog gdugs spos rnams// ci ltar rig pa rnam par bsam// mthe bong srin lag sbyar nas ni//
80b6(rgyud): bkra shis pa bla shad pa ste// de yis me tog de blangs nas// rang gi snying kha'i phyogs nas dbul// 'jig rten pa'i lha rnams la// lte ba'i thad ka nas shes bya// bdun
80b7(rgyud): spos rdo rje khu tshur ram// yang na pad ma'i phreng ba yis// bar snang la ni bzung nas su// 'jig rten mgon po skyobs la dbul// de las gzhan pa 'jig rten pa'o//
80b8(rgyud): rnams la ni go rim bzhin// phyi dang nang gi bye brag gis// sbyin pa sreg rnam pa gnyis zhes bya// las dang tshe las rnam par grol// slar yang sa bon 'byung ba ste// las/
81a1(rgyud): 'dod pa'i sprin bsreg bya// nang gi sbyin bsreg zhes su bshad// phyi rol gyi ni gsum ldan zhing // gnas gsum dang ni gsum la gnas//
81a2(rgyud): las gsum gyis ni las grub pa// 'jig rten pa'i ni sbyin pa'i mchod// sbyin bsreg las ni mi shes pas// gang dag gzhan du byed pa ni// sngags kyi shes pa spangs pa ste//
81a3(rgyud): glen des 'bras bu mi 'thob po// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs bsngags dang // de bzhin rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi gsungs// bka' dang gser du shes par bya// phyag
81a4(rgyud): rgya rdo rje thams cad dang // 'jig rten dbang phyug gsang sngags ni// / las kyi bye brag dag las dkar// kun tu gru bzhi lham pa dang // go rim bzhin du zla ba po dang //
81a5(rgyud): gru gsum dang ni zla gam dang // dbyibs ni legs par bshad pa yi// gzugs ni gnyis su shes par bya// bud med dang ni skyes pa nyid// yang na kun tu thams cad kyi// kha
81a6(rgyud): dog dbyibs dang gzugs rnams ni// bsam yas ye shes las 'byung bas// de bas de rnams bsam yas te// ye shes mkhyen gyis ye shes ni// sems can byin tha
81a7(rgyud): dad 'gyur// yid kyi rgya ni ci tsam pa// bstan dang phyag rgya dag dang ni// lha'i tshad kyang go rim bzhin// de ci tsam du shes par bya// sangs rgyas gang nas 'byung ba nas//
81a8(rgyud): phyag rgya rnams kyang de nas byung // chos la 'byung ba'i slob ma rnams// chos kyi phyag rgyas gdab par bya// de bas 'dor na chos kyi dbyings// mtshan ma phyag rgya yin par
81b1(rgyud): bshad// dbang bskur gsum du shes bya ste// de bas nan tan mnyan par bgyi// phyag rgya gang zhig dbang skur ba// las dang bya ba spangs pa ste// skyobs pa rnams
81b2(rgyud): kyi dbang skur pa// de ni mchog ste dang po yin// gnyis pa las dang bya ba yis// kun nas blangs par yang dag bshad// gsum pa yin gyi shes bya ste// yul
81b3(rgyud): dang dus ni spangs pa'o// bla ma legs par mgu byas nas// phan par byed pa gang smos pa// dbang bskur 'di ni mchog yin par// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnaMs kyis
81b4(rgyud): bsgrags// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdor na ni// dam tshigs can rnams sngar bshad de// dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba las// dam tshig shes pa gcig ces bya//
81b5(rgyud): de la phyag rgya mi bstan cing // sngags kyang sbyin par mi bya'o// byang chub sems kyi bye brag las// sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su bzungs// dkyil 'khor mthong zhes
81b6(rgyud): bya ba 'di// dam tshig can nyid shes bya ste// dkyil 'khor dang ni phyag rgya mthong // las dang bya ba la yang sbyar// bla mas lung ni ma byin pa// de yang dam tshig shes
81b7(rgyud): par bshad// phyag rgya dkyil 'khor bri ba rnams// de tshe cho ga bzhin du bstan// gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung ba yi// dbang bskur med pa'i sngags pa'ang yin// /
81b8(rgyud): gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su// sngags pa cho gas dbang bskur ba// dam tshig shes pa sngar shes bya// dam tshig can zhes bzhin mi bya/
82a1(rgyud): brtul zhugs bzang po byang chub phyir// gang zhig sems ni bsgom pa ni// sngags pa gnas gsum mi dmigs pa// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' yin//
82a2(rgyud): thabs kyi snying stobs bskyed nas su// sems can don la sbyor ba na// dmigs su med pa'i spyod thob pa// rgal ba'i phyog tu shes par bya// thog ma nas ni zhi ba'i chos//
82a3(rgyud): ngo bo nyid ni med pa la// gang gi sems ni ri rab bzhin// gnas pa de ni bden pa mthong // 'di bden 'di ni yang dag par// de bzhin du mi slu ba// ci ltar sangs rgyas bden gzi
82a4(rgyud): pa// de bzhin sngon ni des mthong ba'i// byang chub sems dpa' thob gang yin te// dngos grub de las gzhan ci dgos// de las gzhan du'ang dngos grub ni// rnam pa dag ni
82a5(rgyud): sngar 'dod de// spyod pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang // de bzhin pa ni gnon pa dang // 'jig rten mngon shes lnga 'dod dang // sangs rgyas nyid dang gang gzhan no// rgyud las rgyud du gyur
82a6(rgyud): ba yi// las ni ji srid ma nyams shing // rnam rmin rnam par ma smin te// dngos grub dag tu dus su 'dod// mdor na gang tshe dus gcig tu// las dang skye ba 'phangs gyur pa//
82a7(rgyud): de tshe 'ang sngags pas dngos grub ni// yid las yang dag byung ba thob// ji ltar sbyar ma 'jigs med bzhin// sngags kyi dra bas rmongs byed pa// ji ltar mig 'phrul chen po bzhin//
82a8(rgyud): gang la lhas dang ngag med pa// dri'i za'i grong khyer ci bzhin te// de bzhini ma snang 'gyur zhes bya// de ni de na gnas ma yin// ji ltar nyal ba'i rmi lam na// sum bcu rtsa gsum
82b1(rgyud): gnas su phyin// lus kyang spangs pa ma yin la// de nyid kyis kyang de ma song // de bzhin rnal 'byor nyid kyis kyang // sngags pa sngags la gnas pa dag/ bsod nams bya ba'i
82b2(rgyud): las rnams kyis// 'ja dang 'dra ba'i lus kyang thob// lus ngag yid las byung ba yi// gsang sngags yid bzhin nor bu 'dra// de las rnam par bsam pa'i don// ma rtag
82b3(rgyud): par yang 'byung bar 'gyur// ji ltar nam khe' phyogs rnams su// 'dus byas spyod yul thams cad kyis// de bzhin sngags pa yang // rtogs pa'i spyod yul kun gyis so// /
82b4(rgyud): 'di kun 'du shes tsam du ni// nam zhig de ltar bsgom gyur cig/ rnam par bsgom na sngags pa de// rdzogs sangs rgyas dang lhan cig dga'// sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso
82b5(rgyud): bo yis// sbyin bsreg gnyis su bshad pa ni// phyi rol gyi dang nang gi ste// de yang tshim par bya dang bcas// lha rnams kyang ni so so'i// rang bzhin yongs su mkhyen nas su// /
82b6(rgyud): 'jig rten pa'i sngags rnams kyi// tshad dang legs par gsungs pa ni// dbang phyug la sogs mthu chen rnams// bkur ba'i lha rnams gang yin pa// de dag gis ni gang byas pa'i// /
82b7(rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya stobs chen rnams// 'bras bu phal cher 'phral du ste// cha de ni bshad pa de yin no// 'on kyang skye dang 'jig pa yi// chos can de dag brten med pa// 'jig
82b8(rgyud): rten 'das pa'i sngags rnams ni// thog ma'i byed pa med pa'o// las dang skye dang kun bcad pa// nyes pa gsum bral rgyal ba dang // rang rgyal bas ru lta bu dang // de bzhin rgyal
83a1(rgyud): pa'i nyan thos dang // byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang // gsang sngags mtshan ni sngon bshad pa// dus gsum las ni shin du 'das//
83a2(rgyud): rten cing 'brel pa las byung ba// mthong dang ma mthong 'bras bu can// lus ngag yid las byung ba'o// 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu'i tshad// bskal pa cig tu bshad pa yin/
83a3(rgyud): yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// gsang sngags 'bras bu bskal pa 'das// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po dang // rgyal sras rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin// mtshan ma med cing
83a4(rgyud): dga' ba'o// 'jig rten pa'i mtshan mar bcas// rnam par smin pa 'di nyid la// las kyi 'bras bu smin gyur pa// gang zhig dngos grub thob pa ni// de tshe las kyang ldog par
83a5(rgyud): 'gyur// sems ni ngo bo nyid med phyir// rgyu dang 'bras bu rnams spangs shing // las dang tshe las rnam grol na// namakha' lta bur 'gyur ba yin// bsang ba pa'i bdag po// /
83a6(rgyud): gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs su dgod pa'irim par phye ba/ lha rnams rnam par byin gyis brlob pa// ting nge 'dzin lnga rtogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang
83a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ chos kyi dbyings rtogs par spyod yul du gyur pa// sems can gyi khams ma lus pa bsgral ba yid dam bcas pa rnams kyi don dang /
83a8(rgyud): phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir// sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de nyon la// legs par yid la bzung shig dang // ngas khyod la bsha
83b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas// phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
83b2(rgyud): bsang ba pa'i bdag por yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil dgod pa rim par phye ba gang lags/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor grang
83b3(rgyud): med pa 'byung ba/ gsang ba pas kyang ches gsang ba// snying rje chen po'i snying po 'byung ba zhes bya yod kyis// de bri ba'i cho ga nyon cig/ kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la// sgo
83b4(rgyud): cig par ni steg bur byas// bzang po rdo rje rnams kyi mtshan// dbus su rdo rje rtse brgyad pa// de steng pad ma bri ba ni// sa bon dang bcas rgyas par bya// de steng du'ang pad+ma che//
83b5(rgyud): phyag rgya glad kor gyis mdzes byas// 'dab ma brgyad rnams legs par rdzogs// ze bar bcas pa shin tu bzang // 'dab ma rnams ni thams cad la// yan lag bcu gnyis
83b6(rgyud): tshigs bkod pa// de rnams dbus na mgon bzhugs pa// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis gtso// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyi 'khor rnams kyis// khor 'khor yug
83b7(rgyud): yongs bskor ba// snying rje las byung dkyil 'khor 'di// mchog tu shes par bya ba ste// lus bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams dang ni// las dang lus dang dngos grub dang //
83b8(rgyud): dgod pa rnams kyang nges pa yis// 'di las byung bar shes par bya// gsang ba ba'i bdag po// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ni// zla ba'i dkyi
84a1(rgyud): 'khor 'dra zhing mdog/ dung lta bu'i dbus su na ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi gru gsum pa// pad ma dkar po'i steng na gnas// blang
84a2(rgyud): kor bcas pa'i mtshan gyis btab// rdo rje mtshan mas mtshan pa ste// dpyad mi dgos pas kun nas ni// 'od zer dag ni gnyis bya ba// gsang sngags mgon las byung na su//
84a3(rgyud): de ni phyogs bcu rnams su song // gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang spyan ras gzigs dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// de bas nan tan mnyan par gyis// kun tu gru bzhi ldum
84a4(rgyud): pa la// dbus dung 'dra bzhag par bya// de'i steng du pad ma ni// sa bon bcas byas rgyas par bri// de'i steng du'ang rdo rje che// rdo rje las kyang pad ma yi// thams cad sa bon
84a5(rgyud): rnams kyis mtshan// rang gi sa bon legs par sbar// sgrol ma dang ni khro gnyer can// de bzhin gos dkar can dang ni// rigs ldan longs spyod can ma dang // mthu chen
84a6(rgyud): thob pa'ang nan tan bya// dpal rnams kun dang phya ga brnyan ma// dkyil 'khor 'di yi dbus su ni// phyag rgya mtshan ma dbang thob rnams// khyad par du ni bri bar bya// rta mgrin
84a7(rgyud): can gyis bya ba ni// gru gsum tshul du 'dug pa ste// dkyil 'khor mtshan ma bzang pos btab// nyi ma 'char kha'i kha dog 'dra// rigs sngags rgyal dang bcas pa ni//
84a8(rgyud): mkhas pas rnam par dgod par bya// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang khyod nyid dkyil 'khor bder bshad par bya'o// kun du gru gzhi ldam pa la// rdo rje mtshan ma rnam
84b1(rgyud): kyi mtshan// thams cad ser po yid du 'ong // dbus su pad ma rab tu gnas// de yi dbus su bya ba ni// bum pa zla ba'i 'od 'dra ga/ 'di ni mtshan ma rnams kyis mtshan//
84b2(rgyud): blang kor gyis kyang rnam par rgyan// de steng du'ang rlung chen ni// dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog/ ba dan g.yo bar sngags par bya// glang kor gyis kyang rnam par brgya na//
84b3(rgyud): de steng du'ang gru gsum pa// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can te// 'jigs par byed pa'i me 'dra ba// sum 'od ris mtshan mtshan gyis btab// 'bar phreng khrig
84b4(rgyud): pa 'jigs 'jigs ltar// nyi ma mchar ba'i gzugs 'dra ba// de yi dbus su pad ma che// dus mtha' me 'od 'dra ba'o// pad ma'i steng du rdo rje ni// 'bar ba'i phreng
84b5(rgyud): ba 'gro ba can// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra dang ldan// dam pa sa bon rnams kyis mtshan// dpa' bo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor 'di// rgyal po'i gtso bo rnams kyi sa gsungs/
84b6(rgyud): ma ma ki dang lu gu rgyud// de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs las byung // rdo rje lcags kyu rdo rje'i rtse// rigs sngags rgyal po mthu chen dag/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni
84b7(rgyud): kun kyang khongs su chud par bya// las rnams shin grub byi'i phyir// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor sa bon la// kha dog khyed par go rim bzhin// de dag ji ltar rigs par bya'o// de nas
84b8(rgyud): gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin// chen po gso bshad 'di rnams te// na mkha' dri med rdo rjes 'khor// rdo rje 'che ba nges pa dang // rnam par grags pa bskal chen dang // rdo rje mgon po
85a1(rgyud): @#mchog 'dzin dang // rdo rje zhi ba rdo rje che// rdo rje thing ka rdo rje gzhan// rdo rje pad ma yangs pa'i mig/ rdo rje bzang po rdo rje nyid// spros pa med par gnas pa dang /
85a2(rgyud): nam mkha' mtha' yas 'gro ba'o// de rnams dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni// dkar po ser po dmar po dang // nag po yin par yang dag bshad// de nas gzhan yang phyag rgya'i gzugs//
85a3(rgyud): rtse gsum dag dang rtse gcig dang // gzhan yang gnyis dang gnyis ma yin// phra ba lta bu de bzhin gzhan// kha dog bye brag las shes bya// 'di rnams kun kyang thub chen te// rnam
85a4(rgyud): bar rgyal dang ldan pa'o// mig lo mgon gyi dkyil 'khor ni// rlung dang me yi yin par 'dod// nga yi drung ni 'og logs su// bden bral gyi ni phyogs car bri// rang gis bon mtshan
85a5(rgyud): mar ldan// ral gri phyag rgya legs par sbyar// yang na zhags pa bya yang rung // blo ldan de yis bri bar bya// 'jigs rten gsum las rnam rgyal gyi// bye brag du ni rlung gi dbus//
85a6(rgyud): rdo rje can gyi mtshan dang ldan// gnas gsum dag la 'dug pa'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yum gyi gzugs kyi dkyil 'khor dgod
85a7(rgyud): par 'byung ste/ de la re shig dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rjes mtshan pas mtshan pa ste// 'di ni dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// de nas gzhan yang lha mo'i gzugs// de'i dbus su bad
85a8(rgyud): ma che// thams cad ser po 'bar dang bcas// der yang gtsug tor bzhag pa ni// cha sum la ni gnas par bya// dbu ma'i chen bor nas su// der yang sman ni bri bar bya// rang gi 'od
85b1(rgyud): 'bar dbus na gnas// mdor na sa bon ldan par bya// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi// yid bzhin nor bu rgyal bas gsungs// de yi dkyil 'khor bshad pa ni/ chu
85b2(rgyud): yi yin te thams cad sgo// shin du dri med rab tu zhi// re ba thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// de nas shAkya sing ge yang // de bas dkyil 'khor mnyan par gyis// der ni dbang chen
85b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba// kha dog ser pos nye bar brgyan// kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la// dbus su rdo rje snga ma bzhin// de'i steng du pad ma ni// kun du kha dog ser po bzhag/ de steng lhung zed
85b4(rgyud): chen po ste// rdo rjes mtshan pa 'bar dang bcas// yang na chos gos khar gsil dag/ gau rim bzhin du bzhag par bya// gtsug tor lnga po gang bsgrengs pa// de rnams phyag rgya shes
85b5(rgyud): bya ba// gdugs dkar po ni gdugs su bya// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor blo ldan gyi// mtshan ma ral gris gzhag pa ni// 'od zer rnams ni 'phro bar bya// rnam par rgyal ba'i 'khor lo yin//
85b6(rgyud): rnam par 'thor ba'i lcags kyakyur 'dod// gzi brjid phung po bskal chen gyi// gtsug tor bzang po yin par 'dod// cher 'byung ba'i rdo rje yin// mngon par 'byung ba'i pad
85b7(rgyud): mor 'dod// dung ni mtha' yas sgra dbyangs kyi// kha dog bye brag las shes bya// mdzod bu yid bzhin nor bu yin// spyan gyi yang ni 'di nyon cig/ gtsug tor thams ca
85b8(rgyud): ser po ste// rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan par bya// gzhan gyi mi thub pa yi ni// lag pa ngo mtshar pad ma can// gzhan gyis mthub zhes bya ba'i// kha chen pad ma gnag las//
86a1(rgyud): gtsang mar gnas pa gang grags pa// gtsang mar rtogs pa'i spyod yul can// de dag gi ni phyag rgya'o// mtshan nyid dgos pa nges par nyon//
86a2(rgyud): sems dpa'i lag dang dge ba'i lag/ 'dzum pa'i lag kyang de bzhin bzhag/ lag na me tog na mkha'i lag/ cho ga rgyas par bri bar bya// sa yi lha mo'i bum pa ste/
86a3(rgyud): chu'i dkyil 'khor rdo rjes mtshan// gnyer ba'i lag pa me yi ste// drang srong rnams dang bcas pa bri// 'od bsrung dang ni go'u tam// mar rga nga dang gar dga' dang //
86a4(rgyud): ba si ta dang ang gi sar// me'i gnas kyi nang na 'khod// rigs byed lag par nan tan du// de dag go rim bzhin du bri// gshin rje'i be con bri ba ni// rlung gi dkyil
86a5(rgyud): 'khor nang du 'dug/ 'chi bdag gi ni dril bu yin// dus mtshan phyag rgya ba dan no// drag po'i chung ma mdung rtse gsum// tshangs pa'i chung ma'i pad mar dran// gzhon nu'i chung ma'i
86a6(rgyud): mdung thung yin// khyab 'jug 'chung ma'i 'khor lo nyid// gshin rje'i chung ma'i tho bar shes// 'jigs byed chung mi'i mi thod yin// de dag rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi// nang
86a7(rgyud): du chud par bya ba ni// bya rog bya rgod de bzhin khyi// wa rnams kyis kyang yongs bskor bar// las rnams grub par 'dod pa yis// ji ltar rig par bri bar bya// bden bral gyi
86a8(rgyud): ni ral gri bri// khyab 'jug gi ni 'khor lor bya// skyes byed kyi ni mdung thung yin// dga' bo nye dga' gnyis kyi sprin// gnyi ka'i glog dang bcas par sti// gzugs ni mdog
86b1(rgyud): sngo chu dang bcas// shAkya seng ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi// sgo yi phyogs ni gnyis su dgod// bde byed kyi ni mdung rtse gsum// dka' zlog rtse gsum gdeng bar bshad// bum pa
86b2(rgyud): dkar po pad mar bcas// zla ba'i phyag rgya yin par dran// nyi ma'i dbang chen dkyil 'khor la// gnas pa'i shing rta yin zhes bya// rgyal dang rnam par rgyal ba yi// dbang chen
86b3(rgyud): mtshan ma'i gzhu can no// rlung gi phyogs su rlung rnams kyi// ba dan phyag rgya bri bar bya// dbyangs can gyi ni pi wang yin// chu ni zhags pa 'dzin pa bri// bdag nyid chen po de dkyil lagro/
86b4(rgyud): chu'i yin pa shes par bya// sa bon rnams kyi btab pa dang // mtshan rnams kyis ni mtshan par bya'o// shAkya tog gi dkyil 'khor du// de la sogs pa'i mtshan rnams kyi// dkyil
86b5(rgyud): 'khor rnams ni go ri ma bzhin// de dbus phyag rgya bzhag pa ni// sa bon rnams dang bcas par bya// gzhan yang phyogs sprin rdo rje yi// dkyil 'khor nan tan mnyan pA gyis//
86b6(rgyud): kun tu gru bzhi lham pa la// rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan pa ste// de yi dbus su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor me las byung ba'o// de dbus phyag rgya bzhag pa ni// ud dpal zhes bya
86b7(rgyud): gzugs bzang ba// 'jam dbyangs blo dang ldan pa la// rang gi sngags kyi gzi skyed pa// de yi gnas ni cho ga bzhin// rang gi sa bon nyid kyis btag/ tha ma khor khor yug du//
86b8(rgyud): ud dpal rnams kyi khyab par bya// de yi dbus su bri ba ni// dpa' bo 'di rnams go rom bzhin// de la dra ba can gyi 'od kyi phyag rgya ni// lcags kyu'o// gzhon nu rin chen
87a1(rgyud): #gcod pan gyi ni rin po che'o// gzhon nu dri med 'od kyi ni yud pa la kham bye ba'o// 'jam dbyangs blo dang ldan pa yi// mngag bzhug mar ni gang
87a2(rgyud): grags pa// de rnams kyi ni 'jigs med pas// ji ltar rig par shes par bya// sgra can gyi ni phyag rgya ni// ral gri yin par shes bya// nye skra can gyi mdung rtse gsum/
87a3(rgyud): tshogs ma'i dbyug par bshad// nor ldan ma'i rgyal mtshan gsungs// dgugs ma yi ni lcags kyu yin// de dag thams cad ud pa la'i// mtshan ma dag gis mtshan par bya'o//
87a4(rgyud): ji skad gsungs pa'i phyag brnyan ma// de dag phyag rgya kha ga ri// lho'i phyogs su nan tan du// sgrib pa rnam sel brtson 'grus che'i// phyag rgya legs par bri ba ni// yid bzhin
87a5(rgyud): nor bu zhes bya ba// me'i dkyil 'khor nang na 'dug/ 'khor dang bcas pa go rim bzhin// 'khor rnams kyi ni rgyas pa ru// phyag rgya 'di rnams shes par bya// ngo mtshar can
87a6(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya ni// bum pa'i steng na rdo rje rtse gcig pa'o// mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i lag pa'o// ngan song thams cad sbyang ba ni// lag pa mas yar gyen du 'gren pa lta bur bya'o// skyo
87a7(rgyud): sems blo gros kyi// snying rje'i lag pa brang du bzhag pa'o// byams pa chen po'i gyen du 'byung ba'i ni// me tog 'dzin pa'i lag pa'o// blo chen snying rjes gdungs pa yi ni lag
87a8(rgyud): pa snying khar bzhag la gung mo nang du bkug pa'o// gdug pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i ni// lag pa mchog sbyin pa'i sor mo rnams las chu'i rgyun 'dzag pa'o// blo gros bsam
