114a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod kyis// zhi ba'i cho ga spyad par bya'o// zhal gsil rdo rje mchog sbyin gyis// gsang gtor mi g.yo mgon gyiso// 'dir ni re shig mdor bsdus nas// sbyin
114a8(rgyud): bsreg cho gar sgrags pa yin// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis rlob pa las// zhi ba'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga rim par phye
114b1(rgyud): ba'o// // de nas gzhan yang skal chen po// sngags la mkhas pa rnams kyis sngon// sems can rnam pa thugs brtse nas// sbyin bsreg rgyas pa bye byed pa/
114b2(rgyud): yid gcig bsdus te mnyan par bgyis// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// rgyas pa'i cho ga spyad par bya// grong ngam yang na ldong dag gi/ shar gyi phyogs su gnas bcas
114b3(rgyud): nas/ snga ma bzhin du nges pa yi// sa gzhi legs par brtag par bya// ri'i rtse mo 'am phyugs lhas sam// mchod rten ring srel can dag tu// rgyas pa'i las ni bsgrub
114b4(rgyud): byed pa'i// dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis bris// mkhas pas las kyi cho ga yi// sa ni legs par skos nas su// dbus su rin chen 'bru dang ni// sman dang bcas
114b5(rgyud): sres bzhag bya ste// der ni ras ni ser po yis// sa ni legs par dgang bar bya// mnyam zhing legs par bcags nas ni// de'i 'og tu dkyil 'khor bri// 'dir
114b6(rgyud): yang re shig sngags pa cho ga la mkhas pas// bdag nyid rdo rje dam pa sbyin// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas par// de'i gsang sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis
114b7(rgyud): brlabs la// 'phags pa mi g.yo bas mtshams gcad pa dang / sa yongs bzung bar bya'o// zla ba yar gyi de'i tshes gsum mam/ lnga 'am/ bdun nam/ yang na
114b8(rgyud): zla ba nyal yang rung ste/ gza' bza' bo gza' lhag gam/ bur ba'am/ rgyu skar gro zhun dang / mon gru dang / snron dang / skar ma la bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad
115a1(rgyud): @chen por byin gyis brlabs te/ srad buM ser po blangs la grangs dang tshad snga ma bzhin du// dkyil 'khor gyi thig gdab bo// de nas dkyil 'khor/
115a2(rgyud): bskor te nad nga zhugs la// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'aklags la phyag brkyang ste/ yang bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad da byin gyis brlabs la/
115a3(rgyud): tshon rtsi ser po blangs te/ der ni yi ge ka bzhag pa// de tshe thub pa gser thub ste// gser gyis kha dog 'bar dang bcas// ting 'dzin gnas shing sdig bcom pa'o//
115a4(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor rta babs can bris la// nub phyogs kyi sgo rtag tu dbye'o// phyir rol ri mo gru bzhi pa gsum gyis bskor ba dkyil 'khor du lha rnams dgod pa snga ma bzhin du bya'o//
115a5(rgyud): de la khyad par ni 'di yod de/ 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i gnas su kun du bzang po rin po che'i// rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgya'i ge sar dang bcas pa bzhag gos/ mdzod pa'i gnas su
115a6(rgyud): 'phags pa rmugs 'dzin shing thog gi bin tsa pra ri phyag rgya dang / yi ge dza bdud rtsi'i mtshan nyid can dang bcas pa bzhag go// dza/ 'phags pa khro gnyer can gyi/ gnas su grags ldan ma/
115a7(rgyud): me tog pri yang ku'i phyag rgya yi ge yang dang bcas pa bzhag go// 'phags pa gos dkar can gyi gnas su ni/ dpal chen po 'phags pa dkar mo zhes bya ba pad ma'i phyag rgya dang / yi ge'i
115a8(rgyud): 'brur bzhag go// shri/ 'phags ma gnod mdzes kyi gnas su ni/ dpung bzang rdo rje'i phyag rgya dang / yi ge'i 'brur bzhag go/ hUM/ bdud rtsi thal sbyor gnas su ni/ rdo rje'i sde rdo rje'i phyag/
115b1(rgyud): rgya dang / yi ge'i 'brur bzhag go/ sa/ gnas gtsang ma rnams kyi gnas su ni/ rgya byin dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi bgod do// de nas phyi rol gyi ri mo gnyis kyi nang logs su kho ra khor yug
115b2(rgyud): dang / grwa thams cad du rdo rje bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi g.yas logs su 'khor ba'i nang du me'i thab khung bya ba ni/ gru bzhi lham pa Sha ran can rgyar ni khru do'i tshad du bya/ rdo rje'i sa ni 'khor
115b3(rgyud): bar bskor/ zabs su khru gang tsam gyi tshad// ba ran the chung mtho gang tsam/ 'jim pa ser po/ bskyang nul sku/ pad ma'i phyag rgya 'dzub gang tshad/ 'phang du sor bzhi'i tshad du bya/ dus gsu
115b4(rgyud): du ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas bsku'o// de nas snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po'i lha la sogs pa rnam pa dang mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin du bsams te/ byug spos dang me tog la
115b5(rgyud): sogs pas mchod par bya'o// de la khyad par 'di yod te/ gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gnas su bzhugs su gsol pa dang / byug spos dang / me tog la sogs pa
115b6(rgyud): mchod par byed pa de'i tshe/ bdag nyid rdo rje dam pa sbyin du byin gyi brlabs te/ 'dir byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i khyad par bshad par bya ste// gur gum ga pur bsreg pa ni// rgyas pa
115b7(rgyud): dag la byug spos mchog/ dri zhim kha dog ser po yang // de ma snyed na sbyar bar bya// me tog tsam pa rab tu bzang // yu ti sna ma ser po dang // de las gzhan pa'ang dri zhim pa// ser po dag ni
115b8(rgyud): dbul bar bya// gur gum yaka ru dang sbyar// sha kha ra dang sbyar ba dag gargyas pa'i las rnams gru bya'i phyir// 'dug smos mkhas pas dbul bar bya// gu gul der ni can dan pan/
116a1(rgyud): mar dang sbyar la bdug spos mchog/ pra tsi pog ni gur gum bsres// bdug spos sngags pa mkhas pas dbul// mar me snod ni gser gyi zangs// yang na
116a2(rgyud): dam pa'i ser 'ang rung // mkhas pas ras ni ser po yi// mar me'i snying po ser po dbul// spos kyi 'bru mar bzang po yis// de'i num ni dri zhim bya'o// yang na til gyi 'bru mar gyis/
116a3(rgyud): mar me gtsang ma dbul bar bya'o// 'bras chen ser po sran chod can// mar dang bcas pa shin tu bzang // tshod ma rnams kyang ser por bya// shing thog bag cos de bzhin no// spos chu
116a4(rgyud): me tog ser po dang // de bzhin 'bras dang dur ba'i tsa// snod kyang ser po blug pa dag/ rgyas pa la ni mchod yon gyis// de ltar mchod pa ci lta ba bzhin du bya ste// de nas bdag nyid rdo
116a5(rgyud): rje dam pa'i sbyin du byin gyis brlabs la// phyi rol tu byung ste phyogs kyi gtor ma sbyin no// de nas nye reg byas te nang du zhugs la// sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag byas te// me'i thab khung
116a6(rgyud): gi drung du bsreg par bya ba la sogs pa sngags kyis// gsang ba rnams snga ma bzhin du bzhag la// sa la rtsa ku sha bting ba'i steng du pad ma'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas te 'dug nas/
116a7(rgyud): bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i skur bsam te// khang pa'i nang phyug spos ser por bskus la// me tog ser po sil ma bkram// rtsa ku sha yang bting ste// rgyal rigs kyi khyim
116a8(rgyud): ma ma/ rgyal po'i pho brang nas me blangs la gsang gtor byas te// shing glag sha dang / u dum 'bar bas me sbar la/ de nas me'i thab khung gi zhabs su dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor bsam
116b1(rgyud): te/ der yi ge la glang kor dang bcas pa pad ma la gnas pa bsams mo// yam yi ge ya de la zhus thabs kyi nang nas me byung bar bsam pa ni// gser gyi kha dog lha bu'i thor tshugs can/
116b2(rgyud): mig gsum pa la gdong bzhi pa// lag na bgrang 'breng dang ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa dang / dam pa sbyin pa/ gos ser po bgos pa/ srad bu ser po ser ral khar thogs pa/ so ra
116b3(rgyud): sa gsum gyis byugs pa/ sum mdo ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ gser gyi kha dog 'dra ba/ me lce 'bar ba kun du 'phro ba/ thu chen po dang ldan pa/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal
116b4(rgyud): bo'i 'od zer byung ba'i me tog de lta bu bsams te/ de nas gsang gtor bya ba dang / kha bkru ba dang / mchod yon dbul ba byas la/ byug spos dang / me tog la sogs pa rang gi bsdas
116b5(rgyud): kyis sbyin no// na ma sa man+ta bud d+ha naM/ oM a ga ne ye swA hA/ de nas 'o thug sbrang rtsi dang mar la sogs pa sbyar ba'am/ til nag po dang sbur ba'i bsreg lug sum byin ta te/ de nas shing
116b6(rgyud): bil ba'i bgang gzar dang blugs gzar gyis mar bgang lugs bdun sbyin no// de shing glags sha'am u dum 'bar ra'i dbus kyi cha las byung ba'i yam bsregs shing slom chad
116b7(rgyud): gang la/ srid khru gang ba mar las snyegs pa'i bsreg lu gsum byin la/ yang dgang lug/ sum sbyin no// de nas de snga ma bzhin du lha'i gzugs rnams bsams te/ snying po
116b8(rgyud): dang des bsreg lugs gsum 'bul lo// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad bsams te/ byang chub kyi sems bsgoms la/ bdag gi lha'i gzugs bsam te/ snga ma bzhin
117a1(rgyud): du bsreg lugs phul nas/ bdag gi dngos grub bsgrub pa las bshad pa'i rdzas las sbyin bsreg bya'o// thog mar oM zhes brjod la/ 'jug tu grag
117a2(rgyud): pa dang / dpal dang longs spyod dang / dge ba dang / nor la swAhA/ zhes bya bar sbyar ro// yang na bdag gis ji ltar bsams pa'i dngos grub rjes la swA hA/ zhes
117a3(rgyud): bya zhing dngos grub dbul lo// de ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin bsreg byas nas/ byang chub sems la sogs pa'i rim pa de nyid snga ma bzhin du bya'o// 'dir yang 'grib pa pos cho ga spyad pa ni//
117a4(rgyud): gos ni ser po dgo bar bya// gos byed ser po gtsang ma thogs sems ni brtan zhing mthu yang che/ shin tu mi sgra ser sna med// byang chub sems la rtag tu dga'// dus gsum chog
117a5(rgyud): thog mar byed// nas tshal bcos ma 'am 'o ma mthung // rgyas pa'i las ni btsam par bya// gang zhig 'di'i rgyas pa yis// lam ni legs par brtsom byed pa// de'i yis la
117a6(rgyud): gang bsams pa'i// rgyas pa myur du 'grub pa 'gyur// ral gri 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ldong ros mig sku 'gi wang dang // yid bzhin nor bu bum pa gos// nor gyi char 'bad
117a7(rgyud): mchil lham dang // gdugs shing rta zhon pa dang // de bzhin khang rtsegs pa dang // pad ma bum pa mdung rtse gsum// bskrang phreng be con kun de dang // pi wang mdung rdung
117a8(rgyud): mda' yang rung // lhung zed dang ni khar bsil lam// yang ni rdzas ni gang 'dod pa// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bsgrub par bya// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang//
117b1(rgyud): chub pa// rnam par sprul po byin gyis rlob pa las// rgyas pa'i sbyin bsreg gi las kyi cho ga rim par phye ba'o// / de nas gzhan yang sbyin bsreg 'di// bdag gi las ni rab
117b2(rgyud): bsgrub pa// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad pa yis// brtse bar gyur pa'i thugs kyis su// de ni ma lus bshad par bya// 'byor pa 'dod pa la nyon// thog mar sa bzhi rtag pa yin//
117b3(rgyud): grong ngam yang na ljongs dag gi/ me'i phyogs su gnas byas te// skye bo med pa'i khang stong ngam// shing cig drung ngam du khrod dam// yang na bde byed gnas su'am// ma mo'i gnas sam
117b4(rgyud): phug kyang rung // sngags pas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// mar gyi ngo'i tshes dgul// dbang gis las ni brtsam par bya// bza' ni nyi ma 'am mig mar la// rgyu skar rgyal dang smin drug la// chu dang
117b5(rgyud): sa ga dag la ni mkhas pas dkyor bri bar bya// de dang por sngags bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la// sa kha tog mar mo las sbyang ba dang // yongs su bzungs pa la sogs pa ste// de na
117b6(rgyud): bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlab la// 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bzlas pa'i srad bu leb rgan du btsos pa blangs ste/ dkyil 'khor thig gdab ni/ gru gsum la sgo shar phyog
117b7(rgyud): su gtod pa sgo khyud dang // rta bangs dang / mu ran gyi cha legs par byas ste/ de na tshon rtsi dmar po ni/ shin tu bzang po blangs nas su/ yi ge 'bar ba bzhag pa ni// yi ge klad kyi 'khor dang /
117b8(rgyud): bcas// nyi ma mchar nga 'dra ba ste// shin tu gdul dga' rgyal ba'i mchog/ de ltar tshon rtsi byin brlabs la// sangs rgyas thams cad dran byas te// dkyil 'khon kun du bri ba ni//
118a1(rgyud): / khru gsum yang na khru lnga pa// yang na bdun nam dgu yang rung // gsang sngags dngos grub rjes mthun par// rnam pa gsum du dbye bar bya/ lha rnam dgod
118a2(rgyud): ba snga ma bzhin// mkhas pas rigs kyi bdag por bya// lhag ma rnam ni ci rigs par// mkhas pa yis ni bgod par bya// de la na mkha'i snying po'i gnas su sgra can dang // nyi skra can
118a3(rgyud): gnyis be tson dang zhags pa'i phyag rgyar gzhag go// gnod mdzes kyi gnas su ni// rdo rje lcag kyu mnga'i phyag rgyar bzhag go/ gtsug spyod kyang mda'i phyag rgyar bzhag go// phyi rol tu phyag
118a4(rgyud): brnyan bzhi zhags pa'i phyag rgyar bri'o// de'i nas snga ma bzhin du cho ga thams cad bya'o// byug spos dang me tog la sogs pa yang dmar por dbul lo// me'i thab khung yang snga ma'i gnas
118a5(rgyud): su bya ste// srid du sor nyi shu tshad la kha ran sor gnyis pa phar ltas pa bya'o// zabs su mtho chub du gang la dbus su rdo rje sor rgyad pa dmar po bskas par bya'o// me'i thab khung de ni gru gsuM
118a6(rgyud): sa la gsum du bya'o// de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la// phyi rol tu gtor ma sbyin no// de nas btso ga mkhan gyi khyim nas me blangs la// snga ma bzhin pas gtor/
118a7(rgyud): byas te/ seng ldeng gi shing ngam/ a sho ka'am/ shing ka ra bi ras me sbar la/ de bzhin du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlabs la/ me'i thab khung gi zhabs su me'i
118a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsams la yi ge raM bzhag go/ yi ge raM de yang 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'phro ba las/ me'i gzugs su gyur par bsam pa ni/ nyi ma 'char ba 'dra ba gdul dga' ba/ mig
118b1(rgyud): gsum pa/ thor tshugs kham pa/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag na be con dang / zhags pa dang / bgrang phreng dang / 'gan d+he thogs/ gos dmar po gyon zhing // srad bu dmar po ser
118b2(rgyud): ral khar thogs pa/ yi ge ras mtshan pa/ me lce 'bar ba dmar po'i 'od 'phro ba/ de lta bu'i me bsams te gsang gtor byas/ mchod yon phul te/ rang gi gsang sngags kyis
118b3(rgyud): byug spos dang / me tog la sogs pa byin la// de la shing ka ra bi ra'i yam bsregs shing yungs mar dang / tsan dan dmar po las bstsags pa'i bsreg lu skra bdun sbyin no// de nas
118b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du bkod pa'i lha rnams la bsreg lugs bdun phul te/ snga ma bzhin du bdag gi lha'i gzugs su bsams la bzhag ste/ de bzhin du bsreg lugs phul la/
118b5(rgyud): cho ga las byung ba'i rdzas rnams sbyin bsreg bya'o// 'jug tu yang byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du bya'o// cho ga 'di la yang dkyil 'khor gyi yo
118b6(rgyud): byad thams cad dmar por bya'o// me'i gnas kyang dus sum du tsan dan dmar pos byug cing / me tog dmar po sil ma bkram mo// dpal ldan gos ni dmar po dgos/
118b7(rgyud): byug spos phreng ba dmar pos brgyan// srad bu dmar po ser ral thogs// byang chub sems kyi bye brag shes// zas su sran chung ci che za// dga' zhing 'dzum mu la mi
118b8(rgyud): smra zub// sems dang sems ni rjes su sbyor// rtag tu bzlas dang sbyin bsreg byed// lha'i gzugs ni sems dpa' yis// mi yis dbang du bya ba yi// dngos grub ma lus/
119a1(rgyud): @brtsam par bya'o// gang zhig cho ga 'di yis su// chog shes pas las brtsam nas// gzi brjid can de'i bu// zla ba gcig gis dang
119a2(rgyud): du 'gyur// sbyin bsreg zla ba gnyis byas na// phyag rnyan po mos gnod sbyin ma// de bzhin sa 'og bu mo dag/ sngags pas myur du khug par 'gyur// 'di ni res shig/
119a3(rgyud): 'dor bsdus te// dbang gi sbyin bsreg bsngags pa yin// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa// rnam par sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa
119a4(rgyud): las dbang du bya ba'i sprin bsreg cho ga'i rim pa bye ba'o// // de ni drag shul spyod pa yi// cho ga ma lus bshad par bya// gnod sbyin lho phye yid dwags
119a5(rgyud): gtum// lha min dri za mi 'am ci// sems can gnod dga' sdang ba dang // de bzhin gshegs dang log 'dren dang // 'byung po ma mo srin po dang /
119a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro dang ni lus srul dang // mi yang rgyag drags mthu ldan zhing // drag po'i las byed sdang pa'ang rung // de dag 'dul byer sngags shes pas/
119a7(rgyud): drag shul las ni brtsam par bya// nyes pa chung ngu dag la ni// drag po'i cho ga mi rtsom mo// grong go lho'i phyogs su ni// sdom brtsom pa bzhi nag po dang /
119a8(rgyud): du khrod dben pa'am dgon pa'am// skyed mos tshal rnying zhi gnas su// mar gyi ngo'i tshes rgyad dam// yang na tshes ni bcu bzhi la// bza' ni ben pa mig dmar dang //
119b1(rgyud): rgyu skar rlung las 'byung ba dang // me bzhi dang ni nag pa dang // za skar dang ni de bzhin spo// nam so dang ni sa ri dang // rgyu skar de dag dag po ste// de dag gang yang rung //
119b2(rgyud): ba la// sngags pa gshin rje bzhin khros pas// dgra'i srog ni gcod byed pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri bar bya// sngags pa bdag nyid rang gi rgyas// rdo rje sems
119b3(rgyud): par byin brlabs te// sngags pa 'jigs pa med pa yis// sa bzhi snga ma bzhin du sbyar// de la mi g.yo mthu chen gyis// yongs su bzung la sogs byas na// rang
119b4(rgyud): gi yi ge'i phyag rgya yis// de nas rnam snang mdzad du bya// bu mo bzhon nus bkal ba yis// srad bu sngon po der blangs nas// dkyil 'khor nan tan thig gdab
119b5(rgyud): pa gru gsum phyi rol zlum por bya// gru bzhi khru lnga khru brgyad dam// de bzhin bcu gnyis khru bcu drag/ ji ltar las kyi rjes mthun par// mkhas pas tshad
119b6(rgyud): ni brtag par bya// de nis du khrod thal ba'am// mkhas pas tshon tsi nag po la// yi ge ha ni der bzhag pa// me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'gro// dus mtha'i me
119b7(rgyud): ltar 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbyar gyi char sprin 'dra ba'i mdog/ kha ni mche ba rtsigs pa la// lag na rdo rje be con can// bdud kyi sde ni thams cad dang // snga ma/
119b8(rgyud): thams cad sdigs byed pa// mtshon la mkhas pas tshen de la// de 'dra'i yi ge bzhag nas ni// shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bri// ba dan mang ba'i mtshan mas mtshan/
120a1(rgyud): rta babs dang ni sgo khyud bcas// sgo'i cha ni legs par phye// lha'i gtso bo bzhag pa ni// snga ma bzhin du brtag par bya// byang phyog/
120a2(rgyud): sgo ni bye nas su// lhag ma'i sgo rnams gcad par bya'o// de nas 'phags pa na mkha'i snying po'i gnas su// khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed gsal shing gi phyag rgyar bri'o//
120a3(rgyud): mdzod bu'i gnas su khro bo'i rgyal po 'phags pa gzhan gyi mi thub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje dang // drag sta'i phyag rgyar bri'o// mthu chen thob pa dang // 'phags ma khro gnyer dang /
120a4(rgyud): 'phags ma sgrol ma'i gnas rnams su don yod pa'i zhags sba dang // ral pa gcig ma dang // rta mgrin rnams zhags pa dang // dgra sta dang / rdo rje be con gyi phyag
120a5(rgyud): rgya rnams su go rims bzhin du gzhag par bya'o// gnod mdzes kyi gnas su// khro zla gtso bo rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gzhag go// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba yang be con gyi
120a6(rgyud): phyag rgyar gzhag go/ sgo drung du ni gdul dka' dang // mngon du phyogs gnyis be con gyi phyag rgyar bzhag go/ gnas gtsang ma rnams kyi gnas su// gshin
120a7(rgyud): rje'i 'chi 'dag dang // dus mtshan mo dang / lhan cig du gzhag go/ bden bral yang ral gri'i phyag rgyar gzhag go/ 'khor sa'i nang du ma'i thabs khung sgo
120a8(rgyud): phyogs par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol khor khor yug du ba dan rnams bri'o// me'i thabs khung dbang gi las kyi me'i thab khung bzhin du byas ste/ bye brag du phyi
120b1(rgyud): rol gyi mu ran zlum por byas la/ ba dan mang pos mtshan par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams snga ma bzhin du so so'i gzugs bsams te mchog pa'i
120b2(rgyud): cho ga bya'o// de nas lha rnams ci lta ba bzhin du mchod nas/ bdag phyag na rdo rjer byin gyis brlabs la/ phyi rol tu phyogs kyi gtor ma snga ma bzhin
120b3(rgyud): du sbyin no// de nas byug spos la sogs pa'i khyad par ni tsan dan dmar po dang / du ru ka sol ba dang / sres pa'i byug spos nag po dbul lo// me tog ud
120b4(rgyud): pa la 'thing ka 'am/ gzhan yang me tog sngon po rnams dbul lo// bdug spos ni sra rtsi pog bu ma ram dang sbar la dbul lo// mar me ni yungs mar tsha ba snying
120b5(rgyud): po sngon po can/ me'i snod nag po'i nang du dbul lo// bshos ni kri sa ra dang / gzhan yang tsha ba dang kha ba la sogs pa bza' dang / tshod ma kha dog nag po rnam
120b6(rgyud): 'bul lo// sran chen dang / kri ba ra dang / sha dang / nya btsos dang / rjen pa rnams phyogs kyi gtor mar sbyin no// gtor ma'i cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas/
120b7(rgyud): gdul ba'i khyim 'am/ du khrod nas me blangs la/ khro bo'i rgyal po gsang gtor byas la/ du khrod kyi shing ngam/ shing ba la ta ka 'am/ ba ru ra'i shing gi me sbyar la/
120b8(rgyud): bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad chen por byin gyis brlabs te/ me'i thag khung gi zhabs su rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsams la/ der yi ge sku gzhag go/ yi ge hU~M de las/
121a1(rgyud): me'i gzugs gyur par bsam pa ni/ kha dog nag po shin tu mi zad pa dang / mig gams pa/ mi gdong pa bzhi pa/ mi g.yo bdud ka/
121a2(rgyud): lha dga' ba/ kham pa po// zor tsugs dud ka can/ char sprin sngon po lta bu'i 'od zer can gsum po che gos sngon po gyon pa/ srad bu sngon po se ral khar thogs pa/
121a3(rgyud): kha nas mchi ba bzhi rtsigs pa/ khro ba dang bcas shing kha gdangs pa/ lag na ral gri dang / zhags pa dang / be con dang / ril ba spyi blugs thogs pa/
121a4(rgyud): snying ka sum mdo ris mtshan can/ yi ge ras mtshan pa gdong khro gnyer ster ba/ hUM zhes bya ba dang bcas pa 'bar ba/ gnas cing rtsub pa bzangs lta bu'i 'od 'phro ba
121a5(rgyud): phreng ba can/ 'jig pa'i dus mngon du byung bzhin du 'dug pa de lta bu'i me bsams te/ gsang gtor byas te/ byug spos la sogs pa rang gi rig sngags kyi sbyin no// /
121a6(rgyud): oM a ga ne ye dza hri trad Da hUM phaT/ de nas yungs mar tsha ba dang sbyar ba'i kri sa ra'i bsreg gsum sbyin la/ dug dang / khrag dang / skye che'i bsregs lugs bdun sbyin no//
121a7(rgyud): yang na shing b+ha la da ka dang / ba ru ra'i shing gi yab bsreg shing rtse mo rnon por bzhogs pa yung mar tsha dang skye tsher stug pa sbyin no// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po la
121a8(rgyud): sogs pa'i lha rnams snga ma bzhin du bsam te/ rdzas de dag nyid las rang gi rig pas bsreg lugs dbul lo// de nas rang gi lha snga ma bzhin du bsams te gzhag la/
121b1(rgyud): rang gi rig pa las byung ba'i rdzas ci lta ba bzhin du 'dzub mo dang 'the bos bzung ste/ khro ba dang bcas par gsang sngags bzlos shing / phaT dang bcas par ji srid 'dod
121b2(rgyud): ba de srid du bsreg dbul lo// de nas snga ma bzhin du byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la sogs pa la gsol bar bya'o// sngags pa gang zhing 'di lta bu'i/ rab tu drag
121b3(rgyud): po'i las byed pa/ de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi gnas kyang rtsa mchog bzhin du bsreg/ 'dir yang cho ga 'di ltar bya'o// dpal ldan gos ni sngon po dgos// byug spos
121b4(rgyud): phreng ba sngon pos rgyan// srad bu sngon po se ral thogs// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu gzhol// kha zas bza'/ lha rnams dgod pa'i don la mkhas// gtsang zhing
121b5(rgyud): mchog tu tshul khrims ldan// spro ba che zhing dpal snying can// khros pas 'jig rten mthar byed bzhin// lho phyogs kha ltas mi smra zhing // 'dug pa'i thabs ni tsug pur
121b6(rgyud): 'dug/ sbyin bsreg bzlas la rtag tu 'bad/ srung dang skyab pa dag la mkhas/ mtshan mo sbyin bsreg byed pa yis/ drag shul spyad pa tsam par bya/ rnam par snang
121b7(rgyud): mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa/ rnam par sprul pa byin gyis brlab pa las/ drag po'i sbyin bsreg gi cho ga rim par phye ba'o//
121b8(rgyud): / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod rnams la/ stong pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i spyod yul/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i
122a1(rgyud): snying po rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes thob pa'i spros pa thams cad dang bral ba gsal zhing dag pa/ yid kyis bsgrub pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po
122a2(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po// snying rje chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de'i tshe/ thams
122a3(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la smras pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
122a4(rgyud): kyi spyod yul/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub rtsol ba/ gnas med pa mtshan nyid med pa ngo bo nyid med pa/ mtshan
122a5(rgyud): nyid kyi bzhi dang mtshan nyid dang bral ba/ theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/ bdud rtsi sbyin pa de sngags kyi tshul la rnam par gnas pa'i rjes su zhugs pa rnams kyis
122a6(rgyud): ji ltar thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces smras pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ston pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par
122a7(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi zhal du bltas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la lta ba/ snying rje chen po byang chub sems
122a8(rgyud): dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug de 'dra zhing mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba la phan par byed pa/ theg pa chen po thob par byed pa/ mtshan nyid med cing gnyis su med
122b1(rgyud): pa'i spyod yul/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi tshul gyi dngos grub rtsol ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i snying po ngo bo nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su zhugs pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig
122b2(rgyud): rten gyi khams 'byung bar byed/ stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul gyi chos bshad du gsol/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa
122b3(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas theg pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par mdzad pa/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad
122b4(rgyud): kyi rgya mtsho las sgrol ba/ sems can thams cad la dgongs pa gsang sngags thams cad kyi dngos grub rtsol ba/ bgegs thams cad skrag par byed/ par mdzad pa/ 'byung po
122b5(rgyud): thams cad 'gugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi snying po bsam gyi mi khyab pa gzugs med pa/ sgra med pa/ dri med pa/ ro med pa/ reg med pa/ gnas med pa/
122b6(rgyud): yid med pa/ rnam par shes pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ spyod yul med pa/ brjod du med pa/ spros pa med pa/ ma 'dres pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
122b7(rgyud): bka' stsal to// chos gang rgyus bu de'i rgyu dang // de rnams kyi ni 'gogs pa dang // gang yin de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs// de skad gsung nas dge sbyong che// gzhan dbang yod//
122b8(rgyud): ba ma yin phyir// bsgrub pa yang ni gzhan du 'gyur// gnyis pa yod pa ma yin te// rnam shes rgyad po de nyid mtshan// de nas 'khor mang po 'dus pa de rnams so so'i ye shes mngon par
123a1(rgyud): 'dus byas pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus/ bsams pa tha dad pa dang / blo gros tha dad pas tshigs su gcad pa gnyis gsungs pa'i don ji ltar rjes su
123a2(rgyud): mthun par khong du chud nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so// zhes bya ba phul lo// gsang sngags tshul la legs gnas gang //
123a3(rgyud): rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis sngags pa yi/ yang dag nyid 'di sgom 'gyur ba// de dag sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur// de nas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
123a4(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bzlos pa rnams las 'das
123a5(rgyud): pa yi/ ma 'dres sems ni nyid kyis su// dngos grub kyang ni thob 'gyur na// 'dus byas chos lta smos ci dgos// gang gis rta dang 'dra ba'i sems// mnyam par bzhag
123a6(rgyud): pas brtul nas su// byams dang snying rjes rten nas su// dngos grub brtan pa mos la thob// chos rnams rtag tu ma skyes pa// nga'i sa'o a'i mchog/ rgyal ba dam pa rnams
123a7(rgyud): kyis gsungs// a ni stong pa nyid ces bgyi// yi ge'i phyi mo phye mo kun// de bzhin 'dren ldan gang gi phyir// mi 'gyur mi 'gyur dang ldan pa// de phyir bsam par bgyi ba lag/
123a8(rgyud): a dang i dang u dang ni// ri dang li dang a mchog dang // a mchog snang ba'i dam pa ste// 'di las thar pa thob ces bshad/ ka'i ris dang ci'i ris// de bzhin Ta'i ris mchog dang /
123b1(rgyud): ta'i ris dang ba'i ris// mthun pa'i sgrar bcas lnga dang ni// ya ra la ba sha la sogs// thams cad rgyal mchog yongs su rdzogs// de dag rgyal mtshon don gyi mchog/ rnam pa med
123b2(rgyud): po'i don rnams bgyid/ a zhes bgyi bas byang chub thob// de bzhin e ni 'gug pa ste// u zhes bgyi bas gsod pa 'grub// ri ni dbang gi las la ste/ oM ni srin po 'joms
123b3(rgyud): pa lags// ai zhes bgyi ba 'chi bar bzhed// oM ni klu'i snying po ste// kun kyang mchog dang dam pa lags// yi ge 'dren pa thams cad dang // ra dang tshag drag ldan pa ni// chos kyis
123b4(rgyud): dbyings dang rtag ldan par// bsam btan bzlas byas dngos grub thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
123b5(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug la/ sa bcu rtogs par khong du chud// sems dpa' chen po legs so legs// bder gshegs yang dag mi bzad pa'i// de nyid thams cad khyod kyis bshad/
123b6(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes smras pa yis// rab tu gsang ba khyod kyis rtogs// zhes legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces
123b7(rgyud): gsol to// dpa' bo chos dbyings rang bzhin gyis// 'khor lo bskor ba rgyal po'i mchog/ byang chub sems kyis legs sngags te// 'jig rten dpa'o'i phyag rgya dang // mi skye ba'i/
123b8(rgyud): yi ge yis/ de bzhin bdag gnyid bsams nas su// stong pa gnyid du med sbyor bas// las rnams thams cad grub par bya// chos dbyings rnam par dag pa'i bdag
124a1(rgyud): sa bon yi ge lnga dang ldan/ bsams nas mnyam bzhag dad pa yis/ bzlas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// nus dang bshegs la sogs pa
124a2(rgyud): dad rab tu dben pa lhur len dang / phyag rgya'i yi ge phreng ba yi/ bzlos pas dngos grub brtan pa thob/ chos kyi dbyings dang ldan gyur pa/ sngags 'di rnams kyis bsgrub
124a3(rgyud): na ni/ 'gro dang mi 'gro'i khams gsum na/ grub par mi 'gyur dngos med de/ gsang ba'i bdag po de lta bas na/ bzlas brjod byed pas rang gi dkyil 'khor du
124a4(rgyud): dbang bskur ba'i cho ga de la 'khor lo bskor bar bzhag par bya'o// rnam par snang mdzad chen po mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa byin gyis brlob pa las/
124a5(rgyud): bsgom pa'i yi ge bgod pa dang // dbang bskur ba rnam par phye ba'o// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
124a6(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ sems kyis sa las yang dag par 'das pa nyid kyis/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam la thabs
124a7(rgyud): sna tshogs kyi bsam pa dang / mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du bshad du gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa bshad du gsol/ de re shig thog mar cho ga 'dis sdig pa so sor gshegs par bya'o//
124a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di ni bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar tu
124b1(rgyud): skye ba thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ bdag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las gang bgyis pa dang / bgyid du rtsal ba dang / rjes su yid rang ba de dag thams cad
124b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar so sor gshegs so// de ltar lan nyis/ de ltar lan gsum du bya'o// de nas sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
124b3(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi spyan sngar gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bzung bar bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi
124b4(rgyud): bdus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la skyabs su mchi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhi ba bla na med pa/
124b5(rgyud): so so rang gi rig pa la skyabs su mchi'o// phyogs bzhi'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun la skyabs su 'chi'o// de ltar lan gnyis/ de ltar lan
124b6(rgyud): gsum du bya'o// de nas bdag dbul ba ni/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam
124b7(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag nyid dus thams cad du yod ye 'bul gyi/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
124b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bdag la bzhes su gsol/ de ltar na lan gnyis lan gsum du bya'o// de ltar dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ gsang sngags brjod par bya'o//
125a1(rgyud): na ma sa man+ta bud d+ha naM/ a sa me tri sa me sa ma ye sahA/ de nas chos kyi dbyings su byin gyis brlob bo// nam sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ d+harma d+ha du sa b+hA ba a k+Sho ha/
125a2(rgyud): de nas bdag nyid rdo rje sems par byin gyis brlab po// na ma sa man ta badz+ra naM/ badz+rad ad ma ko ha/ de nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'
125a3(rgyud): thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi bas dus 'di nas bzung ste/ nam byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ dngos po thams cad dang bral ba/ phung po
125a4(rgyud): dang khams dang / rgya mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ rang gi sems gdod ma nas ma skyes pa stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid du ji
125a5(rgyud): ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems skyed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis kyang bskyed do// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du
125a6(rgyud): bya'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i phyag rgya spyi bor bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor thams cad du/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa'i dri bsams te/ rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di lan
125a7(rgyud): gsum du brjod par bya'o// nam sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ ya bi sma ye s+phar ti maM/ ga ga na kang d+harA d+ha d+haka sha sa ma ta ya/ rba ta thag ta sa ri shad man Da lem ma pra ni d+hi su tA dz+nyA na pa len/ sarbata
125a8(rgyud): tha ga ta pa le na/ d+haR+sha b+had ta ti sh+ma ni ba le na tsa swA hA/ gang ba'i phyag rgya ni/ spyi bor pad ma bye ba 'dra bar bya ba gang yin pa ste/ de ni gang ba'i phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid do// bzlas brjod kyi
125b1(rgyud): cho ga rim par bye ba'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par rol par bstan nas/ yang yul bsam
125b2(rgyud): gyis mi khyab par bstan par bzhed pas dbu'i gtsug gtor chos kyi mdzod zhes bya ba/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi thibs po snang byed pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba 'byung
125b3(rgyud): ngo / de nas 'od zer gyi dra ba bkod pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa/ rgya chen po rnam par rol pas chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang na mkha'i khams ca ltar rgya che
125b4(rgyud): ba na bzhugs pa'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bskor ba byas nas sems can thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du snang bar bya ste/ sems can gyi khams ma
125b5(rgyud): lus pa yongs su bskyab pa la sbyar nas/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dus 'gro dang / yid dgas kyi 'gro bar skyes pa rnams kyang mtshim par byas te/ lha dang mi'i 'jig
125b6(rgyud): rten rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po stug po bkod pa'i khongs su rtogs par byin gyis brlabs nas/ chos kyi dbyings bsams kyis mi khyab pa yang / de bzhin gshegs
125b7(rgyud): pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas byin gyis brlabs te/ chos kyi dbyings kyi dgos pa ma rdzogs pas/ snying rje chen po
125b8(rgyud): 'byung ba'i mdzod ces bya ba/ sems can gyi khams ma nges pa yongs su bskyab pa'i snying po/ dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// snyoms
126a1(rgyud): par zhugs nas kyang phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa rnyed la bka' stsal pa rigs kyi bu/
126a2(rgyud): dag/ sems can gyi khams ma lus pa yongs su skyob pa'i snying po'i rgyal po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gang la rten na/ byang chub sem
126a3(rgyud): dpa' rnams tshegs chung ngus bu dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa thob par 'gyur zhing / chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang / mngon sum du byang bar 'gyur ba
126a4(rgyud): yod do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin pa sangs rgyas zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa de dag gis mgrin gcig tu smras pa bcom
126a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de'i dus la bab cing mchod la bab ste/ bcom ldan 'das legs so legs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ dkyil
126a6(rgyud): 'khor chen po bkod pa'i byin gyis brlob pa gang lags pa de bshad du gsol/ chos rje chos kyi dbang phyug ste/ chos kyi mnga' bdag mthar byed bral/ ye shes che mnga'
126a7(rgyud): ston pa ste/ sa'i dbang phyug cig po lags/ dngos grub tshogs kyang grub ste/ khur las rgyal zhing srid mthar byin/ sman pa'i rgyal chen de nyid mkhyen/ 'gag pa mi
126a8(rgyud): mnga' chad mi mnga'/ mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa lags/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag mtha'/ spros med rtogs par thugs su chud/ skyabs dang gnas
126b1(rgyud): dang / gling dang ni/ mya ngan 'das dang zhi ba'ang lags// thar pa rims nad mi mnga' dag/ rdul skyon dang ni bral ba lags// brjod dang kun rdzobs bral/
126b2(rgyud): bde/ dngos po thams cad rnam par 'jig/ de ltar rdo rje 'dzin de kun// rtag tu yid rab dga' ba yis// mtshan ni yang dag bsgrags byas nas// rnam
126b3(rgyud): bar 'dren pa gsol ba 'debs// kun mkhyen dbang chen snyan bral gyis// de dag gis gsol thugs su chud nas// snying rje chen po'i snying po ni/
126b4(rgyud): 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor bshad dus gsungs// de nas gsod ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das
126b5(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ci lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i
126b6(rgyud): bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'di'i ming ni sangs rgyas med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba kun tu ston
126b7(rgyud): pa'o// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
126b8(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni na mkha' lta bu'o// zhes gsungs pa ma lags sam/ nam mkha' la ni skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa yang ma mchis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/
127a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang skye ba ma mchis/ 'gag pa yang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ci'i slad du 'di skad du/ 'di ni sangs rgyas med
127a2(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su sangs rgyas 'byung ba zhes gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// gang gi tshe sprul pa'i sangs rgyas yongs
127a3(rgyud): su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnams/ dkyil 'khor
127a4(rgyud): chen po bkod pa byin gyis brlob pas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das
127a5(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar che lags te/ gang la sems can 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / g.yo dang / sgyu dang / the tsom gyi
127a6(rgyud): bsam pa can tha dad rnams kyi bsam pa ci lta ba bzhin yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po de dag ni shin tu bka' ba bgyis pa rig par bgyi'o// bcom
127a7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa lag na rdo rje/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni sangs rgyas gcig la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa ma yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i
127a8(rgyud): rtsa ba skrun par rig par bya'o// chos snang ba'i sgo gsum gyis kyang nges par 'byung ba yin te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sgo snang ba'i tshul dang / chos
127b1(rgyud): zab mo'i tshul gyi sgo snang ba'i tshul dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / bkur sti byed pa'i tshul ste/ rigs kyi bu de dag ni chos snang ba'i tshul gyi sgo 'di gsum dang ldan
127b2(rgyud): par rig par bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sem
127b3(rgyud): dpa' rnams la gzigs nas/ gsang la ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid nyon cig/ de la re shig slob dpon byang chub tu
127b4(rgyud): sems bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i slab pa spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pas sdams pa/ snying rje can dad pa che ba/ chos zab mo la gnas pa/ shes rab kyi pha
127b5(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la mkhas pa/ sgyu rtsal rnams la mkhas shing bzo ba/ gtsang zhing bag yod pa/ gsang sngags spyad pa dag dang ni/ phyag rgya dkyil 'khor las la slab/
127b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bya ba'i las bya bar/ bla ma la ni lung thob pa// sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// gang zhig yid gnyid med gyur cing // sems can khams ni ma lus
127b7(rgyud): pa/ yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir brtson la// mkhas pa der ni sangs rgyas kyi// dkyil 'khor dag ni bri bar 'os// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs brtan/ yid
127b8(rgyud): 'thungs pa la dpal snying can// bdag gam slob ma rnams kyi 'ang rung // 'gegs ni zhi bar byed par nus// yang dag bden pa'i don rtogs la// gang gi mos pa rgya che zhing /
128a1(rgyud): bzod dang ldan la nga rgyal med// brlabs po che'i las byed cing // de ni brlab po che la dad// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa dang // sangs rgyas
128a2(rgyud): kyi ni smin lam dag/ thos nas byi phyir dga' ba dang // rtag tu 'gu bar 'gyur bar dang // gsang sngags spyod la brtson pa dang // bzlas brjod byed la gang 'bad dang /
128a3(rgyud): gtsam rgyu thams cad mi sems la// 'jig rten chos la mi lta zhing // sngags la gzhol ba'i sngags pa ni// yon tan de la sogs ldan na// slob dpon ston pas bkur ba yin/
128a4(rgyud): yang na rnam pa thams cad ni// rnam par dben la gang gnas pa// de yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas 'byung ba ston par 'os// yang na rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
128a5(rgyud): kyis// sngags pa'i dam tshig gsum shes sam// nyes pa thams cad rnam spangs pa// de la gnas pa'i sngags pa ni// yon tan kun dang mi ldan yang // de yang 'i dkyil 'khor
128a6(rgyud): bri bar 'os// de lha'i yon tan kun ldan na// lam gyi chog mthong ba yis// 'jig rten pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // 'jig rten 'das pa kun byar 'os// de la slob dpon la
128a7(rgyud): gzhan gyis bskul nas// slob ma don du gnyer zhing de la dad pa shes na// de ltar shes nas slob dpon des// sa bzhi legs par rtag par bya// mtsho dang kun dga'i skyed mos
128a8(rgyud): tshal// rdzing bu rnams kyis kun brgyan cing // 'bras bu me tog ldan pa yi// ljon shing de bzhin ldum bu dang // gel ba 'dab mnyam dga' ba// 'bras bu me tog ldan pa dang //
128b1(rgyud): ngang ba khrung khrung rma bya dang // gzhad dang ne tse sha ri rnams// gang gi yul na yod pa yi// yul te nan tan skyed de brten// me tog 'bras bu ldan ri dang // gtsang zhing yid 'ong rdzing bu
128b2(rgyud): dang / 'bab chu'i chu ni zhing sa dang // chu rlung g.yas nas 'khor ba can// der ni sngags pa blo ldan gyis// dkyil 'khor longs spyod 'phel ba bri// yul ni shin tu snum pa dang /
128b3(rgyud): gtsug lag khang dang khang pa dang // lha'i gnas dang phyugs lhas dang // shing cig las kyi bzhi mdor yang // zhi ba'i las las zhi ba dang // dkyil 'khor shes rab can gyis
128b4(rgyud): bri/ khang pa stong pa 'am du khrod dam// sna med drag po'i las can dang // ngan cing rtsu ba la 'jigs pa can// de bzhin tshang tshing mi bzad 'jigs// de la sogs pa'i gnas rnams// /
128b5(rgyud): drag po'i las kyi dkyil 'khor bri// drag por drag pa'i las rnams bya// zhi bar zhi ba'i las bya'o// rgyas par rgyas pa nyid yin te// de ni rgyas pa'i cho ga'o// yang ni yid ni gang dag tu/
128b6(rgyud): nges par dga' ba skye 'gyur ba// yul der dkyil 'khor bri ba yi// las ni legs par sbyar bar bya// gang gi sems ni rnam dag cing // the tshom la sogs rnam spangs pa// de las
128b7(rgyud): las rnams thams cad ni// grub par 'gyur bar dogs pa med// rnam par rtog pa spangs pa yin// rnam par mi rtog byang chub yin// de yang rnam rtog spangs pa yis// thob par 'gyur
128b8(rgyud): gyi gzhan du min// de bas rnam pa thams cad du// blo ldan yid gnyis spangs nas su// 'jig rten kun la phan 'dod pa// shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bri// yul med/
129a1(rgyud): dus kyang yod ma yin// bya ba med cing byed pa med// chos rnam dag ni thams cad la// chos nyid 'ga' zhig yod pa yin// byis pa mi shes pas sgrib
129a2(rgyud): ba/ rgyu dang rkyen gyis brgyal bas na// stong pa'i chos ni ma rtogs pas// rtag tu bdud kyi dbang du 'gyur// de ltar ston pas ye shes mnga'// spros med rtogs par mkhyen
129a3(rgyud): pa yi// rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yis// chos ni gzhal du med pa bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi brgyan//
129a4(rgyud): bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs pa dang // smin mtshams gang nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad
129a5(rgyud): kyi brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // byung nas kyang kun tu snang bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir kun tu snang bar byas nas kyang gang gi rnam pa dang // yon tan gyi mtha'
129a6(rgyud): skal ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du yang gtog par mi nus pa/ lha'i sgo khyud kyi rab tu brgyan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par smin pa las gyur pa'i/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po bkod
129a7(rgyud): ba'i brgyan can 'di dag thams cad lag zil bzhin du mnyam par gyur to// de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bkod pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'od zer de dag gsang
129a8(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor mi snang bar gyur to// 'od zer de dag mi snang bar gyur ma thag tu/ phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
129b1(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa byin gyis brlob pa bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang /
129b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa byin gyis brlob pa nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo//
129b3(rgyud): zhes gsol nas/ phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das la nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje de la 'di skad du bsgrags pa'i gnas rnams su
129b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi tshad khrung gang pa yan chad dpag tshad man chad kyi tshad du bya'o// dpag tshad cig lhag pa ni mi bya'o// de las bzhi mnyam la 'jam/ byug spos dag gi legs par bskus/
129b5(rgyud): yang na 'jim pa gtsang ma yis/ sngags pas nan tan bsku bar bya// de nas phur bu sor brgyad la// las thams cad pa'i sngags kyis brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gang gzhir mnyam par
129b6(rgyud): btang na/ dkyil 'khor kun tu ces kyang mi tshugs par byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// na ma sa man+ta badz+ra na/ haM ko Ta ma a sa me/ ma ha tsan Da le hUM phaT/ de nas phyi de nyid dkyil 'khor
129b7(rgyud): gyi yo byad rnams bsags te/ sta gon byas nas las thams cad pa'i sngags sam/ 'phags pa mi g.yo bas bsrung ba byas te/ dkyil 'khor gyi byang phyogs su 'jog tu bzhug go// yang na byin
129b8(rgyud): gyis brlabs la bdag nyid kyis bzhag go// de nas phyi de nyid slong ma rnams bzung bar bya'o// dad pa che ba/ gtsang zla che ba/ chos la 'bad pa/ tshe rigs btsun pa/ mos pa rgya che ba gcig gam/
130a1(rgyud): gnyis sam/ gsum mam/ ji snyed 'dod pa rnams bzung ngo // las thams cad pa'am/ 'phags pa mi g.yo ba'am/ mi bzod pa'i gsang sngags kyis bu mos/
130a2(rgyud): bkal ba'i bskrad pa'am/ rgyud gzhan nam/ yang rtsa ku sha yang rung / 'dud pa gsum bor la/ de nas sngags kyis brgya'am ni// yang na lhag par mngon sngags te// slob ma'i las rnams
130a3(rgyud): 'grub pa'i phyir/ dpung pa g.yon pa la bcings par bya/ u dum 'ba' ra'i so shing ni// me tog dri zhim la sogs pas bskus// shin tu bzang po rkyang bar bya// sor rgyad tshad la rtse gcig pa/
130a4(rgyud): bzang po yid du 'ong ba dag/ de nas mkhas pas sbyin par bya// shar ram byang du kha ltas te// so shing dag ni bca' bar bya// de nas blo ldan mi bza' zhing // dpyad pa med par dor bar bya//
130a5(rgyud): gang du ltung bar 'gyur ba ni// de bzhin du ni grub par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin la sogs// mdo sde'i chos nyid nyan du zhugs// slob ma skyo bar bya ba'i phyir// chos gtam shin tu
130a6(rgyud): bzang po bya// gal te rmi lam bzang po'am// ngan pa dag ni mthong gyur na// bdag gis skal pa brtag pa'i phyir// bla ma la ni de dag bsnyad// mchod rten kun dga' gtsug lag khang /
130a7(rgyud): gleg bam dang ni lha rnams dang // yid bzhin nor bu rin po chen gos// yang na me tog 'bras bu snyed// ral gri 'khor lo pi wang dang // grub pa'i rdzas ni sna tshogs rnams// gang gis
130a8(rgyud): rmi lam thong gyur smis// de'i dngos grub yid bzhin 'gyur// nyi zla me dang tshon dag gam// de bzhin rgya mtsho rgal ba dang // glang po che dag zhon mthong ba// de ni dngos grub thob mi dka'//
130b1(rgyud): de la sogs pa rmi lam ni// bzang po grub pa pad ma rtag/ rmi lam zlog pa mi bzad pa// 'jigs pa mthong na mi 'grub po// bong bu rnga mo khyi dang ni// chun la stag dang byi la wa//
130b2(rgyud): mi ni 'bru mar mar bskus dang // bcer bu btsu pa la mi sdug de la sogs pa'i rmi lam rnams// blo ldan ma'i yis spangs pa ra bya// yang na dngos rnams rmi lam dang // dri za'i grong khyer
130b3(rgyud): bzhin shes nas// blo dang ldan pas rmi lam rnams// snying po med par bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
130b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams 'di lta bu'i chos rnams/ dang po nyid nas blo brtan par gyur pa de'i rgyu ni gang / rkyen ni
130b5(rgyud): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu de dag snying rje chen po dang ldan zhing / chos thams cad shin tu yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta na/ so
130b6(rgyud): so'i skye bo rnams kyi mtshan nyid phyin ci logs cing mtshan nyid dang bral ba cig tu shes te/ de nas de dag thams cad la blo brtan zhing nges pa yin no// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis//
130b7(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings bsams kyis mi khyad pa rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs nas/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// dkyil 'khor chen po
130b8(rgyud): bkod pa byin gyis brlob pa nyon cig/ de la dang po'i slob dpon gyis gtsang sbra byas ste/ bden bral gyi phyogs su gnas la// dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par dbye ba bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang /
131a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag byas la/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa yang dran par byas ste/ mtha' yas pa rgya che ba/ rab 'jam
131a2(rgyud): bkod pa byin gyis brlong pa lta'o// ltas nas kyang bdag nyid rdo rje sems par byin gyis brlabs la/ tshon sna lnga'i srad bu'am/ yang na mkhas pas blos kyang rung // lha'i gnas
131a3(rgyud): rnams nges pa ni// shes rab can gyis rnam par dbye/ kun tu gru bzhi ltam pa la// sgo bzhi rta babs dang yang bcas// sgo khyud rab 'byam rgya chen ldan// rnam par dag pa
131a4(rgyud): sems kyis bri// rin chen lnga'i phye ma'am// yang na sa lu'i phye ma'ang rung // yang na spos ma thal bas kyang // dkyil 'khor sngags pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
131a5(rgyud): pa/ nub kyi sgo ni dbye bar bya// des ni rig sngags rgyal mo ni// mi zad bsrung ba chen mo 'am// yang na mi g.yo dran par bya// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dran byas na/
131a6(rgyud): bden bral gyi ni phyogs su 'gro/ de nas srad bu shes nas su/ bskor ba byas te slar log nas/ de nas blo dang ldan pa ni/ nub dang byang gi phyogs su 'gro// der yang shar
131a7(rgyud): du kha ltas nas// shar gri phyogs su srad bu bri// de ltar srad phu tshul shes pas// rtag par thog ma nyid du bya// de nas dbus su 'dug gnas ni// mgon po ngan song kun
131a8(rgyud): spongs pa/ mi mchog 'od dpag med pa dang // de bzhin sgrib pa kun sel dang // thub pa me tog kun rgyas dang // rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang // thub chen bdud
131b1(rgyud): las rgyal ba dang // de bzhin mi khrugs zhes bya dang // sangs rgyas mi 'khrug bya ba dang // sangs rgyas lnga'i sgra dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs pa rjes dran na//
131b2(rgyud): de yang dka' thub can gyis ni// nan tan bskyed de cha gsum brtag/ de ltar las la mkhas pa yis// sa ni legs par brtags nas su// byang chub sems dpa'
131b3(rgyud): blo ldan dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yang glag/ yang na zab mo'i mdo sde gzhan// sa rnams brten la 'bebs pa glag/ glags nas blo dang ldan pa yis// kun tu
131b4(rgyud): bdug spos bskor nas su// rgyal ba mchog gi sras rnams dang // sangs rgyas rnams la phyag byas nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gzugs sam// phyag rgya mkhas pas bri bar
131b5(rgyud): bya/ yang na gzhan ni gang yang rung // de dag thams cad bri bar bya// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal
131b6(rgyud): pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// sbyor ba gang dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams// tshegs chung ngus
131b7(rgyud): sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yang srid pa'i rgya mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur ba// chos kyi dbyings bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul bsgrub pa'i sbyor ba yod do// de skad ces
131b8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang // phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa'i bzhi gang dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags
132a1(rgyud): #kyi sgo nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams// chos ga thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid cing // de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
132a2(rgyud): mnyes par byed pa'i bsgrub pa bzhi de dag gshad du gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya chen
132a3(rgyud): byin gyis brlab bsgrub pa'i gzhi rgya chen pos byin gyis brlabs nas// sbyor ba bzang po bshad do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de las 'khor los sgyur bas ni// dkyil 'khor
132a4(rgyud): gyi tshad dpag tshad cig tsam bri bar bya ste// gnas can dan bzang po sbrul gyi snying po dam pa las byas pa'i khang pa dril bu er ka chen po dang // rin po che'i bla re bris pa// a ka
132a5(rgyud): ru bzang po'i 'dug spos sna tshogs kyis 'dugs pa// 'dzam bu'i chu bo gser gyi srad bus bskor ba// rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bas bsteng brgyan pa// rnga snyan pa sna
132a6(rgyud): tshogs kyi sgra grag pa// phyogs bzhi na rta babs sna tshog pa mu tig phreng bas btags pa// tshon sna tshogs su btsos pa'i gos kyis blugs pa dkod pa dang // rgyan sna tshogs kyis spras
132a7(rgyud): ba/ rin po che'i sgron ma sna tshogs kyi kyang rnam par gsal bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'dus pa'i nang du 'dug bzhin du// bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag
132a8(rgyud): ba'am/ de'i rnam pa la dmig par byin gyis brlabs la/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'am/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya cings te/ stong pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi rjes su song ba rnams sangs rgyas
132b1(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang // byang chub kyi sems 'dzin du gzhug go/ de nas bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ dam tshig bstan par bya'o//
132b2(rgyud): de la nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// shar phyogs su sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya gru gsum pa/ pad ma'i sted na 'dag pa bri'o// de'i gsang sngags ni 'di'o//
132b3(rgyud): na ma sarba bud d+ha b+ho d+hi sad tA naM ya sad ta Ta na ko swA hA// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas rol tu// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal
132b4(rgyud): mtshan bri'o// de'i gsang sngags ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ sa man ta a mri te dza la swA hA/ de'i 'og tu kun tu bzang po'i phyag rgya ral gri dang / gnas kyi dkyil 'khor chung ngu bri'o//
132b5(rgyud): gsang sngags ni/ na ma sarba bud d+ha b+ho d+hi sad tA naM/ badz+ra ra dza ma la swa hA/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i g.yon rol du chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bri'o// de'i 'og tu bcom ldan
132b6(rgyud): 'das shakya thub pa'i phyag rgya lhung zed dang / chos gos bri'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas logs su na mkha'i spyan gyi phyag rgya btsug tor 'dra ba pad ma'i steng na 'dug pa bri'o// bcom
132b7(rgyud): ldan 'das ma'i 'og log su/ rdo rje dam tshig pa sbyin pa'i phyag rgya ud pa la'i steng du rdo rje gzhag pa bri'o// 'phags pa kun tu bzang po'i byang phyogs su byams pa'i phyag rgya rib
132b8(rgyud): spyi thugs ze'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi nu ba phyogs su// smyan ras gzigs dbang byug gi phyag rgya bdamatha'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi byang phyogs sa// mtha' las pa 'thob rgya chenan
133a1(rgyud): @mi g.yo ba rgyal po'i phyag rgya bri'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lho phyogs su rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi phyag rgya bri'o// de nas phyi rol kyi dkyil 'khor ma
133a2(rgyud): gsum du byas pa la/ 'khor ba'i snam bu bor te/ shar phyogs su pho nya'i tshogs thams cad bri'o// de dag gi shar lho'i phyogs mtsham su/ pho nya mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya bri ste/ pho
133a3(rgyud): nya mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni lcags kyu'o// tshogs rnams kyi phyag rgya ni zhags pa'o// lho dang / byang gi ngos gnyis su bran pho dang bran mo rnams kyi phyag rgya bris ste/ de la bran po rnams kyi
133a4(rgyud): phyag rgya ni ral gri'o// bran mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni khang gi ri dang rdo rje'i khab bri'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa klag go// glags nas langs la dkyil
133a5(rgyud): 'khor bskor bar byas ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la phyag kyang byas la/ slob ma byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ dad pa can/ gtsang sbra che ba/ yi dam la
133a6(rgyud): brtan pa/ sdom pa bzung ba/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyabs pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje che ba/ gdong ras kyis g.yog pa/ 'gro ba ma gtong ba de la sems rtse gcig tu
133a7(rgyud): dmigs pa rnams dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya ste/ dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo gang 'brel pa gang ba'i phyag rgya'am/ chos 'byung ba'i phyag rgya'am/ tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te/ dam/
133a8(rgyud): tshig brjod la dkyil 'khor du bzud do// de nas me tog 'dor du gzhug go// me tog gar babs pa de de'i lha yin no// de ltar dam tshig brten pa can gyi slob dpon la ston pa'i 'du
133b1(rgyud): shes bskyed do// slob dpon gyis kyang bu'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de nas sems kyi rgyud rab dang / 'bring dang / tha mal la bltas nas/ gsang sngags spyad pa la 'jug/
133b2(rgyud): pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga sbyin no// de ltar byas na dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa 'dir dam tshig mthong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du
133b3(rgyud): zhugs kyang rung ma zhugs kyang rung dam tshig tu zhugs par 'gyur ro// de ltar dkyil 'khor chen por byin gyis brlabs shing / rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba/ de bzhin gshegs
133b4(rgyud): pa'i rigs las byung ba/ sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa yongasu bskyabs pa yid la byed pa des/ gsang sngags spyad pa'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rje su dran par bya'o// de nas
133b5(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ chos kyi dbyings kyi gnas na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la byams pa chen po dang / thugs snying
133b6(rgyud): rje chen po'i spyan gnyis kyi gzigs nas zhal cung zad mdzum zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag pa'i rig pa la 'jug pa'i tshul gyis/ bla na med pa'i chos kyi dbyings shin
133b7(rgyud): tu rnam par dag pa bstan par bzhed de/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las bsgral bar yid dam bcas pa zhes bya ba'i bzhed pa chen po mdzad nas/ gtsug tor chen po'i dkyil 'gor
133b8(rgyud): nas thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'byung ngo // 'od zer de byung nas kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam nam/
134a1(rgyud): dbyings kyis glas pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mi snang bar byas//
134a2(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings bsam gyi mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i yul ni stan/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa rnams la ni ltas/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa mtha'
134a3(rgyud): yas pa ni dmigs par byas/ chos kyi dbyings rnam par rol pa na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rjes su 'gro ba chos mnyam pa nyid bstan pa rnam par rol pa'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs
134a4(rgyud): pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa las mngon par grub pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sangs
134a5(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing bkod pa rnam pa bcu'i rab tu brgyan par mdzad de/ na mkha'i ngos la bkod pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlab pa bsham par bya ste/ gnas par gyur to// 'od
134a6(rgyud): zer chechen po de dag gnas par gyur ma thag tu/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rje'i sems la sems kyi rtog pa 'di lta bu byung bar gyur to// ci tsam de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgod
134a7(rgyud): pa las byung ba'i 'od zer sngon po mthong ba'i bkod pa bstan pa 'di dag rnam par bkod pa sna tshogs kyi na mkha'i ngos ni khebs par byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rol pa chen po
134a8(rgyud): rnams ni bstan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal du mi snang bar gyur pa ni ngo mtshar ro// de bas na nges par de/ bcom ldan 'das so so'i yang dag par rig pa chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i
134b1(rgyud): tshul rnam par dag pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par rol pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed do// de'i phyir bdag bcom/
134b2(rgyud): ldan 'das la zhu'o snyam mo// de na phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyi dang por/
134b3(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa nas/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i bar du/ bdag rtag tu zham ring la mchis nas/
134b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar de ltar bzhad pa chen po sngar mdzad nas dbu'i gtsug tor gyi dkyil 'khor nas/ 'od zer stong phrag sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed byung nas/
134b5(rgyud): 'od zer de rnams kyis kyang 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas glas pa snang bar bgyid pa'i ngo mtshar 'di lta bu ni bdag gis sngon chad ma lags so// de la bdag 'di snyam
134b6(rgyud): du bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la 'jug pa'i tshul bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnam grangs/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par
134b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa byang chub pa rnam par sprul pa bshad par bzhed pa ni/ bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do snyas da bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ legs lags kyis bdag cag la
134b8(rgyud): thugs rtse ba'i slad du/ so so yang dag par rig pa chen po la/ 'jug pa'i bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i bzhi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam
135a1(rgyud): bar sprul pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/ de ni dus slad ma'i 'gro ba rnams la yang snang bar bgyid pa'i 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol/
135a2(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po legs so legs so// gang khyod ni don 'di 'gri ba ni yang
135a3(rgyud): legs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la bzung shig dang / ngas khyod la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so so yang dag par rig pa la
135a4(rgyud): 'jug pa'i bsgrub pa'i tshul rnam par dag pas/ mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i rnam par dag pa'i gzhi/ chos kyi rnam grangs de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang
135a5(rgyud): chub pa rnam par sprul pa bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
135a6(rgyud): kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ stong pa nyid kyi gzhi ni/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// na mkha' dang mnyam pa'i gzhi ni/
135a7(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// mtshan nyid med pa'i gzhi ni/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bzhi ni/ mngon par rdzogs
135a8(rgyud): par byang chub pa'i gzhi'o// de ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gzhi/ 'di dag byang chub sems dpa' bsgom par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po 'di ni de bzhin gsheg
135b1(rgyud): pa thams cad so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa bsgrub pa'i rnam par dag pas mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i gzhi chos kyi rnams grang yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
135b2(rgyud): snang mdzad kyis/ chos kyi dbyings rgya chen po rab 'byam mtha' yas pa byin gyis brlab nas/ nam mkha' dri med pa'i rgyal po rnam par smin pa na mkha' ltar rgya che zhing mtha' yas pa
135b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyom par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyom par zhugs ma thag tu dbu'i gtsug tor nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul snang ba yul
135b4(rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab 'byam ston pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung ngo // byung nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rjes su mthun pa stan ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
135b5(rgyud): par snang mdzad la bskor ba lan brgya stong du ma byas nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa bcur snang ba chen po la gsal bar byas te/ steng gi na mkha' la gnas nas gsang ba'i
135b6(rgyud): snying po'i dkyil 'khor chen po bsham par byas ste/ dam tshig chen po gsum gyi snang bas/ 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas glas pa'i snang bar byas nas/
135b7(rgyud): sems can gyi khams la dam tshig chen po gsum gyi mig skye bar byin gyis brlabs te/ 'od zer dag na mkha' la lhags nas/ phyag na rdo rje'i spyi bor babs so// 'od zer phyag na
135b8(rgyud): rdo rje'i spyi bor babs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod la gsang ba ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin chen po thob par gyur te/
136a1(rgyud): de thob pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa gnyis su med par gnas thob par gyur to// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs/
136a2(rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyi dga' bas snyid tshim par gyur nas/ mi 'dzums par/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yud tsam zhig bltas te/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum zhing //
136a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la yid kyis zhus pa/ ci ltar de bzhin gshegs pa lags// ji ltar rgyal ba dam pa lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' lags// ji ltar
136a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhes kyang bgyi// mgon po bdag gi the tshom 'di// thub pa chen pos gsal du gsol// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen rnams/ the tsom yid
136a5(rgyud): gnyis sangs nas su/ spyad pa'i rgyal po theg chen la// rgyal ba'i sras ni spyod par 'gyur// de skad gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis// gsang ba pa'i bdag
136a6(rgyud): po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// khong don 'di lta bu 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// chos/
136a7(rgyud): kyi tshul bsgrub pa'i bzhi 'di lta bu thos nas skrag par mi 'gyur/ shin tu skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i sems can de ni dkon no// gsang ba pa'i bdag bo// rigs kyi bu de dag ni/
136a8(rgyud): sangs rgyas gcig la snyen bskur ba byas pa ma yin gyis/ sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa yin par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
136b1(rgyud): de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ thog ma nyid theg pa chen po rtog par khong du chud par bya'o// de
136b2(rgyud): ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// theg pa chen po rtogs par khong du chud pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni tshegs chung ngu kho nas/ gsang sngags kyi sgo nas byang chub sem
136b3(rgyud): dpa'i spyad pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro// 'di ltar gsang ba'i sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa 'di ni/ mngon par shes pa chen po yongs su sbyong ba yin no//
136b4(rgyud): de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de'i phyir nyon la legs par yid la zung
136b5(rgyud): shig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la nyan to// de la bcom ldan 'das
136b6(rgyud): kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chos rnams na mkha'i mtshan nyid de/ gnyis su med cing mtshan nyid cig/ bzhi bcus rdzogs shing sangs rgyas pa// de ni rdzogs sangs rgyas
136b7(rgyud): shes bya// 'du shes rtsam yang spangs pa'i phyir// rang gi ngo bo bstan med cing // ye shes kyi ni rang rig pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs par bshad// byang chub na mkha'i mtshan nyid de// /
136b8(rgyud): rtog pa thams cad spangs pa yin/ gang zhig de rtog 'dod pa de// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sa bcu po dag bsgrub nas ni/ dbang rnams rtog par khong du chub/ chos rnams stong bskrun
137a1(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
137a2(rgyud): ma na#/ bzhin// gang gi 'dir ni kun rtogs shing // 'jig rten kun gyi rgyud shes pa// sangs rgyas zhes ni bya ba yin/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de ltar na/ de dag ni
137a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi gnas skabs rnams par bzhag pa yin no// rnams grangs des kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang gi sems rnam par bzhag pa
137a4(rgyud): kha sgrub pa med par rig par bya'o// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
137a5(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos kyis rnams grangs legs pa
137a6(rgyud): bshad pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar lags so// bde bar gshegs pa shin tu ngo mtshar lags so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu de dag 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i
137a7(rgyud): tshe ngan 'gro ngan song gi 'jigs pa'am/ bdud kyi las kyi 'jigs pa 'am/ mi khom par skye ba'i 'jigs pa mchis pa bdag mi sla'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po mngon par
137a8(rgyud): rtogs pa la gnas pa ni/ 'jig rten dang lhan cig tu gnas kyang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mi gtong zhing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ thabs kyis 'jig rten gyis byab
137a9(rgyud): thams cad kyang ston to// theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba gtab
137b1(rgyud): ba bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol/ de ni skye bo mang po la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
137b2(rgyud): gsang ba ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ gangs pa'i bdag po de phyir nyon la legs par rab tu yid la bzung shig dang / ngas khyod la gsang ba'i snying po'i
137b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsham pa bshad par bya'o// de la re rig slob dpon dam tshig gsum rnam par dbye ba la mkhas shing / bdag kyang dam tshig gsum la gnas pa yin no// gsang ba'i bdag
137b4(rgyud): po de la dam tshig gsum po de gang zhe na/ chos kyi khyad par gsum ste/ chos kyi khyad par gang la dus gsum du rtogs pa 'dus na/ sgrib pa med pa'i tshul gyis 'jug pa de ni dam tshig gsum
137b5(rgyud): zhes bya'o// bsang ba pa'i bdag po/ chos kyi khyad par de yang gang zhe na/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ sems ni chos kyi khyad par ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa thams cad med
137b6(rgyud): pa yongs su shes pa gang yin pa de ni/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// 'di la chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i rang rig pa'i rnam pa gang yin pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin
137b7(rgyud): no// gang lus ngag dang yid 'jug pa de ni sprul pa'i mtshan nyid yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di ni dam tshig gsum yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang ma tog
137b8(rgyud): na mu stenas can zhan dadages sna c-ing sngam/ dedas bcom ldan 'das cig tshigs su gcang pa 'di dag gsungs so// byis pa mi shes pas pasgribs// tshul 'di shes par mgyur/
138a1(rgyud): mngon da/ rnams// sangs rgyas gzhan du tshol bar byed// 'di ni gnas par yod ma rtogs// 'jig rten khams gzhan gang nas kyang // sangs rgyas snyed par yong mi 'gyur//
138a2(rgyud): sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma stan to// de lta bas na rnal 'byor pas// rtag tu yid gnyis spangs nas ni// sems kyi khyad par rnam gsum brtag
138a3(rgyud): de nas dam tshig gsum shes 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su gcad pa de dag gsungs nas// gsadag pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/
138a4(rgyud): de nas slob dpon dam tshig gsum shes par bya ba la mkhas pas// bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings su mos par byas la/ de la dmigs pa'i sbyor bas sa gzhi rnam par spang bar bya'o// de ltar des sa gzhi rnam
138a5(rgyud): par spangs nas/ na mkha'i dbyings lta bu la yang dag par gzhol bas/ bdag ni chos kyi dbyings sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes kyi yul yin no// snyam du bdag nyid rnam par snang mdzad du byin gyis brlab
138a6(rgyud): pa/ de ltar bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gnyi su med pa'i sbyor bas bdag gi lus la dkyil 'khor yin pa'am/ dkyil 'khor bdag gi lus
138a7(rgyud): yin par byin gyis brlabs te/ rang gi sems kyis byas pa'i tshon sna lnga phye ma dang / gzhan yang rung ste/ cho ga snga mas rnam par dbye bar bya'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ de ni sem
138a8(rgyud): can sdug bsngal ba rnams yongs su bskya ba phyir/ gsang ba'i snying po'i dam tshig la 'jug pa'i cho ga bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'angs rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ byin gyis brlab
138b1(rgyud): gang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyang tshe 'di nyid gcig pus/ thog mar/
138b2(rgyud): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byams pa chen po dang / thugs rje chen po'i spyan gnyis sems can gyi khams la gzigs
138b3(rgyud): nas/ gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po byin gyis brlabs bsgrub pa'i gzhi gang dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/
138b4(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par dka' ba yang / bsod nams ma byas pa'i sems can rnams kyi pha rol gyi rgyud la yang rab tu rdzogs par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi
138b5(rgyud): brlabs kyi gzhi nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyi de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
138b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das stobs dang ldan pa// mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi ye shes la mnga' ba ngo mtshar to// bcom
138b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'im rigs kyi bu mo mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di 'dra'i don du/ na mkha'i dbyings kyis mtha' klas pa'i bskal par yang
138b8(rgyud): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal mi gzad pa yang bzod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu mkhas pa 'di la slob par 'tshal bas/ de bzhin
139a1(rgyud): mgo gshegs pa'i rjes su brlab par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de lta bas na/ legs lags kyis bdag la thugs brtse ba'i slad du/ chos kyi/
139a2(rgyud): dbyings kyi byin gyi bzhi de bdag bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
139a3(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i 'dog po/ na mkha'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// chos kyi dbyings dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad ni
139a4(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi byin byin gyis brlams kyi mtshan nyid do/ gsang ba'i bdag po/ gang dag ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/ byang chub kyi snying po ni 'jug gi bar tu bsgom
139a5(rgyud): shing len mang du byas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi bzhi yin te/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po de lta bas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
139a6(rgyud): ni de yin no/ rigs kyi bung byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa na yang / 'di dag sems sems dpa' las rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thob
139a7(rgyud): par gyur to// sgra dbyangs mtha' yas pa sgrogs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi sgo dang / bdud bzhi pham par byed pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gnas med pa/ na mkha'i spyod yul/
139a8(rgyud): mtshan nyid med pa 'gro ba med pa byed pa po dang / tshor ba po des/ 'jig rten gyi 'gro ba thams cad las 'das pa yang thob par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo mtha'
139b1(rgyud): yang shing rab 'jam rgya che ba bstan par byas pa de gang zhes na/ na ma sti yang du mu ga te pra tiSh+Thi te b+h+yo/ a pra ti ha ta shas ni b+hU/ mad kri beb+hA/ kag na a ma ru/ sa d+ha ri ni/ dpra ta du babi b+ha ba b+ha ba ni/
139b2(rgyud): par ru pa d+ha re ma da kri be'i ma le sarba ga ti bi sho d+ha ni/ de la de ni rdo rje tshig mnyam pa med pa yin no/ a ma ha bisma yi hUM khaM/ phyag na rdo rje 'di ni na mkha' ltar dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i rig sngags kyi
139b3(rgyud): rgyal mo ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis byin du brlab pa sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs
139b4(rgyud): pa rnams gang na rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di mi 'chad cing / mi brjod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dengs ma mthong ngo // gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rnams grangs des kyang 'di ltar bsang ba'i snying po/
139b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ gsang sngags
139b6(rgyud): kyi sgo nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyal po/ 'di mngon par brtson par bya'o// de la gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
139b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams gsang sngags kyi rang bzhin ci ltar bstan chos thams cad la dbang thob pa'i
139b8(rgyud): mar du ji ltar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ 'di la byang chub
