140a2(rgyud): gis ston te/ bla na med dpa'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bskul ba'o snyam du yang sems bskyed par bya'o/ de de nas thal mo sbyar te/ nye bar song la gsol ba gdab
140a3(rgyud): po slob dpon gyi kyang de don du gnyer bar shes nas/ snying rje chen po mngon du byas te/ tshig 'di skad ces smra bar bya'o// rigs kyi bu longs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan bla na
140a4(rgyud): med pa de khyod la bstan par bya'o// de nas sa bzhi yid du 'ong ba brtags la cho ga snga mas sa bzhi sbyangs te/ dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa sgo gcig pa/ lha rnam par dbye ba'i gnas
140a5(rgyud): legs par rtags pa/ mchod pa'i gnas rnam pa sna tshogs bkod pa bsgrub pa/ spos chu'i dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pa dbus su bzhag pa bris la/ slob ma pad ma'i
140a6(rgyud): steng du 'dug pa rang gi lha'i gzugs bdag yin par dmigs pa la gnas pa/ yid byang chub kyi sems su gyur pa/ 'gro ba mtha' das yongasu bskyab pa'i bsam pa can/ de bzhin gsheg
140a7(rgyud): pa'i rigs su 'gyur bar 'dod pa dag/ bum pa des spyi bo nas dbang bskur ro// 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
140a8(rgyud): spyan phye'o// zhes kyang smra bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la byed sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skud pa spyod pa rnams kyis lha'i gzugs ni
140b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgra ci snyed pa'am/ sems dpa' mtha' yas pa/ thams cad kyi cha lugs kyi bye brag rung ste/ gsang sngags dang / phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa las
140b2(rgyud): 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gsang ba'i bdag po/ gsang sngags dang / phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs pa yang ci lta bu yin pa gang zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la dbang bskur ba'i
140b3(rgyud): tshe slob dpon gyis pad ma'i phyag rgyas gdan sra zhing rtan pa/ bsam gyi mi khyam pa/ rdo rje lta bu mi shigs pa yongs su brtag pa ni/ gser ram/ zangs sam/ 'jim pa
140b4(rgyud): las byas pa'am/ ri mo bris pa gzhag ste bya'o/ de'i steng du 'dug pa la chos thams cad la dbang thob par bya ba'i phyir/ spos chu dri zhim pos bkang ba'i bum pas spyi bos nas dbang skar
140b5(rgyud): bar bya'o// slob dpon bdag nyid ji ltar rjes su mthun par mos par bya ba 'am/ de'i phyag rgyas rjes su mthun pa'i bya ba'o/ chos kyi dung gi phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags
140b6(rgyud): kyis kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab par bya'o// ral gri'i phyag rgya dang gsang sngags kyi ni 'jig tshogs lnga lta ba tha dag gzhom
140b7(rgyud): par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo byin gyis brlab
140b8(rgyud): par bya'o// rdo rje phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis ni mi shes pa'i grong khyer gzhig par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gtsug tor ltar mi snang bar byin gyis brlab par bya'o//
141a1(rgyud): kya / @#mdzod spu'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis ni/ mdzod spu'i dong ldan par byin gyis brlab par bya'o// yan lag thams cad 'byung ba'i phyag rgya dang /
141a2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyis ni/ yan lag thams cad byin gyis brlab par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la pad mi'i phyag rgya byung ste/ lags pa gnyis cig tu sbyar la 'khrig ma
141a3(rgyud): nas dkyed de sor mo thams cad go nyam par rkyang ngo // phyag rgya 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gdan yin te/ dam pa mthu chen po/ gsang sngags ni ngo mtshar
141a4(rgyud): che ba thams cad kyi sgo ste/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha ne/ ga ga na ma la pra ba badz+ra b+hed t+ye/ ma dA kri pad ma ka/ de la 'di dag ni rdo rje'i tshig mnyam pa med pa'o// a ti bi ma ya ma hA
141a5(rgyud): kri pad mdza hUM/ lag gnyis bsnol te rgyab sbyar te/ sor mo rnams phan tshun glas pa'i tshul rngub snol te/ g.yas pa'i bre bo rgyab du bzlog te/ g.yas pa'i 'the
141a6(rgyud): pos sen mo sbyar ro/ rgya 'di phyag rgya po ste// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su bsgrubs// 'jig rten mgon po skyo rnams kyis// 'khor lo dam pa 'di bskor ro//
141a7(rgyud): na ma sa man ta bu da d+ha naM/ ta thag ta smi ti bi dza ya ba ra d+ha ni/ sarba dza ya ka tha dar tha/ ka ri ma hA kri be hAM tri hI ma hAd b+ha ti hUM/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya las 'gre bo gnyis gril du gtsug
141a8(rgyud): la/ 'dzum mo rtsa ba bkris te/ lhag ma rnams so na bzhag la sgreng ngo / 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyis/ phyag rgya sems can thams cad kyi/ don rnams rtag tu myur byed 'di/ chos kyi dung zhes rnam par
141b1(rgyud): grags/ nam sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ tra ta ta na ba nag ti pra ti shI ta na na/ a nan ta du sa ra bi ta nir g+ho Sha/ ta thag ta bAg pra sa ra bi sma ya kad+hA ra mad ng+ga ram shang ka sarba sad te san to// nganar ka ma da ma hA hUM/
141b2(rgyud): gang ba'i phyag rgya de nyid las/ 'dzub mo gnyis bkugs s+ho/ 'the bo'i sen mo steng du ral gri'i tshul du bzung ngo // phyag rgya rab tu mthu chen 'di// ral gri'i phyag rgyang rnam par grags// sems can kun gyi 'jig
141b3(rgyud): tshogs lta// len cig skyes pa gcod pa yin/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha na/ a ma hA kha dag prad dza se ta sang ka ya dri sh+tsi tshe d+ha na ka ra/ ta tha ga ta d+hi mu ti ni dza ta bid+hu ta sa ra ka la pa ma hA ma hA hUM dza/ phyag rgya de nyid
141b4(rgyud): las 'dzub mo gnyis phyi rol tu brkyang ste gung mo gnyis kyi tshigs gsum par nas gang tsam gyis reg par bzung la rdo rje lta bur byas te/ 'the bo dang / srin lag 'the'u chung rnams nang du gzhug go// sangs rgyas 'jig
141b5(rgyud): rten mgon po yi// phyag rgya rab tu bsgrags pa 'di// mi shes grong khyer 'jig pa yi// rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams par grags/ de'i gsang sngags ni/ na ma sa man ta bud d+ha ne/ ma hA bi sma ya te dza dab+ha ba man/
141b6(rgyud): tsan Da dur dan ta tra b+han dza hA/ rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis kyi ngos su gtsug tor lta bur bzung ngo // 'di ni gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya ste// 'jig rten mgon po skyob pa yin// gang
141b7(rgyud): gis phyag rgya 'di bcings pa/ de la 'di ni gtsug tor 'gyur// de'i gsang sngags ni// na ma sa man ta bud d+ha naM/ sar pad tra pra ti hA ta bA ba ti d+ha ra ma tA ba li nan/ sarba ta tha ga ta no'u r+ya ba Sha ya/
141b8(rgyud): mad b+h+'u \u0f7fsarba ta mag ta/ a d+hi bA na a d+hiSh+Thi te s+phar ma dmachod/ sa de// lag pa g.yas pa 'a tshur bcings la smin 'tshams su bzung ngo // rgya di rgyal po mchog rnams kyi// mdzod/
142a1(rgyud): mngo kyangasU rtag tu rnam par bsgrags// de'i gsang sngags ni/ nam sa man ta bud tan/ a/ kha khyen du sa ma pra b+ha sa rab sad ta kle shasan ta pa pra sha ma na ka ra ma dA ma ti d+ha ra/
142a2(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta a lang ka ra ma ha ba ru pa d+ha ra pi rag ko tig ta swAhA// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams//
142a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bya ba la nye bar gnas pa de gang yin pa de dag ni gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya 'di dag yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sdug
142a4(rgyud): kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags dang / phyag rgya 'di dag gi brlab pa rnams ni// yid bzhin gyi nor bu gzugs sna tshogs pa dang 'dra ba'i lus rnams kyis/ sems can
142a5(rgyud): gyi khams rnams su sems can 'dul ba'i dbang gis ji ltar rjes su mthun pa'i lus rnams ston to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
142a6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa// gas ba pa'i bdag po// gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor la sdom pa gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/
142a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams lus dang // yid sngams shing spyod par 'gyur ba'i sdom pa dang // byang chub kyi sems yod do// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de la sngon
142a8(rgyud): pa gang zhe na/ bsdam pa ni sdom pa ste/ lus dang ngag dang / yid rnams bsdus shing yongs su rtogs pa phyi dang nang gi ba sdug bsngal sel bar 'gyur de ni sdom pa yin no// de skad ces
142b1(rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang // phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
142b2(rgyud): spyod pas sdom pa ji ltar bzung bar bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po
142b3(rgyud): 'di la slob dpon gyis lha spyan drad pa byas la/ bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma glags te// dkyil 'khor la phyogs der 'dug la/ slob ma rnams la bos te/ 'di skad
142b4(rgyud): du bu gsum du sgrib pa med par gnas// dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom pa nos shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// des kyang thal mo sbyar pus mo gtsugs te// 'di skad du slob dpon dgongs su gsol/
142b5(rgyud): bdag mi 'di zhes bgyi ba deng gi dus 'di nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la mchis kyi bar du slob dpon gyi bdag la dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa'i sdom pa sprul du gsol// ston pa'i bka' spyi bos
142b6(rgyud): nod par 'tshal lo// zhes smra bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis kyang 'di skad du rigs kyi bu dgongs shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pas khyod kyis byang chub kyi snying po la
142b7(rgyud): 'dug gi bar du lhag pa'i bsam pas/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bdag 'bul bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// 'di ni dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i sdom pa
142b8(rgyud): 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams ni// tshul khrims bla na med pa la gnas pa yin no// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// de lta
143a1(rgyud): mngon kyang / bas nagasang sngags kyi sgonas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i sgo de la slob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dam tshig chen po la 'jug pa 'di la mngon par
143a2(rgyud): brtson par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byang chub sems dpa' sems gang dang ldan na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skyes shing / 'das pa dang / mabyon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas
143a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes rab tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i byang chub kyi sems de yang nyon cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/ bdag cag la
143a4(rgyud): thugs brtse ba'i slad du// byang chub kyi sems de bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba pa'i bdag po phyagan rdo rjel 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i
143a5(rgyud): bdag po/ de la byang chub gang zhe na/ byang chub ni na mkha'i ngo bo nyid do// na mkha' la yang gzugs med/ bstan du med bzung du med pa'o// byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa sems kyi mtshan nyid kyang de'o//
143a6(rgyud): gsang ba ba'i bdag po/ de lta bas na/ sems dang / namakha' dang / byang chub 'di dag ni gnyis su med do// de la chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa/ chos nyid kyi dbyings khod du chud pa yang yin pa de ni/
143a7(rgyud): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin no// de la skye ba'i tshul dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sems skye ba gang yin pa de ni/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o// gsang
143a8(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gnas kyi bzhi lngas byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur te/ lnga gang zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnams dngos
143b1(rgyud): po thams cad dang bral bar mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / bzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ stong pa sgyu ma lta bur mngon par rtogs/
143b2(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// kha cig ni chos la dmigs so// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pas/ 'di ltar dngos
143b3(rgyud): po thams cad dang bral ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa/ chos bdag med pa/ mnyam pa nyid kyi rang ging sems thogs ma nas ma skyes
143b4(rgyud): pa/ stong pa nyid kyis ngo bo nyid du rtogs par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de la dngos po thams cad bral ba zhes bya ba de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/
143b5(rgyud): skye ba 'am/ she ba las skyes pa yod pa ma yin gyis/ phung po dang khams dang / skye mched tsam du zad do// zhes 'jig rten pa'i lam yongs su spangs par bstan pa yin no// phung po dang / khams dang /
143b6(rgyud): skye mched dang / gzung ba dang / 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ nyan thos kyi lam mngon par rtogs pa yongs su shes pa'i sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi theg pa chen po mngon par
143b7(rgyud): rtogs par rnam par bzhag pa yin no// chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sprad pa spyod pa rnams rang gi sems thog ma nas
143b8(rgyud): ma skyes par mthong zhing stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rdzas med pa/ mtshan nyid med par mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de lta bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas med pa sgrib pa
144a1(rgyud): mngon byang#med pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ rnams grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar theg pa chen po la yang dag
144a2(rgyud): par gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams gsang sngags sprad pa'i tshul bsgrub pa rnam par thar pa'i sgom gtogs par/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la phan 'dogs pa med par
144a3(rgyud): rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhes na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal pa du mar 'bad cing brtsal te btang dka' ba rnams kyang byas pas/ byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur
144a4(rgyud): ba de/ byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags kyi sgo nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa rnams kyis/ tshe 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
144a5(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// de yang ci'i phyir zhe na/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ tshe zhes bya ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pas skye ba la 'du shes su bya bar zad de/ byang chub sems dpa' di rnams kyi 'du shes de
144a6(rgyud): yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid khod du chud pa'i ti nge 'dzin thob pa'i sngon rol nyid du 'gag pa'i phyir/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ phyag
144a7(rgyud): na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gsang ba'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya'i dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas chos lnga ring du spang bar bya'o//
144a8(rgyud): lnga gang zhe na/ ser sna dang / sems can la gnod pa dang / the tshom dang / le lo dang / gsang sngags la sogs pa la ma gus pa ste/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ chos 'di lnga ni/ byang chub sems
144b1(rgyud): dpa' tshe 'di nyid la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam la 'jug par 'dod pa rnams kyis rgyang ring du spang bar bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ chos 'di rnams la gnas pa'i byang chub
144b2(rgyud): sems dpa' de la/ byang chub kyi spyad pa cung zad kyang yongs su rdzogs par mi smra'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'di rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'
144b3(rgyud): rnams kyi byang chub kyi bar da gcod pa chen po'o// de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
144b4(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gsang ba'i snying po 'di'i dam tshig la gnas par 'gyur ba de'i bsod nams ci tsam zhig 'phel bar 'gyur// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom
144b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' ni rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das
144b6(rgyud): na mkha'i dbyings kyi tshad mchis pas de'i tshad bzung bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ na mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' ni rtogs par nus kyang srid kyi/ gsang ba'i snying
144b7(rgyud): po'i dkyil 'khor du dam tshig mthong ba'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bsod nams mngon par 'du byas pa gang yin pa'i bsod nams de'i tshad ni rtogs par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
144b8(rgyud): gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba mthong ba'o// gsang ba'i bdag po/ dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba ni snying po gtso bo snying po thams cad kyi mtha' phyin pa ste/ de'i/
145a1(rgyud): la#gong na de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po med do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyi snying por gyur pa gnas su gyur pa'o// gsang ba ba'i bdag go//
145a2(rgyud): de lta bas na/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig 'di la 'jug par 'dod pas/ dkyil 'khor dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig la 'jug pa
145a3(rgyud): thob par 'gyur ba gan ba der 'jig rten gyi khams mem mur gyis yongs su gang ba la yang rkang pa gnyis kyis bgogs te 'gro bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gas sngags kyi sgonas byang chub sems
145a4(rgyud): dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de rnams la yang rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu me de dag gis/ dge ba'i gshes gcen gyi 'du shes dang / pha ma'i 'du shes dang / mkhan po'i 'du shes bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i
145a5(rgyud): phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la ni/ bdag gi sha dang / khrag gis mchod na yang lan ljon par mi 'gyur na/ mchod pa gzhan gyis lhag la nus/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ gang la rten nas sems
145a6(rgyud): can dmyal brgya chad par 'gyur zhing / dud 'gro'i skyeganas su 'grob dang / gshin rdzo'i 'jig rte pa'i phung po med par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' gas rdzags kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa snod
145a7(rgyud): pa de dag la ji ltar lan ljon par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa la gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ namakha' ltar gnas med pa'i spyod
145a8(rgyud): yul can yin par rig par bya'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po/ ngas khyod la sgo bar bya'o// shes par bya'o// ma'ong ba'i dus na/ mithun po dmigs pa can la lta ba/ 'jig tshogs lta ba'i mngon par zhen pa/ blo phyin ci log tu 'argyan/
145b1(rgyud): ba/ bdag gi sems kyis gnas gtan la ma phebs pa rnams rnam par khrul nas/ 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyi/ 'di dag ni rang po zo can gyis rang bzor byas pa yin no// zhes zer ba dag 'byung bar/
145b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// gsang ba pa'i bdag po// mi blun po de dag ni 'gro ba gnyis su 'gro bar rig par bya ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dus 'gro'o// gsang ba pa'i bdag po de dag la ni dge ba'i rtsa
145b3(rgyud): ba'i rgyu cung zad kyang yod par nga mi smra'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni rtsa ba chad par byed pa la zhugs te/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la bar du gcod par byed/ bdud kyi zil gyis non pa shes rab 'chal pa'i rang bzhin can//
145b4(rgyud): theg pa chen po la goms par ma byas pa/ nyan thos kyi theg pa la snying por 'du shes pa rnams 'byur bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson par 'gyur ba de dag la/
145b5(rgyud): tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig pa'i chos spyod pa de dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ga la yod ces smra bar 'gyur te/ mi blun po de dag 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa des/ sems can rnams la phan gdags
145b6(rgyud): par bya ba'i phyir/ 'di dag thams cad gsungs so// de dag la sdud pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sdug bsngal gyis skal pa can du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba 'dzin pa/ lha dang //
145b7(rgyud): bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi phyag bya bar 'os pa yin par rig bya'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyis zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab snyed la bka' stsal
145b8(rgyud): pa/ ribs kyi bu de rnams bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod kyis lag tu gtad kyis khyod kyi rigs kyi bu de rnams rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung bar bgyis shig/ yongs su bskyab par gyis
146a1(rgyud): nang khyad \u0f7f/ shig/ yongs su bskyab par gyis shig/ gnod pa las bzlog par gyis shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa rdo rje 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra/
146a2(rgyud): rab snyed po de dag gis 'grin gcig tu 'di skad smras so// bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rjes cig skad bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin du thams cad bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu de dag rnam byang chub kyi snying
146a3(rgyud): po la mchis kyi bar du bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de dag legs so legs so// khyod kyis ci nas kyang ston pa'i snyan pa 'jig par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig
146a4(rgyud): de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po// phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje 'dzin de dag thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bya ba dka' rgya stong du mar
146a5(rgyud): bsgrubs pa de ni/ bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di yin te/ de bas na khyod thams cad kyis nan tan skyed de/ de dag bsrung bar gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dis ni bdag cag de bzhin gshegs
146a6(rgyud): bka' bzhin byed pa'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'o zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// stobs bcu 'jig pa'o zhes
146a7(rgyud): bya bar 'gyur ro// de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba'i phyi bdag can rnams kyis rtag tu rtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de dag kyang bsrung ba dang / bskyabs pa dang / smra ba'i phyir brtsa
146a8(rgyud): par bya'o// de skad smras pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin de dag gis 'grin gcig du smras pa/ bdag gis ci nas kyang ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par gyur pa dang / 'jig par mi 'gyur bar bya ba 'di nges par dgongs so/
146b1(rgyud): zhes smras so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba la gzigs nas/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun rings du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ thugs rje chen po thog mar byas nas/
146b2(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di dag gsungs so// na ma ste yang d+hi ka naM/ sarba ta thA ga ta naM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ta ga ti ga te e ka d+ha ma sa ba sa ra ne/ bi tsid tra/ ru pa d+ha ri ni/ sarba sad ta/ a bi pra ya/ pa ri pu ra ni/ sarba
146b3(rgyud): bodaM sad ta/ ga ta ma ni si/ dA hi na ma sarba d+ha ma sa ma/ ma ha ma hi be tsan gar+b+ha sab+hA te/ sarba ta thag ta/ a b+hi shI te tra hi te/ bag ba ti hUM/ de nas phyag na rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
146b4(rgyud): rjes su gnang ba/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis snying rje chen po mngon du byas te/ 'di nyid rgyud phyi ma smras pa/ dang par slob dpon gtsang sbra byas te/ chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur
146b5(rgyud): ba'i yid kyis/ bdag rnam par snang mdzad de/ de'i phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyis sbyar te/ dkyil 'khor bri'o// sngags pa gsang sngags cho ga la// rtag par cho ga snga ma yis// phyi ma kar por blangs nas
146b6(rgyud): su// snying rjer gyur pa'i yid kyis ni/ rtag tu mi g.yo 'dren byas te// dang por tshon ci 'gyed par bya// de nas tshon rtsi gnyis pa ni// dmar por blangs te bkye bar bya// tshon rtsi gsum pa ser po yang // shin tu/
146b7(rgyud): nges par bgyi bar bya/ de nas mar gang 'dra bab kye/ de nas an d+ha nyi la 'dra ba kye/ gang gis kha dog ci 'drar gsungs/ de'i dkyil 'khor de nyid do// lha'i kha dog de bzhin te// zhi dang rgyas dang drag spyod pa/ de'i
146b8(rgyud): gsang sngags de nyid 'dod// 'di dag gsang ba bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang sngags gang // de dag dbang chen yin par bsgrags// phyag na pad ma'i chu yi yin/ rdo rje can gyi rlung gi yin//
147a1(rgyud): mdo byad \u0f7f/ pho nyal sogs bran rnams dang / khro bo'i ming du gang gtogs pa/ spun du thog med spyod pa rnams// kun gyi dkyil 'khor me dang rlung // yang na 'di dag thams cad kyang /
147a2(rgyud): nus pa'i mthu ni kun dang ldan// stong pa nyid du bdud rtsi ngogs// snying rje mig gi dri ma med// byams pa'i cho ga legs par bgos// dga' ba dri med rtsal dang ldan// srid pa'i rgya mtshor bying pa yis/
147a3(rgyud): sems can 'don par rab tu brtson// 'khor ba na yang mi gnas shing // mya ngan 'das pa'ang gnas ma yin// yang dag mtha' la nges byas shing // sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// de nas gas
147a4(rgyud): ba pa'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la ltas nas/ tshig smras pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa sdig bral ba// ston pa bcom par ldan par 'dis// bgegs
147a5(rgyud): rnams 'byung ba'i gnas// gtan la bab par bshad gyur pa// grogs po kun gyis mnyan par gyis// bgegs ni rnam pa du ma ste// lha dang lha min gnod sbyin mi// de la bgegs ni rnam gnyis te/
147a6(rgyud): phyi dang nang gi spyod yul lo// blo lu dbugs rnangs rims dang sbyas/ skya band dang yig 'chus// de la sogs pa'i rims nad ni// grang rlung tsha ba la sogs pas// mi bzad ngo bo can 'byung ba/ nang gis yin
147a7(rgyud): par shes par bya// phyi rol gyi ni bgegs chen rnams// me dang de bzhin mi min te// ye shes tsher ma de dag ni// spyod pa rnam pa rna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten gzhig pa'i phyir 'byung ste// bka' thub gnas
147a8(rgyud): na rmogs par byed// las kyi cho ga mthong ba yis// de rnams la ni bzlog par bya// tsha bar gyur nas 'ongs pa'i bgegs// bsil bas nye bar zhi bar bya// shes rab can gyis gnyen po yis// de dag
147b1(rgyud): so sor gos par bya// yang na bgegs rnams thams cad la// sngags pas nges par 'tshams bcad pa// bgegs rnams kun la ye shes ni// zhi bar byed pa'i mchog tu bshad// 'phags pa rnam par
147b2(rgyud): snang mdzad chen po/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par rnam par sprul pa// byin gyis brlob pa// theg pa chen po// gsang ba mchog gis rim par phye ba las/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
147b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po// byin gyis brlob pa// / rdzogs s+ho/ rgya gar gyi mkhan po/ shi len tra bo de dang / zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban d+he dpal brtsegs kyis bskur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
147b4(rgyud): bkra shis par gyur cig/ maM g+ha la/ b+ha wan tu/ shud+haM/ oM sarba'i hUM/
148a1(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud bzhugs s+ho// /
148b1(rgyud): @#rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya badz+ra i b+hi shi Sha ma hA tan+ta/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po//
148b2(rgyud): bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus cig na/ bcom
148b3(rgyud): ldan 'das rgyal po dbang bskur gyis khang pa chen po// rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab par mngon par grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
148b4(rgyud): cad kyis spyod yul rgyu mthun pa/ rin po che'i rgyal pos/ shin tu rnam par spras pa yod pa// khang bzang rin po che chen po// rin
148b5(rgyud): po che'i rgyal po// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na/ pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po nor bu chen po dbang gi
148b6(rgyud): rgyal pos/ ngos gnyis spras pa la bzhugs nas/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni
148b7(rgyud): nam mkha' la lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po de la/ lham me lhan
149a1(rgyud): ne lhang nge bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te/ sems kyi dbang thams kyi dam pa'i
149a2(rgyud): pha tu phyin pa 'di bsnyes/ sku dang gsung dang thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis brlabs/ g.yo dang brlom sems thams cad bral zhing / lhun gyis grub
149a3(rgyud): par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing / 'di lta ste lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / ngag mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas shes
149a4(rgyud): bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang / de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid gnas shes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi/
149a5(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'thos na lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / bcom
149a6(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra
149a7(rgyud): rab kyi rdul snyed kyis de bzhin gshegs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas/ 'di lta ste/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi/ gnas
149a8(rgyud): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyis chos ston pa dag mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag/ me tog gi
149b1(rgyud): gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam du ma nges par ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems skyed pa dang / spyod pa la nan
149b2(rgyud): tan byed pa dang / sa bsgrub pa dang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de dag thams
149b3(rgyud): cad kyang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad gyes byin gyis brlabs kyis so// 'dor na sems can gang la la dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang //
149b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa dang tshig snyan par smra ba dang /
149b5(rgyud): don spyod pa dang / don mthun pas sdu ba sha stag ste/ de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de dag nyid kyis/ dge ba mngon par 'du byed do// de ltar na/ byang
149b6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' de dag/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa/ de mthong zhing 'jug ste/ rnam par lta zhing nye bar sems te/
149b7(rgyud): de dge ba'i rtsa ba ci tsam mngon par 'du byed pa yang / rgyu de nyid dang dmigs pa de nyid kyis so// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar bar gyur cig/ ya mtshan
149b8(rgyud): gyi 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyi mi khyab po snyam ste cang mi smra bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par lta zhing nye bar
150a1(rgyud): sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la ya mtshan gyis snying bdun
150a2(rgyud): pas mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor stong phrag du ma mgur nas phyung ngo // de byung nas bcom ldan
150a3(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sku thams cad snang bar bya ste/ nam mkha'i khams rab 'byam dag dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
150a4(rgyud): gang dbang dang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la/ thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ bcom ldan rim nad bra bla de// dbang bsgyur rgyal po'i khang pa ni// skyon
150a5(rgyud): kun rnam par spangs pa ni// snying thang chen po seng ge'i khri// dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa la// pad ma'i snying po der bzhugs nas// byang chub sems dpa' rnams
150a6(rgyud): kyis bskor// gnas der thub pa chen po yi// bkod pa chen por gang sprul pa// de dag kyi ni grangs kyis tshad// dbyings dang kha dog gang yin pa// de ni
150a7(rgyud): bskal pa grangs med du// bstan par nus pa ma yin no// de rung des la dpa' bo che// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ yid gnyis som gnyis
150a8(rgyud): spangs pa'o// dogs pa spyod pa lta bar gyis// zhes skul te/ de nas 'od zer de dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bskul nas slar logs te// bcom
150b1(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'gur du rang gi gnas su bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzod spu nas/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi
150b2(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer/ sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskal pa'i 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa/ phyung de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du/ sangs rgyas
150b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de dag la/ 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la/ bskal ma thag tu/ lta ba dang ni mchod par bgyi ba dang / sems can phan par bzhed
150b4(rgyud): pas chos brjod phyir/ khyed cag thams cad ma bzhol de ring gshegs shig/ zhes yang dag par ston to// de nas 'od zer de dag kyang slar log ste/ bcom
150b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul ma thag tu/ rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
150b6(rgyud): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la// bcom ldan 'das dag re rnam par snang mdzad/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
150b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas de la lta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal por dbang sgyur ba'i khang pa chen por mchis na/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa de ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
150b8(rgyud): gang zhig na mchis/ gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ de'i byang
151a1(rgyud): chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags de zhus so// de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs/
151a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/ rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyu me tog gi gzhi'i snying po rgyan bkod pa dang ldan
151a3(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'jam du ma nges par ston pa dag yod de 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam nges par ston pa re re yang / 'jig rten gyi khams mtsham sbyor
151a4(rgyud): ba ma nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byam du ma yod pa khong du chud par bya'o// de la rigs kyi bu dag mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams
151a5(rgyud): bye ba phrag brgya dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab phrag brgya dang // zla ba dang nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dag gang khong du chud cing rjes su zhugs pa de/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
151a6(rgyud): khams so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khong du 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i brgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa
151a7(rgyud): rab 'byam gyi 'tshams sbyor ba rnams kyis khong du 'dus shing rjes su zhugs shig go// me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byam gyi 'tshams sbyor ba bye ba
151a8(rgyud): phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs so// me tog gzhi'i snying po'i brgyan bkod pa rab 'byam gyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go/ me tog gi gzhi'i
151b1(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su chud cing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyis rgyud bar ma gcig go
151b2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi
151b3(rgyud): khams bkod pa gcig ste/ de ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa// yongs su sbyangs so// rigs kyi
151b4(rgyud): bu dag 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig pa de nyid/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
151b5(rgyud): de nyid yin te/ smon lam dbang gis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi ni yongs su bskor/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las ni shin tu 'das shing / nam mkha' nyid
151b6(rgyud): byang chub kyi snying po'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de nas rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po gzhugs so// rigs kyi bu dag/ bcom ldan
151b7(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni/ de 'dra ste de'i yon tan nam/ smon lam mam/ ye shes mtha' ni nges kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu
151b8(rgyud): dag nges kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bcud do// des ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa brtse/
152a1(rgyud): ba byas pa/ sha stag go// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyod pa dang /
152a2(rgyud): smon lam dang ngag gi 'khor rgyun mi spyod pas brtsam brten par gnas par mdzad pa dang / theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang / ji lta ba bzhin du rnam
152a3(rgyud): par rig par bya ba dang / ci tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la rtsam ste/ ngag sna tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor
152a4(rgyud): rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byam gor mdzad par bzhed 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po 'di phyung ngo // de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
152a5(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros dang // rin po che chen po'i snying po 'di byin no// na ma sa man ta mu khe
152a6(rgyud): bya sarba ta tha g+ha ta b+he sarba tha dza na/ rigs kyi bu khyod rin po che chen po'i snying po 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo
152a7(rgyud): gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te/ bcom ldan
152a8(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang / rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po'i/ 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po mngon
152b1(rgyud): ma mchod pa mngon par sprul nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i rgyan bkod pa ga la dang / rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba der song ste/ phyin nas thams
152b2(rgyud): cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po yang rin po che dang / rdo rje me tog gis sprin chen por mngon par bkab po// de bzhin du
152b3(rgyud): gdag pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / gdags dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / rin po che dang / rdo rje sprin chen
152b4(rgyud): po dag gis bkab bo// bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lhan cig tu bcom
152b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la/ lan brgya stong dmar bskor ba byas nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du/ shar phyogs nyid du gnas te/ rin po che dang / rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang /
152b6(rgyud): rin po che'i rgyan chen po dang / rdo rje dbyug gu dang / pad ma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che rdo rje chen pos snying po byin gyis brlabs te/ rin po che
152b7(rgyud): rdo rje chen po'i ye shes snying pos/ phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing zhug so// lho phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
152b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la/ rdo rje chen po'i snying po'i byin gyis brlabs nas/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi
153a1(rgyud): khams/ me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la phyag bya ba dang / lta ba dang mchod pa'i phyir song zhig/ de nas
153a2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po// rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di gsungaso// na ma sa man ta mu khe b+he sarba ta
153a3(rgyud): tha g+ha te b+ha/ sarba tha ma hA badz+ra g+ha sa ra tA hUM/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pas/ rdo rje mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing // bcom ldan 'das des gnang pas byang chub sems dpa'/ bye ba khrag khrig rgya
153a4(rgyud): stong dmas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i
153a5(rgyud): snying po'i rgyan ga la ba de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba de dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i ni snying po'i rgyan bkod pa 'di dang /
153a6(rgyud): thams cad rin po che'i rdo rje mchog gi snang ba chen pos snang ba byaso// rdo rje chen po'i mchog gi me tog dang / gdug pa dang / spos dang phreng ba dang / byug pa dang phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang /
153a7(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan rnams dang / rdo rje chen po'i mchog dang / rin po che mchog gi 'od zer gyi snang bas rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen por snang bar byas so// mchog sbyin pa chen po'i rdo rje
153a8(rgyud): mchog gis sgras/ phyogs bcur go bar byas so// go bar byas nas kyang ci ltar 'ong ba bzhin du lho phyogs nyid du gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dang lhan
153b1(rgyud): cig tu/ rdo rje chen po mchog las byung ba'i pad ma'i rgyal po chen po rnams la 'dug go// nub phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
153b2(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi
153b3(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje chen po'i pad ma'i mchog gi snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag
153b4(rgyud): med kyis/ rdo rje chen po'i pad ma mchog gis dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i stobs kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// na ma sa man+ta mu khe b+ha sarba ta tha g+ha te b+h+ya sarba ka ru pa la badz+ra pad ma gras/ de nas
153b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi snying po 'di gsungs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la rigs kyi bu
153b6(rgyud): de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
153b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de la lta ba deng / phyag bya ba'i phyir song zhig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug
153b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
154a1(rgyud): #dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams su phyin nas/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das
154a2(rgyud): ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ pad ma chen po rdo rje rgyal po la 'dug ste/
154a3(rgyud): rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po 'di/ thams cad dang 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po rgyan bkod pa thams cad du thugs rje chen po'i/ rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyis rang gi lus kyis
154a4(rgyud): rnam par byed sprin rnams kyis/ kun tu bkang nas rnam par bya'o// byang phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs
154a5(rgyud): bas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems snying po la/ rdo rje chen po bAr gnon pa/ rdo rje chen po rnam par rol pa/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po 'di sbyin par mdzad do// de
154a6(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas/ byang chub kyi snying po mchog 'dzin pa'i snying po
154a7(rgyud): 'di gsungs so// na ma sa man ta mu khe b+he sarba ta tha ga te b+he sarba ta tha ba rang man Ta gra gye na/ 'di gsungs nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po la/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten
154a8(rgyud): gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba der/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i
154b1(rgyud): phyir songs shig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig
154b2(rgyud): brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdan du bdar te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig te/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi
154b3(rgyud): gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya
154b4(rgyud): stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ong ba bzhin du byang phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan bkod par byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub kyi snying po'i mchog
154b5(rgyud): gi lus kyi sprin rnams kyis phyogs bcur rgyas par 'gengaso// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
154b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i cod pan la/ dkon mchog gsum po'i rdo rje 'byung gnas la rdo rje chen po 'di
154b7(rgyud): sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che mchog 'dzin gyis/ dkon mchog gsum po'i
154b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'byung gnas kyis snying po 'di gsung so// nams man ta mu khe b+h+ya sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ye sarba thA/ oM a dz+ra oM/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams na me tog gi gzhin
155a1(rgyud): snying nge'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur ba'i 'ang ba chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par yang mdzad de la lta ba dang / brag dra ba'i phyir song shi
155a2(rgyud): ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin po che cod pan/ bcom ldan 'das des snang bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems bye ba khrag khris
155a3(rgyud): brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du 'dar nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan gan
155a4(rgyud): ba gal ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po gal ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin dbyang shar gyi phyogs nyid
155a5(rgyud): du gnas nas/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rjes brgyan pa'i pad ma'i rgyal po chen po la 'dug ste/ dkon mchog gyi sku'i sprin rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams thams cad rgyas/
155a6(rgyud): par 'byings so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal zhes bya bas/ byang
155a7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po la/ sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa dag
155a8(rgyud): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sprin gyi dpal gyis sprin chen po rdo rje mchog bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungaso// na ma sarba mu khe b+h+ya sarba ta thA g+ha ta ma hA ma
155b1(rgyud): badz+ra me/ b+ha b+hi kri tri ti byi sha sa ma b+ha ba ha/ 'di byin nas rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa de dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po der/
155b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba'i phyir song shig ces btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sprin gyi snying po 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang
155b3(rgyud): bar gyur// byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig rgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po// de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom
155b4(rgyud): ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mas bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar lce'i phyogs mtshams nyid du gnas nas/
155b5(rgyud): sprin chen po rdo rje mchog gi lus kyi rnam par rig pa'i sprin gyi rnams kyi pad ma chen po'i rgyal po'i sprin gyi brlabs nas/ mchog chen po'i mchog gis sprin rnams kyis 'jig rten
155b6(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'dug go// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
155b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bo la/ rdo rje las byung ba'i snying po sbyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
155b8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rdo rje chen po'i tog gis/ rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i snying po 'di gsung so// nam sa man ta mu khe byas rba tha
156a1(rgyud): phyag shang#badz+re d+he b+ha ba swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dpa' bos/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub
156a2(rgyud): sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig pa stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du 'dar de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig du/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog
156a3(rgyud): gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
156a4(rgyud): rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ongs bzhin du/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams nyid du gnas nas/
156a5(rgyud): rdo rje chen po las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po rgyan rnam kyis/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / rdo rje gzugs kyis brgyan pa'i rdo rje chen po'i pad mo la 'dug go/ nub byang
156a6(rgyud): gi phyogs 'tshams na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs snyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'brug gi rgyal po la rdo rje'i
156a7(rgyud): sgra dbyangs/ de nas byang chub bsgrags pa'i snying po byon par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgra dbyangs shin tu snyan
156a8(rgyud): pas rdo rje'i yi ge'i snying po 'di gsungaso// na ma sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba ta thag ta badz+rak+Sha ra nir go Sha bi kran ta swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
156b1(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'brug sgra'i rgyal po bcom ldan 'das des gnangs pas 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing
156b2(rgyud): mdun du bdar de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / lhan cig tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po chen po dbang
156b3(rgyud): sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du nub byang gyi phyogs 'tshams nyid du gnas pa de/ dbyangs kyi rigs
156b4(rgyud): byed mtha' yas pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad go bar byed cing / rang gi smon lam las nges par 'byung ba'i/ rin po che'i pad ma la 'dug go/ 'og phyogs nas bcom ldan
156b5(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i pad ma rnam par dag pa'i snying pos byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i yan lag la/ spyod pa chen po'i rgyal
156b6(rgyud): po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na ma sa man ta mu khe b+h+ya/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha haM he swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' pad ma'i yan lag/ bcom ldan 'das des
156b7(rgyud): gnang nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sem dang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu skor cing / mdun du bdang de/ byang chub sos dpa' sos dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan
156b8(rgyud): cig du/ 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan dkod pag la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga lab dang / bcom ldan 'ad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa'i sangs rgyas
157a1(rgyud): byag dang #/ rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong dums skor ba byas ste/ ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du/ 'og gi phyogs nyid du gnas nas/ pad ma'i rgyal
157a2(rgyud): po chen po'i khengs pa brtsegs pa sna tshogs pa/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par 'gengs shing / pad ma'i rgyal po'i rdul dang bral ba'i/ dkyil 'khor gyi snying po la 'du'o/
157a3(rgyud): steng gi phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las shin tu rnam par rgyal ba la/ byang chub
157a4(rgyud): kyi stobs kyi snying po sbyin par mdzad do// na ma sa man ta sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+h+yo d+ha ka ra rta rma swA hA/ 'di byin nas btang ngo de nas byang chub sems dpa' g.yul rnam par rgyal bas bcom ldan 'das
157a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pas gnangs ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing mdun du bdar de/ byang chub sems dpa'
157a6(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan dkod pa ga la ba dang / rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
157a7(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der song nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan rgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te/ ji ltar 'ong ba bzhin du/ steng gis phyogs nyid du gnas nas/
157a8(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'ged par mtha' yas par go bar byed pa'i sgos 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing / chos nyid las byung ba'i pad ma chen po la 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems
157b1(rgyud): dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus shing / mkhod pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhing 'di dag du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yon tan bkod pa sngon ma mthong ngo //
157b2(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ shin tu lham me lha ne lhang ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing // nam mkha' ltar bzod ma nas zhi ba dang // yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po
157b3(rgyud): che'i rgyal po ltar/ bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa mdzad pa yang mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te/ sgra skad cig tu tshig su gcad pa 'di gsungaso// rtogs pa thams cad spangs pa po// bzod
157b4(rgyud): nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa// mgon po smad 'byung dam pa 'di// ji ltar sa la snang zhing du/ sku'i 'phrin las mi mdzad la/ gsungs dang thugs kyis mi mdzad la// sum bcu rtsa gnyis mtshan
157b5(rgyud): dang ldan/ shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra/ sku'i sems can thams cad la// sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyang // sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste// thub pa de ni 'gyur mi mnga'//
157b6(rgyud): gsung ni brag cha lta bu ste// bstan du med cing gzugs kyang med// lha'i rnga chen ji bzhin du// 'gro ba thams cad tshims par mdzad/ thugs ni rlom sems bral ba te/ de la
157b7(rgyud): yul ni mang ba lags// yul rnams dang ni de bral yang // sems can rnams ni yul du gyur// gsung ni ji bzhin sems can de// de bzhin sku ni de bzhin thugs// /
157b8(rgyud): mtshan nyis cig dang rab ldan zhing // smra ba'i nang nas mchog du snang // skye ba med la grol ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pas yod min pas/ gang dag skye ba med
158a1(rgyud): phyag dag #/ shes pa// de dag 'dren par rnam par shes// mgon po rtag tu mnyam bzhag cing // lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang // rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du/
158a2(rgyud): thub pa rgyun du rab du snang // byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid// shin tu dka' ba byed pa dag/ sangs rgyas ye shes che char ba// 'di 'dra yongs su tshol bar byed// de la
158a3(rgyud): mig ni mi snang zhing // rna ba dang ni sna yang min// lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni/ de phyir de'i lus ma yin// gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te/ dri dang ro dang reg ma
158a4(rgyud): yin// dbang po ma yin rnam shes min// thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi// yul can dang ni yul de dag rnam par rtag pas yod pa min/ yul can yod pa ma yin pas/ @
158a5(rgyud): yul rnam srid pa ma yin no// byis pas ji ltar btags pa bzhin// de ltar gang tshe yod min pas// de che mgon po yod 'gyur te// gzugs ba nyen 'byung ba'i tshul gyi su/ ting
158a6(rgyud): 'dzin dbang bsgyur rnams la ni// blta smra khengs rnam thams cad kyis/ kun gyi longs spyod 'os su 'gyur// rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas// de tshe kun gyis ting 'dzin
158a7(rgyud): dang // bzungs dang rig dang rnam par thar// bsams kyi mi khyab thams cad thob// sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa// bdag rnams ni thams cad kyang / phyogs bcu
158a8(rgyud): dag nas lhags pa yin/ yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzungs/ 'di ni gzungs kyi mchog yin te// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas yang dag par// de ni bdag cag thob
158b1(rgyud): par shog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ 'di lta ste// lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang / de bzhin du
158b2(rgyud): yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' med pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyis gang yin pa la 'jug/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo bo nyid yongasu
158b3(rgyud): shes pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' mi dmig so// de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas/ ngag dang yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmig so// lag na rdo rje dbang bsgyur ba'i chos
158b4(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor las gleng gzhi'i// le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
158b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen/ rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i/ byang chub
158b6(rgyud): sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis mthus/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/
158b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ ska cig thang cig yud tsam cig la sems dang po skyed pa nas bzung te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdza'i bar du/
158b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyi 'arlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyom par zhugs
159a1(rgyud): byas dang @#/ ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dang /
159a2(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gling bzhi pa'i thams cad dang // stong thams cad dang / stong gnyis pa thams cad dang /
159a3(rgyud): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la phab pa thams cad dang / me tog gi bzhi'i
159a4(rgyud): snying po bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang / re ba sna tshogs dang / 'dod pa sna tshogs dang /
159a5(rgyud): theg pa sna tshogs kyis rnam par gnas pa dang / 'gro ba sna tshogs dang / skye ba sna tshogs dang // ljongs sna tshogs dang / kha dog sna tshogs dang / dbyibs
159a6(rgyud): sna tshogs dang / sems can sna tshogs la sgra dang / tshig brjod pa rnam par bzhag pa/ sna tshogs kyi sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzungs te/ yongs su mya ngan las
159a7(rgyud): 'das pa'i mtha'i bar du/ sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par ston cing / rang gyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba// sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyis
159a8(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu 'azang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas/ rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po de na yod pa dang /
159b1(rgyud): bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa cig nas cig tu rgyud par rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyi yongs su bzung bar byin gyi brlabs ste/
159b2(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur chen po dang / rdo rje chen po yi snying po dang / rdo rje chen po 'od bro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang thog pa chen po'i spyod pa dang / gsang sngags rnam par dag
159b3(rgyud): pa'i sgos/ rdo rje'i 'khor yug chen po'i 'khor du/ lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bkur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo // de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang
159b4(rgyud): bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa med pa'o// rtog pa dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog pa'o// ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o// gdong ma nas dag pa'i phyir
159b5(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'o// skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o// bsam pa'i sa la shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bum gyi mi khyab pa'o// yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o// tshig gi las la
159b6(rgyud): shin tu 'das pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad sems can thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i sa la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams// yid
159b7(rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang / 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad du rjes su mthun pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/ gzugs rnyen gyi rnam par
159b8(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi rno du 'dug pa/ nor bu rin po che chen po rin zang med par gos dri ma can gyi bsgris pa lta bu su'i yin/ 'di ci zhig ces sems can thams cad kyis mi shes ste/ ya mnan
160a1(rgyud): kyag dang #/ zhig du gyur to// gang yang tho gros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang / the tshom dang bral ba/ sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ theg pa chen po
160a2(rgyud): gsang sngags dang / spyod pa'i tshul la byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ dang po rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyis byin gyis brlangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ rnam par snang
160a3(rgyud): mdzad chen po'i phyag rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen po// snang bar byas pa de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i po'i snying po la zhugs pa dag/ de dag ni gsang sngags spyod pa'i tshul gnyan
160a4(rgyud): pa dang srab pa dang / rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por bris pa dang / dngos grub par bya'i bskal pa yod do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi 'jed 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
160a5(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa'i bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud pham par mdzad nas/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas de/ dga' ldan gyi
160a6(rgyud): gnas na gnas pa/ nas gzungs ste/ mthar gyi spyad pa spyod cing yongs su mya ngan 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos ston to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bstan
160a7(rgyud): ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang / na mda'i
160a8(rgyud): snying po dang / sa'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad spongs pa la sogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam bsdus nas lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang /
160b1(rgyud): lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phye chen po la sogs pa/ thams cad kyi mdun du/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas// lag na rdo rje'i dbang chen po bskur ba/
160b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la dbang bskur nas de nyid la gtad do// lag na rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i/
160b3(rgyud): gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes bya'i le'u ste/ gnyis pa'o// // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po las// bam gnyis so// 'di skad bdag gi thos
160b4(rgyud): pa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan gyi 'byung gnas na/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi nag 'tshal tug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon spyod
160b5(rgyud): pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i nag tshal chen po mchog na/ dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhug ste/ thams cad
160b6(rgyud): kyang zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa sems dbang thams cad kyis dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa baglang bdag dang //

168b3(rgyud): der song ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs mgo bos phyag 'tshal ste/ phyogs cig tu 'khod do// de'i tshe shing sa la sna tshogs gi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po
168b4(rgyud): shin du yangs shita tha gru che la/ ka tsa li ki ltar reg na bde bar gyur cing / sa bzhi rdo rje dang bai dUr+ya dang / sdug gi kha khyer gyis rnam par bye ba// ngos gnyis ga'i sgo gang dang / rta babs
168b5(rgyud): dang / skar khung gi rgyan te/ mdzes par byas pa steng du nor bu rin po che chen po'i dril bu er ka'i dra bas bris pa/ mu tig gi do zhal mang po sbyangs pa/ dar gi lnga ldi mang po bris pa/ sil snyan dang /
168b6(rgyud): pheg rdob pas snyen cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/ lha'i me tog ud pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / dri mchog gi sa phyogs de bkram par gyur te/ 'dir sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi brlabs
168b7(rgyud): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis shing sa la sna tshogs kyi brgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po// thams cad rdo rje chen po'i 'khor yu gi ris skor ba/ rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khyam su gyur pa/
168b8(rgyud): chu zheng dpag chad 'bum phrag bcu pa/ dus thod pa'i me tog gis sa legs par brgyan pa/ lha'i chu yan lag rgyang dang ldan pas/ phyog cha yong su gang pa/ byang chub sems dpa' las kyi byung ba ste/ dper/
169a1(rgyud): byas dpa / 6/ gan gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi rgyal po'i gnas dag pa'i gnas la kyis byung ba ldan ne lcang nger 'dug pa de bzhin du/ shings la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan dkod pa'i nag cal stug pa
169a2(rgyud): yang / bcom ldan 'ad kyis mthus lhan ner rnam par mdzes// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa rdo rje'i 'byung gnas zhes
169a3(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs thams cad kyi leg so zhes bya ba gsung byung ste/ rdo rje 'byung gnas zhes bya/
169a4(rgyud): ba'i snying po 'di gsung so// dpa' bo chen po leg so legs/ rdo rje 'byung gnas stob po me sha kya seng ge skyob pa'i/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni/ rdo rje stobs can gsungs par gyis/ nams sa
169a5(rgyud): Tha la ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya hA/ rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying po mchog 'di gsung ma thag du/ dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/ rdo rje 'byung gnas kyi snying pon
169a6(rgyud): sgracig nas cig tu 'ur ba ces grags par gyur te/ rdo rje 'byung gnas pa'o Ne/ sems can kun la phan mdzad pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di la ni/ thub pa chen pos byin gyis rlobs/ 1
169a7(rgyud): tu srog chags thams cad kyang / snying po 'di ni 'dzin 'gyur cig/ des na 'dir ni de dag kun/ tshul chen dngos grub thob par shog/ ces grag so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas/
169a8(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la gzigs nas/ kun tu bzang po dang byams pa dang / 'jam dpal la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag bcom
169b1(rgyud): ldan 'ad rnam par snang mdzad sngon gyi smon lam gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gang rnam par dag pa/ sgo 'jug pa'i snying po'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes/ bya ba'i gsang sngags la 'jug pa dang
169b2(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi sgo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis theg pa po'i gnas/ rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
169b3(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ston pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po lta bu mang ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i gsang ba chen po'i byang chub sos dpa' sa legs par brjod pa/ byang chub sem
169b4(rgyud): dpa'i mig 'phrul/ byang chub sem dpa'i sgyu mas rnam par rol pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha~Md kyi dam tshig/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kyang yongasu mi shes sems can gzhan
169b5(rgyud): bdag gis shes par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de bzhin du byang chub sem dpa' sem dpa' chen po gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigasu 'byung ba dang / de bzhin gshegs
169b6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlabs pa dag ni me tog ste/ rdo rje chen po'i ye shes dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba gsang ba'i mchog yod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sog
169b7(rgyud): pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des 'grin cig tu tshig smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dus lagaso// bde bar gshegs pa 'di ni tshad lagaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das sngon gyi spyod
169b8(rgyud): pa yang dag par ston pa sgrub pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i tingange 'dzin la snyom par zhugs nas sdong gyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsung so//
170a1(rgyud): byag ##/ nam sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta thag te b+h+ya/ sarba tha kham/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs ma thag tu// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i snying gi
170a2(rgyud): 'grin cig tu tshig smras pa/ kye ma ye shes babyed pa che/ bas blan bdeb mchog thob pa/ kun kya de'i dbang dubya/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de mtshar tse ci/
170a3(rgyud): tu gyur par mkhyen nas/ dpal be'u las/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad du snang bar bya ste/
170a4(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dpal be'u nyid du zhug so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod
170a5(rgyud): pa 'di thams cad du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa snyan par smon lam btab nas/ gnod sbyin 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzungs te/ dbus kyi mdzam bu'i gling mi 'jed
170a6(rgyud): 'dir/ lcang lo can du gnod sbyin sde dpon chen po// 'brog gnas kyi gnas pa de'i 'od zer gyis snang ba de snang bar gyur pas/ mig dang bzhin rgyas par gyur nas/ ched du brjod pa/
170a7(rgyud): 'di ched du brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa bsams kyi mi khyab pa zhing yid la byed pa cing cang mi zer bar 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/ byang chub sems
170a8(rgyud): dpa' kun tu bzang po 'ong bar gyur pa'i banga' mdzad do// tshigasu bcad pa yang gsungs so// sems can gang dag zla bzhin chur gshegs cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa byin brlabs byan
170b1(rgyud): chub bzhol// bas ma yas mnyam nyid legs rtogs khong chung khyed/ rtag tu sangs rgyas byas bzo chur shog cig/ dus sum mnyam pa nyid la rtag gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje mnog
170b2(rgyud): tshur shog/ phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas ji snyed cig/ sems can don mdzad bsam yas gzugs mnga' ba/ de dag ma lus don gyi mdun 'gro khyod/ gsang ba'i bdag po sems can mchog
170b3(rgyud): tshur shog/ gsang ba'i dam pa sems can snying po chur/ 'dul bka' rtag 'dul dbang thob tshur shog cig/ rten 'di 'byung las skyes pa po// dus dang chod shes tshur shog cig/ dam
170b4(rgyud): pa'i thob pa tshur shog cig/ dam pa sbyin byed chur shog cig/ dpal byed dpal sdad dpal ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa sras chur shog/ sems can bzang po stobs po che/ rdo rje lta bus
170b5(rgyud): chur shog cig/ sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med pa/ stobs can rnams kyi mchog chur shog/ rtag tu srid pa gsum po'i// snying dga' byed pa chur shog cig/ yang dag lam ni ston byed pa//

171a3(rgyud): sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsungs par zhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di gsungs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang
171a4(rgyud): pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa/ grogs po dag tshur gshegs bcom ldan 'das de la lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bskur bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i

171b2(rgyud): kun tu bzang po de'i tshe rgyan sa tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyud mthun pa ston pa la snyoms par zhugaso// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la
171b3(rgyud): snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mod las rnam par snang mdzad kyi brgyan bkod pa'i khang pa rtsegs pa dang / stong gsum stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs shing
171b4(rgyud): rgya che ba nor bu rin po che'i ka ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma bzug pa/ sgo khang dang / rta babs dang / stegs bu du mas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu'i gling chu bo'i gser la/ shing sa la la sogs
171b5(rgyud): ba lta bu byas pas rnam par spras pa// mtha' 'thar phug nor bus mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig gi sna gnyis gi dri pas bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba steng /
171b6(rgyud): gi bar snang yongs su bskor ba/ lha'i ras bcos ma dang / dar gi lda ldi mang pos bres pas mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i sil snyan pheg rdod cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa/

171b8(rgyud): tha res kun du bres pas/ phyogs bye dur ru chen pos leg par spras gakan tsa li da ka ltar reg nang de ba/ dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pa legs par bsten pa/ lha'i rin po che'i them smras
172a1(rgyud): phyag dab / kyi phreng gi rnam par spras pa/ ngang pa dang bzhad dang / ngur pa dang / shang shang de'u dang / ne rtso dang / ri skyegs dang / rma bya dang / khrung khrung dang / bya'i tshogs rnams sgra 'byin pa dang / me tog ud pa/
172a2(rgyud): la dang / ka mu ta dang / pad ma dkar po dang / dri mchog dang / pad ma dang / ka la ra kha dang / yan lag rgyad dang ldan pa/ chus gang ba'i rdzing bu byang chub sems dpa' yongs su sprad pa dang / lha'i rtsa ni deng
172a3(rgyud): sbrul gyi snying po rdzas kyis snying po can dag gis kun tu mdzes par byas pa/ kun tu rgyun mi chad par khang pa rtsegs pa der/ lha'i me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sra rdol dang /
172a4(rgyud): sa rdol chen po dang / me tog gi char mngon par phad pa/ a ka ru nag po'i sprin mang pos khebs pa/ rnam par mdzes pa byung bar gyur te/ khang pa rtsegs pa de'i nang du/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
172a5(rgyud): kyi so so'i gnas bsam pa lta ba bzhin du las kyi skyed pa dag mngon par sprul to// khang partsegs pa de dag re re yang rin po che dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa/ yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug rin po che'i rgyal po
172a6(rgyud): la sogs pa/ ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyad par bya ba/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dag bkod do// rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i
172a7(rgyud): / khang pa rtsegs pa thams cad gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan sgreng ba mdzes par byaso// khang pa rtsegs pa de dag du yang / pad ma'i snying po seng ge'i khri rnams sprul to// khang pa glegs pa thams

172b1(rgyud): kyis rnam par dag cing / gsal ba ste/ bai dur r+ya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams can gzugs bstan gyi tshul du bsnang ngo // dbus su ni bcom/
172b2(rgyud): ldan 'das seng ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyis bkod pa'i snying po/ rin po che'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to// sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'i yo byad kyi sprin ltar
172b3(rgyud): dag par khang brtsegs pa der kun tu mngon par sprul ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis spyod pa rgya mtsho rnam par spyad pa'i
172b4(rgyud): phyir ro// de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / gasnyen bkur bya ba dang / chos nyan pa'i phyir// gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen

172b6(rgyud): rtsegs pa de lag pa gnyis kas blangs ste/ steng gi bar snang la phab/ shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stag po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

172b8(rgyud): khyab par snang bar gyur nas/ gang dag 'khor 'dir 'dus shing/ 'khod pa'i lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho byi chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dedag

173a2(rgyud): nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ma mtshan du gyur te/ de'i snying gis phan chur rnam par ltas nas cad mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'

173a4(rgyud): pa mthong nas/ de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das
173a5(rgyud): bdi nas dpal tshad 'bum phrag brgya bcu rtsa brgyad kyi steng gi bar stang la lha me lhan ne lhang nge gang zhing // bcom ldan 'das rtogs par bka' ba brjod par dka' ba 'di ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang /

173a8(rgyud): nyan pa'i phyir 'ongs te/ nga la chod pa bya ba'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa
173b1(rgyud): bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi spyod pa'i sgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa ste/ 'di ni gang gi yon tan de bskal pa brgyar yang mthar rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lham me lhan ne lhang nger 'dun
173b2(rgyud): go/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu 'dri'o//

173b4(rgyud): nas shing sa la bAr sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad du lha'i me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang / phreng ba dang /
