174a2(rgyud): lo// bzod pa zhi zhing ma skyes la// sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yi// gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten du// mnga' bdag khyed ni rtag tu gda'// khyod ni sems can srog ma lags//
174a3(rgyud): gang zag kun bzhi khyod ma lags/ dus dang rang bzhin las ma byung // ji ltar ma lhags ci ma lags// khyod ni 'jig rten nas byung ba tsam// sgyu ma lta bur dngos po yang // chos rnam
174a4(rgyud): sgyu ma lta bur ni// thugs su khyod chung rkang gnyis mchog/ khyod na ngo bo nyid kyis stong // stong pa nyid kyang mchis ma lags// stong dang mi stong rnams par grol// nam mkha' 'dra la phyag
174a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// g.yog 'khor dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das
174a6(rgyud): la lan brgya stong du mas bskor ba byas ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo 'os phyag 'tshal nas// bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing phyogs cig tu 'dug go// de nas khang pa
174a7(rgyud): brtsegs pa de dang // bkod pa de dag dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa de dag las theg pa chen po'i thog ma'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig pa nas gcig du 'u ra zhes grag so// bzod nas
174a8(rgyud): zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// chos nyid cig pu dag pa ste// khyed cag the rtsom dgos spongs la// kye ma 'o 'di la brtson par gyis// theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni// sngon gyi spyod pa bla na
174b1(rgyud): med// spyod pa'i rgyal ba skyid che ba/ kun gyis shin du thob par gyis// sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams// yongasu dag pa'i rgyu yis ni// rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni// rtag tu 'di na mdzes
174b2(rgyud): la ltos// ston pa gang du mi gnas lo// gang du sprad par mi gnas kyang / gang dag spyod pa rnam sbyangs pa// de dag kun la gnas par 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni//
174b3(rgyud): rna ba de bzhin sna dang ni/ lce dang de bzhin lus dang yang // yid du snang ba ma lagaso// dbang po 'byung ba'i spyod pa ni/ gang gis tshe nas spangs gyur pa// de che bcom ldan rnam snang
174b4(rgyud): mdzad/ rnal 'byor can gyi rtag du mthong // ring ba ma lags nyi ma lags// nang dang phyi yi ma lags te// rtag tu na mkha' 'dra gnas pa// rnal 'byor pa ni chen por snang // de ltar byang chub
174b5(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos tshig su gcad pa dag brjod ma thag tu/ stan las langs te bla gos phrags pa cig tu bzar te sgra smo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la
174b6(rgyud): tsug te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logasu thal mo sbar ba btud de bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan
174b7(rgyud): 'das kyi bdag la skabs phye nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol
174b8(rgyud): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ci dang ci 'dod dris shig/ ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung
175a1(rgyud): byab dab / #bstan pas khyod sems rang bar bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun bzang pos bcom ldan 'das
175a2(rgyud): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba 'di chos gang gi tshig bla dgas lags/ theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de spyod ni ji
175a3(rgyud): lta bu zhig lags// spyod pa de rtogs pa khong du chud pa ni su zhig lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
175a4(rgyud): bo la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ sems can chen po legs so// legs so// sems can chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'dri ba yang legs so// de'i phyir legs par
175a5(rgyud): nyon la yid la zung shig/ ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang // theg pa chen po 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la theg pa chen po zhes bya ba 'di bsam gyis mi khyab
175a6(rgyud): pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas go// de 'jug pa ni byang chub bo// rigs kyi bu gnas zhes bya ba 'di ni gzhi'o// de yang snying rje chen po mngon du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ste/ sems can 'dul ba'i
175a7(rgyud): dbang nye bar bzung nas// yul dang dus kyi dbang gyi de'i rnam par ston pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis ste// 'dus byas kyi rab tu phye ba dang / 'dus ma byas
175a8(rgyud): kyis rab tu bye ba'o// de la 'dus byas kyis rab du phye ba ni// spyod pa'i ngo bo 'dus ma byas kyi rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po nyid kyi theg pa chen po'o// rigs kyi bu bzhan yang 'dus ma byas
175b1(rgyud): ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do// rigs kyi bu 'dus ma byas ni mi skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// stong pa nyid rang kyi ngo bo'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan
175b2(rgyud): yang spyod pa'i ngo bo theg pa chen po gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam kyis/ yul dang dus
175b3(rgyud): dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung bya ba dang las kyi kun du spang ba'i tshul gyis 'dog pa ste// rigs kyi bu 'di ni spyod pa'i ngo bo nyid theg pa chen po'o// rigs kyi bu
175b4(rgyud): de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen po gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dgas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni bsam
175b5(rgyud): gyi mi khyab pa nyid kyis tshig bla dgas so// bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o// 'dus ma byas gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis la mi ltos pa ste/
175b6(rgyud): de la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gnas pa'i ngo bo gang yang med do// mi bdag pa'i ngo bo yang med la de yod pa med do// gang la spyod pa med pa de brjod par bya ba ma yin no// gang brjod
175b7(rgyud): bar bya ba ma yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o// dngos po thams cad dang bral ba ni mi khrugs pa'o// gang mi khrugs pa de chos so// chos gang yin pa de/ de bzhin gsheg
175b8(rgyud): ba'o// mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'o// gang de bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas bde bden pa'o// rigs kyi bu bden pa gang yin pa yod pa'o// yod pa gang yin/
176a1(rgyud): bde brdzun ma yin pa'o// gang rdzun ma yin pa de yang dag pa'o// yang dgu pa gang yin pa de chos nyid do// chos ning gang yin pa de mi tog rnam par mi rtog pa'o/
176a2(rgyud): gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye sheso// ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de btags pa'o// btag
176a3(rgyud): pa gang yin pa de rtog pa'o// rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bya ba stan te// kun rdzob yod pas spyod par btag so// btags pa yod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
176a4(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung bar bstan to// sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bzhi bam par byed pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'ang
176a5(rgyud): ba chen po la thug pa'i bar dang / gnas pa dang / 'byung ba dang / 'jig pa dang skye ba dang / rgas pa dang / na ba dang / 'byor pa dang / rgud pa 'jig rten du kun du ston to// rigs kyi bu de las/
176a6(rgyud): ba dus dang / yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas/ spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor btsos te/ thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnam kyi sems can rnams la chos ston to// chos ston pa de ni yang
176a7(rgyud): dag pa'i thul yin te/ theg pa gcig yang dag par ston par byed pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe// de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu chos nyid
176a8(rgyud): yin pa de la ni gdags pa 'am// rnam par rig pa med cing mi dmigs ste/ ye shes snang bar mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// de la ni yod pa yang med// mi spyod pa yang med/ bslab pa yang med
176b1(rgyud): bslab pa ma yin pa yang med do// de la ni lus sam ngag gam yid kyis 'jug pa 'am zlog pa mi dmigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'am// sangs rgyas zhes bya ba
176b2(rgyud): 'am/ nyan thos zhes bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am// chos zhes bya ba 'am/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba dang / klu zhes bya ba dang / gnod sbyin zhes bya
176b3(rgyud): ba 'am/ dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram/ yod ces bya ba 'am/ med ces bya ba 'am/
176b4(rgyud): bsod nams zhes bya ba 'am// bsod nams ma yin pa zhes bya ba 'am// 'khor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am/ 'ching ba zhes bya ba dang // thar pa zhes bya
176b5(rgyud): ba med do// rigs kyi bu de la ni/ dus zhes bya ba 'am tshad ces bya ba 'am// ska cig ces bya ba 'am/ yud tsam ces bya ba ma/ thang cig ces bya ba med do// de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am/
176b6(rgyud): skam zhes bya ba 'am/ nyi ma zhes bya ba 'am/ me zhes bya ba 'am/ rlung zhes bya ba 'am/ chu zhes bya ba dang / sa zhes bya ba dang // mtshan mo zhes bya ba 'am// nyin mo zhes bya ba dang / du tshig
176b7(rgyud): zhes bya ba 'am/ lo khyud zhes bya ba 'am// zla ba zhes bya ba yang med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na rtogs pas rtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar lhung ba ci snyed pa dang / 'jig
176b8(rgyud): rten pas btags pa'i sgo ji snyed pa de dag thams cad/ de la mi 'byung zhing med de/ de mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te/
177a1(rgyud): phyag dngade la gnyis su mi 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nam mkha' gnyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ na mkha'i khams ni gnyi su med pa'o// rigs kyi bu
177a2(rgyud): de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa de ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
177a3(rgyud): rnams kyi spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnamasu ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ spyod pa ma yin pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o// bslab pa ma yin
177a4(rgyud): na ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i slab pa'o// thog pa med pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o// brtson pa med pa rnams ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson pa'o// 'dul ba
177a5(rgyud): ma yin/ pa ni 'dul ba'o// gdags pa med pa ni gdags pa'o// mthong ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas mthong ba'o// bsnyen skar mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bskur byed pa'o// mi nyan
177a6(rgyud): pa ni chos nyan pa'o// khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o// 'gro ba med pa ni 'gro ba'o// gnas med pa ni gnas so// stong pa ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid do// byang chub sems dpa'
177a7(rgyud): ni/ shes pa med pa ni thob pa med pa mngon par rtogs pa med pa mngon sum du byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu rnams grangs 'di ltar shes par byas ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni spyad pa spyod
177a8(rgyud): pa'o// gang du yang mi chags po// gong du yang mi chags pa'o// gang du yang rjes su chags pa med do// gang du yang khong khro ba med pa'o// gang du yang zhes sdang med do// des mi snang ma rmod
177b1(rgyud): phyin ci ma logs pas// rtag tu mnyam par bzhags te/ rnam par mi rtog pa zhi ba/ legs par gnas pa zla mi g.yo ba/ rab tu mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun
177b2(rgyud): dang sems can gyi don bya ba la mi skyo ba dus gsum du yang sgyid lug pa med pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/ na mkha'i khams ni rdul lam/ du ba 'am/ sprin gyis kun nas nyon
177b3(rgyud): mongs par mi 'gyur// sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ na mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di
177b4(rgyud): lta bu spyad pa yang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur/ kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor
177b5(rgyud): bkod pa'i rgyan/ rdo rje chen po'i rtog gi/ spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs gshegs pa'i spyod pas bsod nams la brtson pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs bzung bar
177b6(rgyud): bya/ glag par bya/ gzhan dag la yang rgya chen yang dag par bshad par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos/
177b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ngo mtshar to bde bar gshegs pa ngo mtshar to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gang rnam lam du grags par gyur
177b8(rgyud): ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag pa rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yid la bgyid pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ bcom ldan/
178a1(rgyud): dada'adas de dag ni theg pa chen po// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lag so// bcom ldan 'das de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med
178a2(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par 'phrul pa'i gnas bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i tshul la skal pa mchis pa lags so// bdag la thugs brtse
178a3(rgyud): bar dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par 'phral du 'bras bu mang bar bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
178a4(rgyud): cang mi gsungs par bzhugs te/ rdo rje chen po'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma thag du/ de nas
178a5(rgyud): de'i mos las phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'jam thams cad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra bsgrags te/ gsu cig tu rdo rje rin po che 'bar
178a6(rgyud): ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i 'byung gnas/ rdo rje sems dpa' yi ge brjod cing / shing sa la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang /
178a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byin na/ rdo rje chen po pad+ma'i gdan la dkyil mo dkrung bcas de bzhug so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ bcom
178a8(rgyud): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes snyun gsol te/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang ldan nam/ mtsho 'am bde ba la reg par gnas sam/
178b1(rgyud): zhes bsrung gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams
178b2(rgyud): cad bsgrub nas// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi brlabs pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungaso// na ma sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha oM badz+ra ka ru ba sahA/
178b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas/ sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pa zhes
178b4(rgyud): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugaso// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan che'o// snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
178b5(rgyud): la blta zhing 'khod/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan che snyam du rtse cig du rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
178b6(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhus pa gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas/ rnam
178b7(rgyud): par 'dren pa rnams mi gsungs/ bde gsheg sras las rdo rje'i dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'/ gsang sngags spyod pa'i ye shes te// theg pa chen po go 'phang mchog/ der ni thams
178b8(rgyud): cad mkhyen nyid dang // don kun grub pa'i spyod pa thob// gsang sngags spyod la 'byung ba yi// theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen// sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis// nags
179a1(rgyud): tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshad// sa la'i rgyal mtshan nyam dga' che// spyod pa yang dag brten pa'i gnas// sngon gyi spyod las byung 'gyur ba/ gsang
179a2(rgyud): sngags ye shes las byung bshad// gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs gsang rgyas// de bzhin gshegs dag ma byon dang // mgon po gang dag da ltar byung // rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs pa
179a3(rgyud): rnams/ de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs nas// gsang sngags las la 'byung ba yi// theg pa chen po dbang bskur 'di// bde gshegs sras la rab tu rtsol// sangs rgyas drang
179a4(rgyud): srong chen po la// kun gyis dbang ni bdag lags so// 'jig rten phan par 'tshal ba dang / rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol bar 'tshal// bstan pa kun la srung ba dang // dam
179a5(rgyud): chos rtogs nas bgyid slad dang // bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug du// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur rtsol// gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi// theg chen ston la khong du
179a6(rgyud): chud// sngon gyi smon lam nges byung ba// sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lags// thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di// sangs rgyas 'dra tsam ci zhig te// bde gsheg sras po chags
179a7(rgyud): med pa byang chub mthar thug dbang thob lags// gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun du// 'khor 'di byin gyis brlab lags na// gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal na/
179a8(rgyud): ci las mi gsung 'gyur cing bzhugs// thams cad ngo mtshar 'dzin 'gyur te// bde bar rtogs la brtson par gnas// dpa' bo che rnams the tshom dang // de bzhin yid gnyis
179b1(rgyud): gsal du gsol// de ni dus la bab lags na byi bshol ma mdzad bshad du gsol// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab
179b2(rgyud): par mkhyen nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la gsungs pa/ 'dren pa rnams kyi gang sangs rgyas/
179b3(rgyud): chos nyid 'di ni gcig tu mchog/ rtag tu mnyam par bzhag rnams kyi// rab tu sgribs te rtogs bya ba// de nas de gzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la sogs pas/ shing la sna tshog
179b4(rgyud): kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nag tshal stug po kun tu de bzhin rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyam bkod pa gru bzhi lham pa sgo bzhi gtod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi'i ra bas bskor ba/
179b5(rgyud): sgo khang dang rta babs dang steg bus rgyan pa/ steng du rin po che'i bla re bres pa/ rin po che'i dril bu 'phyang ba/ rin po che'i sna lnga'i srad bus bres par byin gyis brlabs te/ dbus su rdo rje
179b6(rgyud): pad ma'i khri dang / phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas bskor ba/ rdo rje phyi ras kun tu bskor ba dang // rdo rje'i phyi rgyab du ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang / rdo rje sras pus mdzes pa dang / rdo rje
179b7(rgyud): bcings pa dang / rdo rje phur bu dag gdab pa dang / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas/ steng gi gtsug thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od
179b8(rgyud): zer byung ngo // 'od zer de dag byung nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la snang bar byas te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug du zhug so// de bzhi/
180a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag du/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas/ rab tu bga' ste/ thogs pa med pa'i stong
180a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ bi shA mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha a pra ti ha ta ba la/ ma ha badz+ra a nya ka ra na na mo stu ste saha/ de nas thogs pa med pa'i stobs rdo rje
180a3(rgyud): snying pos smras ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ting 'dzin dang / bzungs pa dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa dang /
180a4(rgyud): stong pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa nyid chen po mtha' las byas pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / de la sogs pa pha rol du phyin
180a5(rgyud): pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs kyis rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag du byin no// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis
180a6(rgyud): kun tu bzang po'i lag du rdo rje byin ma thag du/ de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rnams su sangs rgyas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ de bzhin
180a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang lha
180a8(rgyud): ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang // mi 'am ci dang / lto bye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / thams cad kyi 'grin cig du/ e ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di
180b1(rgyud): ni lag na rdo rje'o// lag na rdo rje zhes brjod do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las// bam po gsum pa'o//
180b2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas// yang gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba
180b3(rgyud): tha gu h+ya badz+ra d+ha ra swA hA/ de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsung ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang // sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mas cad
180b4(rgyud): du gsang ba'i bdag po'o// gsang po zhes bya ba gcig pus gcig du 'ur ba zhes sgrags nas/ 'di lta ste/ snying po 'di yi mthu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
180b5(rgyud): byin gyi brlabs kyi stobs kyis byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugaso//
180b6(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brtan pa kun du bsrung ba dang / 'gro ba yongasu skyob pa dang // snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya'i snying po gsungs pa// na ma sarba ta
180b7(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra d+ha ra b+hi d+hi ma bi kir/ bi ka ra sad+ma// rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying po gsung ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / sang rgyu
180b8(rgyud): kyi 'khor kyi 'khor thams cad du/ rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang // 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / de
181a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang // byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad nas/ sems dang po
181a2(rgyud): bskyed pa rnams dang / las dang po rnams dang / sems can thams cad kyi rgya ba dang / mdun dang nyal ba dang // gnyid log pa 'am chos ston pa 'am byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs
181a3(rgyud): rgyas pa 'am/ sems can gyi don byed pa 'am// sprul pa rab byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung nas gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i cho ga shes pa rdo rje cod pan kun tu sna //
181a4(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ phyogs rdo rje bcings pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje snying po mchog gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha dig pa badz+ra Ta Ta Ta Ta sad// phyogs
181a5(rgyud): rdo rje bcings pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ phyogs bcu na sems can ma rung ba thams cad rdo rje bcings pas bcings par snang ngo // de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi/
181a6(rgyud): sa'i rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba'i snying po gsung so// nam sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha Sha Tha Tha tha dza tra sahA// sa ston gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sem
181a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di/ rdo rje rtogs tog do// zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig nas cig du 'ur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog
181a8(rgyud): gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta spos te yang Ta sad/ sa 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'bum thams
181b1(rgyud): cad dang / sa 'og gi phrag thams cad du kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ sa 'og rdo rje zhes sgra cig nas cig du 'ur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin
181b2(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis/ rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyis 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ta t+ye b+hu// sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tshin d+ha/ sarba bIr+ya
181b3(rgyud): dar ga ti ma pra sa ra d+ha ra ma la pa ta b+hi tsa ya sahA// rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsung ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rigs 'argya da
181b4(rgyud): gyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ rig sngags 'chang kyi 'gro ba gcod pa'o// zhes sgra cig nas cig du 'ur zhes
181b5(rgyud): gragaso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sprin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po 'di gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra yag k+Sha ni 'gro hu
181b6(rgyud): swa hA// gnod sprin gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsung ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / gnod srin gyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems
181b7(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje zhes sgra cig du 'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i rtogs rgyal
181b8(rgyud): mtshan zhes bya'i snying po gsungs pa// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ha ra na ga badz+ra dza satwa/ de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsung ma thag du/ 'jig rten
182a1(rgyud): gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / klu'i gnas thams cad du// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje ni klu'i rdo rje zhes
182a2(rgyud): sgra cig nas cig du 'ur zhes gragaso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba tA tha ga te b+ha// na ma sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba ma tha badz+ra ba
182a3(rgyud): ni hA/ rdo rje chen pos dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag du/ de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang dri za'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa'
182a4(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes cig nas cig du 'ur zhes grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po rnam na mkha' lding dang po'i snying po
182a5(rgyud): gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra bi da ta dza ma ka ra haM ha sahA// de nas rdo rje na mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams
182a6(rgyud): rab 'byam thams cad dang / na mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje chen po 'di ni/ na mkha' lding gi dbang po rdo rje'o// sgra cig
182a7(rgyud): nas cig du bur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi 'am ci'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thAg te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra ki na na ra dan ta pi tsa ya sha
182a8(rgyud): ba ta swA hA/ de nas mi 'am ci'i snying po'i cho ga 'di gsung ma zag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / mi 'am ci dang gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa'
182b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di mi 'am ci'i rdo rje'o// zhes sgra gcig nas cig du 'ur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje lto byed chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/
182b2(rgyud): na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha ma ho ra ra ga ba badz+ra dza la ya swAhA/ de nas lto phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam dang / lto bye chen
182b3(rgyud): bo'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ lto phye chen po'i rdo rje'i ces cig nas gcig du 'ur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin gsheg
182b4(rgyud): pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+he/ sarba ba badz+ra rak+Sha sa kru ra da ha ba tsu DuT+TA D+haM sahA// de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po
182b5(rgyud): 'di gsung ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / srin po'i gnas tham cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin po'i rdo rje
182b6(rgyud): zhes sgra cig nas cig du bur ces gragaso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba tha badz+ra hi he swA hA/
182b7(rgyud): de nas rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i snying po gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa'
182b8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra cig nas cig du 'ung zhes grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i 'byung ba'i snying po gsung
183a1(rgyud): @ga na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ha le hu le badz+ra ma hA b+hU te sha ra sad/ rdo rje chen po 'byung ba'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi kham
183a2(rgyud): rab 'byam thams cad du/ 'byung po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje chen po zhes sgra cig nas gcig du 'ur zhes gragaso//
183a3(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i sha za'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ma ha badz+ra bi sha tsa hri da yang ga ma mi tsi ma ci ma
183a4(rgyud): ta ma ta ma badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / sha za'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems
183a5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ sha za rdo rje'o zhes sgra cig nas cig du'ur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po sha za'i snying po gsungs pa/
183a6(rgyud): na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra du ti bi shatsI kr-i ri mi ri le sahA/ rdo rje chen po sha za mo'i snying po gsung ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang /
183a7(rgyud): sha za mo'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sha za me'i rdo rje ni sha za mo'i'o zhes sgra cig nas cig tu 'ur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin
183a8(rgyud): gau shegs pa de dag gis rdo rje srin mo'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+he/ sarba tha thadz+ra ka la re k+Sha si ti mi ri swA hA/ rdo rje srin me'i snying po 'di gsung ma
183a9(rgyud): zag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ srin mo'i rdo rje'o// zhes sgra cig nas gcig du bur zhes
183b1(rgyud): gragaso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha 'o ha ra ka badz+ra hi si swa/ yang gnon po yi snying po
183b2(rgyud): 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / gnon po'i gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// lag na rdo rje 'di ni
183b3(rgyud): gnon po'i rdo rje'o// zhes sgra cig nas cig du 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gri bas gnon rab du 'jig pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te
183b4(rgyud): b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha gi li ki li badz+ra si ta hi swahA/ grib gnon rab tu 'jig pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / grib gnon gyi gnas
183b5(rgyud): thams cad du kye mo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di grib non gyi rdo rje zhes sgra gcig nas cig du bur zhes gragaso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis brjed
183b6(rgyud): byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA gr-i gr-i s+phar ra na sa hA/ brjod byed kyi gdon 'gog pa'i rdo rje snying po gsungs ma thag tu
183b7(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / brjed byed kyi gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ brjed byed kyis rdo rje'o
183b8(rgyud): zhes sgra cig du 'ur zhes grags so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ yang gdon thams cad zlog pa'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/
183b9(rgyud): sarba tha s+thi ra badz+ra sarba gra ha ni kri ta na dza ni la bal po d+ha ri ra ta rata swAhA/ gdon thams cad zlog pa'i rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams
184a1(rgyud): cad dang / gdon thams cad kyis gnas thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ gdon thams cad bzlog pa'i rdo rje
184a2(rgyud): zhes sgra gcig nas gcig du 'ur zhes gragaso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu
184a3(rgyud): khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ba badz+ra badz+ra saM sad/ lha la sogs pa rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / lha la sogs pa thams cad kyi gnas
184a4(rgyud): rnams su/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na la rdo rje 'di ni/ lha la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'o// rdo rje'o zhes sgra cig nas cig du 'ur ces grag so// yang de
184a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ nad kyi gdon tshar gcod pa'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+h+ye kha badz+ra badz+ra a mri dang sa pa swahA/ ci
184a6(rgyud): sman chen po rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / sre sman chen po'i gnas rnams/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sem
184a7(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ rtsi sman gyi rdo rje zhes sgra cig nas gcig du 'ur zhes grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis nad kyi gnod pa gsal ba'i rdo rje'i
184a8(rgyud): snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tA Ta Ta Ta badz+ra swa hA// nad gsal ba'i phyir rdo rje snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab
184b1(rgyud): 'byam thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni// nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i sgra gcig nas gcig du 'ur zhes grag so//
184b2(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rga ba 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha a mri tod b+ha ma badz+ra la la la ya sahA// rga ba
184b3(rgyud): 'gog pa'i snying po gsungs ma thag du// 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ rga ba 'gogs pa'i rdo rje
184b4(rgyud): zhes sgra gcig nas gcig du bur zhes gragaso// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'chi ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs so// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+ya/
184b5(rgyud): sarba tha a ti badz+ra dz+wa ya dz+wa ya ha ha sa hA// 'chi ba rab du zhi bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du/ kye ma byang chub sems
184b6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni/ 'chi ba las rgyal ba'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra cig nas gcig du 'ur ces grags so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rgud pa'i gdon pazlog
184b7(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs pa/ na ma sarba ta ma ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ \u0f7fsarba tha par ma badz+ra sarba shi ya a b+hU ti yan de ma ku ru ni ka ta ka sahA/ rgud pa thams cad 'gog pa'i rdo rje'i snying po
184b8(rgyud): 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad du// kye ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'din/ rgud pa thams cad 'gogs pa'i rdo rje zhes
185a1(rgyud): sgra gcig nas cig du 'ur zhes grag so// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i chen po'i stobs thogs pa med pa'i rdo rje'i snyi bro gsungs
185a2(rgyud): pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA oM pa badz+ra tsakra sa ti du ma sa hA/ de nas 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po'i gsang sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag du/ 'jig rten
185a3(rgyud): gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i gnas thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za
185a4(rgyud): dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci'i dang / lto bye chen po dang srin po dang 'byung po dang / sha za la sogs pa'i gnas thams cad du/ rdo rje chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba zhes bya ba'i
185a5(rgyud): sgra cig nas gcig du 'ur ces grag so// yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje 'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying po 'di gsung ba/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA ga brdzi
185a6(rgyud): shi hUM sahA// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis yang 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po la sogs pa/ rdo rje snying po rnams byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la byin te/ byin
185a7(rgyud): nas kyang 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi srin stug pa 'dra ba chen pos/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang / shing sa la sna tshogs rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i
185a8(rgyud): nags chal sdug po dang // thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byas nas chos gsum gyi byin gyis brlobs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje byin gyis/
185a9(rgyud): brlabs nas// chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin du bsgyur nas mi snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas kyang de'i tshe byang chub
185b1(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba chen po'i rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen por lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ro// ting
185b2(rgyud): nge 'dzin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma las byas pa'i rdo rje khyod la byin no// 'khor lo bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje khyod byin gyis brlab so// rdo rje'i snying po thams cad khyod la
185b3(rgyud): bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khyod la bstan pa thams cad kyi don bya ba dang / srung ba snang ngo // khyod sngon gyi smon lam chen po yongs su rdzogaso// rigs kyi
185b4(rgyud): bu da rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul nges par ston cig/ rigs kyi bu lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po shod cig/ de skad ces bka stsal pa dang / lag na rdo rje bcom
185b5(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// chos kyi rjes ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du 'tshal lo// bcom ldan mchog du ngo mtshar thob pa dang / bdag rnam par rgyal ba'i chos dam
185b6(rgyud): bathob pa ni// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis bdag la thugs brtse bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems
