215b6(rgyud): stong pa nyid chen pos lus rnam par bskyed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ lag na rdo rje'i snying du 'thad pa sha stag go// de nas gsang
215b7(rgyud): ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes ting nge 'dzin las langs te gsang sngags smras pa// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra sa mod b+ha ba badz+ra pa ni pri ya sahA/ rdo rje sde
215b8(rgyud): sngagaso// rnam sasad lag g+ha/ sarba bu'i bya/ sarbab bcwas thubapa brjes su gu rang gamasas/ rdzalag parang gi sdig so// nams la bya/ sam bu la bya sa
216a1(rgyud): tsi ti badz+ra she kha ra badz+ra she kha ra/ pa lam b+hi ta ra ha ra sarba/ rdo rje me tog gi sngag so// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA ki ri tri badz+ra d+ha ri bi shud
216a2(rgyud): d+ha a ga satwa/ rdo rje cod pan gyis sngags so// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra badz+ra mu taM a gi ta mu ti huM hUM hUM/ sahA/ rdo rje gtsug nas 'byung gi sngags so// na ma sarba
216a3(rgyud): ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+hA/ sarba tha ku mu ma/ a tsi ta badz+ra sam b+ha ba sahA/ rdo rje me tog gi sngags so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+yo/ sarba tha badz+ra ba ra d+ha ri/ u ra brjod
216a4(rgyud): ta ma swa hA/ rdo rje brang gi sngag so// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra pa ni pra ya sa sad ta hi ta ka ra swA hA/ gzhon nu rdo rje sdug gi sngagaso// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba
216a5(rgyud): mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tsan tra badz+ra ang ga su na daM sahA/ gzhon nu rdo rje zla ba'i sngagaso// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra tsa kra man Ta la saM b+hU ta badz+ra b+hA ba sahA/ gzhon
216a6(rgyud): nu rdo rje smin ma'i sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra a gra d+ha ri shud tra d+ha ra da ra swahA/ rdo rje na mchog gi sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/
216a7(rgyud): sarba tha badz+ra lo ta na badz+ra dz+nyA na tsak+Shu ra dang sahA/ rdo rje mig gi sngagaso// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra ba ga d+ha ri ma no dza d+ha ra d+ha ra swahA/ rdo rje shugs 'chang gi sngags/
216a8(rgyud): na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khaM b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra pa ga d+ha a d+ha ra badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu la ya swAhA/ rdo rje rten gyi sngags so// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha ha ru badz+ra
216b1(rgyud): du ru du ru/ dza li ta mu ti sarba/ rdo rje gces pa 'dzin gyi sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ badz+ra aM ku ra badz+ra ki du sa ra sahA/ rdo rje mche ba'i sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga
216b2(rgyud): te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha sam b+ho d+hi badz+ra b+ha ra/ pra ya badz+ra gi ti sahA/ rdo rje glu'i sngags so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha dz+wa la ta/ badz+ra mu ti badz+ra d+ha ra sahA/
216b3(rgyud): gzhon nu rdo rje 'bar ba'i sngagaso// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya sarba tha te tsa a sa la ma ba ta mu khi d+ha ka sa hA/ gzhon nu rdo rje gnya shing 'dzin gi sngagaso// de bzhin gshes
216b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa lag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje las yang dag par 'byung ba sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum sgyu ma'i ting nge 'dzin la dbang
216b5(rgyud): bsgyur ba/ gnod pa thams cad 'gog pa lus la srung ba chen po'i sras bu thogs pa/ rtag du bdag gi zhes brjod pa'i sgra phyung ngo // na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe
216b6(rgyud): b+ha/ sarba tha ta badz+ra shu la ni badz+ra ma tang gi/ a nan tha mu khi/ dza ti le dz+wa yan tring/ ru ti mu ti s+phu ran ti sahA/ ma ma ki'i sngagaso// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA
216b7(rgyud): su ni shi ye badz+ra ma li ne/ badz+ra ad b+hud de/ b+han d+ha ya si man ta sha da sha~M badz+ra b+han d+ha nin/ g+hu du g+hu du/ dza bI dzahi/ ma bi lam b+ha b+ha ga wa tri ba ra ti/ sA ra sma ra badz+ra saM gau ti satwa/
216b8(rgyud): rdo rje 'tshams kyi sngag so// nams rba ta pa ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ba mAn nga sangs de ga ya badz+ra si tra ma sarba/ rdong snying po 'dzin gyi sngag so// na ma sarba ta tha ga to//
217a1(rgyud): @b+hu/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra sid ta ta kra dz+ra sahA/ rdo rje gdugs dkar po can gyi sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+hi tata
217a2(rgyud): ha badz+ra bi dan d+ha rang g+has yas hA/ rdo rje rin chen pa dan chen po'i sngag so// na ma sarba ta thAg te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba rang nagu ta 'arjod pa sa hA/ rdorje khang pa brtsegs pa'i
217a3(rgyud): sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra pad mod b+ha ba/ badz+ra a sen badz+ra na dang sarba/ rdo rje pad ma gdan gyi sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/
217a4(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha smi ti badz+ra rA ka sa hA/ rdo rje dran pa'i sngags so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+ho ti bi bo ta na badz+ra b+hi ma ba sahA/ rdo rje byang chub kyi sngags
217a5(rgyud): so/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+hu/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+hi ma ti ha ra ka badz+ra rang na/ d+ha ma d+ha ma swa hA/ rdo rje yid gnyis rnam par gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i sngagaso// na ma sarba
217a6(rgyud): ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha rA na badz+ra swAhA/ rdo rje ye shes byin gyi sngagaso// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha a mi ta badz+ra swahA/ rdo rje bdud rtsi'i
217a7(rgyud): sngagaso// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba su khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha bra ba tA ya/ badz+radz+nyA na sa ga na ra sarba/ rdo rje chos brjod kyi bsngagaso// na ma sarba tA tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/
217a8(rgyud): sarba tha badz+ra saM ba sra ya bi rag go tri sahA/ rdo rje chags bral gyi sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha shu n+ya la go ti/ badz+ra sa non d+ha ra ka swahA/
217b1(rgyud): rdo rje stong pa nyid kyi sngags so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+hA/ sarba tha sarba d+ha ma sa ma tra pra ba kar ra badz+ra sad tA swA hA/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi sngags so//
217b2(rgyud): nam sarba ta thag te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha ga na dza ni d+hu ra shi sha ma mu kha badz+rA sehA/ rdo rje na mkha' mdzod kyi sngag so// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ras
217b3(rgyud): k+Sha ni/ badz+ra d+harme id tsi sa sa ra ni/ ma ni si badz+ra ma li ni sahA// rdo rje gnod sbyin mo'i sngag so// de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs
217b4(rgyud): rgyas dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci ba dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa// sems can thams cad
217b5(rgyud): kyi srog la dbab pa'i tshogs kyi/ bye ba sreg zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// 'jig pa'i dus chen po'i tshe/ 'byung ba'i nyi ma bdun ltar 'bar ba/ rgya mtsho'i
217b6(rgyud): gling chen po'i me sgron ltar// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang sems las byang ba'i tshogs za ba/ 'jigs pa'i me chen po zhes bya ba/ rdo rje snying po'i mchog 'di smras pa// na
217b7(rgyud): ma sarba ta thAg te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba paT ts+yai/ 'jigs pa'i me chen po'i snying po smras ma thag tu/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chu shing tshal rtsa ba bcad pa dang / rlung
217b8(rgyud): drag po chen pos bskyod pa bzhin du/ 'gul nas/ stan thams cad la kha sbub du 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor steng du 'gyel lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
218a1(rgyud): po sa bcu la gnas pa ni ma gtogs so// lag na rdo rje'i mthus thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad dang / ri rab dang
218a2(rgyud): ri rab chen po dang / 'khor yug dang / 'khor yug chen por 'bar zhing me lce gcig du gyur pa dang / rgya mtsho dang rgya che chen po thams cad skam nas/ rnam par tshigs te/ thal bar gyur
218a3(rgyud): pa mthong ngo // lag na rdo rje'i snying kha nas kyang khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig pa'i me lce chen po zhes bya ba byung nas/ gad mo rta skad chen po rgyas pa byin cing / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor
218a4(rgyud): gyi snying po rnams yongs su bsdus nas/ na mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du gyur te/ lag na rdo rje'i snying po'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs so// lag na rdo rje yang snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor
218a5(rgyud): la gnas nas/ de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes/
218a6(rgyud): bya ba brjod de bka' stsal pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho yi// snying po stobs chen ldan pa yi 'di/ bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing / theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di la// 'dul dka'
218a7(rgyud): rtag tu 'dul ba ste// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bshad/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor lo chen po rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen por 'gyel
218a8(rgyud): bar rig nas/ cher snying rje skyes te mig gnyis kyi ring du bltas nas// rdo rje mchog gi snying po dam pa 'dis sbyin pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te/ spyod pa chen po mchog
218b1(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor gyis phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por blta zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rab dam pa la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' lag
218b2(rgyud): na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad cig stsol cig dang / des bstan pa 'di la srog gi rig pa thob cing dad pa thob nas/
218b3(rgyud): rang rang kyi sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur de/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam/ dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa/
218b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing // na mkha' lta bur chags med la/ kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyis/ smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa/ gsang sngags kun gyi sprod pa dang /
218b5(rgyud): de bzhin gsang sngags bsgrub pa dang / rtul zhugs dang ni rtags dang gzugs// dus dang yang na cho ga bshad/ de'i rdo rje rdo rje mchog/ stobs kyi gzungs dang lhan cig du/ 'jam
218b6(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba i hi ma ha badz+ra kro ti ku ti la ba sa ga a ku la shi khe ka bi la ki shi ta Ti ta Ti/ kha ta mo ti mI ka
218b7(rgyud): ti karka ti mu tri ma hA bi dang lo le d+hu ke d+hu ke sa ma sa ma/ sa ra sa ra bi sa ra pi sa ra/ s+phu ra s+phu ra/ u dz+yo ti te/ ha ri bi ga le/ tsa tri bi tsa tri/ dza le b+hi dza le/ badz+ra g+ho ni/ sarba sa ra d+hi tI
218b8(rgyud): pra ha ra ni/ ma ti b+hud d+he rad ni tra ya a tai ta le badz+ra d+ha ra b+hi sha sa mi a pra ti ha ta pra ma d+ha ni sA// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pas 'khor de la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag rig
219a1(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rdo rje mi 'pham me rab tu rmongs byed 'di dran par gyis gcig dang / 'dis khyed la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / srog thob par byed par 'gyur ro//
219a2(rgyud): de nas lag na rdo rjes rig pa chen mo 'di smras ma thag du/ de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'khor der byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa la phyag 'tsha lo// bcom ldan 'das
219a3(rgyud): rdo rje mi 'pham pa me rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes smras te/ ska cig de nyid las 'khor der langs nas/ kun tu bzang po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
219a4(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa la blta zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so// kye ma ye shes kye ma skyed// kye ma sngangs zhes bsam mi khyab/
219a5(rgyud): des bdag cag thams cad kyang // mgon dang bsam bstan dga' dang ldan// sems zhing tshogs ni ma mchis par// sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnam
219a6(rgyud): kyis spyan sngar ni/ bdag cag thams cad mchis nas su/ cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir// snying po dag ni de dbul lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas 'di skad ces
219a7(rgyud): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang / lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par bye ba mang po 'dir rang gi dbul lo// na ma sarba ta b+hU te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe/
219a8(rgyud): b+h+yaHsarba tha oM/ bcom ldan 'di ni bdag snying po'i cho ga lags te/ rigs byed bzhi rab tu brjod pa rigs bzhi kun tu gzhog pa/ dbyangs dang ldan pa'i bkod pa chen po 'god
219b1(rgyud): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di la rig byed rnams 'byung sngags rnams dang / mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste/ rgya mtsho chen po rnams su/ chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur/
219b2(rgyud): ba'o// lag na rdo rje smras pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje 'che/ rdo rje oM zhes bya ba ste/ byams dang ting 'dzin las skyes// nga rgyal rnam par spangs pas legs/ de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po
219b3(rgyud): rgya byin gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis snying po rgyal srid thams cad la dbang sbyin par byed pa 'di bzhes su gsol/
219b4(rgyud): na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+hi da ra ya mi du li be hu swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis/ bdag lha rnams kyi bdag po bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la
219b5(rgyud): zhig rdo rje 'khor lo yi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs par gyur pas/ der bdag gi snying po sgrub par 'tshal na des dang po// la ga na rdo rje mdun du lan sum 'bum du zlas brjod
219b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// tha mar thang shing gi yam sreg shing mar dang sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig tu lan khri sbyin bsreg bya'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o//
219b7(rgyud): shis 'bos nas kyang mtho rigs su skyes par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis nas rgyas par 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje la blta zhing zad mi 'tshal bar lan 'bum bzlas
219b8(rgyud): brjod kyis na rgyal srid thob te dmatshig gams pa ni ma rtogs demi grub/ de nas klu'i rgyal ba de dag thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdorjel 'di skad ces
220a1(rgyud): @smras so// bcom ldan 'das klu'i snying po mchis te/ des na bdag cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o// dngos grub rtsal bar bgyi srung bar bgyi'o// dug bsal
220a2(rgyud): bar bgyi srung bar bgyi'o// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha re re dra ti na ga le li ri pu ta ri dza he swahA// snying po 'di bsgrub pa lags te rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung 'am mtsho
220a3(rgyud): chen por zhugs te/ lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas klu gang yang rung ba mngon du mchog ste mchi bar mthong ngam/ de mtsho khrugs te de la 'jig par bgyis nas 'grub par
220a4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// tha mar seng ldeng gi yam shing yungs kar gyis 'bru mar la smyugs pas khri bzlas brjod bgyis te/ de ltar na yang 'grub bo// de 'gro ba 'am mi 'gro ba'i dug rnams kyang
220a5(rgyud): bsam pa tsam gyi sel bar 'gyur// sgrub pa po'i las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bsam pa rtsam gyis bgyid par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sprin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bus// byang
220a6(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen por rim par bye ba mang po 'dir// bsgrub pa po rnams kyi phun sum cho ga
220a7(rgyud): pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa'i snying po 'di dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha yak+Sha sha ra ki na tsi ra ya si/ sa ma ya ma nu sma ra de hi me/ bi sha ra ba na pra ya sahA/
220a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis snying po 'di bsgrub pa des/ ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gcig tu mchod te/ snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
220b1(rgyud): tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis mtshan tho thag du til nag po dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang / bsregs pas lan sum khri sbyin bsregs bgyis na/ gang stsol ba de thob par/
220b2(rgyud): 'gyu ro// zas 'tshal ba rkog bu dben par gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis te nyan zhag bdun du lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis na/ gnod sprin mo stsol bar 'gyur ro// lo cig gi bar du nyin
220b3(rgyud): re zhing dran par bgyis na gter stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'brog gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag kyang
220b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rim pa che ba mang po 'dir rang gis snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha dz+ra khe re si ri sa ma bri/ sa ri su ra yan pra ti nya man ti ti ke swa hA/
220b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag du yang dran par bgyid na/ de'i slad du bdag 'brang bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des ri'i rtse mor mchis la/
220b6(rgyud): lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing / yung dkar dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang mar bsres la lan 'bum sbyin bsregs bgyis na/ gang btsal ba de rtsol lo// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde
220b7(rgyud): dpon chen po yul 'khor bsrung gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul
220b8(rgyud): lo// nams ma ta mag te bya/ sarba bu khe bya/ sarba tha kha t+ya di rig na ti ri ri ris/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po dran par bgyid pa/ de la dus ma lags par gum par/
221a1(rgyud): mi 'byung ngo // rtag tu dpal gyi 'khor bar 'gyur ro// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal ba de/ zla ba ches nas bzung ste/ nya'i bar du nyin cig bzhin du me tog gi bsreg
221a2(rgyud): lugs/ lan khri sbyin bsreg bya'o// de nas nyi gdugs la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis mtshan tho thag 'bras dang 'o thug gi sbyin bsreg bgyis na/ 'grub par 'gyur te gang bcal
221a3(rgyud): ba de rtsol to// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon mig mi bzang gis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bsam pa thams cad
221a4(rgyud): yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha shri d+hi ra ra ya/ b+ha ru sa k+Sha sa hA/ becom ldan 'ad
221a5(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
221a6(rgyud): par bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas nyi' gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan
221a7(rgyud): tho zag gu gul gyi yam sreg sbrang ci mar la sug la khri sbyin bsreg bgyid na grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de stsol to// ma grub na yul gru bzang po stsol to// de nas chu
221a8(rgyud): dbang chug 'dzin byed kyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bsgrub pa po rnams kyis don thams
221b1(rgyud): cad grub pa'i snying po// mchog dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha g+hu ru rtsi ru mu dza ma ba dza lod b+ha ba sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gi/
221b2(rgyud): bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyid pa de la ci tshal ba sgrub par bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la/ la nas ya bzlas brjod
221b3(rgyud): bgyis na rgyal srid dam gter chen po stsol to// ge wa la lan cig sngags te mig la bskus nas gang la bltas pa dbang du 'gyur ro// mtshan mo gdong la bsngags ste bsam la
221b4(rgyud): nyal na/ ci bsam pa de rmi lam du mthong ngo // gos 'dod na me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba tshur bor ba/ kha dog de 'dra ba'i gos de dag rnyed par 'gyur ro// phyag chung 'dod na zhag gsuM
221b5(rgyud): du nyi ma'i gzugs rnyan la sngags lan cig btab pa'i me tog por par bor na rnyed par 'gyur ro// phyag chung 'dod na zhag gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs rnyan la sngags lan cig btab
221b6(rgyud): pa'i me tog por par bor na rnyed par 'gyur ro// rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal chen por 'gyur ro// de nas lag brgyad pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
221b7(rgyud): smraso// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste 'dod pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du/ bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul bar bgyi'o// na ma sarba
221b8(rgyud): ta ba gte bya/ sarbe su khe bya/ sathab tsag kun d+ha dru ba hu casad/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa des srung ba bgyid pa la bskyed
222a1(rgyud): mos tshal gyis phyogs gtsang mar byas shing mya ngan med kyi 'og du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar gzhon nu la ci 'byor pas mtshan tho zag
222a2(rgyud): a ga ru'i gdug pa bsreg la bzlas brjod bgyis na/ na ma sa rba ta thA ga te b+hA/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ nam byed dam nang bar de la bdag stan par bgyi'o// dam pa gang btsal ba rtsol
222a3(rgyud): to/ zas mi za bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nyid du gnod sbyin mo 'chi'o// gang 'chal ba de stsol to// ci ste mi 'chin mgum par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon
222a4(rgyud): chen po rnga rtsan gyis btud nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang bsgrub bo// gsang sngags bsgrub pa la rtson ba srung ba dang sgrub
222a5(rgyud): pa dang / sba ba'i srad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ban tsa mu khe dri dring rak+Sha sahA/ bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi 'am rigs
222a6(rgyud): bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dam tshig thob ste/ gsang sngags bsgrub par 'tshal na/ de thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po 'di lan cig brjod par gyi'o// de la bsrung
222a7(rgyud): ba dang / skyabs pa dang / sba ba'i slad du/ bu lnga'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o// bdag mchi ba'i snga ltas ni bsgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad 'bab par
222a8(rgyud): 'gyur/ spobs pa'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ bgegs thams cad ma mchis par tshegs chung ngus des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// ci ste bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub
222b1(rgyud): par 'tshal na/ des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan mngar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi nang na bzhag ste du ba 'thul bar 'bar
222b2(rgyud): gyi bar du bzlas pa bgyis la de 'thungs na gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// du ba 'thul na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// cig grub na yang skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro// rtag
222b3(rgyud): tu bzlas brjod bgyid na nor 'du bar 'gyuraro// ba glang gi lci bas la ma ltung bar dkyil 'khor bgyis la bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsam nas lan brgya stong bzlas brjod kyis na
222b4(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur/ de bzhin du mi 'gyur ro// de nas thag bzang ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gi rgyal po rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so//
222b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tAng g+hi ni b+he d+he ma la ni dza ti ni hUM swA hA/ bcom
222b6(rgyud): ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag snying po mchog du gsang chen drag po dam pa 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa nges dpal gyi sgo mo'i sgor mchis la snying po 'di lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod
222b7(rgyud): bgyi'o// tha mar dug dang khrag dang skye tshe 'bru bsreg pa lan 'bum sbyin bsreg bgyis na/ lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad bstan sa ma mchis zhing / 'khrul 'khor ma mchis par 'gyur
222b8(rgyud): ro// de nas bdag bcag gis rim 'gro cher bgyis de rigs kyi bu de bzhugs par bgyi'o// rdul chu dang sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang brtsal bar bgyi'o// de nas sna tshogs phreng
223a1(rgyud): / can lags dri zi'i rgyal po rnams kyis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen
223a2(rgyud): po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha mad ta ma tang gi sahA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis dngos grub bstsal bar bgyi'o/
223a3(rgyud): 'di bdag bcag dri za'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o// lha'i bde ba sna tshogs myong ngo mdor na bgyi ba bgyid pa thams cad nus so// mi dang mi ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad na mchis so// ci ste
223a4(rgyud): gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des thog mar ri phug du ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis la/ snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyid na 'grub par 'gyur ro// mar du ru kir
223a5(rgyud): 'bru mar gyi me bus la a ka ru'i yam bsreg shing khri sbyin bsreg bgyis na/ de nas de'i bsam pa rdzogs par bgyi'o// g+hi'u wang la sngags kyis btab de/ dpral bar thig le bgyis
223a6(rgyud): na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro// lag mthil la sngags kyi btab de gdong la bya bas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyuraro// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi
223a7(rgyud): 'am ci'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo//
223a8(rgyud): na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ti ti li sahA/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag mi 'am ci'i rgyal po bgyi'o// sil snyan dang beg
223b1(rgyud): rdob pa dang / rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing thams cad du/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'chi'o// lha dang klu'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis kyang
223b2(rgyud): bkur ro// snying po 'di ci'i yang mi mdzad do// ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na des cig pur dgon par slong mor zas 'tshal zhing / snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
223b3(rgyud): tha mar bar grang gi lci ba la ma lhung ba'i sna lnga dang bsres pas/ dkyil 'khor bskus la ci 'byor par mchod de/ gur gum gyi bsreg lugs lan khri sprin bsreg bgyis na de nas 'grub
223b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur te/ mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing / gang 'dod pa de bgyid do// de rnam par bdud kyi bu la sogs pa na mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang
223b5(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/
223b6(rgyud): sarba tha rang ga ri bi sha ti bi sa na da ni ku ma ri ki he sahA/ pu bu sarba/ bdag cag gi snying po 'dis klu thams cad rang gi dam tshig la bkod par bgyi'o// snying po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis
223b7(rgyud): klu thams cad bdag cag gi phyag rnyan du 'gyuraro// 'jigs shing zhum pa dang sdang ba dang re ba 'chad par 'gyur/ dug ma mchis zhing phyogs phyogasu 'bros par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das ci
223b8(rgyud): te rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des mtsho chen por zhugs la ming pa tsam du nub par 'greng ste/ snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod
224a1(rgyud): / bgyis na/ de nas mtsho de nyin cig bzhin bskam mo// klu'i gnas thams cad 'bar bar 'gyur ro// rang gi gzugs kyang ston to// bgegs gzhan rgyang dag
224a2(rgyud): kyang bgyid de/ de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o// de nas mtshan ma de dag byung nas tha mar ba glang gi lci bas ma ltung bas de nyid kyi ngos su dkyil 'khor bskus la/ bcom ldan 'das lag na
224a3(rgyud): rdo rje la ci 'byor pa mchod de/ dug dang nye ba'i dug thams cad las klu'i rgyal po brgyad bgyis nas/ de nas kye tshe'i 'bru nas khrag gis bskus de sbyin bsregs bgyi'o// de nas
224a4(rgyud): klu thams cad lhag nas dam pa longs shig ces mchis na/ skrag par mi bgyid do// 'di skad phyag rnyan dag du gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras
224a5(rgyud): nas mi 'gyur te/ de slad chad ni 'tshal bar bgyid do// de nas 'jigasu rung ba la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
224a6(rgyud): smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha kre ka ri ni lun tra ni srad/ bdag
224a7(rgyud): cag gi snying po 'dis mi thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang stobs 'phro bar bgyi'o// sems can thams cad 'dul bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'dor na rgyu kun dang mi rgyu kun bcas
224a8(rgyud): pa'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na ci yang dkon pa mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des du khrod du du ba thul bar zas su sha 'tshal zhing gos sngon
224b1(rgyud): gon la lag na ral gri thogs la snying po 'di lan bdun 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o// ci 'byor pa mchod pa bgyid la nam byed kyi
224b2(rgyud): bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas srin po'i bdag po gang yang rung ba gcig mchis par 'gyur de de la 'jigs par mi bgyi bar mchod yon stsal na/ bdag la 'dod pa'i gzug
224b3(rgyud): can gyi dngos grub sbyin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// des ral gri de grangs nas rtsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha'i 'gro ba can du 'gyur// ngo mtshar las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur
224b4(rgyud): ro// de nas drang srong chen po mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bsgrub pa po rnams la sman pa'i sladadu dkyil 'khor
224b5(rgyud): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ka bi la badz+rod di/ ni ra na ti sang ka la lo tsa na swa hA/ bdag gi snying po 'dis de re ba thams
224b6(rgyud): cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyid pa lags te/ 'dis bdag kyang bkug de dbang du mchi so// dpal bskyed par bgyi'o// nor stsal bar bgyi'o// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyid na nor 'du bar
224b7(rgyud): 'gyuraro// snying po 'dis rtag tu bza' ba'i sbyin bsreg bgyis na/ bza' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mdor na rdzas gang sbyin bsreg bgyis pa'i rdzas ni 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ci ste bsgrub
224b8(rgyud): bar 'chal na ri'i rtse mor mchis na slong mo'i zas 'chal zhing snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha ma ci 'byor pa de mchod pa de me thabs bgyis la/ rgya shugs so/
225a1(rgyud): yam bsreg shing gi zho dang sbrang ci dang / mar dang sprugs lan khri sbyin bsreg bgyi'o// de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ dga' mgu las rnams kyi'o// de
225a2(rgyud): nas srin gyi phreng can la sogs pa rlung rnams kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lagan rdo rje ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das
225a3(rgyud): bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// bsgrub pa po dngos grub grub par 'tshal ba rnams kyis bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// namasarba
225a4(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+hU ma ri/ b+h+ra ma ri rtse ba li tsi ba li ke hi ra ma ba ni swAhA/ 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po mchog lags te/ 'dis bdag cag de bzhin gsheg
225a5(rgyud): pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid do// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang sngags kyi sgo spong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus dang mi 'gal bgyi'o// phan pa dang bde
225a6(rgyud): ba bsgrub par bgyi'o// byang chub sems pa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des thog mar snying po 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas bdag cag gis de'i
225a7(rgyud): bgyi ba thams cad snang bar gyi'o// ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na/ de zas mi za bar lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba glang gi
225a8(rgyud): lci ba sa lam ltung bar dkyil 'khor lnga bgyi'o// kha don sna tshogs pa'i ba bdan bdun bzhag go// de nas ba dan 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de nas 'grub
225b1(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ bskyed pa dang 'gag pa dang la sogs pa las rnams dga' 'gur bgyid do// de nas skar ma'i rgyal po zla bas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
225b2(rgyud): smra so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/ dpal yang dag par rdzogs par bgyid pa dbul lo// na
225b3(rgyud): ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tsan tra ka na ti b+hi shud d+ha d+haM ga sahA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams
225b4(rgyud): kyi gdung ba thams cad rab du zhi bar bgyid pa laso// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyid na bkra mi shis pa rnams sel to// dpal bskyed do// skal pa bzang po bstsol to// ci ste bsgrub par 'chal
225b5(rgyud): na tsa swa bsgob par 'tshal na// de nas zas 'o ma 'thung zhing pad ma'i rdzing bur zhugs la snying po 'bum brjod bgyi'o// tha mar zla ba nyal shel lam mar sar la bzlas pa bgyis la/
225b6(rgyud): pad ma'i phrag du bstsal to// mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis nas/ nam byed dam nyi ma 'char ba'i tshe 'od zer 'byung ste/ byung nas kyang sgrub pa po'i kha ru 'jug go// de nas 'khor lo
225b7(rgyud): bzhin du/ 'khor nas kun nas 'khor bar gyur de 'dug go// de nas 'grub par gyur te/ gdung ba ma mchis pa dang / nam mkha' las mchis par 'gyur te/ bdag gi gzhal med khang
225b8(rgyud): du bskal bar gnas shing // lha'i bde ba dang ldan par 'gyuraro// dpal yang mchis par gyur te/ rgyal srid la sogs pa gang 'dod pa bstsol to// de nas nyi ma la sogs pa'i/ bza'
226a1(rgyud): thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di'i gzi brjid dang / stobs thams
226a2(rgyud): cad pa zhes bya ba bgyi ba mchis ste/ bsgrub pa po rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba dang tshe ring ba dang / nad med pa'i slad du/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/
226a3(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha sing dong b+hi tong ta na swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa po gang la la snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ de la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo // rtag tu brjod byas na/
226a4(rgyud): gzi brjid can du 'gyur ro// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na 'bab chu'i 'gram bye ma la mar me kha lngar bus la/ snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// des nyi ma gang yang rung ba zhig mchi
226a5(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ des mchod yon la sogs pa 'tshal ba gang 'dod pa blangs la de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras na mchis par 'gyur te/ gang 'dod pa de bgyid do// gzhal med khang gang yang
226a6(rgyud): rung bar mchis so// de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lha klu'i rgyal po du ma dang lhan cig du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag
226a7(rgyud): kyang dkyil 'khor 'dir rang gi snying po dbulo// nA ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha a baM ba ti b+hai ra tsa sa swA hA/ gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa' gsang sngags
226a8(rgyud): kyi sgo spyod pa 'di bzlas bla gying na/ de rang bzhin gyi yongasu dag par 'gyuraro// spyod pa gang gtsang ma thams cad la blo mngon gsum du 'gyur ro// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na rgya mtsho
226b1(rgyud): chen por// mid pa nub rtsam du zhugs la snying po 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu gnyis bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas tha mar rin po che sna bzhi las klu'i bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de klu'i
226b2(rgyud): rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gnas kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la mchod yon stsol te/ ji 'dod pa bzhin du byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de phan chad gang bsgos pa de bgyid
226b3(rgyud): do// de nyid du zhugs nas lo mang po gnas so// de nas khyab 'jug gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te 'di skad ces smras so// btso
226b4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+hA/ sarba tha e ka e ka/ dza la dza la/ ba ra ba ra dza la dza la/ b+he Sh+Ta pa sa hA/
226b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po ni 'di lags te/ 'dis sdang ba thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o// bu nga bar bgyi'o// yam kyi nad dang gnod pa thams cad mchis par bgyi'o// gang
226b6(rgyud): la la zhig drag du dran par bgyid na/ de'i blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro// ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar grog mkha
226b7(rgyud): kyi rtse mo'i sa dang / ba'i nam lnga bsres khyab 'jug kyi gzugs lag pa g.yon pa cig na 'khor lo// g.yas pa gcig na dbyugs to// g.yon pa gcig na mdung / cig na dam pa sbyin
226b8(rgyud): bar bgyis la/ bgrang gi lci ba sa la ma ltung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ ci 'byor pa mchod la kha nub phyogs su blta ste mchis la/ khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'gul ba 'am/ dung /
227a1(rgyud): \u0f7fsgra 'byung gi bar bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ dgos pa gang gang bsam pa de thams cad bgyid do// de nas yi dgas kyi rgyal po drag pos/ byang
227a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag la mchog du gsang ba'i snying po 'di mchis te/ des bdag drag po bgyid pa'i slad du sems can thams
227a3(rgyud): cad kyis drag po zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'dis/ bdag rgyud dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten ma rung bar 'gyur ro// dbang du bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag
227a4(rgyud): gi snying po 'di dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha oM paT/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad pa'i nor lagaso//
227a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la dran par bgyid la/ rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// yid dgas kyi tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig du bkakra
227a6(rgyud): bzhin du bgyid do// 'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyuraro// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des du khrod du lus thal bas byugs la mi g+ho thod pa'i phreng bas rgyan thogs shing lag na mdung
227a7(rgyud): rtse gsum pa thogs te/ khri'i zus shing khyed la stag lpags kyi shams thabs 'tshal cing / slong mo'i zas 'bab du 'tshal la/ snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
227a8(rgyud): de nas du bathul ba'i/ dur khrod du ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma ltung bar dkyil 'khor bgyis te/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang / khri'i zur zhing bzhag ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis na/ mig bdug
227b1(rgyud): ba bsreg cing mtshan thog thag brjod par bgyid na/ drag po nyid yi dgas mang pos bskor nas/ 'jigs 'jigs lnga chen po'i gzugs can du mchis par 'gyur te/ de las mi 'jig
227b2(rgyud): par bgyi zhing mchod yon stsol to// de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad bgyid do// de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing bka' bstod pa lhur len te/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag
227b3(rgyud): dbang ldan gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir snying po dbul lo// na ma
227b4(rgyud): sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha pro na Tu stu ta d+he swa ti swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi snying po 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rtsol bar bgyid pa de/ rigs kyi bu 'am rig
227b5(rgyud): gyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ rtag du de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyid pa bsrung bar bya/ dpal bskyed par bya'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des bskyed mo/
227b6(rgyud): tshal dben pa'i gnas su zas nub mo 'tshal zhing / snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pa'i mchod par bgyid te/ tsan dan gyi bdug pas sreg cing / gtor ma
227b7(rgyud): rgya chen po yang bul mar gyi mar me brgyad kyang bul la kim nub nas brtsam te/ nam byed kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o// de nas grub par 'gyur ro// dgos pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur
227b8(rgyud): ro// sman bcus kyi len kyang stsal to// de nas lha mo dga' ba zlog gis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smraso// bcom 'das bdag kyang dkyil
228a1(rgyud): @'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sar+b+ba ta thA ga te b+he/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha u ma ye satra/ bcom ldan 'dag gi snying po 'di ni bskal pa bzang
228a2(rgyud): po thams cad bgyid pa te/ me tog gam spos sam lig bu mig gam/ g+hi wa la sngags lan gcig btab ste bzlas brjod bgyisa'o// rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyid na bskal pa bzang
228a3(rgyud): bor 'gyuraro// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des dbang ldan gyi snying po las cho ga rgyas par nyis 'gyur du sbyar te bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas gza' chen po smin drug gi bus/ byang chub sems
228a4(rgyud): dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir yid rab du dga' zhing rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/
228a5(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha he ku ma ra dza li ta mu ti tsi ru rtsi tam par hUM/ bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad du bsgrag par bgyid pa do/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de las
228a6(rgyud): 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // klag tshol ba'i gdon thams cad kyi klags mi rnyed do// rma bya'i 'jug ma la sngags kyis btab te/ gdon gyi btab pa la bya ba bsrungs bgyi de'i
228a7(rgyud): bdug pa yang bsreg na sos par 'gyuraro// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ de thog mar byis pa khye'u brgyad bkur sti chen bgyis te 'tshal ma btsal la de dag zas gang la sred pa de stsol
228a8(rgyud): to// de nas ma mo'i khyim du lag na mdung zung thogs la/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyi snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// ba mar ma mo'i dkyil 'khor de nyid mchod pa ci 'byor
228b1(rgyud): pas mchod par bgyid te/ 'bab chu'i 'gram gnyis kyi 'jim pa la gzugs brnyan bgyis la/ snying khar mdung thung brtug te ji srid shi'o zhes 'am/ rgyab mchog go zhes sgra drag
228b2(rgyud): gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyuraro// de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas lha'i bu srin dkar srin gyi lha'i bu thams cad dang lhan cig du/ byang chub sems dpa
228b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces logasu thal mo sbyar la btud de 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// nam
228b4(rgyud): sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ s+yAr+b+ba gu lu gu lu// ma hA pa u b+ha ba/ ba ra mi ta yu ma la/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ su ru sa ra/ ka pa la sa hA/ bdag cag gi snying po 'di ni 'gro ba thams cad la sman pa bgyid pa
228b5(rgyud): ste/ 'dis ni bdag cag rgya che zhing gdug pa'i sprin gyis dra bas na mkha'i dkyil khyab par byin gyis brlabs nas lo tog thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// sa chen po 'di yang char pa'i
228b6(rgyud): rgyun chen pos tshim par bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na
228b7(rgyud): de las chus bongs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo // lus la nad thams cad kyang mi mchi'o// de'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongasu rdzogs par mchi'o// ci ste sgrub par nas des
228b8(rgyud): byangs pa dang ldan pa des bla ba drug pasar nas brtsam te tha bshar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bkri'o// zla ba drug chang banas ci 'byor bas mchod ba bgyid te/ rgyamatsho chen po dzin/
229a1(rgyud): la/ chu blangs la bum pa nag po med pas bkang ste/ spos dang / me tog dang bdug pas mchod la/ nam chu la dbu ba byung zhing gyen du mthong ba dang / sgra
229a2(rgyud): 'bug 'bug pa 'am 'brug gi sgra grag kyi bar du/ bzlas brjod bgyis na lnga char sprin// gang yang rung ba cig 'chos nas chu bar snang la 'thor ro// de nas grub par 'gyur te/
229a3(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin bsgos pa thams cad 'grub par bgyid do// de nas klog sprin 'joms pa dang / klog gzi garjid dang / klog phreng bzangs zhes bya ba rnams kyis byang chub sems
229a4(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das gnod pa thams cad zhi ba'i slad du/ bdag cag kyang rang rang gi dkyil
229a5(rgyud): 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ s+phu ra sarba ma ha pri ti ka ra sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po dran par gyid na/ de la
229a6(rgyud): bdag cags gis srung bar bgyi/ yongasu skyabs pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des phyogs bzhin sgron ma bus zhing phyogs bzhir bdug pas bdug la/ ci 'byor
229a7(rgyud): ba'i mchod pa bgyis te/ phyogs bzhin kha dog ci lta bzhin du bum pa bzhi bzhag la/ mtshan thog zag bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas phyogs bzhid klog 'byung ba la 'jigs par mi
229a8(rgyud): bgyid pa thams macad la mchod yon stsal na 'grub par 'gyur te/ rang gi gnas su khrid nas srung bar bgyid/ yid kyis bsam pa rnams sgrub par bgyid// gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sum
229b1(rgyud): to// de nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab la sogs pa ri'i rgyal po chen po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan
229b2(rgyud): 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i sprad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbulo// nam
229b3(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tsal ma hi d+ha ra swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di gang zhig rtag du dran par bgyid na/ de dgon par mchis pa'i tshe/ bdag cag gis
229b4(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kying bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs la// snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod
229b5(rgyud): pa re ma gyis de// 'o ma dang zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang sres la bsreg lugs lan khre sbyin bsreg bgyi'o// de nas bdag bcag ri'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis te 'di skad ces smraso//
229b6(rgyud): bu chur shog nges kyi gnas su 'dod pa de sbyin no zhes smra so// bu tshur shag ngas kyi gnas su 'dod pa de spyang des kyang bdag dog de dran pa'i tshe chur shog ces smras nas/ de bzhin du gyur cig/
229b7(rgyud): thams cad bgyi yis khyod su la yang ma srong cig ces smra'o// de nas gshin rje dang / mtshan mo nag mo dang / be con nag po can dang / skyes bu nag po dang rna nag mo dang / dpal sbyin ma rnams
229b8(rgyud): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sagan rdorjel phyag 'am la nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi ging po dbul lo// nam sas
230a1(rgyud): / ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha be'i b+ha sa sta ya sa hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi snying po 'di gang la la zhig gis rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag
230a2(rgyud): gis de bsad 'gug kyi slad du rang gi g.yon 'khor mi dge bar bgyi'o// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na zla ba mar gyi ngo'i zhag bcu 'am zhag brgyad la bsnyung ba bgyis te 'bras lu rtag pa'i phye
230a3(rgyud): mas sor brgyad dam sor drugs 'khor dang bcas pa bgyis la ma he dang be con yang ngos gnyi su bzhag ste/ de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyid mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi
230a4(rgyud): nas/ nam phyed dam nyi ma shar ka na/ ma he dgra 'byin tam be con 'gul te/ mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la dri bar bgyi'o// de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa'i las rnams bgyi'o//
230a5(rgyud): de nas mtshan mo bzang mos rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha bi ka le ra ti ma ste sa hA/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de bdag gis bsrung
230a6(rgyud): ba ba gyi'o// ci ste grub par 'tshal na snga ma bzhin no// be con nag pos kyang rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha badz+ra ta mod bA bA ka la pa sha ga sa hA/
230a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag de'i drung du mchi'o// ban dgas pa'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub
230a8(rgyud): bar bgyis te/ bdag gis de'i bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas skyes bu nag pos rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba te tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha a
230b1(rgyud): ta ma su ru sha sa hA/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis snying po 'di gang la la shig tu dran par bgyid na bcom ldan 'das bdag de'i drung du mi mchi bar ban gdag par bgyi'o// spyi te bsgrub
230b2(rgyud): bar 'tshal na/ snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// khyad par du cung zas ni 'di lta ste sgra'i bzhag pa ni gnyis bzhag par bgyi'o// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
230b3(rgyud): de nas 'chi bdag gis rang gis snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+hA/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha a pra te/ ha te garma ba sha a nu ko te bi sa ra te satwa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis
230b4(rgyud): snying po 'di gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag gi drung du mi mchi ste sngon gyi las ni ma rtogs so// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na// snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyis ste/ dril bu
230b5(rgyud): bzhag/ de nas dpal byed kyis rang rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+he/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ba kri ti ma ha d+ha'i te ba ga ti ma ti mu khe swA hA/ gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par 'dod
230b6(rgyud): na bdag de'i drung du mchis te/ 'phags pa la skur par 'debs pa dang / dam pa'i chos spongs pa dang / bla ma la smad pa ni me togs so// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des snga ma bzhin du bsgrub
230b7(rgyud): par bgyi'o// 'bras kyi 'o thug lan ca can bzhag par bgyis te/ phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsal to// de nas rna ga mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu kha/
230b8(rgyud): bya barbab tul tsami nesan/ gangs la zheg dran par bgyid ma/ bdag de'i drung du mi 'chi'am me dag ba babyed pa thogaso// ci ste bskub par 'chal na/ de snga ma bzhin du bsgrul
231a1(rgyud): par mchi'o// bye brag du ni phub ma'i me dang bcas pa'i me tog bzhag par bgyi'o// su zhig de ltar bgyid na btag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// de nas ma mo//
231a2(rgyud): thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te// 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das ma mo drag mo bdag cag kyang 'jigs rten
231a3(rgyud): la ba na gtags pa'i slad du/ grong dang ljongs thams cad du gnas par bgyi'o// dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdag cag so so'i snying po 'bul bar bgyi'o// de nas tshangs pa'i chungs mas rang
231a4(rgyud): gis snying po smras pa// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha oM pA ma pA ti ni sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyis na/ bdag rtag tu de'i
231a5(rgyud): slad bzhin du 'brang bar 'gyur ro// ma mo thams cad kyang yid rang nas rtag tu bsrung bar bgyid do// spyi ste sgrubs par 'tshal na nges oM zhes bgyi ba snying khar bsam la lan 'bum bzlas
231a6(rgyud): brjod bgyi'o// de nas ma mo'i dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod ste/ mtshan thogs thag sngags grang nor bu dang / ril ba spyi blugs lag na thogs la/ oM zhes bgyis pa'i
231a7(rgyud): sgra grags kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas grub par gyur te/ gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do// gang 'tshal ba de stsol to// de nas drag po'i chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta
231a8(rgyud): tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha hri phaT sa hA// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rgyun tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyid do//
231b1(rgyud): gang bsam pa de stsol to// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na/ slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dur khrod na mtshan gcig mchis par lha chen po'i glo g.yas par lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
231b2(rgyud): tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de/ dung tu re ke'i me tog zho dang sbrang dang mar la skyugs la bzhi khri dur khrod kyi mes sbyin bsreg bya'o// nam byed nas khyu mchog gi sgra 'am oM zhes bgyi ba'i
231b3(rgyud): s+tha gra p+tar gyur te/ de nas ma mo thams cad grub par 'gyur ro// de nas khyab 'jug gi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha na ra ya ni dza ga d+ha
231b4(rgyud): d+hi d+ha d+hi ri ba la pa ti dza ye sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bsrung ba dang / skyabs pa dang / rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o//
231b5(rgyud): ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ nges pas bsod nams 'bar bar lan lnga khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ston zla tha chung gi tshes bcu gnyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de/
231b6(rgyud): man d+ha ra'i me tog mar la skyugs pa lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na// grub par 'gyur te/ gang rtsam pa de stsal to// lha mo thams cad kyis dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// de nas gzhon nu'i chung
231b7(rgyud): mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ s+yAd+b+ha tha ku mA ri ma sU ra/ tsatra ta ga tre shag ti/ d+ha ri ni bing tsa sa tra/ bu saH// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran pa
231b8(rgyud): bgyid na/ bdag de'i slad bzhin dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o// ci ste sing po bsgrub par 'tshal na/ de kha lho phyogs su lta ste// lag pa yon par mdung zung thogs shing / lan bzhi
232a1(rgyud): @'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas de bzhin du ci 'byor pas mchod la/ 'bru'i la thu rgya shugs tsam gyis mtshan thog thag sbyin bsreg bgyi'o// nam
232a2(rgyud): bye dam nang par gzhon nu ma mchis nas/ mdun du 'greng ste/ de la mchod yon stsal to// de phyin chad 'grub par 'gyur te// gang 'tshal bar de bgyid do// de nas tsa mun tas rang gi
232a3(rgyud): snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga to b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha ru d+hi ra pe ta Ti// a kar sha ni ma ha kro ti/ tshin d+ha chen d+ha/ b+hin d+ha b+hin d+ha tsa mun te pi rtsa swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang
232a4(rgyud): la la zhig bdag kyi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang zhing / yid la bsam pa'i dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o// ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des
232a5(rgyud): gos sngon po bgos te/ lag na mi thod thogs te/ zla ba gcig zas su sha za zhing / dur khrod dam ma mo'i dkyil 'khor du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// yid la bsam pa'i dgos pa thams
232a6(rgyud): cad bgyi'o// ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ tha ma de nyid du ci 'byor par mchod do// mi sha'i sregs lugs yung kar gyis mar la bskugs la lan khri sbyin bsreg bgyi//
232a7(rgyud): de nas ha ha zhes bya ba sgra 'byin te/ lce myug myug bgyid la/ lag na mi thong thogs shing 'chi bar 'gyur te/ mi thod khrag gi gang ba'i mchod yon stsal to// de nas legs so
232b1(rgyud): zhes mchis te// bsgrub pa po la bskor ba bgyis nas mi snang bar gyur to// de slan chad rtag tu sradang bzhin 'brang zhing ci 'dod pa bgyid do// de nas bag gis chung mas rang gi
232b2(rgyud): snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha badz+ra g+ho ni badz+rod ri bi ri mi hUM ka ri swA hA// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig/ snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/
232b3(rgyud): gdag rtag tu 'di skad bzhin 'brang zhing ci dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar skye
232b4(rgyud): che'i 'bru dang / chang sres pa'i bsreg lugs lan 'bum ma mo yi dkyil 'khor du sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas na ma phyed nas phag gi chung ma nyid byi lha me'i gzugs kyis mchis par 'gyur/
232b5(rgyud): yang na lha'i spos kyi ngad 'byung ngo // de nas grub par rig par byas ste/ de nas phyin chad ci 'dod pa bzhin las thams cad bgyid do// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba las/
232b6(rgyud): bam po drug pa'o// // de nas lus ngan gyi chung mas rang gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te
232b7(rgyud): b+hA/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+hi d+ha ra ni/ ku ra pin de dan tra pa ni satwa/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ de la rgyal po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
232b8(rgyud): zhon gcig bzhin du nor thams cad rnam par 'phel lo// bdag gis phyag bsnyen bzhi rtag tu g.yogs/ 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro// yid la bsam pa'i dgos pa thams cad
233a1(rgyud): kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des slong mar ba'i zas bza' zhing lag na be con thogs la/ shing drung gcig na mchis par snying po 'di
233a2(rgyud): lan sum khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar de nyid du ci 'byor par mchod pa 'bras yos kyis bsregs/ zho dang sbrang rtsi dang / mar dang bsregs la lan 'bum sbyin bsregs bgyid na 'grub
233a3(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ des slan chad gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas 'jigs 'jigs lnga chen po'i chung mas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// bco
233a4(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha he ku na khi ma ha na kha shi ku na/ u lu ku mu khi ya// ma d+hu ti bing rtse
233a5(rgyud): swahA bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ de'i bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des slong me'i zas za zhing lam gyi bzhi
233a6(rgyud): mod 'am/ shing drung gcig par mchis la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de/ bu btsas pa'i thal ba'i bsregs lugs lan 'bum sbyin bsreg
233a7(rgyud): bgyi'o// de nas 'jigs 'jigs lha chen po'i chung mas// sprul pa'i gzugs 'dzin cing mchi bar 'gyur te// de la 'ug pa'i 'dab ma'i bdug pa btsal to// de nas grub par 'gyur te/ gang
233a8(rgyud): 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas chu klung chen po g+hang g+ha la sogs pa chu klung chen po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lags na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ 'di skad ces smras so// bcom
233b1(rgyud): ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ma na se ma no mu ge dza gi li bi ma le satwa/ gang la la zhig snying
233b2(rgyud): 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de la chu'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ rkog ma nub tsam gyis chur zhugs la/ snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
233b3(rgyud): de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de/ 'bras sa lu'i phye ma dang sbrang cis sgrub la sor drug tsam gyi gzugs bgyis la brgya stong sbyin bsregs bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te/ de nas sran cad
233b4(rgyud): chu klung rnamasu zhugs kyang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro// de dag nyid dang ji srid 'dod kyi bar du gnas shing bu bzhin du rjesu spong pa la gang 'tshal ba de bstsal to// de nas sna tshogs breb
233b5(rgyud): ba can la sogs pa'i dri za'i rgyal po thams cad kyis lag na rdo rje ga na ba der lo gsu thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen
233b6(rgyud): po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+he/ sarba tha b+ha ga ba te ga na d+ha ra dza sr-i sa hA/ gang la la zhig bdag cag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag
233b7(rgyud): bcag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad rab tu dga' bar yid kyis rtsal bar bgyi'o// bskor nas gnas par bgyid do// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe na yang
233b8(rgyud): sil snyan dang / pheg rdob par bgyid cing steng du bla re bzung la sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rjes su dran par bstsal bar bgyi'o// des de bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des thog mar dgon
234a1(rgyud): ba chen por zhugs la zas su 'bras bu za zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de// du ru ka'i bdug pa bsreg
234a2(rgyud): cing mtshan thog thag du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing // dri za'i rgyal por gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas mgo la me tog gi phreng ba bstsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dri za'i nang
234a3(rgyud): du kun gyis bskur bar 'gyur te/ dri za'i gnas thams cad du zhugs nas kyang nam yang yongasu nyams par mi 'gyur ro// 'dor na gang 'tshal ba de stsal to// de nas rig sngags
234a4(rgyud): 'chang gi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba der lo gsu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'khor
234a5(rgyud): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbu lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+hA/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ga ga na sarba be ga ga na/ ku'u ri ud pad ti hi ri/ khi ri khi ri/ sa ma ba ra pa hUM ga me swa hA// bcom
234a6(rgyud): ldan 'das 'di ni/ rigs sngags 'chang thams cad kyi snying po lags te// 'dis bdag cag rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po zhes bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
234a7(rgyud): la mchod pa dang rim 'gro bgyid pa zhes bgyi'o// mdor na 'dod pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo
234a8(rgyud): sdod pa/ gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag cag de la dngos grub dang mthu dang / stobs brtan pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci ste snying po 'di nye bar bsgrub par bgyid na//
234b1(rgyud): des ri'i rtse mor phyin la cho ga snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod la/ ba glang kyi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskur ste/ mar gyi sreg lugs lan 'bum sbyin
234b2(rgyud): bsregs bgyis na grub par 'gyuraro// thogs pa med par 'dod dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas so can las la sogs pa bsrin mo chen mo thams cad byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje
234b3(rgyud): ga la ba der log su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbu'o// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe
234b4(rgyud): b+hA/ sarba tha kre ka ri go te re// pi ti ke swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig rtag tu snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ dgon pa chen po na mchis kyang rung / dur khrod na mchis kyang rung /
234b5(rgyud): chu'i nang na mchis kyang rung / me'i nang na mchis kyang rung // rgya mtsho'i nang na mchis kyang rung / srin me'i nang na mchis kyang rung ste bsrung bar bgyi'o// zhi ba dang bde legasu 'gyur bar
234b6(rgyud): bgyi'o// khang pa la sogs pa yang yongasu spang bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des khang stong 'am dur khrod chen po gcig par bung bu zhon zhing grangs pa ma lags pa'i kha
234b7(rgyud): zas 'tshal la// lag na gri thogs zhing lce spyang gyi spags pa 'am/ byi la'i spags pa bgos la/ snying po lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar nya sha la sogs pa ci 'byor mchod
234b8(rgyud): la ba grang gis lci ba'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis ste/ phyogs phyogs su bya'i bud trig phyogs bzhir sgra 'byin pa dang / bung bu'i kha nas me lce 'bar
235a1(rgyud): bar 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing 'jigs par mi 'gyur bar legs par 'ongs la 'ongs so zhes brjod la mchod yon stsal to// leg so zhes
235a2(rgyud): brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas grub par 'gyur te// gang 'tshal ba de bgyi'o// bung bu la zhon zhing dgar dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de 'byung po'i rgyal po'i la sogs
235a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag byang chub sems dpa'i
235a4(rgyud): spyod pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dang / phan pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta tha ga te byA/
235a5(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha hi li hi li/ si mi si mi/ g+hu li g+hA li/ b+hu d+ha sha ri sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag cag des bsgom
235a6(rgyud): bzhin du bgyi'o// bye brag du ni zas kyi bud stsal la don thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des shing ta la'i drung du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o//
235a7(rgyud): tsan dan gyi bdug pa bsregs cing kha zas mi 'tshal bar 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad lhags nas/ gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa rtsal gyi bar du bzlas brjod
235a8(rgyud): bgyi'o// yang na rang gi khyim du khrid nas dngos po thams cad kyis 'grod par bgyi'o// gang 'tshal ba de stsal to// las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang bgyid do// de nas ba glang
235b1(rgyud): skyong ba la sogs pa sha za thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor
235b2(rgyud): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha mi tsi mi tsi/ khi li khi li/ sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par
235b3(rgyud): bgyid na/ bdag cag kyang rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// dgos pa thams cad la gnang bar stsal bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des khang pa stong du
235b4(rgyud): snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de// gzigs ma'i bsreg lugs sam/ rgya skegs kyi bsreg lugs lan khri bsregs lugs bgyid
235b5(rgyud): na sha za gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas/ dam pa 'gron bgyid do// gang 'tshal ba de spang bar bgyis ste/ grub par 'gyur ro// gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do// de nas mgon po/
235b6(rgyud): 'gul po la sogs pa gnon po thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir
235b7(rgyud): rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA gu ru gu ru swAhA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ de la 'byung /
235b8(rgyud): po'i 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // de nas rnam par khyab pa la sogs pa grib gnon rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjel 'dri
236a1(rgyud): skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// nam sarba ta thAg te b+he/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha
236a2(rgyud): gi na dzi mi dzi sa hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ de la grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // de la nya ming la sogs pa mdangs 'phrog
236a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpal lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas// 'di skad smraso// bcom ldan 'das bdag tsug kyi la 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na
236a4(rgyud): ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha gi li gi li swa hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig/ snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag cag de'i mdangs 'phrog par mi bgyid do//
236a5(rgyud): des nas gzhin ngan la sogs pa yid tags kyi tshogs thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang dkyil 'kho
236a6(rgyud): chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta thathA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha bi mi ri bi mi ri// dur la b+he sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang lA la snying po 'di dran par bgyid
236a7(rgyud): na/ bdag cag de'i dgos pa thams cad bsgo bzhin bgyid do// de nas logs brgyad la sogs pa bdud kyi rigs kyi lha'i bu thams cad kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag
236a8(rgyud): na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das 'dag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir// bdud kyi stobs thams cad pa zhes bgyi ba'i snying po dbul lo// na ma sarba ta/
236b1(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha tra ki ra sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na/ bdag cag de'i gam du mi mchi bar srung bar bgyi'o// ci ste
236b2(rgyud): bsgrub par 'tshal na/ de thog ma kho nar gtsang mar bgos la skyed mo tshal lam/ lha chen po'i gnas su glu len cing ga ri bsgyid cing rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dag gis/ yid
236b3(rgyud): dga' bar snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas de nyid du yo byad thams cad kyis rgya chen por mchod de spos thams cad las/ 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs bgyi ste/
236b4(rgyud): mar gyi mar me brgyad bus la/ klu'i sha Ta baM ma med t+ya pa'i dbyangs kyis// mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod par mchod pa bgyid na// nam phyed nas dga' ma dang / sdug ma dang / lhan du mchi
236b5(rgyud): zhing / de'i tshe rigs sngags 'chang nyid dam/ mi snang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ rjes su rgyu ba nyid kyang rung ste/ dam bstsal to// ci ste ma grub na grong dam pa brgyad stsal to// bskal pa bzang
236b6(rgyud): po'i mchog dang ldan shing 'dod pa'i lha gnyis pa dang 'dra bar sal rgyu bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal ma la sogs pa srin mo chen mo bzhi phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs te 'dug nas/ de dag gi
236b7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo// de nas rgyal mas rang gi snying
236b8(rgyud): bo smras pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsarbA b+hA dza ya dza sod b+he bi sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig/ bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i srad bzhin 'brang
236b9(rgyud): sarba mu khe
237a1(rgyud): @/ bar bgyi'o// srung bar bgyi'o// dpal bskyed par bgyi da'o// bu mang bar bgyi'o// skal pa bzang po stsal bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ des rgya
237a2(rgyud): mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs kyang rung / ri'i rtse mor phyin kyang rung / snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis// tha mar cig pur sa phyogs gtsang mar dben par ba glang gi
237a3(rgyud): lci ba sa la ma ltung bas dkyil 'khor byugs la/ ba ser me'i mar gyi mar me bus te/ nam gyi gung la yung dkar gyis sprin bsregs bgyis nas/ de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro// skye bo
237a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang // 'dod dgur 'gro ba dang 'dod pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa dang / dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas rnam par rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras so// na ma
237a5(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha dza yod ta re dza yi ni nan ti ni swA hA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang
237a6(rgyud): bar bgyi'o// che ring ba dang / nad med pa phun sum tshogs pa stsal bar bgyi'o// bsrung bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ de yang snga ma bzhin du lan gnyis 'bum bzlas brjod pagyis/
237a7(rgyud): tha mar snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o// ma grub na yang skye bo thams cad snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// nor chen po dang ldan pa dang / lan theb par 'gyur ro// de nas mi pham mas rang gi snying
237a8(rgyud): po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha a na ti a dzi ti sahA/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na/ bdag gi bsam pa thams cad
237b1(rgyud): yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad du/ rtag tu srang bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na/ de snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha ma ci 'byor pa
237b2(rgyud): mchod de/ mtshan tho thag du gu gul gyis dud pas bsregs cing / til nag po rnam gyi gung la sbyin bsregs bgyis na/ de nas grub par 'gyur te 'tshal bar bgyid do// de nas gzhan gyi
237b3(rgyud): mi thub mas rang gis gi snying po smras pa/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+ha/ sar+b+ba tha an nan rdza bo a ku tI le/ a sa ra dzi te sahA// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par
237b4(rgyud): bgyid na/ bdag de srung ba'i slad du rtag tu de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar ba gyi'o// snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na/ skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro// gzung ba'i tshig dang /
237b5(rgyud): bskal ba bzang por 'gyur ro// ci ste sgrub par 'tshal na/ de snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o// tha ma ci 'byor pas mchod de/ klu shing gi me tog mar
237b6(rgyud): dang sres pas/ lan 'bum sbyin bsregs bgyis na/ de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ tshigra tsam gyis las bgyis las bgyis de bzhin du mi 'gyur ro// de nas dum bu rus/ byang chub sems
237b7(rgyud): dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgor spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
237b8(rgyud): rnams kyi don gyi srad du// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di rang gi snying po dbul lo// nam sarba ta thA ga ti b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha/ oM he jam ste/ oM tsa me he satra/ bcom ldan 'das bdag
238a1(rgyud): gi snying po 'di ni// gdong bzhi pa phyogs bzhi pa byung ba skye dgu gnas pa/ 'byor pa 'byin pa/ sdud par bgyid pa ste/ 'bru dang bas sa bkra shis dang / dbang dang
238a2(rgyud): rnam par 'byor pa 'phel// ngo mtshar mang po rnams dang ldan// 'di ni bcud kyi len gyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di dus thams cad du yid la bgyid na/ bdag 'khor
238a3(rgyud): dang bcas pa ste de'i slang bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o// ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des 'greng yang rung / nyal yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / lam du 'gro yang rung ste/ bdag rnam par bgod pa
238a4(rgyud): bgyis bzhin du/ skyes bu bcing bar bgyi'o// gdod bzhi pa rnam par bkod la phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o// de'i tshes na sa bzungs te zla ba nya'i bar bar bgyi'o// de nas ci 'byor pas mchod
238a5(rgyud): de 'bras sa lu'i phye mas pad ma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bgyis la/ snying po oM zhes bgyi ba dang / rdza zhes bgyi ba shar phyogs su dgod do// ba zhes bgyi ba nub phyogs
238a6(rgyud): su bzhag go// ma zhes bgyi ba byang phyogs su bzhago// ha zhes bgyi ba lho phyogs su bzhag la dngos grub 'tshal bas rtsa ku sha sbams pa'i steng du mchis te/ nub gcig lan cha'i bsreg
238a7(rgyud): lugs lan khri sbyin bsreg bgyis na nang par dngos grub ci 'tshal ba'i 'bras bu stsol to// bzlas brjod bgyid na yi ge go rims bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de nas lag na rdo rje de'i tshe
238a8(rgyud): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bltas nas leg so// zhes bya ba sbyin te/ grogs po dag 'di dag 'di ltar khyed kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po rnams smras shing bul ba dang
238b1(rgyud): rjes su yid rang ba ni/ grogs po dag legs so legs so// snying po 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis grangs pa ste des na 'di dag snying po'i mchog gis zin pas/ dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur/
238b2(rgyud): gang le la zhig bstan pa 'di las 'da' ba/ snying po mchog gi 'bar kun tu rab du 'byed cing 'bar bas/ de'i mgo bo 'goms par 'gyur te/ gzhan du ma yin no// de nas thams cad dang
238b3(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gyur cig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe rdo rje ye
238b4(rgyud): shes chen po'i 'od zer 'bros pa las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ lag pas lag na rdo rje blangs te/ ye shes las 'byung bar ud pa la dri ma med
238b5(rgyud): bar byas nas// ye shes chen po las byung ba'i// yud pa la de la rdo rje bzhag go// rdo rje chen po de bzhag ma thag tu/ de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad dang / sangs rgya
238b6(rgyud): kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du/ kye ma 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ni/ dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje bo// zhes sgra gcig tu 'ur zhes gragaso// de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon
238b7(rgyud): nur gyur pa'i snying kha nas mchog du gsang ba'i snying po 'byung po// na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha man dzu badz+ra dz+wa ya/ Ta ta bi la sa hUM kri ta na ku d+ha ra swa hA// rdo rje'i snying
238b8(rgyud): bo zhes bya ba mchog dang ldan pa 'byung ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de nas bzhugs bzhin du/ phyag g.yas
239a1(rgyud): brkyang te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mgo la byugs nas bka' bstsal pa/ rdo rje chen po legs so legs/ stobs chen rdo rje chen po rdo rje dam pa byin/ lag
239a2(rgyud): na rdo rje dbang bskur bar/ dngos grub sgrub pa rgya cher ni/ bstan pa 'di la bshad par bgyis// de skad gsungs nas rdzu 'phrul che/ sangs rgyas de dag der bzhugs bzhin/ 'jam dpa
239a3(rgyud): gzhon nu'i spyi bo nas/ phyag rnams de dag slar bkug go// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnan pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de'i tshe/ dngos grub pa'i rim par
239a4(rgyud): bye ba smras pa/ thog ma nyid du ring srel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam/ sku gzugs sam dpa'i chos glegs bam gyi mdun du snying po gang yang rung ba rgya cher brjod/ slob dpon mgu
239a5(rgyud): bar byas la gsol ba btab ste/ slob dpon thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ bdag la gsang sngags stsal tu gsol brjod par bya'o// slob dpon de la de skad
239a6(rgyud): ces gsol ba btab nas/ thal mo sbyar te pus mo'i lha ngas la btsugs la lag stong ma yin pas sngags gang 'dod pa blangs par byas te/ byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar
239a7(rgyud): du'o// zhes tshig du brjod par bya'o// gzhan du sngags pa dag gis blangs na ni 'grub par mi 'gyuraro// de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i snying po 'di dag gis spyi bos dngos
239a8(rgyud): grub sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ ri 'am nags tshal lam/ khang stong ngam/ phug gam/ dur khrod dam/ chu klung ngam/ dben par gang yang rung ba der gnas la/ slong mo'i zas za yang
239b1(rgyud): rung / gtsang mar byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la/ dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos lan gsum brjes te/ snying po gang yang rung ba zhig/ lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod
239b2(rgyud): bya'o// de nas ldong ros sam/ lig bu mig gam/ g+hi wang gi sna lngas bkrus kyang rung / ba glang gi lci ba'i phung po steng du bzhugs kyang rung ste/ zla ba yar gyi ngo ches nas bzung
239b3(rgyud): ste/ nyi shar du gzhag go// bdag gi lha dang gzugs tha mi dad par byas la mtshan ma byung gis bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// de la mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin ste/ sngon ma byung ba'i chos
239b4(rgyud): thos par 'gyur ba dang / yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa myong ba snyam du shes pa dang / bdag nyid la yid ches par 'gyur ba
239b5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur/ de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod de/ rdzas de lag pa'i skam par bcug la mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod byas nas// nam phyed
239b6(rgyud): dam byed dam nyi ma shar kar rdzas de 'bar ba 'am/ du ba 'thul ba 'am/ dri bar 'gyur ro// 'bar ba ni lus la bskas na rig sngags 'chang du gyur te/ nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i 'dog
239b7(rgyud): can dang / bskal par gnas pa dang / thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad du rgyu ba dang / 'dod na 'ching bar 'gyur ro// du ba thul na sum ris
239b8(rgyud): byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// ma grub na las su rung ba dang / blon po chen po'i srid thob par 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig
240a1(rgyud): @sangs rgyas rjes su dran par bgyid cing snying po gang yang rung ba zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci 'byor pas mchod la/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la lta zhing
240a2(rgyud): mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na/ de'i gzugs de thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang rung ba'i mdun du bsgrubs na yang de bzhin du 'grub ste gang 'dod pa
240a3(rgyud): de byed do// sngar sprad pa ma byas kyang / gdon mi za bar 'gyur ro// de la dbus kyi yul du ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba bcom ldan 'das drag po chen por 'grub bo// lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni/
240a4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje drag po 'grub bo// 'gro lding ba'i yul du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'gro lding 'grub po// byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni// byang chub sems dpa' lag na pad mo can 'grub bo// shar
240a5(rgyud): phyogs kyi yul du ni dam pa'i sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'grub bo// rgya mtsho chen por ni sring mo bzhi dag 'grub po// rigs kyi bu dag gzhan yang grong khyer chen po rnamasu ni rigs sngags kyi rgyal mo
240a6(rgyud): sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can 'grub bo// skyed mos 'tshal chen por ni gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams 'grub po// khang stong du ni sha za dang / sha za mo rnams 'grub bo// du khrod
240a7(rgyud): du ni ma mo rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / srin po dang / srin mo la sogs pa 'grub bo// de rnams su ni rigs sngags 'chang rnams dang // mi 'am ci rnams 'grub po// dgon pa chen po rnam
240a8(rgyud): su ni dri za rnams 'grub po// 'bab chu rnams su ni klu rnams 'grub po// khang pa chen po dang // shing pa ti'i drung dag du ni 'byung po rnams 'grub bo// byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni/ gnod sbyin chen po
240b1(rgyud): dang na ta ku ber 'grub po// chongs dus su ni tshangs pa 'grub bo// dur khrod du ba dang bcas par ni drag po 'grub po// skyes bu chen po'i gnas su ni khyab 'jug 'grub bo// byang phyogs kyi rgyu
240b2(rgyud): du ni nyi ma 'grub po// gangs ri la ni zla ba 'grub po// lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni smin drug gi bu 'grub po// ri sul dag du ni lha ma yin rnams 'grub po// rigs kyi bu dag rgya mtsho chen po rnams
240b3(rgyud): su ni// lto phye chen po rnams 'grub po// yul ma ga tar ni drang srong chen po rnams 'grub bo// yul ka li kar ni 'byung po'i rgyal po dang ldan 'grub po// gtor khung rnams su ni gnon po 'grub
240b4(rgyud): bo/ khyim gyi bar rnamasu ni grib gnon rnams 'grub po// stan dang gnas rnams su ni/ brjed byed kyi gdon rnams 'grub bo// gzhan yang srin po chen po rnams ni yul lang ka dang / ri ma la
240b5(rgyud): yar 'grub bo// gzhan yang na mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen por 'grub po// gangs khrod du ni g.yar srin gyi lha'i bu rnams 'grub po// gzhan yang ri rtse brgyad pa'i rtse
240b6(rgyud): myor ni rlung bdun 'grub bo// rigs kyi bu dag de ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul
240b7(rgyud): gyi dbang nye bar bzung ste// dus kyi dbang gis gsang sngags sgrub pa dag par mdzad cing / rnam par bzhag par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo
240b8(rgyud): gros kyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dus zhes bya ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dgas yin/ de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal
241a1(rgyud): gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu dus zhes bya ba 'di ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i tshig bla dgas so// de ci'i phyir
241a2(rgyud): zhe na/ ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dgas par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas bzhugs shing mtsho la ba zhes pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par khrod du chud bar bya'o//
