295b6(rgyud): rgya 'di nyid las srin lag gnyis phyung ste/ mthe'u chung gnyis snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni/ na mkha' mtha' yas pa'i rnam par gnon pa'i phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya las/
295b7(rgyud): mthe bong gnyis lag mthil du bzhag pa ni/ bltas mo can gyi phyag rgya'o// mthe bo phyung ste 'dzub mo'i drung du sbyar ba ni/ spyod pa'i blo gros kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo
295b8(rgyud): dang ma ze bo sbyar ba'i/ blo brtan gyi rin za ci'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las 'dzubs gnyis btung ba ni/ dkon mchog 'byung gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// byag rgya 'di nyid las ma the bom
296a1(rgyud): dang srin lag rtse mo sprad la/ gung mo brkyang ba ni/ lag na rin po che'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ mthe bong mthe'u chung sbyar la 'dzub mo bkug
296a2(rgyud): pa ni/ rtag tu brtson par gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te/ srin lag gnyis nang du bcug la/ 'dzub mo gnyis kyi gung mo gnyis kyi rtse mo mnan te/ mthe bong
296a3(rgyud): gnyis ngos la sbyar ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni/ cher
296a4(rgyud): bshad kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ 'dzub mo gnyis brkyang ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi 'od zer 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo gnyis kyis mthe bo
296a5(rgyud): gnyis go cha'i tshul du mkhyud pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi go cha'i phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo g.yas pa bkug pa ni// bcom ldan 'das 'di nyid kyi snyan gyi phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo g.yas
296a6(rgyud): pa bkug la g.yon pa brkyang ba ni/ de nyid kyi smin ma'i phyag rgya'o// 'dzub mo gnyis bkug pa ni/ de nyid kyi shangs kyi phyag brgya'o// de bzhin 'dzub mo gnyis kyi gung mo gnyis
296a7(rgyud): dang / srin lag gnyis la go cha'i tshul du mkhyud pa ni/ yid tsam bkug ste mthe bo gnyis de'i drung du sbyar ba ni/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o//
296a8(rgyud): de nyid kha sbubs te smin 'tsham su bzhag pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du 'dzub mo brkyang la mthe bo gtod de bkug pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das
296b1(rgyud): kyi zhabs kyi phyag rgya chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa la slar sgreng ba ni/ mche ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis nang du bcug
296b2(rgyud): ste phyir sgreng ba ni ljags kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis gdub 'khor gyi tshul du ngos la sbyar ba ni/ mkhur ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis nang du
296b3(rgyud): bcug ste gung mo gnyis kyi drung du sbyar ba ni/ gos ka'i phyag rgya'o// gtsug gi phyag rgya las mthe'u chung gnyis bkyed de snying khar bzhag pa ni/ dpal be'u'i phyag rgya'o// de
296b4(rgyud): bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyor ba'i tshul du sbyar te/ 'dzub mo gnyis gdub 'khor gyi tshul du gung mo gnyis kyi ngos la sbyar ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung gi phyag
296b5(rgyud): rgya chen po'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni/ lte ba'i phyag rgya'o// srin lag gnyis kyang nang du bcug pa ni/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par/
296b6(rgyud): sbar t+ye mthe'u chung gnyis dang / 'dzub mo gnyis ka bkug la/ rdo rje'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje las byang ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje yan lag las byang ba'i
296b7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis gung mo gnyis kyi drung du sbyar la/ lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni/ rdo rje ltar mkhregs pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snol ba
296b8(rgyud): tshul gyis g.yon pa kha sbub la g.yas pa bkan te/ mya ze'u chung gnyis rtse spang la/ sor mo lhag ma rnams mdung rtse gsum pa'i tshul du bzhag pa ni/ gnyis ka'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o
297a1(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe'u chung dang / mthe bo che rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul du bcing ba ni/ rdo rje gdub bu'i phyag rgya ste/ 'tshams bcad pa'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid
297a2(rgyud): las 'dzub mo g.yas g.yon gnyis ka bskum pa ni sa bcings pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje'i phyag rgya 'di nyid las// 'dzub mo snga ma bzhin du brkyang ba la/ lag pa g.yas g.yon gnyis ki
297a3(rgyud): gung mo bkug pa ni// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i phyag rgya las/ gung mo brkyang la srin lag g.yas pa bkug pa ni/ lus kun du 'dzin pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lus kun du 'dzin pa'i phyag rgya de
297a4(rgyud): las srin lag brkyang ste/ 'dzub mo'i tshigs dang po bkug pa ni/ nam mkha' rnam par 'joms pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo yang lag mthil du
297a5(rgyud): pur bu'i tshul du bzhags pa ni/ pur bu rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// phur bu rdo rje'i phyag rgya las/ sor mo thams cad bskam pa ni/ rdo rje bkra shis kyi phyag rgya las// sor mo thams cad bsgreng
297a6(rgyud): ste bzhag pa ni/ rdo rje bla re'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje mdung rtse gsum pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las mdung shing gi tshul du gcig tu bkug pa ni/ rdo rje gtun shing gi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje gtun
297a7(rgyud): bu'i phyag rgya la/ lag pa g.yas pa'i gung mo de srin lag gnyis la bkug la/ 'dzub mo be con gyis tshul du bsgrengs pa ni/ rdo rje be con gyi phyag rgya'o// gung mo de nyis las sbyar te brkyang
297a8(rgyud): ba ni/ rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya las tshigs dang po bkug pa ni/ 'khor lo rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo'i phyag rgya ni 'dzub mo gnyis bkug ste sbyar ba ni/ rdo rje lcag/
297a9(rgyud): rdo rje 'akris kyi phyag rgya'o
297b1(rgyud): ma da'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje lcags mda'i phyag rgya las/ srin lag yang de nyid du sbyar ba ni/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya las/ gung mo sgreng ste brkyang la/
297b2(rgyud): de dag las gcig zhags pa'i tshul du bkug pa ni/ rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa g.yon pa'i sor mo gsum gcig tu bsdus pa ni/ rdo rje rus sbal gyi phyag rgya'o//
297b3(rgyud): rgyab las 'dzub mo sgreng ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las sor mo gnyis rkyang ste 'dzub mo bkum pa ni/ sdang
297b4(rgyud): ba thams cad bkug pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar te gung mo gnyis srin lag gnyis la mkhyud de/ mthe bo gnyis dang 'dzub mo ngos la sbyar ba ni/
297b5(rgyud): rdo rje gnas kyi phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las mthe'u chung gnyis ka brkang nas mthe bo gnyis sgreng bar byas la/ 'di ni gtun shing rkyed nyag ste/ kun du thogs pa med par 'dod/ phyag
297b6(rgyud): brgya 'di nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis de'i drung du bkug pa ni/ rdo rje yan lag brgyan gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' sems chen po lag na rdo rjes/ rdo rje don
297b7(rgyud): yod pa'i dkyil 'khor yang dag par sgrub par bya ba'i phyir// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i rdo rjes byin gyi rlabs pa rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i thab
297b8(rgyud): sra ba sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod pa shes pa/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i phyag rgya gsang chen yan lhas byung ba/ rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa/
298a1(rgyud): / rnams dang / sngon gyis rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa rnams dang / theg pa chen po rtog par khong du chud pa rnams dang / rdo rje 'chang gis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam
298a2(rgyud): kyis mnyan pa 'am// bzung ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dang shes par mi nus na/ gzhan 'jig rten pa mu stegs can rnams kyis shes pa 'am/
298a3(rgyud): rnam par shes pa lta ci smos pa bshad par bsam so// de nas rdo rje 'chang gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i mig gnyis
298a4(rgyud): kyis rnam par blta ste/ rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs kyis brlabs nas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i zur tsam gyis go ba'i ye shes las
298a5(rgyud): byung ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rab 'byam zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo// sems can gyi khams mtha' yas pa sgrol bar byed pa yod do// zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe smin 'tshams kyi
298a6(rgyud): bar nas/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa pa zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'bum phrag du ma dang ldan pa byung ngo // de byung nas na mkha'i khams kyis klas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams zam
298a7(rgyud): cad du sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa 'dun par byas nas/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/ sems can gyi khams byin gyis brlabs te/ slar
298a8(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la ba byas nas mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa// sems dpa' chen
298b1(rgyud): po 'di ni dus so// 'di ni tshod do// de nas bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la dngos grub brtsal bar bgyi'o//
298b2(rgyud): bsrung ba dang gzi brjid phun sum tshogs pa la sogs pa brtsal bar bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje 'chang gis gsang chen dang bcas pa'i yan lag gi phyag rgya smras pa/ mkhas pas dam
298b3(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba/ phyag rgya thog mar bcings nas su/ sangs rgyas snying po dran byas la/ lag pa g.yas pa bskal bar bya// oM rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi phyag ni
298b4(rgyud): mi shes pa'i grong khyer 'jig par byed pa ste/ rdo rje ye shes rnam par dgod pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya'o// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas ste/ steng gi phyogs su yongs skyod nas// sdang ba
298b5(rgyud): rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// bskyod byed rnams kyi g.yo bar 'gyur// gtsug gi tshul du byas nas su// lag pa g.yas pa bskod byas la// rnal 'byor pas ni tshogs mar bzhag/
298b6(rgyud): kha zhes bya bar breng can// thig le dang ni bcas par yang // spyi bo'i steng du gnas par bya// me lce phreng ldan kun tu 'bar// phyogs bcu kun du lam me ba// gtsug tor phyog rgya che//
298b7(rgyud): gtsug tor steng nas gnas pa yin// sngags la/ badz+ra ho khaM swA hA// lag pa de nyid 'dzub bsgreng ste// sgeg pa smin ma gnyis kar yang // sngags pas ha zhes bya ba ni// bskyed gaN+DI/
298b8(rgyud): dang ni ldan par bzhag/ sngags la badz+ra ho tu sahA/ rdo rje smin ma'i phyag rgya'o// gung mo bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis su// lag pa de gnyis gteg nas su// hA zhes bya ba mig gnyis su//
299a1(rgyud): brkyed gnyis dang ni ldan par bzhag/ sngags la badz+ra ho hri sahA// rdo rje mig gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa de gnyis bteg nas su// ha zhes bya ba stobs
299a2(rgyud): ldan par// mthe chung bsgreng ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje sna la bzhag par bya// sngags la badz+ra ha ho sa hA// rdo rje sna'i phyag rgya'o// mthe chung sgreng ba'i tshul gyis su// lag pa de nyid
299a3(rgyud): bteg nas su// sngags pas rna ba gnyis ka la// he zhes bya ba bzhag par bya// sngags la badz+ra ha ho swA hA/ rdo rje rna ba'i phyag rgya'o// mthe bo sgreng ste lag de nyid// bteg nas
299a4(rgyud): 'khur chos ka yang // ha zhes bya bar brkyed gnyis can// brtul zhugs can gyis bzhag par bya// sngags la badza ho ho swa hA// rdo rje mkhur ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags pas gung
299a5(rgyud): mo 'theb sbyar te// lag pa de nyid bsteg nas su/ ha zhes bya ba brkyed gnyis can// brtul zhugs can gyis bzhag par bya// sngags la badz+ra ho huM swA hA// rdo rje mchu'i phyag
299a6(rgyud): rgya'o// sngags shes pas ni 'theb sgreng ste// lag pa de nyis bteg nas su// ha zhes bya ba thig le can// lce'i gnas su bzhag par bya// sngags la badz+ra ho hau swA hA// rdo rje
299a7(rgyud): lce'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa bteg nas su// ra zhes bya ba bzhag byas te/ brkyang gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o// badz+ra ho hor sahA/ rdo rje nu 'jing gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon
299a8(rgyud): pa de nyid ni// mgul ba'i gnas su bzhag par bya// ra zhes bya ba brkyad gnyis can/ 'dzub mo'i rtse mos bzhag par bya// badz+ra ho hri srahA// dpal be'u rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag
299b1(rgyud): pa de nyid bteganas su// mkhas pas mchan khung phyogs su bzhag/ ra zhes bya ba'i theg le can// der ni legs par bzhag par bya// badz+ra ho ram swA hA/ rdo rje 'chan khung phyag
299b2(rgyud): rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// sor mo srin lag tshul gyis ni// ra nyid chag dang bcag par yang / lag pa gnyis ka bzhag par bya// badz+ra ho ra ra swA hA// rdo rje dge ba'i
299b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid btegs nas su// sngags pas snying gi steng du ni// re zhes bya ba rna ru can// ci lta bzhin du bzhag par bya/ badz+ra ho ri swA hA// rdo rje snying gi phyag rgya'o//
299b4(rgyud): lag g.yas dam pa sbyin byas la// mkhas pas sor mo 'dzub mo yis// snying kha nas ni sor gnyis su// bskyed gnyis ldan pa'i bar bzhag go// badz+ra ho ba swa hA// rdo rje
299b5(rgyud): yan lag gi phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid smad nas su// gung mo ba zhes bya ba gnyis// brkyed gnyis dang ni ldan pa yang // rtsibs logs g.yon por bzhag par bya// badz+ra ho
299b6(rgyud): pi bi swA hA/ rdo rje rtsibs logs kyis phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// mkhas pas rtsibs logs g.yas par ni// ba zhes bya ba'i thig le can// maze'u chung sor
299b7(rgyud): mor bzhag par bya// sngags la badz+ra ho baM swa hA// rdo rje rtsibs logs g.yas pa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid bteg nas su// mthe'o dang ni gung mo gnyis// ba zhes bya
299b8(rgyud): ba'i thig le cas/ rna ru rtag can lte bar bzhag/ sngags la badz+ra ho ba sahA/ rdo rje lce'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa de 'i ba te gnas su// lte ba'i 'og gi sor gnyis su// pa zhes
300a1(rgyud): bya ba'i thig le can// gnyis bzhi pas 'dzub mo'i rtse mor bzhag/ sngags la badz+ra ho ba baM srad/ rdo rje zla ba'i sdug phyag rgya'o// lag pa de nyid btag
300a2(rgyud): nas su// brkyed pa'i phyogs su blo ldan gyi// sor mo gung mo tshul gyis su// bkyed gnyis ldan pa'i bar bzhag go// sngags la badz+ra ho be bu swA hA// rdo rje brkyed pa'i
300a3(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yon pa kha sbub la// g.yas pa de yi steng bkan te// lag pa gnyis snol mar sbyar la// mthe bo dang mthe'u chung phan tshun du rdo rje bcings pa'i tshul du byas te/
300a4(rgyud): 'dzub mo bsgreng la g.yon rol nas sor mo thams cad kyis bsgo ba'i tshul du bskor ro// rdo rje bgos pa'i phyag rgya ste/ sngags la badz+ra haM ha sahA// mthe bo gnyis ni bye nas su/
300a5(rgyud): g.yas log su ni yongasu 'phangs// tshangs la sogs pa'i lha skod na// sdang sems pa rnams smos ci dgos// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya zhes// rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyis gsungs/
300a6(rgyud): 'di bzhag bya ba'i tshul gyis su// rgyal ba dam par gyur pa yin// sngags la badz+ra ha baM ba sa hA// 'dzub mo nang du bkug nas su// lhag ma snga ma bzhin du bzhag/ gung mo gyen du bsgre
300a7(rgyud): byas la// 'og gi sa la bzhag par bya// sngags la badz+ra ho haM sa hA/ rdo rje yan lag gi phyag rgya'o// de dag thams cad shes nas su// rdo rje lus su blta bar bya/ bltas pas bgyeg
300a8(rgyud): kyang zhi 'gyur na// pha rol gnon pa smos ci dgos// bltas pas nad rnams thams cad dang // sdang ba thams cad 'jig par byed/ phyag rgya bcas la sngags brjod na// lha la so/
300b1(rgyud): pa dbang du 'gyur// de nas slob ma brtag bya ste// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyis ni/ yan lag thams cad mtshan ldan zhing // yan lag rdzogs pa 'thun pa gdams// mthong ba nyams
300b2(rgyud): dang zur blta dang / ma rungs pa dang yo thung spangs// bye brag du ni blta bya ba rtag/ blta bas don kun bsgrub par byed// dran pa 'jam dam par ma dang // blta ba rnam pa gsum du gsung /
300b3(rgyud): bskad dang bsad dang de bzhin du/ skam dang phung bar bya ba dang // ma rungs pa dag dbang byed dang // tsher gcod pa dag drag bor bstan// 'jam por blta ba 'dzam por byed//
300b4(rgyud): sems can thams cad dbang du byed// bsgrub pa rgya cher sems ldan zhing // 'jam por blta ba snyan par smra// snying rje dang ni thabs ldan zhing // byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med
300b5(rgyud): pa// bdud kyi dpung ni stobs po che// ma thul thams cad 'dul byed na// bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad dang // sdig pa kun la lta ci smos// de lta bas na rnam kun du//
300b6(rgyud): 'jam por blta ba brtag par bya// mdza' dang dgra la sems snyoms zhing // las su bya ba rnam spangs la// sngags pas bar mar gnas pa ni// gal te thabs la mkhas shig
300b7(rgyud): na// yid la bsam par 'gyur ba yi// dgos pa thams cad byed par 'gyur// de lta bas na rnam par sbyar// gang zhig blta ba yongs dag cing // de bzhin nyid kyang rnam dag
300b8(rgyud): pa// de la rdo rje ye shes phyir// brtul zhugs can gyis mchog tu bstan// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras
300b9(rgyud): kun du/ lta ba 'di ni rma
301a1(rgyud): so// rigs kyi bu ji ltar khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin/ don bdag gis shes pa ltar na// bdag 'di snyam du byang chub sems dpa' yid rnam par byang ba'o snyam
301a2(rgyud): byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / lag na rdo rje 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal leg so legs so// yid rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir/
301a3(rgyud): tshig 'di khyod kyis legs par smras so// 'jam dpal de'i phyir nyon cig dang / gang dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems
301a4(rgyud): dpa' rnams/ gsang sngags rnams la gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i yid rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sgo kho bos khyod la bshad par bya'o// 'jam dpal
301a5(rgyud): de la rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dkyil 'khor mthong ba// byang chub tu sems bskyed pa/ yid snying rje dang ldan pa/ thabs la mkhas pas gsang sngags kyi sgo yi ge'i tshul
301a6(rgyud): bstan pa la mkhas pas/ 'di snyam du ngag ma rtogs par yid med/ yid ma rtogs par dag med// yid ma rtogs par lta ba'i gzugs med de/ yid nyid ngag yin/ ngag nyid yid
301a7(rgyud): yin zhing // lha'i gzugs nyid dang yid yin la/ ngag nyid dang lha'i gzugs yin no// snyam du bsam par bya'o// de ltar tha dad du bya ba med par mos na// sngags pas yid rnam
301a8(rgyud): par dag pa 'thob bo// yid rnam par dag pa dang ldan pa de dag gi tshe na/ rnam pa thams cad du rtag par bdag gi ngag dang / lha'i ngag du bdag gi yid dang lha'i yid du mtshungs par/
301b1(rgyud): mthong ba de'i tshe mnyam par bzhag pa yin no// gang tshe kun du thams cad du/ sngags ma mnyam par bzhag gyur na// de tshe lus la sogs pa yi// mnyam nyid gnas la zhug
301b2(rgyud): par 'gyur// mnyam nyid gnas la gnas pa yi// yan lag bskyod pa ji snyed pa// tshig tu brjod pa ji snyed pa// de snyed gsang sngags phyag rgya yin// sngags pas kun tu dgra
301b3(rgyud): med cing // rtag tu mi g.yo bde bar gnas// dbang phyug kun gyi go 'bang 'thob// 'dod pa 'byor pa'i gnas la gnas// de bsil yongs su gdung ba med// bzod dang
301b4(rgyud): ldan pa'i tshul khrims bsdam// de nas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros kyi// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji tsam du yid
301b5(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar to//
301b6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na/ sa chen po'i rkang pa gnyis pa dang / rkang pa bzhi pa rnams la phan par 'gyur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du chos kyi sgo 'di yang / byang chub
301b7(rgyud): sems dpa' spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par 'gyur ba yin no// rigs kyi bu gang dag chos kyi sgo 'di la mngon par brtson par
301b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni sngags kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i gnas la skal par yod pa yin no// lag na rdorje smras pa/ zhi ba'i blo gros de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no/
302a1(rgyud): @de dag ni bla na med pa yang byar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa ste/ de dag ni rdo rje dkyil 'khor chen po la 'jug pa dang / mnyan pa dang // yang dag par 'dzin pa'i
302a2(rgyud): skal ba yod pa dag go// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu gang dag rnam par
302a3(rgyud): dag pa'i sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mngon par brtson pa de dag ni phyag bgyi ba lags te/ bdag cag thams cad g.yog dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus nas/ gos
302a4(rgyud): dang zas rnams kyis de dag la bsti stang du bgyi/ bla mar bgyi// ri mor bgyi/ mchod par bgyi'o// grong na gnas kyang rung / dgon par gnas kyang rung ste/ gnod pa thams
302a5(rgyud): cad kyang bzlog par bgyi'o// phan pa rnams nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par brtson pa de dag ni re ba thams
302a6(rgyud): cad ci tsam yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyid pa de srid bar du/ bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par mi bgyi'o//
302a7(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces smras so// legs so legs so// grogs po dag 'di ltas ste/ gang gi lag na/
302a8(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i sgo gnas pa de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byang chub po// 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags kyi spyod pa mngon par rdzogs pa byang chub pa 'dzin pa la bsti bstad
302b1(rgyud): bya/ ri mor byas te/ 'di nyid bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje de'i tshe// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnam bsrud
302b2(rgyud): ba'i phyir rnams par dag pa mtha' yas pa'i gnas kyi gsang sngags kyi tshigs rnam smras pa// na ma sarba ta thA gA te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha hU~M sa tsa li ni ke rak+Sha rak+Sha/ da kad
302b3(rgyud): ka bud ta gi tsan da li/ sha pa ri ni ke dri rang na/ sa ma pa ya ni/ ma ha sa hi na ma si sa hA/ chos smra ba gang la la zhig gis/ nyin lan gsuM mtshan lan gsum dran par byas na/
302b4(rgyud): de la 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar te/ gung mo gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni/ byang chub kyi snying po gnon pa'i rnga
302b5(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis kyi tshigs dang po bkug pa ni bdud yang dag par btul ba'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis slar sbar te/
302b6(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni/ bdud dpung skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las srin lag gnyis bzhibs te/ the bong gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni// bdud
302b7(rgyud): kyi sde rnams 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid las 'the bo gnyis phyung la/ 'dzub mo gnyis bkug la nang du bcug pa ni/ bdud 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ nam/
302b8(rgyud): sarba ta tha ga de bya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ga ces/ phyag rgya 'di nyid lasa'i the bo g.yas pa gnan pa ni/ gdon thams cad par gcod pa'i byam rgya'o// sngags lenas san ta/
303a1(rgyud): thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha dri dzA swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las 'dzub mo g.yas pas 'the bo g.yon pa gnan pa ni/ srin mo thams cad tshar gcod
303a2(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha// sarba mu khu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha he he ha ra tra sA hA// phyag rgya 'di nyid las lag pa g.yon pa'i srin lag gis/ lag pa g.yas pa'i
303a3(rgyud): 'thil du drud pa ni mkha 'gro ma thams cad kyi snying rnam par 'jom pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+rU~M/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha he ra gi ni he ha sahA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid la
303a4(rgyud): snyim pa'i tshul du byas la/ 'dzub mo gnyis dang 'the bo banyis 'dung gi tshul du byas pa ni/ rdo rje mdung gi phyag rgya ste/ klu thams cad kyi snying rnam par 'joms pa'o// sngags lan
303a5(rgyud): ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha rang ga ra ri ni pud ta sahA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la/ gung mo gnyis stsol ba ni/ gnod sbyin thams cad char gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o//
303a6(rgyud): sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+he/ sarba mu khe b+he/ sarba tha tsa gi ra ni hUM na di ke swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ mthe'u chung gnyis nang du bcug la/ gung mo gnyis snga ma bzhin du bzhi pa
303a7(rgyud): ba ni/ dri za char gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ye/ sarba tha be hi ri ke saha// phyag rgya 'di nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis mkhyud pa'i tshul du byas pa ni lnga
303a8(rgyud): ma yin thams cad nges par 'joms pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha hUM hUM phaT baT sahA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis mkhyud
303b1(rgyud): pa bsgreng ste/ sor mo lhag ma rnams brkyang ba ni/ na mkha' lding thams cad bran bzhin las ci yang byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha
303b2(rgyud): ha ti pi ga la mu gi sa hA/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbar la/ lag pa g.yon pa bkan te g.yas kha sbu ba la/ srin lag gis lag pa g.yon pa'i mthil du reg par bya ba ni/ mi 'am
303b3(rgyud): ci char gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA gra te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sar+b+ba thA dzA sa ni sahA// phyag rgya 'di nyid las 'dzub mos lag pa
303b4(rgyud): de nyid kyi mthil du reg par byas pa ni/ lto phyed chen po tshar gcod pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+r-i/ sarba tha ga ra li ni satwa/ de bzhin du lag pa gnyis sbyar la/ lag
303b5(rgyud): pa gnyis gasnol ba ni/ sdang ba thams cad dag pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags ni na ma sarba ta thA ga te/ b+hA/ DA s+yAr+b+ba b+hA he tsan de he baM pi ge swA hA/ lag pa de nyid sor mo rnams gcig gis gcig
303b6(rgyud): mkhyud/ lag pa gnyis snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni/ srin po thams cad kyi snying tshig par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+hany+dza sAr+b+ba the ge ka ri ni dzang ka ri ni ke swahA/
303b7(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis yid tsam bkug pa 'di ni srin po thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga ta b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ba
303b8(rgyud): ga ra na dzi ki bi da la mu khe sahA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ 'dzub mo gnyis bye ste/ mthe bo snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni/ sha za 'dul ba'i phyag rgya ste/ rgyal mchog rnams kyis stag/
304a1(rgyud): du gsungs so// sngags la na ma serba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha mi tsi sa hA phyag rgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bye la/ 'dzub mo gnyis snga ma bzhin
304a2(rgyud): bzhag pa ni/ sha za mo thams cad kyi snying rmongs par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha bi ga tsi ni sahA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las srin lag bye
304a3(rgyud): ste/ gong ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni/ 'byung po thams cad dbang du bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ba gung+ga swAhA// phyag rgya 'di nyid las mtshan
304a4(rgyud): chung gnyis kyang phye la/ srin lag gnyis snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni/ 'byung po thams cad 'gugs pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHsar+b+ba tha gu mi ga le ke swAhA/
304a5(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ mthe bo g.yon pa brkyang la/ lhag ma snga ma bzhon bzhag pa ni/ grib non thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+he/ sarba
304a6(rgyud): mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tsa ga li tsa ki sahA// de bzhin du mthe bo g.yon pa yang brkyang la/ g.yas pa snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni/ grib gnon thams cad 'jigs par byed pa'i phyag
304a7(rgyud): rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thag te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha dzi te ke sahA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las 'dzub mo gnyis bye ste gnol ba'i tshul du bkug la/ mthe bo gnyis kyi
304a8(rgyud): steng du bzhag pa ni/ brjed byed thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta tha gA te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha la ma po ta ri br-ing shi ne sad/ phyag rgya 'di
304b1(rgyud): nyid las/ sor mo thams cad sgreng ba ni/ brjed byed ma thams cad skrag par byed pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga tre b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ba rang de u
304b2(rgyud): la ka mu khi bi yu ri ke sa hA// de bzhin du sor mo thams cad bkug ste/ nang du bcug la/ mthe bo gnyis sgreng ste de ltar byas pa 'di ni/ byang sde mas thams cad kyi sing skam
304b3(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha khi khi ri hri da ya bi dar ni sahA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis bkug ste/ nang du bcug la/
304b4(rgyud): 'dzub mo gnyis sgreng ba 'di ni/ byang sdems thams cad kyi snying kun du spang ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+he/ sarba tha bi sa ri ne sahA/ de nas
304b5(rgyud): yang lag na rdo rjes byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i stobs bcu'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje ye shes las mngon par byung ba rnam
304b6(rgyud): kyi don du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po las byung ba'i phyag rgya gsang ba rab 'byam bstan pa'i sgo smras pa/ thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag bya ste/
304b7(rgyud): byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas la/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i mig gis sems can gyi khams khyab par byas te/ spos kyi lag pa bkrus la shar phyogs sam/
304b8(rgyud): byang phyog su bltas te/ phyag rgya legs par bcings par bya'o// lag pa gnyis snyim par sbyar la btod de bzhag pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che tog gi phyag rgya'o// sngag
305a1(rgyud): la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu kho b+h+ya/ sarba tha dri rat+na ni rA dza hU~M sahA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las mthe bo gnyis bkug ste ngos la sbyar ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs
305a2(rgyud): pa me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// sngogs la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha dasta na sa ma ba ba swAhA/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las 'dzub mo
305a3(rgyud): gnyis rdo rje'i tshul du bkug ste/ gung mo ngos kyi thad kar bzhag pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/
305a4(rgyud): sarba tha a mi tod pa be da d+ha su ri ni sahA/ 'dzub mo gnyis bkug ste/ 'di nyid kyi rtse mo la reg par byas pa ni mi 'khrug pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba
305a5(rgyud): mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha bi ka ta badz+ra ra dz+nyA na snga ma pa ba sa hA/ lag pa gnyis khu tsur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo gnyis mthe bo gnyis la mkhyud pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par gzig
305a6(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ka na kaM bi tsu rid ta dz+nyA na d+he swa hA/ phyag brgya 'di nyid las gung mo gnyis bzhi bas te sgreng ba ni/ bcom /
305a7(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha b+ha na shi ki sam pa saha/ de bzhin du snga ma ltar khu
305a8(rgyud): tshur bcangs la srin lag gnyis bzhibs te sgreng ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das thams cad skyobs kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba
305b1(rgyud): tha bi shud d+ha g+ha dz+nyA na bi sahA/ snga ma bzhin du de ltar khu tshur bcangs la/ mthe'u chung gnyis bzhibs te sgreng ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das log pa dad sel gyi phyag rgya'o//
305b2(rgyud): sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha dzi ma swA hA/ de bzhin du khu tshur bcangs la// mthe bo gnyis dang 'dzub mo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni/
305b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po dbu'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+hu/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha hri satwa/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ gung mo
305b4(rgyud): phyung ste bzhibs te sgreng ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo bsgyur ba chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta tha ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha rdzi
305b5(rgyud): swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid las gung mo gnyis phyung ste tshigs dang po bkug pa de nyis las bsgyur ba ni spyan gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha ti/
305b6(rgyud): phyag rgya de nyid las/ mthe bo gnyis yid tsam bkug la/ 'dzub mo gnyis la phyogs par bya/ lhag ma snga ma bzhin bzhag pa ni// bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i phyag rgya'o// sdug
305b7(rgyud): la nA ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba a/ snga ma bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ 'dzub mo gnyis bkyed de brkyang la/ tshigs dang po bkug cing mthe
305b8(rgyud): bo gnyis brkyang ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ba kring / phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ gung mo gnyis bkyeng
306a1(rgyud): de brkyang ba mthe bo gnyis nang du bcug pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis lte ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tri/
306a2(rgyud): snga ma bzhin du lag pa gnyis khu tshur bcangs la/ mthe'u chung gnyis byung ste bkyed pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+hu/ sarba su
306a3(rgyud): khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha traM/ 'di dag ni bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o// dgos pa'i don thams cad bsgrub pa'o// gang zhig nang gi dag pa yis/ phyag rgya 'di dag 'dzin
306a4(rgyud): byed pa/ sngags pa 'di ni sdig bral bar/ 'gyur te de la the tshom med/ rdo rje 'chang rnams thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ni// rdzu 'phrul chen pa'i lha kun yang
306a5(rgyud): blo dang ldan pa de la bsrung // de lta bas na rnam kun tu// bdag nyis che la gus par bya// rig sngags rtag tu bzlas byas na/ de la dngos grub mi dka'o// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs
306a6(rgyud): pa'i sngags// tshe 'di la ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'jig rten sngags rnams gang yin pa// de dag de yi dbang 'gyur te// bsgo ba ci bzhin gyis shig ces// de yi g.yas g.yon 'khor
306a7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// mi men lha yi sman rnams dang // de'i dbang du gyur cing 'khod// sngags pas sngags kyi gsang gnas nas// gang tshe lus ni 'thob 'gyur na// dbang phyug gi ni gnas
306a8(rgyud): mchog tu// de tshe de ni skye bar 'gyur// gang na dbang ldan bcom ldan 'das// rnam par snang mdzad che bzhugs par// rgyal ba'i sras po 'dod pa bzhin// skye ba dag ni 'dzin par
306b1(rgyud): 'gyur// ji srid byang chub 'gyur gyi bar// rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyis// thams cad du ni byin gyis brlabs// de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ka sbyar la// srin lag gnyis nang du bcug
306b2(rgyud): ste/ 'dzub mo gnyis tshigs dang po bkug la/ gung mo gnyis bzhibs pa la nas gang gis ma reg pa tsam du bzhag cing / mthe bo gnyis de'i drung du bzhag pa ni// rdo rje drag po
306b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tsan+ta mahA ro Shan hUM phaT/ phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ 'dzub mo g.yas pas gung mo sgreng ba las mkhyud pa 'di
306b4(rgyud): ni// rdo rje drag po chen po'i mgo yi phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ma/ 'dzub mo g.yon pas gung mo sgreng ba la 'khyud pa las/ 'dzub
306b5(rgyud): mo g.yas pa phye ste/ snga ma bzhin du tshig dang po bkug ste bzhag pa ni rdo rje drag po chen po'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+he/
306b6(rgyud): sarba tha dzI/ de bzhin du 'dzub mo gnyis kyis gung mo sgreng la khyud pa ni/ rdo rje drag po chen po'i go cha'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+ha/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha~M a/
306b7(rgyud): de bzhin du 'jug mo gnyis bye ba glog 'gyu ba'i thabasu brkyang ba ni/ rdo rje drag po rdo rje me 'bar ba chen po'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha/
306b8(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di nyid las/ 'dzub mo g.yas pa bkug ste/ mthe bo'i drung du bzhag pa ni/ drag po chen po'i dpral ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags nam sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sa
307a1(rgyud): tha bi laM bi ta ka ti swAhA/ de bzhin du 'dzub mo g.yon pa'i drung du bzhag la/ gung mo sbrengs pa tshig dang po bkug ste yid tsam smad pa ni/ rdo rje drag po chen
307a2(rgyud): bo chen po'i nu 'jing gi phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ nA ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha ha swa hA/ ka ta ka ta/ tsa ra tsa ra/ he pra tsan+d+ra badz+ra saha/ de bzhin du nub 'jing gi phyag
307a3(rgyud): rgya las 'dzub mo bkug ste bkyed la brkyang zhing / mthe'u chung gnyis nang du btsug pa ni/ rdo rje drag po chen po'i dpal be'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/
307a4(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha pi pu la badz+ra tsaN+DA swA hA/ phyag rgya 'di nyis las mthe'u chung phyung ste snga ma bzhin du bzhag pa ni/ rdo rje drag po chen po'i kang pa'i phyag rgya'o// sngags la na ma sarba
307a5(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha pid tsid tra ka tid sa hA/ de ltar phyag rgya rab 'byam 'di dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnam pa sna tshog
307a6(rgyud): su gnas pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams du mar sems can gyi khams du mar rnam par sbyor bar byed pa dus gsum la stobs thogs pa med pa chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa las byung
307a7(rgyud): ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto phyi chen
307a8(rgyud): po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'gro ba gcod par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rtogs pa thob par byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang thugs kyi bkod
307b1(rgyud): pa bstan pa gnas par byed pa/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed par byed pa/ rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa sgrub par byed pa/ byang chub
307b2(rgyud): sems dpa' gsang sngags kyis sgo nas spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi migs tu gyur pa sha stag go// lag
307b3(rgyud): na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa de bzhin gshegs pa sngon gyis sprod pa'i rgyu 'thun pa bstan pa dang / cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul ba'i gnas phyag rgya rab
307b4(rgyud): 'byam ji snyed cig rnyed pa'o// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba// / bam po bcu pa//
307b5(rgyud): de nas yang lag na rdo rjes/ bdud thams cad bam par byed pa/ bkod pa rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems lag
307b6(rgyud): na rdo rje snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag g.yas pa brkyang ste/ lag na rdo rje'i mgo la byug nas legaso zhes
307b7(rgyud): bya ba byin te/ sems can kun la phan byed pa// dpa' bo chen po legs so legs// gsang sngags spyod pas byung ba yi// rdo rje sngags thams byed pa'i phyir// sdang ba'i
307b8(rgyud): sems can 'jig byed pa/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// rdo rje rkang stabs cho ga rim pa// sems can chen po khyod kyi ston// rdo rje 'byung ba'i rkang stabs ni// sngags
308a1(rgyud): rgyal rnams kyi spyi yin te/ 'dug pa dang ni 'gro ba dang // ldang dang rnam par gtor ba dang // dgug pa dang ni brkyang ba dang // rkang pas bcing dang bskum
308a2(rgyud): po dang / spo ba dang ni bzhag pa dang // khu tshur bcad pas bzung ba dang // gzing dang rdo rje gzhum pa dang // rdo rje'i phyag rgyas pur btab pa// seng ge lta bur 'tshong ba dang // hUM zhes bya bas
308a3(rgyud): sdigs pa dang // stan las langs nas mchu mnan dang // khro gnyer phral bar blta ba dang // smin ma bskyod par bya ba dang // de bzhin mig gnyis bgrang pa dang // rkang pas rnam par
308a4(rgyud): dbye ba dang // lag gnyis sbyar bar bya ba dang // de bzhin rkang pa bskyod pa dang // rkang pa gnyis kyis mchod pa dang // lus ni snyigs dang bcas par yang // bye brag du ni bstod
308a5(rgyud): pa dang // bcad dang brtab dang 'gyed pa dang // bza' dang rnam par bgad pa dang // kun tu sgra dang rnam sgra dang // drag tu byed dang bcing ba dang // de bzhin lha la bsnyen bya dang /
308a6(rgyud): rengs par bya dang rmugs bya dang // gyen du mchod dang bskrun pa dang // mdzes pa'i stabs dang rtsub pa dang // bsgrub pa'i dang por sngar spyad dang // de bzhin lha la bsnyen bya dang /
308a7(rgyud): sngags pa'i sa ni dkyil 'khor dang // dngos grub ci 'dra yin pa dang // sems can khams la rnam kun du// srung dang sba bar bya ba dang // dpa'o 'di dag thams cad dang // gzhan
308a8(rgyud): yang yid la ci 'dod dang // sdang sems ldan pa de dag la// de bzhin phyir gso bya ba dang // 'di dag thams cad rgya cher ni// sems can thar pa 'dod pas smos// de nas de bzhin
308b1(rgyud): gshegs pa de dag gis// rkang stabs kyi thabs kyis rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir/ gsang sngags 'di gsungaso// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+ha/ sarba tha huM hUM hUM/
308b2(rgyud): peT phaT phaT/ ts+tshi na da dz+wa li ta mu rti swA hA// de nas lag na rdo rje gsang sngags 'di thos nas// dga' zhing mgu la/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bltas
308b3(rgyud): nas smras pa/ kye grogs po dag nyon cig/ sems can gang la la dag sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su dong ba rnam dang // byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gsang
308b4(rgyud): sngags kyi spad pa spyod cing / gsang sngags kyi tshul la brtson pa de dag la/ ci nas ston pa'i bstan pa yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir// ding phyin chad bsrung bar gyis shig/ bsti
308b5(rgyud): stang du gyis shig/ ri mor gyis shig/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor der/ mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa/ chos kyi rjes bka' stsal pa bzhin 'tshal lo// zhes brjod nas
308b6(rgyud): cang mi smra bar 'khod do// de nas lag na rdo rje yang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag gang la la ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs
308b7(rgyud): pa sngon gyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor la bsrung ba bsgrub par brtson pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dam tshig
308b8(rgyud): la 'gal bar byed na/ rigs pa'i rgyal po drag zos rdo dza 'bar ba rab tu 'bar kun du mched cing rab tu 'bar ba des/ mag zi tshal ba bdun du 'gas so// de nas byang chub
309a1(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes/ byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so// zhi ba'i blo gros stangs stabs kyi mtshan nyid
309a2(rgyud): sngon gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas nas// sngags pas shar phyogs kha
309a3(rgyud): bltas te// 'greng la thal mo tshogs mar bzhag/ sdang stabs lta bur 'joms mchog gis// rdo rje sdang tshul gar byed cing // tshogs ma'i thal mo bab nas su// snying khar bzhag pa
309a4(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// phyogs rnams kun tu bskor bar bya// rdo rje khur chur bcangs nas su// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas la// g.yon pa brgyad pa'i rgyab du bzhag/ rkang pa g.yas pa
309a5(rgyud): brkyang nas su// g.yas pa bskam par legs par sbar// g.yon pa tshogs mar gtod nas su// sdang ba kun la sdigs par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang bya zhing // gnyis ka rdo rje khu
309a6(rgyud): tshur bcad// khros bcas hUM zhes bya bas bgyid// rdo rje bsnun pas bsnun par bya// rdo rje gar gyis bsgyur nas su// rkang pa g.yon pa bskam byas la// de ltar phyogs bzhi rnams su yab
309a7(rgyud): rdo rje mnan 'gros mnan par bya// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// bkyed pa'i gnas su bzhag par bya// rting sprang gnas su// mig ni thur du blta bar bya// rdo rje phur bu btab nas su// su
309a8(rgyud): 'og rnams bdun g.yo bar 'gyur// 'brug sgra dal sgra hu ldan zhing // rab 'bar rdo rje 'chang 'dra bar// rdo rje gyen du dgyed par bya// rgyab tu thal mo sbyar bar bya// de nas rdo rje gar bya zhing /
309b1(rgyud): lte ba'i gnas su gzhag par bya// 'di 'dra gnas la gnas nas su// myur 'gro la shin tu bslabs pas bzhig/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // khro bo phyag brnyan bran mo
309b2(rgyud): yi// mtshon cha'i phyag rgya ji snyed pa// rdo rje be con dbyug to dang / mdung thung mda' chen 'khor lo// rdo rje ce gcig gtun shing sogs// pho nya pho mo gang yin dang // bgegs la sog
309b3(rgyud): ba rnam par bzlog/ phyag rgya'i tsho gas gzhan gang gsungs pa// bgegs rnams gshig par byas pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor 'di ni mnan rnams kyis// spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa ra ni/
309b4(rgyud): bslab pa'i sngags pas lhar bcas dang / lha min gsang ba kun du gzhom// dkyil 'khor la ni bgegs bya phyir// tshangs pa'i sdong bu thug pa nas// sa steng gnas pa lha'i
309b5(rgyud): bar// gcig tu 'dus nas lhag gyur kyang // gtor bar bya ba'i mchog shes pa'i// spangs pas hUM zhes bya ba yis// thams cad rnam par gtor 'gyur te// shing mdab rlung
309b6(rgyud): gis gtor bzhin// rdo rje 'bar ba'i me gyur nas// bskal ba'i me 'dras langs nas su// rdo rje rkang par ldan par ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun gzhom mo// rdo rje gnon dang ldan par
309b7(rgyud): ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas bcom nas su// sngags pas sa gsum bung byed na// bgegs dang log 'dren smos ci dgos// chen po'i rdo rje phyag rgya yis// sdang sngabs 'di ni spyi yin te/
309b8(rgyud): bsgrub min don yang bsgrub byed na/ cho ga zhi ba las byung ce smos// rdo rje 'byung ba dam pa ni// thog mar bcings pa byas nas su// de nas rdo rje mchog reg las// byung ba gzhan
310a1(rgyud): yang bcing bar bya// 'di las gsang sngags rnams dang ni// sdang stabs rnam pa thams cad byung // de lta bas na rnam kun du/ sngags pas sgribs
310a2(rgyud): te bsgribs par bya// dam tshig chen pos rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// seng ge bzhin du pha rol gnon// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun du bzhom// rdo rje rkang pas brkyang par bya// hUM
310a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i sgra sgrogs shing // rdo rje phyag rgyas bcom nas su// sa rnams kun kyang g.yo 'gyur na// gsang dang klu rnams smos ci dgos// seng ge'i tshul du mchongs nas
310a4(rgyud): ni// bgegs dang seng ge gzugs 'dren dang // glang chen shing rta spre'u dang // rta gzhan gang dag bzhi pa 'am// de nas rnam par 'bros pa 'am/ 'chi bar 'gyur te the
310a5(rgyud): tshom med// chal byis pa'i gages rnams kyang // ska cig de la myur du 'jig/ seng ge ltar rol gnon pa'i/ sdang stabs so// rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'dug ste// rkang pa snol
310a6(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis ka ni// brkyed pa nas su bzhag par bya// hUM brjod mgul ba gsal ba'i sgras// lag g.yas rdo rje gar bya zhing // rkang pa g.yon pa
310a7(rgyud): gteg nas ni// de yi rtse mo sar gtsugs la// rkang pa g.yon pa bteg nas ni// de yi rtse mo sar gtsugs la/ lag na rdo rje gsor gcas par// lag g.yon snying khar
310a8(rgyud): bzhag nas ni// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du skor// rdo rje 'bar ba'i me bsgyur nas// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan par// rdo rje mgul pa gsal ba'i sgras// phyogs kun yongs
310b1(rgyud): su rdzogs par// bgegs kyi gnas su dmigs nas dmigs nas ni// myur du rdo rje gom stabs kyi// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas nas ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas kun du gzhom/
310b2(rgyud): de bzhin phyogs 'tshams rnams kyang // kun du yang dag gzhom par bya// bdud sde mi bzad chen po dang // phyogs rnams kun nas byung ba kun// g.yas brkyang gom pa'i
310b3(rgyud): stabs sbyar te// / rdo rje phyag rgyas kun du gzhom// sa gsum thams cad g.yo 'gyur na// bgegs dang log 'dren smos ci dgos/
310b4(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya bltas nas ni// bges dang log 'dren thams dang // mi bzad gzugs can srin po rnams// phyogs rnams kun du bros par 'gyur// rdo rje g.yas pa
310b5(rgyud): brkyang ba'o// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nasu// tshogs mar rdo rje thal sbar te// rdo rje bcas pa'i lag bskor zhing // sprin ltar yongs su khyab par bya// rdo rje gar gyis gar
310b6(rgyud): bya zhing // mchu ni so yis mnan par bya// khu tshur g.yon pa gdego bar bya// g.yas pa snying khar bzhag par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa te ga nas su// ga ya se rol du
310b7(rgyud): ni bcug par bya// 'brug sgra dal sgra hUM brjod pa// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i brkang mnan te// rdo rje 'dzin pas bsnun par bya// g.yas pas la gcugs par bya// rdo rje
310b8(rgyud): de ba sa 'og tu// bsnun na thams cad g.yo bar byed/ sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i klu/ gsang dang lha min srin bor bcas// thams cad g.yo ba 'di ci zhes/
311a1(rgyud): ya mtshan 'dzin pa'i sems gyur nas// 'di dag thams cad ci 'gyur te/ bskal pa zad par ma gyur bgrang // de skad phan tshun 'dri bar byed/
311a2(rgyud): gnas de nas ni yang bskyod nas// rdo rje 'bar ba'i mig ldan pa// rdo rje phyag rgya hUM brjod te// rdo rje rkang pas bsnun par bya// klu dang gsang ba thams cad dang // gzhan yang
311a3(rgyud): gang dag sar gnas pa// gang na sngags 'chang 'dug pa yi// gnas der thams cad lhags nas su// lung ni yongs su nod byed cing // rdo rje 'bar bas rab nyen pas/
311a4(rgyud): jo bo ci zhig stsol cig pa// bka' lung myur du bdag cag stsol// bcud kyis len tam dngul chu 'am// 'on te mig bsku'i sman rdzogs sam// gnod sbyin pho mos 'bangs
311a5(rgyud): su 'am// 'on te rgyal srid bzhed gyur ta maM/ 'on te dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam// 'on te yul sa gzhan bzhed dag/ rdo rje 'bar bas gzir gyur pas// bzhod pa thams cad
311a6(rgyud): bskang bar bgyi// sngags pas 'ga' zhig blangs nas su// de dag la ni byams par bya// rdo rje gar ni legs byas zhing // phyag rgya de ni bsdu bar bya// cho ga mthong ba'i las kyi
311a7(rgyud): su/ rdo rje gnas su bzhag par bya// gzhan du na ni gsang ba dang // srin po thams cad gnod byed de// glags blta klan ka tshol byed pa// gzir ba de dag gnod par byed/
311a8(rgyud): glags su gyur pa rtogs nas su// sngags pa la ni gnod par byed// de lta bas na rnam kun du// blo dang ldan pa'i bsgrub pa po// rdo rje gnas ni rig bcas ma// sdang stabs bya
311b1(rgyud): bya ba sbyar bar bya// g.yon brkyang ba'i rkang pa'i sdang stabs so// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su/ dpral bar thal mo sbyar bar bya// rdo rje gar ni byas nas su/ thal mo snying khar
311b2(rgyud): bzhag par bya// tshangs pa rkang stabs byas nas su// pad ma'i thal mo rgyas par bya// gnyis ka khu tshur bcangs nas su// g.yas pa gyen du brkyang par bya// g.yon pa snying
311b3(rgyud): khar bzhag par bya// hUM dang phaT bcas khros bgyis shing // sos ni mchu yang mnan byas nas// / rdo rje
311b4(rgyud): nyi ma'i mig ldan zhing // gzhin ni khro gnyer rim bcas pas// gar byed pa'i tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yas pa dgug par bya// g.yon pa yang ni de bzhin dgug/
311b5(rgyud): rdo rje gsor ba'i phyag rgya yis// lag pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// gyen du bltas na drag du ni// rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnan par bya// rdo rje phyag rgya bsnun pas ni/ tshangs pa
311b6(rgyud): bcas dang brgya byin bcas// gnas dang bcas pa thams cad mgul// phan tshun gcig la gcig blta zhing // grogs dag bskal pa 'khrugs 'gyur tam/
311b7(rgyud): 'on te sems can che 'byung ngam// 'on te sangs rgyas 'das gyur tam// ci zhes thams cad phan tshun smra// basmos ces gyur nas phan tshun dang // phyogs bcu dag tu bar+Na
311b8(rgyud): bar byed// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir bas na// gnas de nas ni deng nas su// rdo rje ldan pa ci bzhed pa// gsungs zhes lus kyis gnon par byed// bdag cag nongs
312a1(rgyud): ma mchis shing // bka' dang mgal bar bgyi ma lags// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir gyur nas// bka' lung myur du bdag la stsol// rdo rje can gyi rdo rje can
312a2(rgyud): mig mi 'dzum par rtag tu blta// lta ba la gzhan rnams de dag kyang // rdo rje 'bar bas rgyal gyur nas// rdo rje dam pa ldan pa la// thugs la ci dgongs mdzod cig dang /
312a3(rgyud): gal te rgyal srid bzhed gyur tam// de bzhin mi dang lha gzhed dam/ lha'i bu mo bsnyems par dang // lha'i bde ba yid mthun bzhed// thugs la gang bzhed de dag rnams/
312a4(rgyud): de dag 'bul bar bgyid par 'gyur// de nas lnga yang rdzu 'phrul che// de dag yid rnams rab dga' nas// rdo rje 'bar bas gzir ba dag/ bsgrub pa po la myur du dbul// de nas
312a5(rgyud): byams pa'i sems kyis ni// bsngags pas bltas nas gtang bar bya// gzhan du na ni gzir de dag/ glags brnyed na ni/ gnod par 'gyur// rdo rje 'byung bar yang 'du ste/
312a6(rgyud): rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya// tshogs mar thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya// rkang pa spos pa'i tshul gyis su// mas pa brkyang cing de bzhin g.yon// rdo rje khu
312a7(rgyud): chur tshul gyis ni// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng bar bya// g.yon pa snying khar bzhag nas su// smin ma 'gul cing bskyod byas te// mig gis bgegs la bltas byas nas/
312a8(rgyud): dang bcas pa rab bskal nas// gal te tshangs pa nyis 'gyur tam// gal te khyab 'jug nyid 'gyur tam// drag po brgya byin nyid 'gyur yang // bltas pas myur du 'jig
312b1(rgyud): par 'gyur/ ci ste khyab 'jug drag po rnams// bdag gi dbang du 'gyur 'dod pas// kun du bskyod pa'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig can gyis// rkang pa thal sbyar tshul gyis
312b2(rgyud): su// rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun par bya/ rdo rje phyag rgya bsnun byas na// sa rnams thams cad rab tu g.yo// de nas brgya byin lha rnams dang // lha min srin po gsang ba bo// stan
312b3(rgyud): las nyams par bdag nyid kyis// ma shes shing ni rgyal bar 'gyur/ yid ni slong zhes gyur nas su// rdo rje rnal 'byor cher ldan pa// ga la ba de thal sbyar dong // bdag
312b4(rgyud): cag nongs pa ma mchis pa// sngags kyis bdag cag shin du gzer// gzir ba'i lha rnams de dag kun// stan las sems ni nyams par 'gyur// ji ltar ci bgyi bka'
312b5(rgyud): bstsol cig/ lung la gus par lta zhing 'khod// kun la byams pa byas nas su// snying bla sam pa cig blangs na// de'i mod la de dag rnams// dga' shing mgu nas sbyin
312b6(rgyud): bar byed// sngags pas rnam par bzhag nas su// de dag phyag rgya'i rgyal po btang // rkang pa g.yo ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje'i gnas su bzhag par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa
312b7(rgyud): thams cad kye// rdo rje'i gnas ni brked nas spyod// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// dbang po chen po gnas su brten// chogs mar bathal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnam
312b8(rgyud): kun du rgyas par bya// gang bsla pa'i rgyal gyis su// don buM chur bcang byas la// gar byung ba'i lag pa yis// bgegs kyi gzugs rnams kyi sdigs par gra ba'i/
313a1(rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon gyis kyang // gnas nas song gi bar du bya// ci ste bgegs chen rab sdang ba// bsdigs nas 'gro ba mi byed na// rdo rje gom pa myur bor la/
313a2(rgyud): gyen len lag pa kun du bskyod// gnyis pa sa la brdabs nas su// 'brug sgra dal 'di hUM brjod la// gsang sngags blo ldan brkyang bskum ste// rnam pa kun du lus bskor ro//
313a3(rgyud): de nas sdang ba'i tshul gyis su// rdo rje lag pa gnyis brkyang la// rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya// g.yas dang g.yon gyi tshul
313a4(rgyud): gyis ni// re re tshangs pa'i byed byas la// 'brug sgra dal 'dri'i hUM rnams dang // phaT rnams kyis ni rab bskal te// rdo rje gzir ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams
313a5(rgyud): cad gzer bar bya// bde gshegs go 'phang ma thob par// rdo rje can dang 'khor lo can// sangs rgyas sras po gang bzhin gyis// de'i lus la mi sems na// lha dang dri
313a6(rgyud): za gsang ba dang // gzhan yang gang dag klu rnams dang // shing bal 'dab ma rlung gtor bzhin/ hUM brjod 'jig 'gyur smos ci dgos// lha min srin po ma rung ba// yi
313a7(rgyud): dgas grul bum mngag bzhugs dang // bdud dang bdud kyi bo nya rnams// 'di ltar gyur pa ci zhig smos// byams pa'i sems la mnyam bzhag cing // snying rje la yang
313a8(rgyud): mnyam bzhag nas// byang chub sems dran sngags pa yis// phyag rgya bsdu ba gsal bar bya/ nyes pa cung zad tsam gyis phyir// gegs rnams la ni gnod mi bya// shin du dang
313b1(rgyud): par rig nas su// gal te bgegs la gnod byas na// shin du sdang ba dgra rnams la// 'jam des nyid du mi bya'o// gal te 'jam des nyid byas na// de'i mod la gnod/
313b2(rgyud): pa byed// thog mar 'jam po sbyar bar bya// lan gnyis chen dbye bar brtson// gsum che mchod yon thogs nas su// me tog snyim par gnas bya la// de nas bges/
313b3(rgyud): la mchod par bya// 'byung po kun la phan gtor byin na// 'di skad kyi ni tshig brjod de// bdag gis de ring khyod mchod kyis// song shig bgegs chen 'gro bar gyis
313b4(rgyud): phyin chad de ltar ma byed cig/ khyod kyi stobs dang rtsal mthong na// khyod ni bgegs rnams byed par nus// khyod ni lha'i sprul pa ste// khyod ni bgegs byed mi nus
313b5(rgyud): min// sngon chad mchod pa ma thob pas// de ring bdag gis mchod byas la// khyod kyis da ni mchod khyer la// bgegs kyi dbang po song zhes brjod// gal te 'dun
313b6(rgyud): kyang bgegs min na// de ni spyod pa bzang po yin// sngags pas mchod byas 'os kyang ni// ci ste bgegs ni yang byed na// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas dbang gyur pas/
313b7(rgyud): mi mchog rnams kyis mkhyen par gsol// bgegs la chad pa bcad slad du// sbyor ba bgyis kyang nongs ma mchis// sangs rgyas rnams dang sangs rgyas sras/
313b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ni// bka' dang bdag 'gal mi bgyid brjod// lha dang lha min gang rnams dang // phyogs bcu kun gyi dri za dang // gza' dang mi 'am
314a1(rgyud): gang dag/ mgon po mgon po che rnams la// bgegs rtse ces ni bsgrag par bya// gal te chung zhing sgrub ces na// myur du yongs su skyobs shig ces/
314a2(rgyud): bsgrags pa gal te mnyan byas nas// bgegs byed zhi bar gyur na ni// de nas phyogs rnams thams cad kyi// lha rnams la ni mchod par bya// gal te de ltar mi 'dug na// me tog
314a3(rgyud): thal mo mchod yon gyis// sangs rgyas la sogs rab bskal la// de la chad pas gcad par bya// drag po shin du sdang sems can// bka' lung las ni 'gal byed cing // srog kyang
314a4(rgyud): shin du 'phrog byed la/ sangs rgyas rnams dang mi g.yel ba// de la phan par shes nas su// bskal pa bye ba du mar ni// sems dmyal rnams su skye ba yi// sdug bsngal mang pos 'dir
314a5(rgyud): 'gyur zhes// ji ltar smon pas sems can rnams// nad rnams gso bar byed pa bzhin// gzir bas bdag la nyes pa med// mkhas pas rnam par spong ma yin// de ltar sems
314a6(rgyud): ni mnyam bzhag cing // snying rje yid dang ldan pa yis// byang chub sems ni brten byas te// de la chad pas bcad par brtsam// ji ltar sman pa mkhas pa yis// nyes te yal bar/
314a7(rgyud): mi 'dor zhing // thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa yang // mi byed mkhas na'ang nyes dang bcas// ji ltar sman pa mi mkhas pa/ thabs dang shes rab bral ba yis// nad pa
314a8(rgyud): yal bar 'dor byed cing // gso ba'i cho ga mi byed pa/ de bzhin gshegs dang bral ba yis// gal te gso bar brtson na yang // thabs dang shes rab bral ba la/
314b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams ni bsngags mi mdzad// nad pa nad pa rnams la ni// sman pa ji ltar sman sbyin na// tsha dang kha dang ska ba dang // 'jig rten smon pa mi byed pa// de bzhin
314b2(rgyud): 'dul ba'i bye brag gis// ci rigs pa ni gso bya la// sdang ba'i sems can rnams la ni/ byams te sangs rgyas rnams mi smod// 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba//
314b3(rgyud): shin du smad byung rgyal ba byung // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rabs las// 'gro ba'i chos ni 'di 'dra ste// shin du sdang sems drag po yis// sems can thams
314b4(rgyud): cad de chetshe byung // shin du drag po mthong nas ni// 'jam po nyid du mi sbyor te// shes rab thabs kyi snying stobs can// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// snying seng rje'i
314b5(rgyud): snying stobs khros gyur pa// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// de nas pha rol gnon pa yis// sems can khams ni du mnan// sdig med nang gi stobs kyis su// thams
314b6(rgyud): cad dbang du bgod par bya// pha rol gnod pa'i rigs tshul gyis// ji ltar byang chub 'dod byas na// sems can khams ni du ma dag/ thams cad dbang du dgos par bya/
314b7(rgyud): rdo rje slob dpon chen po yis// log 'dren bgeg rnams de ltar bkod// byang chub sems dran pa sgoms byas nas// skyon gyis gos par mi 'gyur ro// de phyir sngags pa chen
314b8(rgyud): khris pa brgal pa mo'i ma su ga khrus// rdza ma gri'i byam rgya'is// pashegs thams cad pa ca par bya// nga pa'i tshul ni nyid dkyis// rdo rje gar gyis gar byas pa// rkang /
315a1(rgyud): pa g.yon pa brkyang zhes 'dor// rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i gnas brten te// bsnun bya rkyen pa'i gnas su ni// ral gri shubs su bzhag par bya// sman pa med
315a2(rgyud): pa'i tshul gyis ni// shubs kyis lag pa sar brdabs la// rkang pa spos pa'i tshul gyis su// ral gri phyung ba 'dra bar bzung // ral gri tshul du bzhugs pa ni// 'dzub mo gung mo
315a3(rgyud): bzhib par bya// de nas lag pa g.yon pa yis/ ral gri shubs su bya ba ni// 'the'u chung dang srin lag dang // 'the bo ral gri shub su bya// de nas rkang pa g.yas pa yis// sa la
315a4(rgyud): bgeg kyi gzugs bris te// so yis mchu mnan khros byas la// rang gi rdo rje nyi 'bar bas// rkang pas mgon mnan byas la// lag pa ral gri phyung nas su// de ni rdo rje gom stong
315a5(rgyud): kyis// gar gyi tshul du kun bskyob cing // rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcad par bya// rdo rje ldan des gang bcom pa// de yi srog la mi semaso//
315a6(rgyud): da ya sa ga la ma sems so// de nas de dag zhi bar 'gyur// yang na 'chi 'gyur the tshom med// brgya byin mtshungs pa'i bgegs zhig na/ de'i mod la dal bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje
315a7(rgyud): slob dpon che// snying rje snying brtse sems ldan pas// ji ltar de yang skye 'gyur ba// de ltar de la snying brtser bya// rdo rje ral gri'i sdang stab so// de nas rdo rje slob dpon chen// rdo rje gtu
315a8(rgyud): bar bya ba byas// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// gnod par sems pa thams cad rtug/ rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// rdo rje mthu rtsal brtsam byas la// rkang pa bteg
315b1(rgyud): cing bzhug tshul gyis/ rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya// 'khor lo rgyas par bya rigs gyis// pad mo thal mo sbyar byas la// rkang pa rnam par bzhag byas nas// sa la 'khor lo 'phang
315b2(rgyud): bar bya// rting sprad gnas su 'dug byas nas// 'brug sgra dal 'dra'i hUM brjod de// thal mo brdab pa'i tshul gyis su// sa la 'khor los bsnan par bya// bzlog ste lan phur
315b3(rgyud): byas nas// lag pa sbyar ba'i tshul gyi ni// 'khor lo lta bur byas nas su// gyen du 'phags la bzhig par bya// bkug ste rkang pas mgo mnan nas// bgegs rnams la
315b4(rgyud): bsnan par bya// 'on tam rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// yang na shi 'gyur the tsom med// de ltar rim pa'i tshul 'di yis// bgegs rnams la ni gnod par bya// sdig pa'i gnod pa med
315b5(rgyud): par ni// bskul kyang bde bar mi 'gyur ro// lag te rdo rje sems dpa' che// snying rje sems dang ldan gyur pas// bgegs la zhi bar bya 'dod na// cho ga 'di yi tshul du bya/
315b6(rgyud): ba glang gi ni lci ba la// de 'dra ba'i gzugs byas la// sngags pas zhi ba'i sems kyis su// sngags pas 'o mas sgrub nas su// mdo la snga mkho bzhin du 'gyur// de ltar
315b7(rgyud): kun du bgeg rnams ni kun la cho ga bzhin du bya// rim pa 'di yi tshul gyis ni// gsang sngags rnams la'ang sbyar byas te// gcad dang gnod pa byas pa dang // bkag pa dang /
315b8(rgyud): ni bcings pa'ang rung // gal te bsgrub par 'dod na ni// de nas snga ma kho bzhin du 'gyur// 'on tam gsang sngags rnams la ni// bye ga tu ni spos kyis bya// ba ni ser man
316a1(rgyud): 'o ma 'am// yang na mar gyi sprin bsreg bya/ yang na brgya ni rtsa brgyad kyis// sbyin bsregs ni kun zhir 'gyur// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste/
316a2(rgyud): dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyas par ro// drag shul spyod pa gang yin pa// de ni khros par brtsam par bya// ji ltar las ni ci rigs par// gsang sngags rnams la sngag
316a3(rgyud): par bya// gzhan du na ni mi bya ste// las kyi 'bras bu med par 'gyur// rdo rje 'khor lo'i sdang stab so// rdo rje tshul gyis de nas kyang // rdo rje 'byung bar byas nas su// 'chog
316a4(rgyud): mar thal mo sbyar nas de// rdo rje gar ni rab tu bya// rting sprad gnas kyi tshul gyiso// smin bsgyur rkyed par reg par bya// lag pa gnyis ka sa la byug/ de bzhin phyogs
316a5(rgyud): bzhi rnams su yang // yid kyis bskor ba'i tshul gyis so// rkang pa 'khor lo bzhin du ba sgor// lag gnyis rkyed pa'i gnas bzhag la// rdo rje bgad par rab byed cig/
316a6(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng bar bya// rdo rje 'dzub mo rab tu bsdigs// hUM brjod bsgying dang bcas par bya// rdo rje nyi ma'i mig ldan pas// rdo rje 'dzub mos bdegs nas ni/
316a7(rgyud): bdud kyi dbang phyug bdag nyid kyang / ltas pa de'i mod la bros// bya rog bod rdong 'ben pa bzhin// rdo rje bgad pa'o// de nas rdo rje sngags pa ches// rdo rje 'byung ba byas
316a8(rgyud): nas su/ mi 'thun rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa bsnol te khu tshur bcang / 'the bo gyen du bsgreng byas la// gung mo bzhibs te bsgrib par bya// 'dzub mo
316b1(rgyud): de gnyis zla ba bsgreng // rdo rje kha zhes brjod pa yin// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg par bya// g.yon pa gzugs shing de bzhin bya// rdo rje lce ni me ltar 'bar// rgod pa'i
316b2(rgyud): pa'i kha ltar mngon sum bya// 'brug sgra dal 'dri hUM brjod de// kha'i thad kar bzhag par bya// phyogs bzhi dag ni thams cad kyi// rgya mtsho bzhi'i chu 'thungs nas//
316b3(rgyud): mig sdang snang bar 'gyur ba yin// sdang ba kun la smos ci dgos// de ltar byas na phyogs bzhi po// kun nas 'byung ba thams cad sems// 'tshubs ma kun dang lce
316b4(rgyud): 'bab dang // sprin rnams kun nas 'du ba yang // rdo rje kha ni glag pa dang // gtor bas rab tu 'thor bar 'gyur// 'jig rten du ni ltas byung byung ba// kun nas gnas
316b5(rgyud): sgrub gang yin pa// sngags pas rdo rje me lce yi// me lce ltar bsgyur de kun zhing / rdo rje kha'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje 'bar
316b6(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bca' bar bya// rdo rje kha klal pa'i sdang sngabs so// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rdo rje ye shes bsgyur nas su//
316b7(rgyud): bgegs la gso ba byas nas ni// gnyis pa yod pa ma yin no// rgyal ba'i ye shes las byung ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon gso byed pa// bdag 'dra sdug pa de 'dra
316b8(rgyud): ste// sngags pa ci 'dra rgyal de bzhin// sems can kun la snying rje dang // byang chub sems ni brten byas te// thabs kyi dam pa thob 'gyur bas// rnam par 'phrul
317a1(rgyud): pa thams cad bya// gzhan du na ni phyogs rnams na// bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas sngags mi 'gyur// byang chub sems dang bral ba yi// lha'i mchod 'os ma yin no//
317a2(rgyud): thabs dang shes rab bral 'byung ba// rgyal ba'i sras po nyan thos dang // gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni// dga' bsgrub nas la gnas pa ste// bdag don phan pa'i sems ldan pa/
317a3(rgyud): de dag la ni bya ba med// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni snying rje can// byang chub sems kyis shing rta dang // byams dang snying rje'i kha sbyar dang // sa dang pha rol phyin
317a4(rgyud): pa dang // sdu ba bzhi'i rdo rje dang // thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa dang // byang chub phyogs kyi rtsa lag dang // brten nas sangs rgyas rgyal po rnams// sems can don dga' rtse bas rtse/
317a5(rgyud): de ltar slob dpon rdo rje 'chang// thabs dang shes rab mkhas pa yi// spang ba rnams ni thams cad kyi// sems ni rab tu g.yo bar bya// rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje 'byung
317a6(rgyud): bar byas nas ni// rkang pa 'dun pa'i gnas bzhag ste// rdo rje thal mo gzhum byas la/ rdo rje gar ni byas nas su// lag pa g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng // g.yon pa gos bskor
317a7(rgyud): brten nas su// gung mo dang ni 'dzub mo bzhipas// 'the chung 'the bo sprang par bya// g.yas pa lha'i ba dan gsum// g.yas brkyang rkang par mnan nas su// rdo rje bgang pa'i
317a8(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// kye ma ho bdag nyid rdo rje can// bdag nyid du ni bdag gnas pa// hUM brjod snyems dang khros pa yis// rdo rje gar gyis btang bar bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje'i/ bgad
317b1(rgyud): pas bgang pas bsdigs pa na// lha dang lha ma yin gsang bar bcas// dkyil 'khor che 'am bsgrub pa'i tshe// bgegs byed phyir ni 'go mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar
317b2(rgyud): bcing // gtsug nas byung ba nyid kyang ni// bgegs byed phyir ni 'gro mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin gyis thog mar bcings// gtsug nas byang ba nyid kyis ni// bgegs rnams phan tshun
317b3(rgyud): smra byed cing // bsrung ba'i phyir ni de dag kun// lhan cig dkyil 'khor drug tu dong // rdo rje sngags kyis bskal bas na// rdo rje slob dpon bskal pa che// bsod nams tshogs ni
317b4(rgyud): bsags pa la// gzhan rnams thams cad phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje tshul gyis de na yang // rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// pad ma thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogs rnams kun du rgyas
317b5(rgyud): bar bya// g.yas pa brkyang pa'i stabs byas te// bskal pa'i me'i 'od 'dra bas// thal mo gdeb pa'i tshul gyis su// khros pas log pa brdab par bya// lag gnyis rdo rje
317b6(rgyud): tshul gyis su// 'the chung 'the bo phrad byas la// g.yon pa gos bskor rten nas su// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng spras pas// a hUM hUM hUM brjod de bskal ba yis// sngags pas
317b7(rgyud): kun du sgra yang brjod// rdo rje sgra ni byung bas na// sdang ba thams cad bung bar gyur// brgya byin tshangs dang zla ba sogs// rdzu 'phrul che ba'i gza' chen yang // zos pa tsam gyis
317b8(rgyud): kun g.yos te// kun du sgra yis sems kyang mnyam// de tshe thal mo sbyar te btud// rdo rje sgra chen gang na bar// thams cad lhan cig lhag nas su// rdo rje sgra yis gzir
318a1(rgyud): 'gyur zhing // stan la sems ni mnyam pas na/ mnga' bdag sug las ci 'tshal ba// bdag cag myur du bka' ba stsol ces/
318a2(rgyud): sngags pa la ni lung yang nod// sngags pas bsams te gar byas na// lha rnams myur du grol bar 'gyur// de nas byams pa'i sems bskyod la// brtul shugs can
318a3(rgyud): gyis phyag rgya dgrol// rdo rje kun du sgra bo che// rdo rje 'byung bar 'dug nas su// rdo rje gar ni 'bar byas la// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// phyogaso rnams kun du rgyas byas la/
318a4(rgyud): mi 'thun rkang sngabs byas nas su// bsnol te khu tshur bcad byas la// 'the bo gnyis ni gshibs te bsgred// gung mo gnyis ni gzhi ba byas la// 'dzub mo dbu ma'i
318a5(rgyud): tshigs bkugs te// gung mo gnyis ni sbar byas la// rdo rje kha ni byas pas na// sdang ba thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// kha'i thad dkar bzhag na ni// rdo rje sgra yang 'byung
318a6(rgyud): bar 'gyur// bdag ni rdo rje chen po can// rdo rje ye shes stobs dang ldan// hri ha hU~M hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ rdo rje gom stabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje rnon po'i gom pa yis// bzhad
318a7(rgyud): dang brdegs pas 'gro byed cing / phyogs rnams bzhi por brjod par bya// rdo rje sgra 'byung bskul bas na// bgegs chen rnams dang grags rnams dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po ltar rnam
318a8(rgyud): ngag de'i mdun du 'gro bar byed// rdo rje sgra yis bdag cag tshig/ rdo rje sgra yis bskal pa ni// bdag cag rang gi gnas nas g.yos// rdo rje dbang po bka' myur ba stsol// gal
318b1(rgyud): te dpal gyis sgo bzhed dam// rgyal srid dngul chu mig bsku dang // kun nas gter rnams gzigs bzhed dam// bka' ba rtsol cig ces de skad smras// dga' bas byin nas bsgrub
318b2(rgyud): pa la phyag 'tshal mchod pa byas nas dong // rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje slob dpon mthu chen gyis// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje can gyi phyag rgya bcings// rkang pa
318b3(rgyud): pa pus mor gtsugs nas su// lag pa gnyis ni khu tshur bcang // gung mo gnyis ni bsgreng nas su// 'dzub mo gnyis ni ngos la sbyar// g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas nas
318b4(rgyud): su myur rdo rje gam stabs kyis// 'khrul 'khor kun du bsnun byas la// sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// lha min gnod sbyin rgyal po dang // srin po rdzu 'phrul che rnams kyang //
318b5(rgyud): thams cad de rang gi gnas nas g.yos// bskal pa zad dam ji snyam sems// rdo rje phyag rgya bsnun pas na// sems ni slong zhes gyur nas su// rdo rje ye shes cher ldan pa// ga la ba
318b6(rgyud): der nye bar dong // rdo rje 'bar bas bdag cag tshig/ sngags pas dpal gyi sgo bzhed dam// 'on te dngul chu bcud len 'dod// rdo rje dbang po bka' myur ba stsol// smras nas kun
318b7(rgyud): gyis de mod la yid la 'dod pa sbyin par byed// gal te haM dang lha min dang // gsang ba dgol bar 'dod na yang // 'dod pa de dag lhags nas su// 'dod pa bzhin du las byedado//
318b8(rgyud): lung dang 'gal bar ra byed pa dag/ ces ste dam bcas mi yongs nas// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po// rdo rje phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// sos ni mchu mnan khros pa dang // me
319a1(rgyud): / 'bar lta bur 'jigs rung bas// myur du rdo rje gom stabs kyis// sa rnams kun la bsnun par bya// g.yas brkyang gom stabs byas
319a2(rgyud): nas su// rdo rje phyag rgya bsnun pas na// a la la zhes de skad smra// stan las lus kyang rab tu nyams// lus ni me yis rab tu 'bar// rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po
319a3(rgyud): pa// ga la ba der nye bar dod// bskal pa chen pos yongs su skyobs// bka' lung myur du bdag cag bstsol// klu dang gsang ba lha min rnams// 'phral du
319a4(rgyud): sgo ba'i lung yang byed// sgo ba'i lung ni bsgrub nas su// rang rang gi ni gnas su dong // de lta na ni lha dbang song // de lta ma yin mi btang ngo // de nas bsgo lung bzhi/
319a5(rgyud): byas nas/ de dag myur du gnas su dong // slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po// de nas phyag rgya btang byas te// rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis su// brkyed pa'i gnas su bzhag
319a6(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje tshul gyis byas nas yang // de yi gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje zhags pa'i phyag rgya yis// sdang ba thams cad bcing bar bya// dus bzhin rab tu bskal
319a7(rgyud): byas nas/ gal te bsgo lung 'gal byed na// rdo rje lcags skya bkug bya zhing / rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya// rdo rje rnam pa'i sgra'o// rdo rje thal mo gtsug nas su/
319a8(rgyud): 'dun pa'i stabasu gnas bya ste// lag pa rgyab tu bsnan byas la// rdo rje gyen du 'phang bar bya// de nas rdo rje lta byas la// 'brug sgra dal 'dri'i hUM brjod do// rkang pa spo
319b1(rgyud): ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa sgo// lag pa g.yon pa'i 'dzub mo dang // 'the bo sprad de bzhag par bya// lag pa g.yas pa'i 'dzub mo yis/
319b2(rgyud): rtse dgug lcags kyu stan par bya// rdo rje rgyas pa'i mig ldan pa// so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// gang la bgegs ni yod pa der// rdo rje stabs kyis myur song la/
319b3(rgyud): rkang pa g.yas brkyang stabs byas la// rdo rje lcags kyu phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgag bya zhing // rdo rje zhags pas bcing bar bya// gal te 'kho
319b4(rgyud): lo can dang ni// dbang bcas drag po tshangs bcas pa// gal te rdo rje 'chang bsrung yang // sngags pas gzhi nas drangs te dgug/ dgug nas rdo rje bcings pa yis//
319b5(rgyud): rdo rje gzeb du bzhag par bya// ji srid 'dod pa rdzogs gyur pa// de srid bar du bzhag par bya// bsgo ba'i lung ni mi nyan te// gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs na// bdag
319b6(rgyud): gi 'dod pa 'byor 'dod pa'i// de las chad pa bcad par bya// de yin gzugasu byas nas su// rdo rje dga' bas gzir byas na// a la la zhes sgra 'byin cing //
319b7(rgyud): lha'i dpa' bo 'ang 'ong bar 'gyur// de la bgo ba'i lung yang pog/ rdo rje gar gyis de nas yang // thal mo shin du sbyar byas la/ dbang chen stabs gyis 'dug
319b8(rgyud): nas su// phyogs rnams kun du rgyas par bya// rkang pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa ste// lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su// phan tshun bsnol te/
320a1(rgyud): khu tshur bcang // gung mo gnyis ni gzhibs nas su// 'dzub mo de la gzugs par bya// de yi rdo rje phyag rgya de// bgegs rnams kun gyi dam tshig
320a2(rgyud): yin/ snga ma bzhin gyi sngabs tshul gyis// phyag rgyas bgegs rnams bkug nas su// khro bo yi ni rdo rje yis// de la da ma tshig sbyin par bya// rdo rje stabs kyi phyag rgya'o//
320a3(rgyud): hUM zhes pa yis sgra phyung la// bdag nyid rdo rje bskur nas su// bgegs rnams thams cad dgug par bya// lan ni smra bar mi byed no// de ni btang bar mi bya'o// gal te cung
320a4(rgyud): zad mi smra na// de la chad pas bcad bya ste// shing gi dug dang ltar bu dang // nyungs kar dag ni bsres pa la// de yi gzugs ni byas nas su// me yi nang du bor byas la//
320a5(rgyud): gal te tshangs pas bsrungs na yang // bgegs de de'i mod la 'gro// sngags pas de la bsgom par bya// de nas de la rgyas par bya// byams pa'i sems ni bskyed nas su//
320a6(rgyud): phyag rgya btang bar bsam byas nas// gzir dang bcing dang dgug pa rnams// thar nas bde bar gnas par 'gyur// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // ye shes che ba rab
320a7(rgyud): gzhol cing // sems can don la snying rje bas// rdo rje nyid du yang sbyar te// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// rdo rje thal mo rab sbyar te/ phyogs
320a8(rgyud): nams kun du rgyas par bya// sgom pa spo ba'i tshul gyis su// g.yas dang de bzhin g.yon pa sgo// lag pa gar byed tshul gyis ni// de nas thal mo rab sbyar ro// gom pa bskyod pa'i
320b1(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// g.yas pa phyogs bzhi rnams su bskor// rdo rje rengs byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rengs par bya// myur du rdo rje gom pa yis// phyogs rnams
320b2(rgyud): rdo rje rengs par bya// rtse mo brgyad pa'i lhun po che// rdo rje mtshan can bsam par bya// 'og tu lag pa rdo rje can// steng du g.yas pa rdo rje rnyed sbu pas rengs byed cing // phyogs rnams kun
320b3(rgyud): du bskor byas na// gang dag sdang ba'i sems ldan pa'i// bgegs byed phyir ni 'tshe mi byed// de'i spyi bor rdo rje ni// legs par 'dug par bsam byas no// tshangs pa'i gnas
320b4(rgyud): la thug pa nas// sa 'og bdun la thug pa'i bar// rdo rje rengs pas rengs 'gyur te// rmongs shing rengs kyang med par 'gyur// sngags pa mkhas pas 'dod pa ru// de
320b5(rgyud): srid du ni rengs par bya// rdo rje tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas na// phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas na// kun nas byung ba'i
320b6(rgyud): chu rnams kyang // sngags pa bsgom par byed par nus/ 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// rdo rje thal mo gzhum byas la// lag pa g.yas pa gyen du ni// bzhag pa bcas
320b7(rgyud): pa rab tu bya// de bzhin rkang pa g.yon pa ni// g.yon pa lhan cig/ brdeg par bya// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang // gom pa 'dor ba'i tshul gyis ni// mngon du
320b8(rgyud): rgyal po me lta bu// so yis mchu mnan khros pa yis// 'og log su yang mi ltas te/ rdo rje gom pa myur song la// rkang g.yon pa bskum bya ste// lhun po rtse mor bzhag
321a1(rgyud): @par bya// 'og ma 'dzad nas 'byin pa'i lag/ g.yas pa steng nas de bzhin te// mche ba'i rkang stabs sbyar ba yis// kha yi tshul du 'dug
321a2(rgyud): par bya// rgod ma rta yi khu tshul gyis// rgya mtsho chu rnams btung bar bya// rdo rje ldan pas bshad pa yis// bsam gtan sngags pa ldan gyur na// chu ni a la la zhes su/
321a3(rgyud): sgra 'byin kun nas 'du 'gyur na// 'bab chu dang ni klung chu dang // sprin las byung ba smos ci dgos// bskyod na gal te 'o ma yi// chu las byung ba'ang skam par 'gyur// rdo rje'i
321a4(rgyud): tshul gyis de nas yang // rdo rje thal mo tshogs mar sbyar// phyogs rnams kun du rgyas byas te// sprin bzhin yongs su rgyas par bya/ dbang chen gom stabs byas nas su// rkang
321a5(rgyud): pa spo ba'i tshul gyis ni// rkang pa g.yon pa bteg byas te// de nas sa la bzhag par bya// rkang pa g.yas pa btegs nasu// g.yas phyogs su ni bskor bar bya// lag
321a6(rgyud): gnyis khu tshur tshul gyis su// rdo rje ldan pa g.yas pa sgreng // g.yon pa 'khur ba brten nas su// 'khor lo bzhin du yongasu bskor// de bzhin g.yas pa bzhag nas
321a7(rgyud): su// lag pa g.yon pas yongs su bskor// g.yas pa 'khur rten nas su// rdo rje ldan pa'i lag pa sgreng // rdo rje gom pas myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i
321a8(rgyud): gom stabs kyis// ti se rtse mor rkang bzhag ste// rkang stabs sbyar ba'i tshul gyis ni// lus ni 'dud pa byas nas su// rengs byed rtsa bar sbyor ldan pas/
321b1(rgyud): so yis mchu mnan khros gyur cing // bdag nyid me dang 'dra 'gyur ba// stobs chen sgra yang cher ldan pa// gtum pa chen po pha rol gnon// rdo rje tshul gyis steng
321b2(rgyud): bskor la// nges par mnan pa blang bar bya// sngags pas sngags la 'jigs med pa// de ni gang du khros par 'dor// rdo rje nges gnas tshul gyis ni//
321b3(rgyud): rkang pa g.yon pa tsugs nas su// rdo rje mnan pa bsnan byas na// dbang po chen po'ang bye mar rlog/ rdo rje mnan pas bsnun byas na// sa rnams thams cad
321b4(rgyud): rab tu g.yo// lhun po ma 'dar ti se dang // khor yug ri rnams g.yos 'gyur na// lha min sgo lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje ldan pas bshad na'o// bsna/
321b5(rgyud): pas rnam par brgyar te// phub ma spar khang rlung gtor bzhin// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang ba po// sa sbyar rtsam par bya ba ni// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// snying khar
321b6(rgyud): bzhag ste rgyas par bya// rkang pa rting pa sprad nas su// lag pa gar byed sbyar ba dang // rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis 'du// g.yas dang g.yon pa bzhag par
321b7(rgyud): bya// rkang pa bskyod pa byas nas su// de nas rting pa yang sprad de// gar gyi tshul gyi de nyid kyi// phyogs bzhir yongs su bskor bar bya// khros pa dbus kyi gnas
322a1(rgyud): phyag da ##/ su ni/ rdo rje gom pa myur song la// rdo rje thal mo sbyar nas su// gung mo srin lag 'khyud byas la// gnyis ka khu tshur bcang byas la// rting sprad pa yi rkang stabs kyis// sa la gzhag dang
322a2(rgyud): bteg byas te// g.yas su yongs su rgyas byas la// bar bur thams cad gsal bar byed// me me zhes ni brjod byas la// nang na gang dag ci yod pa// sngags pas thams cad gsal
322a3(rgyud): bar bya// hUM dang bcas shing phaT bcas pa'i// gsang sngags pakhas pas brjod par bya// 'on tam sa'i steng gis ni// bar bur thams cad zhi 'gyur te// kun du bgegs ni med gyur na/
322a4(rgyud): skugs pas mnyam gzhag las byas bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje zhags pas legs bslabs pas// rdo rje gar ni rab byas la// tshangs pas rkang stabs byas nas
322a5(rgyud): su// pad ma'i thal mo sbyar te// snying kha'i zad kar bskor bar bya// gar byed tshul gyis lag pa gnyis// rdo rje khu tshur bcang bar bya// g.yon pa g.yon du brkyang bar bya// 'thun pa'i
322a6(rgyud): rkang stabs byas nas su// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod la// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rdo rje gom pa myur song la// g.yas brkyang gom pa'i tshul gyis ni// rkang pa gzhag pa'i
322a7(rgyud): tshul gyis su// de nyid kyi ni yang bskor ro// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra phyung la// de bzhin phrogs bzhi rnams su yang // rdo rje khu tshur bskor bas na// bgegs rnams thams cad brlag par
