322a8(rgyud): 'gyur// rdo rje blo dang ldan pa yis// sa bsdus 'dor bar 'dod na ni// gom pa bzhag pa'i gros kyis su// myur du g.yas pa brkyang byas la// gcig ni ri rab rtse la bzhag
322b1(rgyud): gcig bgos te se'i rtse mor bzhag/ de ltar rkang stabs bzhag pa ni// kun tu 'dod par rab byed cing // sa 'og na ni lag pa g.yon// g.yas pa sa yi steng na ste// a la la zhes
322b2(rgyud): sgra 'byin cing // 'jig rten khams su 'phen byed na// bgegs rnams gzhan lta ci zhig smos// log 'dren sdang ba drag po rnams// mi yi 'jig rten 'di na ni// gzhan du
322b3(rgyud): 'phen pa ci zhig smos// ci ste 'jig rten khams rnams kyang // kan nas tshim par byed 'dod na// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'jug par 'gyur// rdo rje
322b4(rgyud): gom pa myur song la// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i stabs tshul gyis// nyi ma bcu gnyis lta bur ni// me lce phreng ldan bzod dka' ba// rkang pa g.yon pa rtan byas la// rdo rje 'dzin
322b5(rgyud): te lag pa sgreng // lus ni btud pa byas nas su// rkang pa g.yas pa gteg byas la// sngags pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// rlung rnams kun yang ba spang byed
322b6(rgyud): cing // nam mkha' me 'dar bskur nas su// bsregs pa'i bskal pa lta bu 'jug/ lag na 'dzin pa'i rdo rje ni// kun dir rab 'dar bsams la// hai zhes
322b7(rgyud): pa yi sgra gnon cing // rdo rje 'og tu 'phang byas la// ri dang nags su bcas pa yi// sa rnams thams cad 'khrugs par 'gyur// de nas thal ba nyid 'gyur/
322b8(rgyud): mer ni shing bal 'jug pa bzhin// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang 'phos// de nas bsdu ba brtsam byas te// rkang stangs tshul ni de nyid de// bye brag tu ni lag pa
323a1(rgyud): phyag dang @#/ sbreng // rdo rje gom pa myur song la// 'chongs pas bskor ba byas nas su// phyag rgya 'di ni sdang stabs bya// rgyab nas sdang stabs tshul gyis ni/
323a2(rgyud): dbus kyi gnas su phyin par bya// de bzhin phyogs bzhi rnams su yang // rdo rje bsnun pas bteg par bya// sdang stabs tshul ni 'di nyid dang // sngags pa blo ldan lag
323a3(rgyud): chu la gyis// gas rnams thams cad blangs byas la// de nyid du ni bzhag par bya// kun nas bsdu bar byed cing na// mkhas pas gsang sngags brjod byas la// rdo rje can
323a4(rgyud): gyis brjod par bzhin// sa rnams kun du bzhag par bya// rim pa'i tshul ni 'di nyid kyis// mkhas pas thams cad kun du gzhag/ de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // /
323a5(rgyud): rdo rje bzhag pa legs bslabs pas/ sdang ba lha dang lha min dang // mi rnams gzhag bya brtul bar bya// bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba yi// rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs
323a6(rgyud): bas// 'dul ba'i tshogs ni tha dad pa// thams cad rnam par gdul bar bya// brdung bas 'dul ba'i 'jig rten ni// brdung ba nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// g.yas
323a7(rgyud): dang g.yon gyi tshul gyis su// dpa' bo lnga po kun du bya// 'thun pa'i kang stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa brkyang stabs mnan par bya// rkang stabs bzhag pa'i
323a8(rgyud): tshul gyis ni// 'phen la blta zhing lag pA btang // srin lag 'the chung sprang byas la// lag gnyis lug gu rgyud du bya// g.yon pa'i gung mo//
323b1(rgyud): mtshungs par bzhad// g.yas pa yi ni 'dzub mo de// brkyang ba'i tshul du byas pa yi// gzhu dang mnga' zhes brjod pa yin// gung mo yi ni rgyab
323b2(rgyud): logs su// 'jub mo mda' yi tshul du bzhag/ g.yas brkyang sdang stabs tshul gyis su// hUM bcas brjod de phog par bskrun// gal te sa yi 'og gnas
323b3(rgyud): sam// tshangs pa'i gnas na gnas gyur tam// dag pos bsrung bar 'gyur kyang rung // rdo rje smra bar sbyar nas su// rdo rje mnga'i yas phog gyur na// de ni gsod par
323b4(rgyud): mi bsam mo// 'phang ba'i sdang stabs so// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // thabs shes pa la mkhas gyur cing // 'phags pa'i tshul du legs bslabs pa// sngar
323b5(rgyud): ba'i sems can 'dul bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje gzhan pas legs bslabs pas// srid pa gsum las khyab lus kyis// bgegs rnams thams
323b6(rgyud): cad brlag par bya// 'thun pa'i gang stabs byas nas su// rkang pa bzhag pa'i tshul gyis ni// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yi// thal mo khong stong sbyar bar bya// de yi
323b7(rgyud): phyag rgya bcings nas su// phyogs rnams kun du bskor byas na// srid pa gsum yang 'gug 'gyur na// 'og 'dren 'gegs rnams smos ci dgos// dgug pa rdo rje'i phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje
323b8(rgyud): 'chag ga 'dun pa'i gang stabs byas nas su// bang mo bal mo sbyar byas la// phyog rnams kun du rgyas par bya// rkang stabs bzhag pa'i tshul gyis su// gnas ni myur du bzung bas la// rdo rje khu tshur snying
324a1(rgyud): phyag da#// khar bzhag/ khros pas hUM gi sgra brjod de// rgya mtsho bzhi pa'i klu rnams la// rdo rje lag pa bsnun par bya// klu skrag thal mo sbyar ba rnams// rgya mtsho nas ni thon par 'gyur// gang dag
324a2(rgyud): si'i 'og gnas pa// lha min srin po gsang ba rnams// sgo ba'i yid la brtson yid kyis// ci 'cho la gcig ces 'khod par byed// rdo rje 'bar mas bdag nyid gzir// gnod sbyin mo 'am srin po 'am// lha min
324a3(rgyud): mo 'am klu mo 'am// bcud kyis len nam dngul chu 'am// rin chen rnams dang nor bu rgyas// dpal dang phun sum 'dod len nam// thugs la ci dang ci bzhed pa// bdag cag rnams la bka'
324a4(rgyud): myur bsnol// sngags pas gang yang rung blangs la// gsang ba kun tu btang bar bya'i// bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa// ci ste sgo la'ang mi 'ong na// rkang stabs tshul ni de nyid kyis/
324a5(rgyud): g.yon brkyang stabs kyis gnas par bya// lhun po la ni rkang bzhag te// lag pas dbyug pa'i sbyor ba yis// sgra sgrogs cing ni thams cad gnas// sa 'og thams cad gnon par bya//
324a6(rgyud): zhes ni sgra 'don cing // bsgo ba'i lung dang 'gal byed pa// thams cad kyis ni bzung nas su// shin du myur du dbul bar byed// sngags pas de gcig tshar gcod do// lhag ma
324a7(rgyud): thams cad btang bar bya// bsgo ba'i lung la de bzhag la mkhas pas legs par bslab par bya// gsang ba srin po thams cad la// dgos pa'i sems ni
324a8(rgyud): yang bkod do// de dag dam tshig byin ne ni// de rnams kun tu btang bar bya// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba// bam po bcu cig pa'o//
324b1(rgyud): de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // snying brtse snying rje sems ldan pas// mi dang mi men la sogs pa// shin du gnod byed lha rnams dang // lha min gsang bar
324b2(rgyud): bcas pa rnams// gzhan yang sdang ba'i gdon la sogs// nad sbrul dug la sogs rnams kyis// sems can rnams la gnod byed cing // dam tshig la ni
324b3(rgyud): mi gnas te// rgyags pa'i yid dang ldan pa dang // nang dang mu ge la sogs pas// sems can rnams la gnod byed de// pha rol gnod byed mngon dga' ba//
324b4(rgyud): de dag snying rje med pa dang // bstan pa la ni 'gal byed cing // shing du brgyags pa'i shas che ba// mthong nas de dag char bcad phyir// sngags la
324b5(rgyud): mkhas pas sbyar bar bya// bdag la sdig par 'gyur snyam du// bdag nyid la ni mi sems shing // bdag nyid lam min zhugs gyur la//
324b6(rgyud): bdag dang gzhan yang phung byed ga/ gzhan la gnod pa de dag la// sngags pas bzod pa mi bya ste// skrag par bya zhing bcing bar bya// brdung bar
324b7(rgyud): bya zhi bsod par bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje zhags pas legs bsrabs pas// nam mkha' go skabs med byas te// rdo rje dbyingasu
324b8(rgyud): sbyar nasu// gus pas sgrims bcas 'jo tshul dang // bzhin 'jum rgyas dang ldan pa yis// rdo rje gar ni rab byas le// lag pa spyod pas spyad pa/
325a1(rgyud): zag dang @#/ phyogs rnams kun du gar byed zhing // dngos dang 'thun pa bzung byas la// bsgom pa la ni sems gzhag cing // rdo rje rang bzhin lus srabs// mi 'thun
325a2(rgyud): rkang stabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje 'chang bas lags sgreng ste// rdo rje mig gis kun bltas la// srid pa gsum po thams cad mnan// dpa' bo'i gnas su gnas nas su//
325a3(rgyud): rkang pa gdengs pa'i tshul gyis su// hUM brjod 'jigs pa 'jigs su rung // mig gnyis nyi ma zla ba ste// kha ni rgod ma rta'i kha// lte ba dga' bo nye dga' bo// lto ba
325a4(rgyud): rgya mtsho ra bsam par bya// lhun po de yi mgo bor bya// de bzhin lag pa khor yug ri// sa ni ka ba gnyis yin te// nor rgyas bu sbrul gsang bsrel yin// rlung
325a5(rgyud): ni de yi rna ba gnyis// de'i sgra rnams me yin te// lce ni 'jigs pa chen po klog/ a la la zhes sgra chen ldan// 'brug sgra gutum zhes sgra phyung bas// phyogs rnams kun
325a6(rgyud): du yongs su bskor// rab tu bskal bas de nas ni// rdo rje sgra yis 'gyel gyur nas// klu dang dri za srin po dang // lha dang lha min sogs kun dong // hUM brjod pas ni 'jigs 'gyur
325a7(rgyud): shing // 'chi bar gyur pa the tshom med// rdo rje sgra yis tshig 'gyur zhing // slong bar 'gyur te mnan par blta// rdo rje rnal 'byor dang ldan pa// ga la ba der nye bar dod // rdo rje chen po
325a8(rgyud): bka' bstsol la// slan chad de ltar ma mdzad cig/ de nas dam tshig bzhag byas la// lha rnams thams cad btang bar bya// rdo rje 'jigs pa brtul che ba// 'jigs pa chen po
325b1(rgyud): 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs par bya rnams 'jigs bskyed pa// chen pos mchod 'ong rmad byung bas// mi dang mi ma yin rnams la// 'jigs chen bltas byung che byung ba// lha dang klu dang sha za
325b2(rgyud): dang // bza' dang ma mo brtse med rnams// nad dang mu ge la sogs pa// yul khrug pa dang 'chi byed dang // bdud rnams dang ni log 'dren dang // sbrul po srin po la sogs pa 'am//
325b3(rgyud): bdag yul gzhan yul byung ba yi// gnod pa gzhan yang du ma rnams// de dag rnam par bshig pa'i phyir// rdo rje 'jigs byed sbar bar bya// rkang pa rgyas par bya tshul gyis//
325b4(rgyud): hUM zhes pa yi sgra brjod na// rdo rje 'jigs pas rab bskur bas// thams cad myur du 'jig par 'gyur// 'di ni don yod thogs pa med// rdo rje 'jigs pa mi zad pa// sngags pas kun
325b5(rgyud): du sgor byas nas// srid pa gsum yang dbang 'gyur na// mi yi 'jig rten mngag bzhug pa// byed par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// tshig gi cung zad bskal bas na// gang dag shin du drag ldan
325b6(rgyud): pas// srin po lha min gsang ba pa// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas// dbang phyug kun dang yon tan thob lha rnams kun gyi rgyal por 'gyur//
325b7(rgyud): mkhas pas dbang yang bkod par byed// klu'i gnas su klu rnams dang // gnod sbyin rgyal dang gnod sbyin dang // dI ba rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// lha min gnas su lha min dang /
325b8(rgyud): mkha' lding gnas su mkha' lding dang // mi ci rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// lha dang lha min mi 'am cir bcas pa// bsgo ba'i lung bzhin gus sems kyis// rdo rje 'jigs sgra che ldan pa// de'i
326a1(rgyud): phyag dbang @##/ dbang du thams cad 'gyur// rdo rje 'jig su rung ba yi// sgra chen po yi phyag rgya'o// kun la rdo rje rab 'phrul pa// de'i 'og tu brjod par bya// dpal ldan mchod
326a2(rgyud): 'byed pa pos// phyogs bcu'i dag na bzhug rnams kyi// sangs rgyas rnam pa kun la mchod// srid pa bdag nyid che ba rnams kyis// bsam yas mchog min gang yang med// 'ju ba dang bcas
326a3(rgyud): shing mi rgyas pas// bsam pa dang ni g.yon tshul gyis// rdo rje thal mo bcu ma byas la// phyogs bcu rnam pa kun du 'dud// dpral bar thal mo sbyar byas la// phyogs rnams kun du
326a4(rgyud): yongs bskor zhing // dus gsum rnams par bzhugs pa yi// bde gshegs kun la phyag bya mchod// sems can 'dul ba'i dgos pa ni// bsam pa ji bzhin 'jug pa ste// bsam
326a5(rgyud): pa tha dad sems can khams// bsam pa sna tshogs rnam par 'phel// 'asam pa sna tshogs rnam rtog pa// bsam pa chags med de dang des// sngags pas rnam pa thams cad du// sems
326a6(rgyud): can khams mnga' gtul bar bya// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // kun la shes pa cher 'byung ba'i// sgeg dang dpal dang snying rje dang // 'gad dang khros dang 'jigs byed dang // 'jig rung
326a7(rgyud): slad byung zhi ba rnams// bsam pa chags pas rnam 'gyur dgongs// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // kun la ye shes byang byed pa'i// rkang pa g.yas dang g.yon pa rnams// gom pa 'dzes dang
326a8(rgyud): ldan pa yis// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa ni// gar byed pa yi tshul gyis su// 'dzub mo 'the bo rtse sprad la// g.yon phyogs su ni blta bar bya// g.yas dang g.yon pa sbyar chu la gyis//
326b1(rgyud): 'dzub bcas rgyas pa gus sgrims shing // lag na rdo rje gser ldan pas// rjes su chags par gar bya'o// lha rnams kun dang gsang ba dang // lha ma yin dang mi rnams dang // 'dod
326b2(rgyud): khams dbang phyug dbang po dang // sa gsum gnas rnams phyags byed cing // mig zur bgad dang bltas pa yis// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur// sa gsum thams cad
326b3(rgyud): 'gugs byed na// sa stengs mi rnams smos ci dgos// lha yi rgyal po sogs bkug nas// sdom pa can gyis dbang 'jog ste// thams cad bsgo ba bzhin byed cing // mngag bzhug
326b4(rgyud): par ni rab tu bgod// rdo rje cher ldan kun shes nas// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// rdo rje glu yis bskal bas na// rjes su chags dang chags chen 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpar mos pa yis//
326b5(rgyud): gA dang gar ni rab tu bya// bsam pa chags pas rgyal gyur nas// sems can khams ni rjes chags bya// rdo rje'i glu yin no// sa gsum dag na 'bar ba'i sku mnga' ba'i// rjes su chags
326b6(rgyud): mdzad 'dul ldan pas// nyi ma stong phrag bcu bas lhag pa'i 'od zer stong dang ldan pa pos// rnam mngacha byas gzugs kyis sems can 'gro ba chags mdzad pa// sems dpa'
326b7(rgyud): dbang phyugs dam pa mdzes pa'i stobs ldan gar mdzad gsol// sha dang sa la sog pa'i glu/ rdo rje gar gyis byas pa na// sa gsum thams cad 'gugs byed na// sa stengs mi
326b8(rgyud): rnams smos ci dgos// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje nyid du yang bsgyur zhing // rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// thams cad la ni gar ma par bya//
327a1(rgyud): ga dbang #/ gom stobs thams cad mdzes ldan par// g.yas pas 'gum pa'i phyag rgya dang // g.yon pas btang ba'i phyag rgya bya// thig zung dag dang ldan
327a2(rgyud): pa yis// lag pa g.yas dang g.yon pa yis// 'khyud par byed pa'i sbyor ldan pas// tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams ni// rnam pa ku ni dbang bsgyur te//
327a3(rgyud): mngag bzhug par ni rab byed cing // rdo rje can gyi lung la brtson// rdo rje chags pas chags byas pas// shin du chags pas drag myos pa'i/ lha dang
327a4(rgyud): mi dang gsang ba po// bsgrub bya rnams kyang sngags pas bsgrub// rdo rje lus la yang chags pas// 'dod chags thams cad yongs su 'dor// rdo rje
327a5(rgyud): glu stan ldan pa yis// sems can khams rnams chags por bya// rdo rjes su chags pas chags pa'i phyir// lha rnams thams cad dbang du 'gyur//
327a6(rgyud): oM rdo rje glu'i snyan pa'i sgra rnams thams cad dang // bzod nas rang bzhin dag pa rdo rje sems pa bskul// sgyu ma'i dngos rnam mang dang // sman pa'i sgra ni de nid
327a7(rgyud): dang // sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul thams cad kyis// dbang ltar de nas sangs rgyas snang // 'jig rten thams cad yi ngas su 'dren// bdud rnams thams cad yongs
327a8(rgyud): 'dul// shes pa thams cad yongs su spong // sems can thams cad yo ngas smin byed// glu 'di rab tu len byed cing // rdo rje gang ni rab byas na// lha dang gang dag
327b1(rgyud): gnod sbyin dang // lha min klur bcas thams cad 'grub// rdo rje glus 'dren pa'o// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje sems dpar yang bsgyur te// dpal chen bsam pa
327b2(rgyud): kun chags pas// dbang po lnga po bsten par bya// mthun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa rkang pas pha rol gnon// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyisin// /
327b3(rgyud): seng ge bzhin du bsgying bar bya// tshangs pa'i gnas la yang gnas te// rdo rje se gol sbyor ba dang // rdo rje bsnun stabs tshul gyis ni// tshangs pa la sogs rgyu bar bya/
327b4(rgyud): rdo rje glu ni len byed cing // sa gsum 'bar ba'i sku ldan pa// nyi ma bye ba 'bar mtshungs pa// nam mkha' mtshungs shing mnyam med pa// chos dang rgyal mchog rnams kyi
327b5(rgyud): gtso// sangs rgyas ska mchog de la 'dud// so yis mchu ni/ rab gnon cing // kun nas mig can khros gnyer gzhin// rkyad pa rdo rje bsnyen nas su// phyogs bcu kun nas blta bar bya//
327b6(rgyud): g.yas pa rdo rje tshul gyis su// phyog rnam kun du rang grags pa// lha 'jigs 'od zer 'bar ldan zhing // bsreg pa'i bskal pa zhan lta bu// bsgrub 'gyur rdo rje me 'bar ba// 'jig pa che
327b7(rgyud): ltar bzod dka' bas// bgegs rnam la ni sbyor bar bya// rdo rje 'chang ba bsrung 'gyur kyang // hU~M brjod pas ni thal bar klog/ 'jigs pa me ltar babod dka' ba// rdo rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje slob dpon rdo rje 'chang /
327b8(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes lag bslab pas// snying khar rdo rje khu tshur gnyis// gzhag nas 'di snyam bsam bya ste/ sa dbyam 'das du ya / nga na 'phru tha/ pa drang spyong ba sa/ smye khye pa bya// sa ngas dang /
328a1(rgyud): phyag dang / gos dang rin chen rgyan gyi char// de dag rnams la kun du gdab// ci bder yang dag stabs pas na/ snying rjes spyan ras gzigs dbang bzhin/ kun du yongs
328a2(rgyud): su rgyas par bya sems can kun gyi bla med bde/ thob par shog ces bsam par bya/ snying rje'i phyag rgya'o// des nas slong dpon rdo rje 'chang / rdo rje ye shes legs bslabs pas//
328a3(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgya ba cing bya zhing // 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar bar bya/ dgang dang 'god pa'i sbyor ba yis/ de nas myur du spang bar bya/ rdo rje 'gang chen phyag rgya 'di/ rdo rje 'chang nyid bzhin du
328a4(rgyud): bkod// bgad pa chen po'i phyag rgya'o// de nas lags pa g.yas bteg ste// g.yon pa rnyed pa phyogs su bzhig/ g.yon brkyang rkang stabs byas su// de nas thal mo yang sbyar te/ 'jig
328a5(rgyud): rung sgras ni rgyas byas cing // thal mo sbyar ba btud par bya// 'jigs su rung ba chen po'i sgra'i phyag rgya'o// g.yas brkyang pa stabs bzhag ste// lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab rol du// khu tshur
328a6(rgyud): gnyis ni bcas par bya// dgegs kuni nad par bya ba'i phyir// mgul pa nges par smad bye zhing // sgra chen rab btu brjod bya na// phyag rgya 'di yi sbyor ba yis/ bgegs rnams thams
328a7(rgyud): cad 'dar bar 'gyur/ 'thun pa'i rkang stabs bya nas su/ 'chog mar thal mo sbyar byas la// lag pa gnyis lhag par bzhag/ g.yas brkyang dang stabs sbyor ba yis// sngags
328a8(rgyud): pas 'khor lo bzhin du bskor// ha ha zhes pas rab brgyan la// phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te// ri rnams phya mar brlog byed na// sdang ba'i sems can ci smos te// sngags pa'i 'don
328b1(rgyud): pa bzhin du 'gyur// 'thun pa'i rkang sta byas nas su// lag pa gyen du sgreng byas la// gdung bu'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya// de bzhin so yis ma mchu mnan// g.yon pa brkyang ba'i lag
328b2(rgyud): sbyar ba// bgegs rnams kun la bsnan par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni rgya chen te// bgeg rnams thams cad bzlog par byed// phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas// thams cad bzlog
328b3(rgyud): par 'gyur ba yin/ 'thun pa'i rkang stabase byas nas su// lag gnyis brang la sbyar ba las// lag pa g.yas pa sgreng byas te// lags pa g.yon brkyang legs sbyar ba// tho ba yi ni phyag rgya
328b4(rgyud): yis// rdo rje 'chang nyid yin pa'ang bsnun// rdo rje tho bas bsnun par bya// de'i mod la phye mar 'gyur// rdo rje tho ba'i sdang stobs so// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang // lag pa
328b5(rgyud): 'chan khung bzhugs par bya// nyi ma 'bar 'dra 'di 'dra bas// haM brjod bsnyems pas thur du lta// lag na rdo rje nyid bsgyur te/ de 'jigs su rung ba'i sgra phyung la// rgya mtsho ma 'dar
328b6(rgyud): bcas pa yi// sa rnams thams cad g.yo bar 'gyur// so yis mchu ni mnan byas la// rdo rje rkang pas bsnan par bya// phyag rgya 'di ni legs sbyar bas// de dag thams cad
328b7(rgyud): 'dar bar 'gyur// g.yas brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// lag gnyis khu tshur bcangs tshul gyis// g.yon pa brang la sbyar bar bya// g.yas pa gyen du bsgreng byas la// 'jub
328b8(rgyud): mo myur du snang byas shing // rdo rje sgra ni 'byung byas la// gal te sangs rgyas nyid bsgyur yang // bgegs rnams thams cad skyel bar bya// rdo rje can gyis bshad yin na//
329a1(rgyud): phyag dgang @/ sdang ba'i sems can smos ci dgos// phyag rgya 'di ni bskyod pas na// de dag thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// g.yas pa gyen
329a2(rgyud): du bsgreng byas la// lag pa thal mo brkyad par bya// g.yon pa brang du sbar bya// lag pa myur du bsnun stabs kyis/ hUM dang bcas pas sa la bsnun/ nam mkha' me 'bar 'dra ba
329a3(rgyud): yaM// ral gri phyag rgya bcings byas la// bgegs rnams thams cad btung bar bya// rdo rje can gyis bshad yin no// rdo rje can 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa 'og
329a4(rgyud): tu bcug nas ni// rkad pa'i dbus nas bzung byas la// de'i gyen du bteg par bya// hUM zhes rdo rje sgra dang ni// khros shing khro gnyer bcas pa yi// rkang pa de yis yang bsnun la/
329a5(rgyud): der ni bgegs ni bsam par bya// rdo rje rkang pas bsnan byas na// ri rab rnams kyang phye mar brlag// rdo rje rkang pa'i sdang stabs so// g.yas brkyang rkang stangs sbur pa'i sa
329a6(rgyud): lag gnyis 'khor lo'i tshul du bkying // sa yis ma mchu mnan// khros pa'i// kun du 'khor lo 'phang bar bya// phyogs rnams kun nas gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing rnams
329a7(rgyud): zhig par 'gyur// zhig par gyur pa'i zhing rnams nas// rgyal ba dam pa rnams kyang byon// byang chub sems dpa' rdza 'phrul che// gang gzhan dbang ni thob
329a8(rgyud): 'gyur rnams// slong zhes gyur nas blo ma ldan pa// lag na rdo rje'i gnas su dong // srog zad can ni mi rung gis// bu gcig ded kyis ci zhig bya// khyor ni ci ltar
329b1(rgyud): 'dod pa bzhin// nged kyis myur du bsgrub po zhes// rdo rje sems dpa' blo ldan la// lung ni yongs su nod par mdzad// skal pa me ltar gyur pa yis// g.yas
329b2(rgyud): brkyang rkang stabs byas nas su// 'bar ba'i phyag rgya legs sbyar pas// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar bya// sa gsum 'bar bar mthong gyur nas// sngags pa
329b3(rgyud): rnams la rtog 'tshe ba// bgegs byed ma rungs chen po pa// srin po sdang ba rnams skrag go// phyag rgya 'di 'dra mthong gyur nas// de nas de dag zhi lar 'gyur//
329b4(rgyud): de tshe nges par bsnun blangs la// sdigs pas gyen du 'a'ang par bya// de che sos ni mchu mnan la// myur da gom pa gcig por to// des par bsnyen la bsnan de che//
329b5(rgyud): srin po sdang ba bgegs byed pa// de dag thams cad phye mar 'gyur// rdo rdzo 'as bsnan phyag rgya yis// de dag thams cad bzlog par bya// dbang chen gnas la gnas nas
329b6(rgyud): su// lag pa gnyis ni bsgreng byas la// lhan po rgyal po blangs nas su// lag pa gnyis su de bzhag nas/ sngags la pa ni bgegs byas pa// sngags pa'i sems can
329b7(rgyud): rnams la bsnun// bsnun pas rnams par phu 'gyur cing // 'chi bar 'gyur te the tshom med// rnal 'byor gzhol pa'i sngags pa la// gal te bsreg cing bgegs byed
329b8(rgyud): na// de che sngags pa stabs tshan gyis// phyag rgya 'di la sbyar bar bya// phyag rgya 'di la rab sbyar ba// mthong nas de dag dang par 'gyur// de nas slob dpon rdo rje 'chang // rdo rje
330a1(rgyud): sngag kyi thabs bshad//
330a2(rgyud): da#/ ye shes legs bslabs pas// rgyal ba kun la phyag byas nas/ cod lan sngags pa shar phyogs khang bltas la// lags pa g.yas pa 'chog mar bzhag/
330a3(rgyud): g.yon pa rkyad pa'i phyogs su bzhag/ hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung la// 'brug sgra la 'dra'i phyag rgya yis// phyogs rnams kun du bskor bar bya// g.yas pa brkyang ba'i tshul gyis kyang
330a4(rgyud): ngang ba'i tshul gyis sbyar ba yis// lag pa g.yas pa gdengs byas nas// rgya mtsho rnams kyang bteg par 'gyur// dang pa'i rtswa gyi phyogs rgya'o// rkang pa g.yas pa brdeg nas su//
330a5(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni sar bcugs la// a.a la la zhes rnam brgyan pas// sa gsum thams cad bzhes byas na// rgya mtshor bcas pa'i ri rab kyang // thams cad cad shin du brdeg
330a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// ma d+ha ra da ti se dang // gzhan yang gang dag ri rnams kyang // ha la ha la'i phyag rgya yis/ bsnun pa de dag slar ma chags// g.yas dang g.yon pa'i sbyor ba yang
330a7(rgyud): lag pa gnyis ni ldo par bzhag// hUM brjod bsnyems pas mar bltas de// so yis mchu ni mnan byas pa// rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis 'gegs rnams thams cad bza' bar
330a8(rgyud): bya// g.yon pa brkyang pa'i sbyor ba yis// de'i tshen g.yon bteg ste// khros dang bcas pas rkang bzhags// sa gsum thams cad drang par bya// drang pa'i cod pan
330a9(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya'o// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa gnyis ni bteg byas la// bgegs rnams thams cad 'ching byed cing // 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor//
330b1(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di la legs sbyar bas// de dag bcings dang gzir par 'gyur// bgegs thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje can nyid kyis bshad// bgegs skrag par pa'i phyag
330b2(rgyud): rgya'o// rnal 'byor stan la 'dug nas su// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg ni si na// lag gnyis 'khor lo du byas nas// rkang pa gcig ni yongs su bskor/ 'khor lo cod pan
330b3(rgyud): phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel par bya// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// me tog thal mo sbyar tshul gyis// de yi tshe na sa la bzhag/ de nas myur du
330b4(rgyud): yang bteg go// 'dis mchod pas na sngags pa la// thams cad bgegs byed mi 'gyur ro// 'am chod pa'i cod pan gyi phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang
330b5(rgyud): mdzad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' bskal pa// gsang ba'i bdag po skrag par byed pa zhes ba'i sdang stabs yod do// nga byang chub sems dpa' gyur ba na//
330b6(rgyud): bskal pa dpag tu med par gyur pa de'i dus na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas rgyan gyi dbyangs las ngas thos kyis/ de legs par nyon la yid la zung shig
330b7(rgyud): dang ngas khyod la bshad do// de yis skrag par byas nas bgegs// log 'dren thams cad brdungs par 'gyur// 'chi bar gyur te the tshom med// lag gnyis phan tshun bsnol nas
330b8(rgyud): su// g.yon pa brkyang par basbyar de// phyogs rnams kun du bskor bar bya// deng nas brkyang pas yang mnan no// skrag byed 'di ni skrag pa che// bgegs rnams thams cad
331a1(rgyud): gdagabazlog pa ste// skrag pas rnam par phung 'gyur zhing // 'chi bar 'gyur de the tshom med// de nas bkang ba'i tshul gyis kyang // mig ni thur du lhas byas pa// lag
331a2(rgyud): pa g.yas pa brkyang nas ni// g.yon pa brang la bcer byas te// lag pas la brdabs nas ni// rdo rje thal mo bsnun par bya// rdo rje thal mo sbyar pa'i sdang stabs// rnal 'byor
331a3(rgyud): stan la yang 'dug ste// 'tshogs mar thal mo sbyar byas la// rkang pa g.yas pa bteg nas su// 'khor lo bzhin du yongs su bskor// 'di ni rlung 'ching chen po ste// sngon gyi rgyal ba
331a4(rgyud): rnams kyis gsungs// gal te rnam 'thor rlung byung yang // de yang mi g.yo 'dug par 'gyur// rlung 'ching ba'i sdang stabs so// gar gyi tshul gyis legs bslab pas// rkang
331a5(rgyud): pa spo bar byas pa yang // lag pa thur du smad byas la// lag gnyis 'the bo srin lag sprad// g.yon pa brkyang ba lag sbyar te// lag pa g.yas pas gar bya'o// gar gyis bgegs
331a6(rgyud): rnams thams cad ni// shin du dga' ba bskyed par 'gyur// dga' bas sngags pa de la ni// de dag phyin chad bgegs mi byed// 'thun pa'i rkang stabs byas nas su// lag pa g.ya
331a7(rgyud): pa bsgreng byas te// g.yon pa ral gri tshul byas la// gnyis ka gcig tu sbyar bar bya// gal te rdo rje 'chang gyur kyang // bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya// kun nas shin/
331a8(rgyud): du drangs nas kyang // de nas phyag rgya gtod par bya// rdo rje zhags pas bcing byas nas// gnod par gyur pas kun du yang // a la la zhes sgra 'byin zhing / sems ni slong zhes bya
331b1(rgyud): ba yis/ blo ldan lag na rdo rje la// lung ni yongasu nod par byed// phyin chad bgeg ni ma byed ces// lag na rdo rjes gzir ba'i phyag rgya'o// sngags pa ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin//
331b2(rgyud): de nas snying rje yang bskyed de// sngags pas mnyam bzhags la ni// me tog thal mo sbyar na su// de yi tshe na de dag la// gang tshe sngags pas mnyam bzhag ste// khyed cags bgeg ni ma byed
331b3(rgyud): par// gnas nas deng zhes brjod par bya// g.yas brkyang sdang stabs byas na su// lag pa gyen du sgreng par byas// g.yas dang yon pa'i tshul gyi kyang // khu chur mtshan khu gnyis su
331b4(rgyud): bzhag// hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra ldan pa ka/ g.yas drag po'i las byed pas// phyog rnams thams cad kun nas kyang // rdo rje gzir bar gzir bar bya// gzhan yang gang dag log 'dren bgegs//
331b5(rgyud): srin po gang dag drag pa dang // rgod marta yi kha gdangs par// de dag thams cad gzir gyur cig/ rdo rje gzer ba'i phyag rgya yis// gzer nas de dag lhag gyur te// shin du mi bzad da byed/
331b6(rgyud): cing // srog zad gyur na m+b+hi rung gis// ci 'tshal bka' ni myur brtso lo// bsgrub pa'i lung ni nod par byed// sngags pas ci 'dod lung bzhin du// gal te lung ni nod byed na/ de ltar na ni thar
331b7(rgyud): par 'gyur// gzhan du ni nam yang min// shin du mi bzir bas na// khyod ni ci bzhi de bzhin du// bgyid kyi bka' lung brtso cig ces// de tshe de skad de skad smra// 'tshogs mar rdo rje thal
331b8(rgyud): bzhag nas// de nas dag dam chig sbyin// sa la bgegs kyi gzugs bris la// g.yas pa brgyad pa mnan nas su// rdo rje ral gri phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcur lnga/
332a1(rgyud): byag dag/ bya// brtsub pa byas pas de dag kun// de la skyabs su 'gror bar byed// snying rje ldan pa'i sems kyisu// de nas phyag rgya btang bar bya// snying rje'i
332a2(rgyud): sems kyis de dag la// ma 'jig shig ces smra bar bya// sngags pas de yi 'dod pa bzhin// de nas de dag gar gnas 'dod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams par snang
332a3(rgyud): mdzad kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la bka' bstsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag phyag rgya gsum yod do// gang ngas bskal pa dgu bcu rtsa gcig tu/ byang chub sems dpa'i
332a4(rgyud): spyad pa spyod pa'i che// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa spyod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po las phyag rgya gsum thob ste// bskul pa du mar de stan pa tsam gyis bgegs kyis nga la
332a5(rgyud): gces kyis/ sems rtse cig tu bsgrims la de nyon cig/ g.yas brkyang stabs byas nas su// lags pa g.yon pa snying khar bzhag/ g.yas pa gar dang bcas pa yis// chog
332a6(rgyud): mar legs par bzhag par bya// bgegs rnams rtag tu gzhig pa yi// dam tshig 'di ni brjod pa yis// 'di ni bstan pa tsam gyis kyang // bros par 'gyur te the tshom med//
332a7(rgyud): phyir bzlog pa ni yang byas la// sa la lag pa 'ardab par bya// lag pa gnyis ni bteg nas su// de che 'khur ba dpung bar bya// rdo rje phyag rgya bcing bas na// de tshe bgegs rnams
332a8(rgyud): bcom par 'gyur// rdo rje can ni nyid 'gyur kyang // rdo rje phyag rgya bcom 'gyur na// mthong ba ba tsam gyi bgegs rnams kun bud par 'gyur ba smos ci dgos// sngags pa shar
332b1(rgyud): phyogs bltas 'dug la// lag pa g.yas la skur rten te// g.yon pa brkyang ba legs byas la// g.yon pas thams cad bkug par bya// thams cad ni sa ni bkug nas na su// rje'i bya
332b2(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgyas bsnun ni// de'i mod la phyi mar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang 'dzad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bka' bskul pa// lag na
332b3(rgyud): rdo rje de'i slob ma rnams las gtogs par khyod kyis su yang brnyas par mi bya'o// sems can ma dang pa de dag ni tshul 'di la yid mi ches shing de dag la 'di skad du 'di ni// sangs
332b4(rgyud): rgyas kyis gsung ba ma yin no zhes smras pas// de dag ni rnalam du yang bsgrag par mi bya na phyag rgya lta ci smos// gsad pa pa'i bdag po de la slob dpon gyis slob ma rnams
332b5(rgyud): kyi mtshan nyid shes na sbyin par bya'o// gzhan du na ma yin no// de nas lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la gzugs te// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
332b6(rgyud): ldan 'das gang dag slob dpon la brnyas par bgyid pa dag la rnam par smin pa ci lta bu lags// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bstsal pa// lag na rdo rje lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten skag pa
332b7(rgyud): 'gyur gyis de skad ma smra shig/ gsang pa'i bdag po 'on kyang cung zhig brjod par bya// dpa' bo bsgrims te nyon cig/ mtsham med lo sags mi bzad ba// dmyal la gang dag pas bshad
332b8(rgyud): ba de rnams kyi ni gnas su brjod// der ni bskal ba mtha' smra// da lta bas na rnams kun du// de la nam yang brnyas mi byar// gsang ba'i 'das pa sleb bla ma ji ltar lta bar bya
333a1(rgyud): phyas dag/ gzhe na// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la ci lta ba bzhin du'o// de yi sems ni de lta na// rtag tu dge ba skye bar 'gyur// de ni 'jig rten thams cad la// phan par byed
333a2(rgyud): pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// lag na rdo rje dpar bskur pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las// sdang skabs rim par phye ba/ rdzogs sgo//
333a3(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa chen pos bdag nyid rgyas pa de dag gi tshig gi 'khor
333a4(rgyud): lo'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyis dbyings yangs pa la dmigs nas 'jug cing bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas//
333a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'byung ba mngon du byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi gsung dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms
333a6(rgyud): par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i mdo la de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag gi ye shes shin tu rgyas pa dpag tu med pa bsgrub
333a7(rgyud): pa'i don du thugs su chud nas// de dag nyid na bzhugs bzhugs bzhin phyag rgya brkyang ste/ lag na rdo rje spyi bor bzhag nas lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// //
333a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po lagaso legs so// rdo rje ye shes rdzogs byed pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas byas pa bzo// sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/
333b1(rgyud): dam pa gsang ba khyod kyis shod/ gzungs sngags tshul du dgod byos la/ gang du bzhugs ma thag tu ni/ sgrib pa thams cad med gyur pa// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad par
333b2(rgyud): gyis// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed de dag thams cad phyag slar bskams so// de nas lag na rdo rje ting nge 'dzin las langs
333b3(rgyud): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bske da ma/ sdig pa thams cad byang par byed ma/ nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed ma/ bgegs thams cad rnam par 'jig par byed ma/
333b4(rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad bskyed ma/ zhagazud sa sngags chen mo'i mgo mchog 'di slaso// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+huHsarba mu khe b+hu b+ha sarba tha hep+lu ta ma ta ri sarba ba pA
333b5(rgyud): na ni/ sha ni ga dza pan dza pan dza/ ma te ma ta ga ma ri/ ga ma ri ha sa ha sa/ da ma da ma/ ma tha ma tha/ ba tan sa ya sarba sha trun ta ra ma te/ bi ma le/ pu rA ya bu ra y+ya ra/ pra ti
333b6(rgyud): dzA na/ sarba pU Tha rus si ti/ b+ha ga wa te/ ga nag na/ dza hi dza hi/ bi ma le sa ni/ kA ma ni/ ha 'a ba ni/ ra ba ni/ ma ting ge swA hA// // lag na rdo rje gzugs sngags mchog
333b7(rgyud): gsang pa 'di smras ma thag tu/ de sa de'i mod las chen po 'di 'gul lo// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// ldeg rab tu ldeg go// lho phyogs 'gro na phyogs dma'o// byang phyogs mtho na
333b8(rgyud): shar phyogs dma'o// nyi ma dang zla ba yang sa la ltung ngo // rig sngag 'chang rnams kyang // byang chub sems dpa' gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag kyang //
337a1(rgyud): phyag dang #myong myong por gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yang spong slong por 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la yid kyis phyag byas zhing gnas par
337a2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de slong slong por gyur pa mthong nas/ de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// kye grogs po dag khyod kyis ye shes chen po dbang bskur/
337a3(rgyud): ba'i gzungs chen po dran par gyis shig/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// lag na rdo rje gzungs 'di ni mthu
337a4(rgyud): chen po 'di yin na/ sgrub pa po gang la la zhig 'di 'dzin pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / mchod pa byed pa'i mthu chen po ji ltar rig par bya/ de skad ces sbas pa dang / byang chub
337a5(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// 'jam dpal gsang sngags 'di'i mthu 'am/ nus pa 'am/ mthu bgyings pa ci 'dra
337a6(rgyud): ba'o// 'jam dpal shar phyogs logs na 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
337a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags 'di/ byang chub
337a8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje ho la 'dzin du gzhug pa'i phyir byin no// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la byin ma thag tu/ de'i mod la gzungs sngags 'di'i mthus de'i
337b1(rgyud): baspu'i khung bu thams cad nas/ sangs rgyas kyi gzugs rnams 'byung zhing bzhugs te/ mtha' rtogs par mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa ma gtogs par
337b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thams cad la dbang thob pa de dag gis kyang 'di 'dra ba yin zhes bstan par mi nus so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
337b3(rgyud): gzugs so de dag gis nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar gyur nas gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' chen po de la
337b4(rgyud): 'od zer gyi dbang bskur nas sku de nyid du zhugs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzungs sngags chen po 'di nyid kyi mthus so// de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur
337b5(rgyud): gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis chos thams cad kyis
337b6(rgyud): bdag pos dbang bskur ba yin na/ khyod kyis kyang gzungs chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
337b7(rgyud): lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal las don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes gang
337b8(rgyud): dag gzungs sngags kyi tshul du gnas shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa dag zhon cig/ de dag gang zhe na/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu She d+d+he/
339a1(rgyud): @sarba tha/ a ma ri a ma ri/ ta ta ban dza dza dza/ mi tsi mi tsi/ sro Ta swo Ta/ ma tha ma thA/ dur ngan dam ka sA hA/ nam sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba
339a2(rgyud): mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha he he ko na te/ sarba ha thA ga ta ba ni ke/ ba ten ta re/ tang Ta tad Ta/ hU~M phaT hUM phaT/ gardza gardza/ ba ra ma ti ba ra ma ti/ baM hA ri ge swA hA/ na ma sarba tathA
339a3(rgyud): ga te b+h+ya/ sarba tha mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha/ ba ga ti/ prad dz+nyA pa ra mi ta a/ sarba pa pa k+ShA ya ka ri/ dz+nyA na a tsi swa ni/ ban tsa pan tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ a na ya
339a4(rgyud): a na ya/ sa ra sa ra/ ma ra ma ra/ sarba bu ta dzi na tri ye swA hA/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+yAM/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha/ gardza gardza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma/ ban dza ban
339a5(rgyud): dza/ dun du pi/ nir go she/ ha na ha na/ bin tan sa ya/ mo ta ya/ da ha da ha/ pi pu la/ ni ra ma la/ a ha ra/ gad dza gad dza/ sarba pu ta ba ru ba ru ba ti/ sa ti ma
339a6(rgyud): pi laM ba swA hA// // 'jam dpal gzungs sngags chen po 'di ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
339a7(rgyud): bskyed pa/ byang chub snying por ston par byed ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung ma nor ba'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mig mi 'dzum pa
339a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la bltas te 'di skad ces sba so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du blta bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na
339b1(rgyud): khyod ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes chen po sngon ma mthong ba rnams dang / dam tshig la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig tu rgyun mi chad par bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes zhen
339b2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang ldan pa'i gzungs sngags 'di yid la byed pa'i phyir ro// de nas de'i mod la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ dbang chen po bskur ba'i gsang sngags la sogs pa
339b3(rgyud): ye shes bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu las/ nges par 'byung ba'i ye shes chen po'i rdo rje rtogs par gyur to// ye shes chen po rdo rje de rtogs ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
339b4(rgyud): kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin chen po dag byung bar gyur to// kye ma'o ye shes chen por dbang bskur bas 'jam dpal 'di la dbang bskur to zhes stong gsum gyi stong
339b5(rgyud): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sgra 'ur ces grags so// de'i mthus 'dam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab
339b6(rgyud): kyi rdul snyed dag/ ud pa la chen po nang du zhugs par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas chos kyi sku rtogs pa'i mthus de'i mod la'ang ma
339b7(rgyud): gzho nur gyur pa'i spu'i khung bu'i mtshan rnams dang / cod pan dang / rgyan dang / yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs rnams byung zhing zhug
339b8(rgyud): te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu la gnas pa/ sems kyi dbang thams cad thob pa de dag gis kyang sru'i khung bu gcig gi tshad kyang rtogs par ma nus na/
340a1(rgyud): bya/ @nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / gzhan 'jig rten pa rnams kyi lta ci spos/ de nas 'jam dpal gnonur gyur pas yid la byed pa de dag btang ste/
340a2(rgyud): yang byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la mig mi 'dzum par ring du bltas na/ zhing rnams 'di dag yongasu sbyang bar bya/ rgyal sras kun gyi smon lam mthu rdzogs bya/ sem can phan
340a3(rgyud): dang snying brtse nad med cing / zhi ba bdud rtsi rnyed dka' ye shes bstan/ ye shes dam pa ces pa de thos nas/ sangs rgyas zhing nas sems can khrag khrig phrag/ grangs med khyod kyis brjod pa
340a4(rgyud): dgrol bar bya// khyod ni ting 'dzin bstan pa mchog tu bya// zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pa la 'di skad ces
340a5(rgyud): spraso// 'jam dpal leg so leg so// 'jab dpal khyod kyis tshig 'di sbas pa ni/ shin tu rtsigs te khyod yang leg so 'jam dpal khyod 'di lta bu'i gzungs sngags chen po'i gzung
340a6(rgyud): sngags kyi gzhi rnams yid la byed pa ni/ shin du dka' ba byed pa'o// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'di lta bu dag yid la byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang /
340a7(rgyud): bsgrub pa dang / glegs bam du byas nas/ nyin gcig bzhin du byas na/ phyag 'tshal ba de dag ni shin tu dka' ba byed pa ste/ de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu gyu
340a8(rgyud): de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe nye bar gnas pa yang de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur te/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa sangs
340b1(rgyud): rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed dag mthong ba sbyin par 'gyur te/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur/ de nas 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas//
340b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// gang gis tshe 'di nyid la byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos kyi tshul 'di rtogs nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go 'phang thob par/
340b3(rgyud): bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par brtson par byed pa dag/ go 'phang de thob par gyur pa ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba sngon ma byung ba de/
340b4(rgyud): sems can chen po shod cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gang du bzhug pa
340b5(rgyud): tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga po dag yongasu byang bar gyur pa dang / dpal thams cad bskyed par 'gyur ba dang / sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba dang / ye shes chen pos dang
340b6(rgyud): bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par bkod pa de nyon cig/ 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/ 'jam dpal de la lus can thams cad las grol ba 'gyur
340b7(rgyud): ba dang / gsang chen dang bcas pa/ slob dpon rnams kyi gsang chen mchog/ gsang bas kyang ni ches gsang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs sngags 'di dag gi
340b8(rgyud): ming du gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor brjod par bya'o// 'jam dpal de dkyil 'khor gyi tshad la/ tshad ni khru brgya tham pa ste/ slob dpon nyid kyi khru yis bya// ye shes 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khodas
341a1(rgyud): cha ni rnam pa gsum du bya// blo dang ldan pas cha gsum du// der ni sgo 'khyung rnams yin te// der ni sgo yang bzhi btod do// gru bzhi lham pa kha khyer bcas//
341a2(rgyud): sngon gyi bzhin du cha gsub la// cha ni rnam pa brgyad brgyad bya// mkhas pas cha brgyad byas nas su// dbus kyi char ni 'jug par bya// chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par/
341a3(rgyud): thang cig thang cig bsam byas la// phun sum tshogs pa kun byed pa// dkyil 'khor rgyal po bri bar bya// sngags pas de'i dbus su ni// pad+ma mchog tu mdzes pa bri// kun kyang
341a4(rgyud): mar gang 'dra ba ste// 'dab ma brgyad pa brjod pa yin// de'i steng du bum pa ste/ bum pa'i steng du ud pal la// ud pa la steng du dung bri ste// me lce phreng byas 'khrigs pas
341a5(rgyud): mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin de ni// ye shes chen po'i dbang bskur ldan// cha brgyad gang dag brjod pa yang // dbus kyi cha las byung ba ste// gzungs kyi tshul du bri ba yang // cho ga
341a6(rgyud): rim bzhin 'thun par bya// de la shar phyogs su ni// bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo dbang chen po'i dkyil 'khor na gnas pa/ ud pa la'i phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/
341a7(rgyud): mtha' rnams su ud pa la bkram zhing / me lce 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus gnas par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma so sor 'brang ma chen mo ni 'di yin no// na ma sarba ta thA ga
341a8(rgyud): te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba oM b+ha ga ba ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta dza ni ge/ yur ba pra ti da nya na/ ta Ta ta Ta/ ma d+ha ma d+ha/ a ha ra a ha ra/ hAM dza dza hi hi sA hA/ dbang ldan gyi
341b1(rgyud): phyogs su bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje mi 'pham ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ chu'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad+ma shin tu mdzes pa bri// de'i steng du 'khor lo ste// me lce phreng bas
341b2(rgyud): 'khrigs pa mdzes// de la gzungs sngags ni 'di yin te/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta thA ga ta hUM hri/ sarba bu da ma tha ri/ ban dza pan dza/ ma tha ma tha/ da ma man/
341b3(rgyud): garga ri ga g+ha ri swA hA/ me'i phyogs su brten nas su// bcom ldan 'das ma sdig pa thams cad spong bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ chu dang dbang chen ldan pa yi/
341b4(rgyud): phyag rgya gzungs rnams bri bar bya// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje ste// me'i lce nang du shin du mdzes// de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te/ na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha tra
341b5(rgyud): Ta tra Ta/ mu hu mu hu/ sarba pa bA sho d+ha ni swA hA/ lho phyogs 'dul dka' ba zhes pa'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ me dang rlung dang ldan pa yin/ ud pal la ni de bri'o// de'i steng du
341b6(rgyud): rin po che// bsam pa thams cad yongs bskor ste// me lce 'phreng ba 'khrigs zhi ba// pad+ma rnams kyis yongasu bskor// de la gzungs sngags bri bar bya ba 'di yin te/ namasaH
341b7(rgyud): ta thA ga te b+h+ya// sarba mu khe d+ha/ sarba tha/ ta ka ta ka/ moT mo Ta/ da ha da ha/ sarba ta ka dz+nyA na nir dza ya te swA hA/ bden bral phyogs su bdud thams cad rnam par 'jig pa zhes bya ba'i
341b8(rgyud): gzungs bri bar bya'o// de'i dkyil 'khor te/ pad+ma'i dbus su gnas pa ni/ de'i steng du sngags pa yis// lcags kyu shin tu mdzes pa bris// phan tshun 'brel ba'i rdo rje dag/ blo dang ldan
342a1(rgyud): pas der bgod do// de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba ta ha ha/ mi hu mi hu/ de ma da ma/ kha hi kha hi/ dun dun/
342a2(rgyud): mi tsi mi tsi/ dur dan ta ma ni swA hA/ byang phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma sgo mtha' yas pa bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs bri bar bya ste/ de'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni/
342a3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba yin// de'i steng du pad+ma ste// 'di ni dus mtha' me lta bu// de'i steng du ral gri ste// 'od zer rnams kyis rab tu bskor// me lce phreng bas 'khrigs
342a4(rgyud): ldan pa'i// ud pal rnams kyis kun khyad bya// de la gzungs sngags 'di yin te// na ma sarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba tha/ mi tsi mi tsa~M/ gardza gardza/ sro ta ya swo
342a5(rgyud): ta ya/ ma tha ma tha ma tha/ da ma da ma da ma swA hA/ rlung gi phyogs su ni dkon mchog 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags bri bar bya ste/ de'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor te/
342a6(rgyud): ra gsum la ni gtsug tor gnas// lcags kyu thams cad dgab par bya// me lce 'bar ba'i phreng bar ldan// nub phyogs su ni bcom ldan 'das ma bskul byed ma bri bar bya ste/
342a7(rgyud): de'i dbang chen dkyil 'khor de// de la rdo rje legs par gnas// de'i steng du pad+ma che// de'i steng du bgrang nor breng // de dag me lce phreng gis dkris// steng du pad+ma rnams kyis dgab// de nas
342a8(rgyud): cha gsum pa la ni// byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul che// sngags pas ci rigs bri bar bya// brgyad rnams su yang snga ma bzhin// de la shar du rnal 'byor pas// 'jig rten dbang po de chen bri/
342b1(rgyud): padra shin tu mdzes pa ste// de'i phyag rgya brjod pa yin// me'i phyogs su ni byang chub sems dpa' kun du bzang po'i phyag rgya yid bzhin gyi nor bu bri bar bya'o// dbang ldan gyi phyogs su ni
342b2(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa phyag rgya u dpal bri bar bya'o// lho phyogs su ni lag na rdo rje phyag rgya rdo rje bri bar bya'o// byang phyogs su ri byams pa phyag rgya ril ba spyi thugs bri bar bya'o//
342b3(rgyud): rlung gi phyogs su ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba phyag rgya pad+ma la bri bar bya'o// bden bral gyi phyogs su na mkha'i snying po phyag rgyar ral gri bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni sa'i snying
342b4(rgyud): po phyag rgyar pad+ma bri bar bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la leg so legs so// lag na rdo rje khyod kyis sems can thams cad la ban
342b5(rgyud): pa dang bde ba'i phyir// ye shes chen pos dbang bskur ba gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor brjod pa khyod yang legaso legaso// de skad ces spras pa dang / lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal
342b6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad smras so// 'jam dpal ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di su'i lag na gnas pa de nyon mongs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// 'jigs
342b7(rgyud): pa dgra dang bral bar 'gyuraro// gal te chom rkun gyi nang na 'dug gam/ srin po'i nang na 'dug gam/ dgra'i nang na 'dug gam/ 'thab pa'i nang na 'dag kyang rung ste/ de'i lus la mtshon
342b8(rgyud): gyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// chom rkun gyi 'jigs par mi 'gyur/ srin po la sogs pas 'tshe bar mi 'gyuraro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung / rtag tu dpal dang /
343a1(rgyud): phyag #/ ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa thams cad yongasu byang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa yang de la nyin gcig bzhin du
343a2(rgyud): mngon du 'gyur// 'chi ba'i chen yang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongasu gzigs par 'gyur/ shi nas kyang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// gang 'dzin pa
343a3(rgyud): dang / klog pa dang / yid la byed pa dang / ming tsam yang 'dzin pa lta ci smos te/ de'i sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// des ngan song gi sgo rnams bcad par 'gyur// des
343a4(rgyud): ngan song dang ngan 'gro rnams rgyang ring bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig nang bar langs nas su// lan gcig klog par byed pa'i mi// srid pa nyams par bya ba ni// sdig las grol bar de
343a5(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba// / bam mo bcu gnyis pa ste tha ma'o// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
343a6(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// gsang ba'i bdag po su dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po 'di bris nas
343a7(rgyud): der zhugs par gyur na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ji tsam du 'gyur// lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal kho bos ni de'i bsod nams kyi phung po'i tshad bstan par mi nus
343a8(rgyud): mod kyis 'on kyang / 'jam dpal rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ni rdul snyed du rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sems can sdig
343b1(rgyud): can gang tshul 'di la yid ma ches pa dag yod do// 'jam dpal the tshom mang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin can dang / mi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
343b2(rgyud): yongasu zin pa dang / pha ma la ma gus pa dang / slob dpon dang bla ma la smod pa dang / bla ma'i skyon 'bru'i sems can de dag la ni/ ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i
343b3(rgyud): gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lag tu 'chang du mi gzhug go// rna lam du yang grag par mi bya'o// 'jam dpal de dag gi mdun du gtam yang mi bya'o// gleg pam
343b4(rgyud): bris pa yang de dag gi mdun du dbye bar yang mi bya ste/ sems can sdig can de dag gi srong ba cung zad byas pas kyang / ngan song sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur du
343b5(rgyud): 'ong ngo // 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin no zhes kyang zer ro// de dag gis spong ba cung zad byas pas kyang / ngan song sems can dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur
343b6(rgyud): du 'ong ngo // 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi gsungs pa ma yin no zhes kyang zer ro// de dag gis ni bdag kyang phung la gzhan yang phung bar byed do// de ltar byed pa'i sems can de dag la ni gsang sngag
343b7(rgyud): dngos grub med do// zhes kho bos smra sa'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang rtag tu rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur te/ de dag rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur na/ nges
343b8(rgyud): bar 'byin pa dang / gsang sngags kyi dngos grub gtan med do// de skad ces sbas pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras
344a1(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi tshul 'di dag la dad pa gang yin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni shin tu dka' ba bye ba yin no// nga 'jam dpal khyod kyis ji skad sbas pa de bzhin te/
344a2(rgyud): de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa yin te/ de dag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlob par 'gyuraro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pas/
344a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang ye shes chen pos dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di yi ger 'bri ba dang /
344a4(rgyud): klog bdi'i bsod nams kyi phung po ci tsam du rig par bya ba/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phung po ni
344a5(rgyud): tsam pa de bsod nams kyi phung po de tsam du rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzungs sngags 'di'i rang bzhin du bzhugs te/ tshul 'di ma rtogs par blun
344a6(rgyud): po 'di dag gis mi shes so// 'jam dpal gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gzungs thob pa dang / sems la dbang thob pa ji snyed pa rnams rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul sna tshogs pa byed
344a7(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil gyi 'khor du mchod pa'i sprin/ rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de dag kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no// byang
344a8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po gang bdud pham par byed pa dang / byang chub mngon par rdzogs par rtogs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de dag kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no//
344b1(rgyud): 'jam dpal su gsang ba'i ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'o// dkyil 'khor 'dir yang dbang bskur ba de ni dam tshig thams cad la zhugs pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin
344b2(rgyud): gshegs pa nyid de lta bu'i rang bzhin nam/ gzungs sngags kyi rang bzhin nam/ dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin du gnas pa'i phyir de/ de bas na gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las
344b3(rgyud): ma gtogs pa gzhan med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dkyil 'khor 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir ro// de bas na su 'dir dbang bskur ba de ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbang bskur
344b4(rgyud): kha yin no// 'jam dpal phyogs gar du ye shes chen pos dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags kyi dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa 'am/ gang gi lag na 'chang ba 'am/ gang gi phyir 'bri ba
344b5(rgyud): gang zhig nyin gcig bzhin du nang par langs nas lan re klog pa de la 'jigs pa rnams mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de la nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro// /
344b6(rgyud): 'chi kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal ltos dang sa la gnas pa'i shing dang / nags tshal thams cad ni sa med na de dag kyang med do//
344b7(rgyud): 'jam dpal de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems la dbang thob pa rnams kyang / gzungs sngags 'di dag la
344b8(rgyud): gnas te/ 'di dag gis byin gyis brlabs nas/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i go 'phang thob bo// bdud las rnam par rgyal bar byed do// ci chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// byang chub tu
345a1(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de nas sems can gyi don rnams pa sna tshogs byed do// de dag thams cad kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag gi mthu yin no//
345a2(rgyud): 'jam dpal de lta bas na/ khyod kyis kyang chongs shig/ lhogs shig gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston cig dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ro// 'jam
345a3(rgyud): dpal phyogs gang na ye shes chen por dbang bskur ba'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di byed pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten chen po lta bur 'gyuro// gang gi lag na 'chang ba'i sngags
345a4(rgyud): pa de la yang ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur ro// 'jab dpal sngags pa de la ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtag tu byin gyis brlobs par 'gyur ro// sngags pa des kyang gzung sngags/
345a5(rgyud): chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di rin po che za ma tog bzhin du rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jab dpal sems can sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnangs la gus pa med
345a6(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin tan dang / slob dpon gyi skyon 'bru ba dag yod pa de'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal de dag la ni chung ngu na gtam du bzlas par mi bya/ glegs pam yang bstan par mi bya na/ dkyil 'khor du/
345a7(rgyud): dbang bskur ba dang / klog tu gzhug pa dang / lhar gzhug pa lta ci spos/ 'jam dpal de lta bu dag la ltar gzhug pa dang / tshig tu byung ba ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i 'khrul pa yin
345a8(rgyud): te/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' bag med pa chen por rig par bya'o// de'i 'khrul pa chen po dang / shin tu kha na ma tho ba chen po yin no// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas dang byang chub
345b1(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po la slu ba ni bla'i/ gzungs sngags kyi tshig 'di dag spong ba 'di ni de lta ma yin no// 'jam dpal sangs rgyas rnams 'byung ba ni shin tu dkon te/ dper na u dum/
345b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i me tog bzhin no// de bas kyang gzungs sngags 'di dag ston pa ni dkon no// de bas kyang nan tan gyis bsgrub pa ni dkon no// de bas kyang 'di gang dag gi lag na 'chang ba dang /
345b3(rgyud): gang dag 'di nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / yang na dkyil 'khor dri ba'i sems can dag ni shin du dkon te/ sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi phung po'i mtha' yang
345b4(rgyud): rtogs par mi nus na/ gang nang par langs nas lan gcig klog pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ de'i mtshams med pa lnga byas pa la sogs pa rnams yong su byang bar 'gyur ro//
345b5(rgyud): de 'jigs pa thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad dang / phyir rgol ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyu ro// de'i lus la nad thams cad/
345b6(rgyud): 'byung bar mi 'gyuraro// gang la la dben pa'i phyogs su ba glang gi lci bas dkyig 'khor byugs la me tog phul nas/ tshes grangs dang / zhag dang / byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang po la gro ga/
345b7(rgyud): la bris sam/ yang na yar gyi tshes brgyad dam bcwo lnga la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / lha bshos phul la mar gyi mar me brgyad dang / gser gyi bum pa lnga bzhag nas/
345b8(rgyud): gro ga la bris te/ 'gul pa'ag/ dpung ba'am/ lag dar ram/ rkeng ba la btags la 'thab mo 'gyed pa'i nang du 'gro 'am/ dgra'i nang du 'gro 'am/ lam du 'gro'am/ rgyal ngom
346a1(rgyud): phyag dang @#/ pho brang du 'gro 'am/ de la 'jigs pa de dag thams cad mi 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di ni sems can rnams la bsrung ba'i mchog yin te/ khyim 'am gtsug
346a2(rgyud): lag khang gang na gzungs sngags 'di dag 'dug pa'i gnas de bsrung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gang gis gzungs sngags 'di dag las gang dag yang rung bas bsrung
346a3(rgyud): ba byas pa las 'gal bar byed pa de ni lha dang bcas pa dang / bdud dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na ngas ma mthong ste/ de'i mgo bo lag na rdo rje ngas rdo rje kun du 'bar zhing /
346a4(rgyud): me lce gcig tu gyur pas 'gem so// 'jam dpal char mi 'bab na yang gzungs sngags 'di klag par bya'o// pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'ong na yang klag par bya'o// mi nad/
346a5(rgyud): kyi gnod pa byung yang klags na/ gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur te/ de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa
346a6(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor shin du rgya che ba 'di dang / shin du zab pa 'di dang /
346a7(rgyud): gting dpag dka' ba dang / gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba sems can sdig can rnams la bstan du mi rung ba 'di ni/ lag na rdo rje khyod kyis shin du dkon pa shig smras te/
346a8(rgyud): de ni sngon ma thos na/ 'di ni sems can ji lta bu la bshad par bya/ lag na rdo rjes smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang dag byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa la zhugs pa dang / gang gi tshe de dag
346b1(rgyud): gi byang chub kyi sems grub par gyur pa de'i tshe/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ye shes chen pos nga'ang /
346b2(rgyud): bskur ba'i gzungs kyis dkyil 'khor bzhug par bya'o// gang dag gi byang chub kyi sems rdzogs par ma gyur pa de dag ni/ bzhag par mi bya ste/ de dag ni dkyil 'khor
346b3(rgyud): yang ba ltar mi gzhug go// de dag la ni phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags kyang bstan par mi bya'o// 'jam dpal gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'dir byin gyis
346b4(rgyud): brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ phyag rgya chen po gang bcings pa tsam gyis thams cad byin gyis brlob par 'gyur ba bshad kyis nyon cig/ lag pa gnyis sbyar la g.yas pa'i gung mo
346b5(rgyud): bkug pa ni/ gzungs sngags thams cad 'dren pa'i phyag rgya ste/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya/ sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA/ a gad dza pra ni ti/ ba ri pu ra ni/ ma si ma si maM ga
346b6(rgyud): li hUM phaT swA hA// de snyed kyi gung po snga ma bzhin du bzhag na dkyil 'khor du gzungs rnams byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phyag rgya ni
346b7(rgyud): lag pa gnyis khu chur bcangs la 'dzub mo gnyis bkug na thams cad drangs par 'gyur ro// de'i sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+he/ sarba su khe b+h+ya/ sarba'/ To d+hi sa twa/
346b8(rgyud): ma ti ri/ a gdang / a ga dang / ba ni dang ku ru ku ru hU~M hU~M pab/ de nas mchod pa mchog 'byung ba'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya ste/ lag pa gnyis sbyar te/ lag pa gnyis sbyar nas
347a1(rgyud): 'dzub mo gnyis gteg pa ni/ mchod pa 'byung ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis mchod pa'i cho ga byin gyis brlabs pa'o// gsang sngags la/ na maHsarba ta thA ga ta b+hu/
347a2(rgyud): sarba mu khe b+h+ya/ sarba thA/ ma hA pu tsa pra ti na hUM phaT/ pra ba ra ta ya sarba ta thA ga te sa ma ye swA hA/ 'jam dpal de la slob dpon gyis cho ga snga ma bzhin du/ slob ma yongasu bzung
347a3(rgyud): bar bya ste/ byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa 'grub pa la dkyil 'khor bstan tam/ phyag rgya bstan par bya'i/ de ma yin pa la ni glegs pa pa yang bstan par mi bya'o// 'jab dpal gal te/
347a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dam tshig mi shes pa'i sems can la dkyil 'khor bstan te/ phyag rgya bstan na des sangs rgyas dang
347a5(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' rnams bslus par 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa lnga byas pa ni bla'i/ dam tshig
347a6(rgyud): mi shes pa dang / lus yongasu ma sbyangs pa dang / byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa ma grub pa la ston pa ni de lta ma yin te/ 'jam dpal sems cad de dag gi mdun du ni de yang tshig tu brjod pa
347a7(rgyud): mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can sdig can de dag ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la drin mi bzo ba dang ma dad pa yin pa'i phyir ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/
347a8(rgyud): sems can la ya mtshan du 'dzin par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyam nas/ cang mi zer bar 'gyuraro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonur gyur pas byang chub sem
347b1(rgyud): dba' lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces sbas// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags 'di dag nyan pa dang / dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa dang / klog pa dang / dran par byed pang/
347b2(rgyud): chung ngu rnalam du yang zag pa tsam du gyur pa de yang shin du dkon pa min// lag na rdo rjes sbas pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin du'o/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ 'jam dpal gang dag ga sa
347b3(rgyud): sngags 'di dag la mchod pa byed pa dang / yi ger 'bri ba'i sems can de dag ni shin du dkon par rig par bya'o// su gro ga 'am gzhan la bris te yan lag dang / nying lag gang yang rung ba la
347b4(rgyud): 'chang na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung zhing / sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba nyin gcig bzhin du/ sangs rgyas stong las bsags pa 'gyuraro// /
347b5(rgyud): 'jam dpal phyogs gang na gzungs sngags chen po'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa 'di ni gnas pa 'am/ gang gi lag na yod pa'i sa phyogs de ni mchod rten lta bur 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam
347b6(rgyud): dpal gzhonur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smra so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags 'di dag 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton
347b7(rgyud): byed pa gang yin pa de la ni/ kho bos mchod pa dang bsnyen bkur bya'o// de'i phyi bzhin du yang rtag tu 'brang bar bya'o// gang gi tshe 'chi ba'i dus byed pa de'i chen yang kho bos dge ba
347b8(rgyud): ba zhes gnyen bya ste/ rtag tu byang chub kyi las nye bar ston par byed do// 'jam dpal legs legs// tshig 'di legs par sbaso// lajam dpal kho bos kyang mchod brgyan/
348a1(rgyud): byag yang / rtag tu de'i phyi bzhin du 'brang bar bya'o// rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o// 'chi ba'i tshe na yang de lung bstan par bya'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pas/
348a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po gang bsgrub pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i
348a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gzungs sngags gang bsgrubs na/ sngags pa che 'di nyid la ci 'dod/
348a4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba'i gzungs sngags 'di dag gis dngos grub pa rim par bye ba rgyas par shog cig/ de skad ces sbas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje
348a5(rgyud): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sra so// 'jam dpal gzungs sngags bsgrub pa sangs rgyas kyis ji skad gsungs pa bshad kyis nyon cig/ tshes grangs rgyu skar sbya
348a6(rgyud): mi dgos/ bsrung ba bya mi dgos bgegs 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ gzungs sngags bsgrub pa'i tshe yang rtag tu sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po thams cad kyis byin gyis brlab par
348a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal thog mar re shig gzungs sngags 'di dag gi ri mo'i gzungs cho ga 'byung ste/ kha thabs bzhin du ras nyos la/ sra la sogs pa med par bya'o// de nas pa
348a8(rgyud): las byung ba'i rnam lngas bskus la spos chus bkru'o// de nas tshe grangs dang zhag byed pa dang / yud tsam bzang po la ri mo bris te/ ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pa 'drir gzhug go/
348b1(rgyud): ri mo mkhan de yang 'khor los bsgyur bas bsrung bar bya'o// nyin gcig bzhin du lha bshos dang mchod pa yang 'bul lo// de nas ri mo mkhan gyis dbus su bcom ldan 'das ma shes
348b2(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa bri bar bya ste/ dkyil mo dkrung du 'dug la thor tshugs can ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ma'i g.yon rol du so so 'brang
348b3(rgyud): ma chen mo bri bar bya ste/ ud pa la'i rgyal po la 'dug cing ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs shing lcang lo 'byang ba'o// g.yas phyogs su rdo rje mi pham pa'i med pad+ma dkar po
348b4(rgyud): 'dug cing rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan la/ lag pa g.yon pa na 'khor lo thogs pa/ g.yas pa bcom ldan 'das ma la phyag 'tshal bar bya/ steng gi phyogs su yang rig sngags 'chab
348b5(rgyud): gnyis med tog gi char 'bebs pa bri'o// 'og logasu bsgrub pa po lag na pog phor thogs la/ bcom ldan 'das ma la blta zhing ya la ga me tog can bskyil ba la 'dug par bya'o//
348b6(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems phyogs gtsang ma 'am/ dben pa 'am/ ri 'am/ nags tshal lam/ gtsug lag khang ngam/
348b7(rgyud): gang yang yid dang 'thad pa der 'dug la/ spongs mo'i zas za zhing nang gi gtsang sbra'i spyod pas/ ri mo'i gzugs sku gzugs de'i mdun du gang yang rung ba gcig bzung ste/
348b8(rgyud): ba'i bus bzlas brjod byas la/ ba mar bla nyal ci 'byor pas mchong bar bya ste/ mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas la/ nang par rab nyi la gang kar mtshan pa 'byung ste/ thas
349a1(rgyud): pa'i lus la 'od zer sdang bar 'byung ste/ rnga ma'i sku gzugs la me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'arkyang rnams kyang maco'i sgra 'dod pa khyab
349a2(rgyud): 'brug sgra grag par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ma yang bu grub zin gyis longs shig brjod par 'gyuraro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gi mchod yon bul nas/ bcom ldan
349a3(rgyud): 'das mal 'di skad du/ bdag gi bsam pa rdzogs par mdzod cig ces smos shig 'on tang bcom ldan 'das mas rig sngags 'chang gi lag nas bzung ste/ de bzhin
349a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dzeg ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i mthus/ ska cig yud tsam cig la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mcho
349a5(rgyud): pa bsgrub par byed cing sems can gyi khams thams cad ska cig re re la dga' bar byed do// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
349a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das ma'i ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi cho 'phrul pa'i mdo 'di don thams cad bsgrub pa/ sdig pa thams ca
349a7(rgyud): rab tu sel ba/ 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu sbyor ba/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa yin no// 'jam dpal gang ri mo'i sku gzugs 'di mtho
349a8(rgyud): ba dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / su'i lag na 'dug pa dang / su yi ger 'bri ba de la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub kyi lam ston par 'gyur zhing / sdig pa thams cad dang bran
349b1(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams las skye bar 'gyur/ bdud sdig can rnams kyis gtses par mi 'gyur/ 'chi ba'i tshe sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur/
349b2(rgyud): lag na rdo rje de bzhin no// ji skad sbas pa de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang ri mo'i sku gzugs 'di mthong ba dang / ri mo 'bri ba dang /
349b3(rgyud): gang gi lag na 'dug pa de la yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur zhing / ngan song nas ngan 'gror yang 'gro
349b4(rgyud): khar mi 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su rtag tu skye bar 'gyur te// smon lam thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas 'jam dpal gzhonar gyur pas/ byang chub
349b5(rgyud): sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la gsol ba btab pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po gzungs sngags 'di dag spyi'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par dbye ba gang gis byang chub kyi spyod pa
349b6(rgyud): gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi tshogs chung ngus/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams mnyes par 'gyur ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs byed par
349b7(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du sems can thams cad sdug bsngal las thar byed par 'gyur ba khyod kyis shod cig/ de skad ces spras nas/
349b8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes/ 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sbaso// 'jam dpal sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir/ gzung sngags 'di dag/
351a1(rgyud): gi sbyo'i bsgrub pa rnam par bye ba bshad kyis nyon cig/ 'jam dpal de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spong ba'i/ byang chub sems dpa
351a2(rgyud): gang yang rung ste/ ri mo'i sku gzugs gzhan la/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i gzugs sam/ kha dog gam dbyangs sam/ yi ge yid la bsams te zla ba drug gi bar du bsgob nas/
351a3(rgyud): las thams cad nus par 'gyur te/ dug gi mthong ba tsam gyis kyang bros par 'gyur ro// gdon gyis zin pa ni bsdigs pa tsam gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro// gzhan ci yang rung
351a4(rgyud): bas zin pa yang mthong ba tsam gyis gtong bar 'gyur ro// dpag tshad brgya'i pha rol na gnas pa la yang thams cad byed par 'gyuraro// 'jigs pa thams cad la ni lan brgya rtsa
351a5(rgyud): brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i skud pas bsrung bar 'gyur ro// bsgrub pa rnams sam/ ro langs bsgrub pa rnams la gzung sngags 'di dag las gang yang rung ba gcig gi bdag
351a6(rgyud): bsrung ba dang / gzhan bsrung ba dang / phyogs bcing ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi 'tshams bcad par bya'o// de'i lus mi snang bar byed par 'dod na/ skar ma rgyal la ldong ros kha thabs
351a7(rgyud): bzhin nyos te/ rang gi khrag khrig bsgos la/ de nas phyung ste rim par sku gzugs kyi mdun du bzhag go/ de nas zas 'o ma dang phye ma'i 'de gu za zhing / zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum /
351a8(rgyud): lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la kha zas mi za ba lag pa g.yon par zhag go// bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/
351b1(rgyud): thig le byas pas lus mi snang bar 'gyur zhing 'dod dgur bsgrub pa'i gzugs can lo lnga stong thub par 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das ma mthong bar 'dod na/ zla ba gcig gi bar du song
351b2(rgyud): zas za zhing / ri'i rtse mor song ste/ bcom ldan 'das ma brjod par bya'o// de nas zhag gsum bsrung ba byas te/ zla ba nyal byang chub kyi shing drung du ci 'byor pas lha bshos 'bu la ni/
351b3(rgyud): mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das ma bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas nam byed na bcom ldan 'das ma nyid 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de la me tog dkar po dag gis mchod yon 'bul lo//
351b4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bsgrub pa po'i spyi bor byug nas bu leg so// khyod la mchod pa ci zhig sbyin par bya/ zhes de nyid zer ba dang / ci 'dod pa de slong bar bya ste/ 'dod zho 'am/
351b5(rgyud): rig sngags 'chang 'di nyid dang / lus mi snang ba 'am/ sa 'og tu 'gro ba 'am/ gzhan yang yid la gang 'dod pa ci yang rung ba de thams cad spang bar bya'o// ci ste ngang pa bsgrub par
351b6(rgyud): 'dod na/ li khri la ngang pa'i gzugs byas te/ ri mo'i gzugs kyi drung du bzhag la/ kun tu me tog gi mchod pargyas par byas la/ mtshan rangs pa bcom ldan 'das mal bzlas bcwo/
351b7(rgyud): byas na nang bar nyim gar kar 'grub par gyur te/ de la zhon nas namakha' la 'phags pa dang / tshangs pa gnyis par 'gyu'o// ji sem bya bsgrub par 'dod na/ 'jam pa la ma
351b8(rgyud): / tha gas ca tug sa/ bcu gi bar du 'a pal la rgyas 'i ngag mas na thag
352a1(rgyud): sa dang / @#brjod byas na/ nyi ma shar kar rma bya'i skad 'byin par 'gyur te/ skad byung ma thag tu sngags pas blang bar bya'o// de blangs pa tsam gyis sngags pa srin drug gi bu dang 'ang
352a2(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// cho ga de bzhin du sa bsrung gi bu bsgrub par 'gyur na brgya byin dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// lus mi snang bar bsgrub par 'dod na mi'i thod pa blangs la/ shing ngar dang lhan cig
352a3(rgyud): tu zhib mor btags te/ tha ma yar gyi ngo ches brgyad la arga'i shing gi me bus la/ ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgyas pas byas nas mtshan rangs sbyin bsreg byas te/ nang pa de'i

352a5(rgyud): zangs kyi snod du bcug ste ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgyas pa byas na/ shel bzhin du 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du mtshan rangs brjod par bya'o// de nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ des thig leg
352a6(rgyud): byas nas lus mi snang bar 'gyur te/ lo lnga stong thub par 'gyuraro// ci ste mig sman bsgrub par 'dod na/ sna ma'i me tog dang / lig bu mig blangs te/ zhib mor byas la snga ma bzhin du
352a7(rgyud): zangs kyi snod du bzhag ste/ mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas snga ma bzhin du gyur nas des mig la bsdus na/ phyogs gang du bltas pa der zad dang /
352a8(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// ci ste des mig la bsdus na/ rgyal po dang blon po dang / rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa dang / gzhan yang gang su bltas pa des thams cad du 'gyuraro// de nas mig sran gyimacho
352b1(rgyud): bsgrub par 'dod na/ mar gyi ngo la zhag brgyad la mi ro rma med pa blangs te tsan dan dmar po dang / ldan pa'i lha bshos 'phul la/ de nas ri mo'i lag tu mig sman bzhag ste/ bzlas brjod bya'o//

352b3(rgyud): tog brgya stong gyis sbyin bsreg bye ba byas na/ las thams cad bde brag tu 'grub par 'gyuraro// rgya mtshor 'bar ba'i chu rlung du zhugs te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad tsam nas/ bsod
352b4(rgyud): snyoms kyi zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ yang yul sbyin par byed do// yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la bsod snyoms kyi zas za zhing / ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya sto/
352b5(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs zhi bar 'gyuraro// de nas zas su 'o ma 'thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs 'byed par 'gyur ro//
352b6(rgyud): mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig bsrung bar byas te/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyas par byas la/ mtshan rangs bzlas brjod byas nas/ des ri mo'i sku gzugs
352b7(rgyud): 'od zer byung bar 'gyuraro// des grub par 'gyur te/ ra dzu ma da da ti'i lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ro// rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi nang du zhugs la lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas/
352b8(rgyud): zas su chu 'thungs na/ de nas nam 'al ral gri mthong bar 'gyur/ de nas mchod yon phul nas blang bar bya'o// des blangs pa tsam gyis spa lung lo 'khyil cing / lo bcu drug thon/
353a1(rgyud): phyag dang #pa'i sha tshugs 'dra bar 'gyur la/ rig sngags 'chang du mas bskor cing / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa du mas rol mo du mas rol mo byed cing 'gro bar 'gyu ro// nyin gcig
353a2(rgyud): bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing du ma yang mthong bar 'gyuraro// thams cad du yang mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprin dag 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe shi bar 'gyur ba de'i tshe yang sangs rgyas kyi
353a3(rgyud): zhing rnam par dag pa rnamasu skye bar 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigasu skye bar 'gyur/ ci ste ral gri bsgrub par 'dod na/ dgon par song na chu 'thung zhing bzlas
353a4(rgyud): brjod byas na/ de'i 'og tu zla ba nya la ci 'byor pa'i mi'i gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ mtshan rangs par bzlas brjod byas na de nas ral gri 'bar bar 'gyur te/
353a5(rgyud): de blangs pa ces gyis rig sngags du 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// lo drug khri 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// de yang mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// 'dod pa bzhin dgos
353a6(rgyud): pa thams cad byed par 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe shi bar gyur pa de'i tshe sa dang po la dbang bar 'gyu ro// ci ste zas mi za bar 'gyur bar 'dod na/ lho ma'i rtsa ba blangs la sre dres dang lan gcig
353a7(rgyud): sbyin bsreg byas na/ kha zas mi zad par 'byung // mig nan rgya mtsha btags la lan bdun bsngags te mig bkab na/ mig nad sos par 'gyu ro// ka la bing ka'i rtsa ba srog chag med kyi
353a8(rgyud): chul btab nas lte ba'i phyogasu bskus na/ bud med bde bar bu btsas par 'gyuraro// zla ba spyang 'is zin pa'i tshe/ ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod du bcug ste/ ci ri ri zer gyi bar du
353b1(rgyud): bzlas brjod byas la/ de 'thungs la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// nye ba'i gso sbyong byas nas ches bcu drug nas brtsams te/ til dang sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i sbyin bsreg byas na/

353b3(rgyud): yang byed do// des thos pas phyir mi ldog par yang 'gyur ro// tsan dan dmar po las rdo rje byas pa der bzhag ste/ 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas nas/ de la reg pa tsam gyi
353b4(rgyud): gling bzhi'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// shing sa dri'i 'bras bu sbyin bsreg byas nas/ gang gis ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// rgya shug gi 'bras bu rnams kyang de bzhin te/ gang gi
353b5(rgyud): ming nas brjod cing sprin bsreg byas na de dbang du 'gyur ro// yang nim pa'i 'bras bu sbyin bsreg byas na/ mi gang gi ming nas brjod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// ba ru ra'i me tog sbyin
353b6(rgyud): bsreg byas na/ yul chen por rnyed par 'gyur ro// ma li ka'i me tog sbyin bsreg stong byas na/ zas zad mi shes par 'gyur/ ka ra bi ra'i me tog 'bum 'bum sbyin bsreg byas na

353b8(rgyud): kyi bar du 'azlas brjod bya'o// gu sul kyi sbyin pasreg gis ni rgyal phran thob par 'gyur// shing bil bas me sus la se le ga'i me tog 'bum za gcig sbyin pasreg byas sa/ grubang dbang du

358a5(rgyud): bas tshig thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// bri yang ku'i me tog kha ma bye ba sbyin bsreg khri byas na nyin gcig bzhin du kar sha pa ni lnga lnga rnyed par 'gyur ro// ci ste thams cad bdag nyid kyis legs par
358a6(rgyud): 'dod na grong khyer gyi bdag po'i lha'i gzugs ri mo bris pa la/ skye che'i sprin bsreg byas te de'i thal ba thogs la grong khyer du song ste gtor na de dag thams cad gnyid kyis log cing 'dud par
358a7(rgyud): 'gyur te ci 'dod pa byed do// grong khyer la ci lta ba bzhin du yul la yang de bzhin du bya'o// mtshe'u skam par 'dod na bsreg blugs skye che rang gi khrag dang lpags pa khri sbyin bsreg byas la
358a8(rgyud): de'i thal ba rlangs te mche'u der gtor na mtshe'u skam par 'gyur te/ de na gnas pa'i klu rnams ci 'dod pa bzhin du rin po che rnams 'bulo// a pa ma rga'i yam shing bsregs shing 'bum
358b1(rgyud): sbyin bsreg byas na lha mo dpal mthong bar 'gyu ro// sa tsa ra dzu ma pra yad cha ti/ bil ba'i 'bras bu stong sbyin bsreg byas na rgyal po chen po'i mdun na 'don du 'gyuraro// mya ngan sangs kyi lam shing
358b2(rgyud): bsregs shing 'bum sbyin bsreg byas na rkang bzhi pa thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// sna ma'i me tog 'bum sbyin bsreg byas na rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du tshig bzung bar 'gyu ro// sna ma'i me tog 'buM
358b3(rgyud): sbyin bsregs byas na bud med thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// skye tshe sdong bu'i yam shing bsregs shing sbrang rtsil bstsags pa brgya sbyin bsreg byas na gnod sbyin byas na gnod pa thams cad de la zhi
358b4(rgyud): bar 'gyur ro// 'bras kyi 'o thug dang sAng rtsi babs ma'i nang du gtor na klu mo thams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur te rang gi gnasu te yang khrid par byed do// log 'dren thams cad 'grub par 'dod/
358b5(rgyud): na a ti mug ta ka'i me tog 'bum gtor na log 'dren thaMd dngos grub sbyin par byed do// a shod ta'i lo ma'i sbrang rtsi la bsnyugs te brgyad stong sreg sbyin byas na gnod sbyin mo tha~Md sngags pa
358b6(rgyud): de la nyin gcig snod gang ba ci 'dod pa 'bul lo// rma bya'i sgro brgyad stong sbyin bsreg byas na bdud kyi gnod pa khams gsal bar 'gyur ro// a ka ru sa mi ta nan a ta sa ha pran dzu hu yang/
358b7(rgyud): raja ba shib ti/ thi lang bu'i lam bsreg shing gis mthar rdu nupa ci shi shod ba ti/ a ka ru lam 'bregs shing gis me bus la/ kyil 'brukhri sbyin bsreg byas na yul dbang du 'gyur ro// shing 'o/
358b8(rgyud): ma can gyi me'us la til 'bru 'bum sbyin bsreg byas na sha za zad du 'gyu ro ci 'dod pa byed do// shing ma kas me bus la na la zham gyi 'bras bu brgyad stong sbyin bsreg byas na 'byung po thams cad
359a1(rgyud): dbang du 'gyuraro// 'byung po'i bdag po re re yang nyin gcig tu g.yog brgya gos zas sbyin par byed// gar 'gyu
359a2(rgyud): bar 'dod pa der phrag pa la bskon te 'gro'o// mon sran dre'u 'bru bus sbyin bsreg byas na 'byung po thaMd dbang du 'gyur te/ de
359a3(rgyud): dag sngags pa de'i yo byad thams cad bsgrub/ 'dza dpal 'di dag la sog pa gzung sngags 'di dag rnam kyis bsgrub pa dag ni gang du
359a4(rgyud): sbyor ba de'i dngos grub sbyin par byed// 'dod pa dang sbyor ba tha dad pa sbyor ba yang rung nyung ba yang bsgrub par byedado// 'dzi dpal
359a5(rgyud): gzung sngags 'di dag 'dzin pa dang bsgrub pa rnam la ni bgeg rnaMs kyi skabs medo// lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba lA/ de bzhin gabye
359a6(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi yul rnams kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa'i cho ga rdzogas+ho// // 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud
359a7(rgyud): den po'i rgyal po rdzog s+ho// rgya gar gi mkhan po shi len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban d+he ye shes bsgyur cing zhus
359a8(rgyud): de gtan la phab pa rdzogaso// / bo ti 'di la rnam snang mngon byang dang / phyag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud gnyis
359a9(rgyud): bzhugs pa yin no// maM g+ha la b+ha warU b+hI ho// gcig zhus/ dge'o/
